GE09ram_02_u:1: 2.001.001a kasya cit tv atha kālasya rājā daśarathaḥ sutam 2.001.001c bharataṃ kekayīputram abravīd raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2: 2.001.002a ayaṃ kekayarājasya putro vasati putraka 2.001.002c tvāṃ netum āgato vīra yudhājin mātulas tava
GE09ram_02_u:5: 2.001.004a āpṛcchya pitaraṃ śūro rāmaṃ cākliṣṭakāriṇam 2.001.004c mātṝṃś cāpi naraśreṣṭhaḥ śatrughnasahito yayau 2.001.005a yudhājit prāpya bharataṃ saśatrughnaṃ praharṣitaḥ 2.001.005c svapuraṃ prāviśad vīraḥ pitā tasya tutoṣa ha
GE09ram_02_u:6: 2.001.006a sa tatra nyavasad bhrātrā saha satkārasatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8: 2.001.007a tatrāpi nivasantau tau tarpyamāṇau ca kāmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9: 2.001.007c bhrātarau smaratāṃ vīrau vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:10: 2.001.008a rājāpi tau mahātejāḥ sasmāra proṣitau sutau
GE09ram_02_u:12: 2.001.009a sarva eva tu tasyeṣṭāś catvāraḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13: 2.001.009c svaśarīrād vinirvṛttāś catvāra iva bāhavaḥ 2.001.010a teṣām api mahātejā rāmo ratikaraḥ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14: 2.001.010c svayambhūr iva bhūtānāṃ babhūva guṇavattaraḥ 2.001.011a gate ca bharate rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15: 2.001.011c pitaraṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ pūjayām āsatus tadā 2.001.012a pitur ājñāṃ puraskṛtya paurakāryāṇi sarvaśaḥ 2.001.012c cakāra rāmo dharmātmā priyāṇi ca hitāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:18: 2.001.014a evaṃ daśarathaḥ prīto brāhmaṇā naigamās tathā
GE09ram_02_u:20: 2.001.015a sa hi nityaṃ praśāntātmā mṛdupūrvaṃ ca bhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:22: 2.001.016a kathaṃ cid upakāreṇa kṛtenaikena tuṣyati 2.001.016c na smaraty apakārāṇāṃ śatam apy ātmavattayā
GE09ram_02_u:23: 2.001.017a śīlavṛddhair jñānavṛddhair vayovṛddhaiś ca sajjanaiḥ 2.001.017c kathayann āsta vai nityam astrayogyāntareṣv api
GE09ram_02_u:24: 2.001.018a kalyāṇābhijanaḥ sādhur adīnaḥ satyavāg ṛjuḥ 2.001.018c vṛddhair abhivinītaś ca dvijair dharmārthadarśibhiḥ 2.001.019a dharmārthakāmatattvajñaḥ smṛtimān pratibhāvanān
GE09ram_02_u:26: 2.001.020a śāstrajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca puruṣāntarakovidaḥ 2.001.020c yaḥ pragrahānugrahayor yathānyāyaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:28: 2.001.021c śraiṣṭhyaṃ śāstrasamūheṣu prāpto vyāmiśrakeṣv api 2.001.022a arthadharmau ca saṃgṛhya sukhatantro na cālasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:30: 2.001.023a ārohe vinaye caiva yukto vāraṇavājinām 2.001.023c dhanurvedavidāṃ śreṣṭho loke
GE09ram_02_u:32: 2.001.024c apradhṛṣyaś ca saṃgrāme kruddhair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:33: 2.001.025a anasūyo jitakrodho na dṛpto na ca matsarī
GE09ram_02_u:34: 2.001.025c na cāvamantā bhūtānāṃ na ca kālavaśānugaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:35: 2.001.026a evaṃ śraiṣṭhair guṇair yuktaḥ prajānāṃ pārthivātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:36: 2.001.026c saṃmatas triṣu lokeṣu vasudhāyāḥ kṣamāguṇaiḥ 2.001.026e buddhyā bṛhaspates tulyo vīryeṇāpi śacīpateḥ 2.001.027a tathā sarvaprajākāntaiḥ prītisaṃjananaiḥ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:37: 2.001.027c guṇair viruruce rāmo dīptaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:40: 2.001.029a etais tu bahubhir yuktaṃ guṇair anupamaiḥ sutam
GE09ram_02_u:41: 2.001.029c dṛṣṭvā daśaratho rājā cakre cintāṃ paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:42: 2.001.030a eṣā hy asya parā prītir hṛdi saṃparivartate
GE09ram_02_u:43: 2.001.030c kadā nāma sutaṃ drakṣyāmy abhiṣiktam ahaṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:45: 2.001.031c mattaḥ priyataro loke parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān
GE09ram_02_u:47: 2.001.032c mahīdharasamo dhṛtyāṃ mattaś ca guṇavattaraḥ 2.001.033a mahīm aham imāṃ kṛtsnām adhitiṣṭhantam ātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:48: 2.001.033c anena vayasā dṛṣṭvā yathā svargam avāpnuyām
GE09ram_02_u:49: 2.001.034a taṃ samīkṣya mahārājo yuktaṃ samuditair guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:50: 2.001.034c niścitya sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ yuvarājam amanyata 2.001.035a nānānagaravāstavyān pṛthagjānapadān api
GE09ram_02_u:52: 2.001.036a atha rājavitīrṇeṣu vividheṣv āsaneṣu ca 2.001.036c rājānam evābhimukhā niṣedur niyatā nṛpāḥ 2.001.037a sa labdhamānair vinayānvitair nṛpaiḥ; purālayair jānapadaiś ca
GE09ram_02_u:54: 2.001.037c upopaviṣṭair nṛpatir vṛto babhau; sahasracakṣur bhagavān ivāmaraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:55: 2.002.001a tataḥ pariṣadaṃ sarvām āmantrya vasudhādhipaḥ 2.002.001c hitam uddharṣaṇaṃ cedam uvācāpratimaṃ vacaḥ 2.002.002a dundubhisvanakalpena gambhīreṇānunādinā 2.002.002c svareṇa mahatā rājā jīgmūta iva nādayan
GE09ram_02_u:58: 2.002.004a mayāpy ācaritaṃ pūrvaiḥ panthānam anugacchatā 2.002.004c prajā nityam atandreṇa yathāśakty abhirakṣatā 2.002.005a idaṃ śarīraṃ kṛtsnasya lokasya caratā hitam
GE09ram_02_u:59: 2.002.005c pāṇḍur asyātapatrasyac chāyāyāṃ jaritaṃ mayā 2.002.006a prāpya varṣasahasrāṇi bahūny āyūṃṣi jīvitaḥ 2.002.006c jīrṇasyāsya śarīrasya viśrāntim abhirocaye
GE09ram_02_u:62: 2.002.008a so 'haṃ viśramam icchāmi putraṃ kṛtvā prajāhite 2.002.008c saṃnikṛṣṭān imān sarvān anumānya dvijarṣabhān 2.002.009a anujāto hi me sarvair guṇair jyeṣṭho mamātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:64: 2.002.010a taṃ candram iva puṣyeṇa yuktaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:66: 2.002.011a anurūpaḥ sa vo nātho lakṣmīvāṃl lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:67: 2.002.011c trailokyam api nāthena yena syān nāthavattaram
GE09ram_02_u:68: 2.002.012a anena śreyasā sadyaḥ saṃyojyāham imāṃ mahīm
GE09ram_02_u:69: 2.002.012c gatakleśo bhaviṣyāmi sute tasmin niveśya vai
GE09ram_02_u:70: 2.002.013a iti bruvantaṃ muditāḥ pratyanandan nṛpā nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:71: 2.002.013c vṛṣṭimantaṃ mahāmeghaṃ nardantam iva barhiṇaḥ 2.002.014a tasya dharmārthaviduṣo bhāvam ājñāya sarvaśaḥ 2.002.014c ūcuś ca manasā jñātvā vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:72: 2.002.015a anekavarṣasāhasro vṛddhas tvam asi pārthiva 2.002.015c sa rāmaṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣiñcasva pārthivam 2.002.016a iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā teṣāṃ manaḥpriyam
GE09ram_02_u:73: 2.002.016c ajānann iva jijñāsur idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:74: 2.002.017a kathaṃ nu mayi dharmeṇa pṛthivīm anuśāsati
GE09ram_02_u:75: 2.002.017c bhavanto draṣṭum icchanti yuvarājaṃ mamātmajam 2.002.018a te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadaiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:76: 2.002.018c bahavo nṛpa kalyāṇā guṇāḥ putrasya santi te
GE09ram_02_u:77: 2.002.019a divyair guṇaiḥ śakrasamo rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 2.002.019c ikṣvākubhyo hi sarvebhyo 'py atirakto viśāmpate 2.002.020a rāmaḥ satpuruṣo loke satyadharmaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:78: 2.002.020c dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca śīlavān anasūyakaḥ 2.002.021a kṣāntaḥ sāntvayitā ślakṣṇaḥ kṛtajño vijitendriyaḥ 2.002.021c mṛduś ca sthiracittaś ca sadā bhavyo 'nasūyakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:79: 2.002.022a priyavādī ca bhūtānāṃ satyavādī ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:81: 2.002.023a tenāsyehātulā kīrtir yaśas tejaś ca vardhate
GE09ram_02_u:83: 2.002.024a yadā vrajati saṃgrāmaṃ grāmārthe nagarasya vā
GE09ram_02_u:85: 2.002.025a saṃgrāmāt punar āgamya kuñjareṇa rathena vā
GE09ram_02_u:86: 2.002.025c paurān svajanavan nityaṃ kuśalaṃ paripṛcchati 2.002.026a putreṣv agniṣu dāreṣu preṣyaśiṣyagaṇeṣu ca 2.002.026c nikhilenānupūrvyā ca pitā putrān ivaurasān 2.002.027a śuśrūṣante ca vaḥ śiṣyāḥ kaccit karmasu daṃśitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:88: 2.002.028a vyasaneṣu manuṣyāṇāṃ bhṛśaṃ bhavati duḥkhitaḥ 2.002.028c utsaveṣu ca sarveṣu piteva parituṣyati 2.002.029a satyavādī maheṣvāso vṛddhasevī jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:89: 2.002.029c vatsaḥ śreyasi jātas te diṣṭyāsau tava rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:90: 2.002.029e diṣṭyā putraguṇair yukto mārīca iva kaśyapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:91: 2.002.030a balam ārogyam āyuś ca rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:92: 2.002.030c āśaṃsate janaḥ sarvo rāṣṭre puravare tathā
GE09ram_02_u:93: 2.002.031a abhyantaraś ca bāhyaś ca paurajānapado janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:94: 2.002.031c striyo vṛddhās taruṇyaś ca sāyaṃprātaḥ samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:95: 2.002.032a sarvān devān namasyanti rāmasyārthe yaśasvinaḥ 2.002.032c teṣām āyācitaṃ deva tvatprasādāt samṛdhyatām 2.002.033a rāmam indīvaraśyāmaṃ sarvaśatrunibarhaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:97: 2.002.034a taṃ devadevopamam ātmajaṃ te; sarvasya lokasya hite niviṣṭam
GE09ram_02_u:98: 2.002.034c hitāya naḥ kṣipram udārajuṣṭaṃ; mudābhiṣektuṃ varada tvam
GE09ram_02_u:101: 2.003.001c pratigṛhyābravīd rājā tebhyaḥ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ 2.003.002a aho 'smi paramaprītaḥ prabhāvaś cātulo mama
GE09ram_02_u:102: 2.003.002c yan me jyeṣṭhaṃ priyaṃ putraṃ yauvarājyastham icchatha
GE09ram_02_u:103: 2.003.003a iti pratyarcya tān rājā brāhmaṇān idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:104: 2.003.003c vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca teṣām evopaśṛṇvatām 2.003.004a caitraḥ śrīmān ayaṃ māsaḥ puṇyaḥ puṣpitakānanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:106: 2.003.005a kṛtam ity eva cābrūtām abhigamya jagatpatim
GE09ram_02_u:108: 2.003.006a tataḥ sumantraṃ dyutimān rājā vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:109: 2.003.006c rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bhavatā śīghram ānīiyatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:110: 2.003.007a sa tatheti pratijñāya sumantro rājaśāsanāt 2.003.007c rāmaṃ tatrānayāṃ cakre rathena rathināṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:111: 2.003.008a atha tatra samāsīnās tadā daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:112: 2.003.008c prācyodīcyāḥ pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca bhūmipāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:113: 2.003.009a mlecchāś cāryāś ca ye cānye vanaśailāntavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:114: 2.003.009c upāsāṃ cakrire sarve taṃ devā iva vāsavam
GE09ram_02_u:115: 2.003.010a teṣāṃ madhye sa rājarṣir marutām iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:121: 2.003.013a gharmābhitaptāḥ parjanyaṃ hlādayantam iva prajāḥ 2.003.013c na tatarpa samāyāntaṃ paśyamāno narādhipaḥ 2.003.014a avatārya sumantras taṃ rāghavaṃ syandanottamāt 2.003.014c pituḥ samīpaṃ gacchantaṃ prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt
GE09ram_02_u:122: 2.003.015a sa taṃ kailāsaśṛṅgābhaṃ prāsādaṃ narapuṃgavaḥ 2.003.015c āruroha nṛpaṃ draṣṭuṃ saha sūtena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:123: 2.003.016a sa prāñjalir abhipretya praṇataḥ pitur antike
GE09ram_02_u:124: 2.003.016c nāma svaṃ śrāvayan rāmo vavande caraṇau pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:125: 2.003.017a taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇataṃ pārśve kṛtāñjalipuṭaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:126: 2.003.017c gṛhyāñjalau samākṛṣya sasvaje priyam ātmajam 2.003.018a tasmai cābhyudyataṃ śrīmān maṇikāñcanabhūṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:127: 2.003.018c dideśa rājā ruciraṃ rāmāya paramāsanam 2.003.019a tad āsanavaraṃ prāpya vyadīpayata rāghavaḥ 2.003.019c svayeva prabhayā merum udaye vimalo raviḥ
GE09ram_02_u:128: 2.003.020a tena vibhrājitā tatra sā sabhābhivyarocata 2.003.020c vimalagrahanakṣatrā śāradī dyaur ivendunā
GE09ram_02_u:129: 2.003.021a taṃ paśyamāno nṛpatis tutoṣa priyam ātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:131: 2.003.022a sa taṃ sasmitam ābhāṣya putraṃ putravatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:132: 2.003.022c uvācedaṃ vaco rājā devendram iva kaśyapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:133: 2.003.023a jyeṣṭhāyām asi me patnyāṃ sadṛśyāṃ sadṛśaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:134: 2.003.023c utpannas tvaṃ guṇaśreṣṭho mama rāmātmajaḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:135: 2.003.024a tvayā yataḥ prajāś cemāḥ svaguṇair anurañjitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:136: 2.003.024c tasmāt tvaṃ puṣyayogena yauvarājyam avāpnuhi 2.003.025a kāmatas tvaṃ prakṛtyaiva vinīto guṇavān asi
GE09ram_02_u:137: 2.003.025c guṇavaty api tu snehāt putra vakṣyāmi te hitam 2.003.026a bhūyo vinayam āsthāya bhava nityaṃ jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:139: 2.003.027a parokṣayā vartamāno vṛttyā pratyakṣayā tathā 2.003.027c amātyaprabhṛtīḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtīś cānurañjaya
GE09ram_02_u:141: 2.003.028c tasya nandanti mitrāṇi labdhvāmṛtam ivāmarāḥ 2.003.028e tasmāt putra tvam ātmānaṃ niyamyaiva samācara
GE09ram_02_u:142: 2.003.029a tac chrutvā suhṛdas tasya rāmasya priyakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:143: 2.003.029c tvaritāḥ śīghram abhyetya kausalyāyai nyavedayan 2.003.030a sā hiraṇyaṃ ca gāś caiva ratnāni vividhāni ca 2.003.030c vyādideśa priyākhyebhyaḥ kausalyā pramadottamā
GE09ram_02_u:144: 2.003.031a athābhivādya rājānaṃ ratham āruhya rāghavaḥ 2.003.031c yayau svaṃ dyutimad veśma janaughaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:145: 2.003.032a te cāpi paurā nṛpater vacas tac; chrutvā tadā lābham iveṣṭam āpya 2.003.032c narendram āmantya gṛhāṇi gatvā; devān samānarcur atīva hṛṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:146: 2.004.001a gateṣv atha nṛpo bhūyaḥ paureṣu saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:147: 2.004.001c mantrayitvā tataś cakre niścayajñaḥ sa niścayam
GE09ram_02_u:148: 2.004.002a śva eva puṣyo bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣecyeta me sutaḥ 2.004.002c rāmo rājīvatāmrākṣo yauvarājya iti prabhuḥ 2.004.003a athāntargṛham āviśya rājā daśarathas tadā 2.004.003c sūtam ājñāpayām āsa rāmaṃ punar ihānaya
GE09ram_02_u:149: 2.004.004a pratigṛhya sa tadvākyaṃ sūtaḥ punar upāyayau
GE09ram_02_u:150: 2.004.004c rāmasya bhavanaṃ śīghraṃ rāmam ānayituṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:151: 2.004.005a dvāḥsthair āveditaṃ tasya rāmāyāgamanaṃ punaḥ 2.004.005c śrutvaiva cāpi rāmas taṃ prāptaṃ śaṅkānvito 'bhavat
GE09ram_02_u:152: 2.004.006a praveśya cainaṃ tvaritaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:153: 2.004.006c yad āgamanakṛtyaṃ te bhūyas tad brūhy aśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:154: 2.004.007a tam uvāca tataḥ sūto rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati 2.004.007c śrutvā pramāṇam atra tvaṃ gamanāyetarāya vā
GE09ram_02_u:156: 2.004.008c prayayau rājabhavanaṃ punar draṣṭuṃ nareśvaram 2.004.009a taṃ śrutvā samanuprāptaṃ rāmaṃ daśaratho nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:157: 2.004.009c praveśayām āsa gṛhaṃ vivikṣuḥ priyam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:158: 2.004.010a praviśann eva ca śrīmān rāghavo bhavanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:159: 2.004.010c dadarśa pitaraṃ dūrāt praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ 2.004.011a praṇamantaṃ samutthāpya taṃ pariṣvajya bhūmipaḥ 2.004.011c pradiśya cāsmai ruciram āsanaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:160: 2.004.012a rāma vṛddho 'smi dīrghāyur bhuktā bhogā mayepsitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:162: 2.004.013a jātam iṣṭam apatyaṃ me tvam adyānupamaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:163: 2.004.013c dattam iṣṭam adhītaṃ ca mayā puruṣasattama
GE09ram_02_u:164: 2.004.014a anubhūtāni ceṣṭāni mayā vīra sukhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:166: 2.004.015a na kiṃ cin mama kartavyaṃ tavānyatrābhiṣecanāt
GE09ram_02_u:167: 2.004.015c ato yat tvām ahaṃ brūyāṃ tan me tvaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:168: 2.004.016a adya prakṛtayaḥ sarvās tvām icchanti narādhipam
GE09ram_02_u:169: 2.004.016c atas tvāṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣekṣyāmi putraka 2.004.017a api cādyāśubhān rāma svapnān paśyāmi dāruṇān
GE09ram_02_u:170: 2.004.017c sanirghātā maholkāś ca patantīha mahāsvanāḥ 2.004.018a avaṣṭabdhaṃ ca me rāma nakṣatraṃ dāruṇair grahaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:172: 2.004.019a prāyeṇa hi nimittānām īdṛśānāṃ samudbhave 2.004.019c rājā vā mṛtyum āpnoti ghorāṃ vāpadam ṛcchati
GE09ram_02_u:173: 2.004.020a tad yāvad eva me ceto na vimuhyati rāghava 2.004.020c tāvad evābhiṣiñcasva calā hi prāṇināṃ matiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:174: 2.004.021a adya candro 'bhyupagataḥ puṣyāt pūrvaṃ punar vasum
GE09ram_02_u:175: 2.004.021c śvaḥ puṣya yogaṃ niyataṃ vakṣyante daivacintakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:177: 2.004.022c śvas tvāham abhiṣekṣyāmi yauvarājye paraṃtapa 2.004.023a tasmāt tvayādya vratinā niśeyaṃ niyatātmanā 2.004.023c saha vadhvopavastavyā darbhaprastaraśāyinā
GE09ram_02_u:178: 2.004.024a suhṛdaś cāpramattās tvāṃ rakṣantv adya samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:179: 2.004.024c bhavanti bahuvighnāni kāryāṇy evaṃvidhāni hi 2.004.025a viproṣitaś ca bharato yāvad eva purād itaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:180: 2.004.025c tāvad evābhiṣekas te prāptakālo mato mama
GE09ram_02_u:181: 2.004.026a kāmaṃ khalu satāṃ vṛtte bhrātā te bharataḥ sthitaḥ 2.004.026c jyeṣṭhānuvartī dharmātmā sānukrośo jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:182: 2.004.027a kiṃ tu cittaṃ manuṣyāṇām anityam iti me matiḥ 2.004.027c satāṃ ca dharmanityānāṃ kṛtaśobhi ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:183: 2.004.028a ity uktaḥ so 'bhyanujñātaḥ śvobhāviny abhiṣecane 2.004.028c vrajeti rāmaḥ pitaram abhivādyābhyayād gṛham 2.004.029a praviśya cātmano veśma rājñoddiṣṭe 'bhiṣecane
GE09ram_02_u:184: 2.004.029c tasmin kṣaṇe vinirgatya mātur antaḥpuraṃ yayau
GE09ram_02_u:185: 2.004.030a tatra tāṃ pravaṇām eva mātaraṃ kṣaumavāsinīm
GE09ram_02_u:186: 2.004.030c vāgyatāṃ devatāgāre dadarśa yācatīṃ śriyam 2.004.031a prāg eva cāgatā tatra sumitrā lakṣmaṇas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:187: 2.004.031c sītā cānāyitā śrutvā priyaṃ rāmābhiṣecanam 2.004.032a tasmin kāle hi kausalyā tasthāv āmīlitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:192: 2.004.034c uvāca vacanaṃ rāmo harṣayaṃs tām idaṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:194: 2.004.035c bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣeko me yathā me śāsanaṃ pituḥ 2.004.036a sītayāpy upavastavyā rajanīyaṃ mayā saha 2.004.036c evam ṛtvigupādhyāyaiḥ saha mām uktavān pitā
GE09ram_02_u:195: 2.004.037a yāni yāny atra yogyāni śvobhāviny abhiṣecane
GE09ram_02_u:196: 2.004.037c tāni me maṅgalāny adya vaidehyāś caiva kāraya
GE09ram_02_u:197: 2.004.038a etac chrutvā tu kausalyā cirakālābhikāṅkṣitam 2.004.038c harṣabāṣpakalaṃ vākyam idaṃ rāmam abhāṣata 2.004.039a vatsa rāma ciraṃ jīva hatās te paripanthinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:198: 2.004.039c jñātīn me tvaṃ śriyā yuktaḥ sumitrāyāś ca nandaya 2.004.040a kalyāṇe bata nakṣatre mayi jāto 'si putraka
GE09ram_02_u:199: 2.004.040c yena tvayā daśaratho guṇair ārādhitaḥ pitā
GE09ram_02_u:200: 2.004.041a amoghaṃ bata me kṣāntaṃ puruṣe puṣkarekṣaṇe
GE09ram_02_u:201: 2.004.041c yeyam ikṣvākurājyaśrīḥ putra tvāṃ saṃśrayiṣyati 2.004.042a ity evam ukto mātredaṃ rāmo bhāratam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:202: 2.004.042c prāñjaliṃ prahvam āsīnam abhivīkṣya smayann iva
GE09ram_02_u:203: 2.004.043a lakṣmaṇemāṃ mayā sārdhaṃ praśādhi tvaṃ vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:204: 2.004.043c dvitīyaṃ me 'ntarātmānaṃ tvām iyaṃ śrīr upasthitā
GE09ram_02_u:205: 2.004.044a saumitre bhuṅkṣva bhogāṃs tvam iṣṭān rājyaphalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:206: 2.004.044c jīvitaṃ ca hi rājyaṃ ca tvadartham abhikāmaye
GE09ram_02_u:207: 2.004.045a ity uktvā lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mātarāv abhivādya ca
GE09ram_02_u:208: 2.004.045c abhyanujñāpya sītāṃ ca jagāma svaṃ niveśanam
GE09ram_02_u:209: 2.005.001a saṃdiśya rāmaṃ nṛpatiḥ śvobhāviny abhiṣecane 2.005.001c purohitaṃ samāhūya vasiṣṭham idam abravīt 2.005.002a gacchopavāsaṃ kākutsthaṃ kārayādya tapodhana
GE09ram_02_u:211: 2.005.003a tatheti ca sa rājānam uktvā vedavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:212: 2.005.003c svayaṃ vasiṣṭho bhagavān yayau rāmaniveśanam 2.005.004a sa rāmabhavanaṃ prāpya
GE09ram_02_u:213: 2.005.004c tisraḥ kakṣyā rathenaiva viveśa munisattamaḥ 2.005.005a tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ rāmas tvarann iva sasaṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:214: 2.005.005c mānayiṣyan sa mānārhaṃ niścakrāma niveśanāt 2.005.006a abhyetya tvaramāṇaś ca rathābhyāśaṃ manīṣiṇaḥ 2.005.006c tato 'vatārayām āsa parigṛhya rathāt svayam
GE09ram_02_u:215: 2.005.007a sa cainaṃ praśritaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāṣyābhiprasādya ca
GE09ram_02_u:216: 2.005.007c priyārhaṃ harṣayan rāmam ity uvāca purohitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:217: 2.005.008a prasannas te pitā rāma yauvarājyam avāpsyasi
GE09ram_02_u:218: 2.005.008c upavāsaṃ bhavān adya karotu saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:219: 2.005.009a prātas tvām abhiṣektā hi yauvarājye narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:220: 2.005.009c pitā daśarathaḥ prītyā yayātiṃ nahuṣo yathā
GE09ram_02_u:221: 2.005.010a ity uktvā sa tadā rāmam upavāsaṃ yatavratam
GE09ram_02_u:222: 2.005.010c mantravat kārayām āsa vaidehyā sahitaṃ muniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:223: 2.005.011a tato yathāvad rāmeṇa sa rājño gurur arcitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:225: 2.005.012a suhṛdbhis tatra rāmo 'pi tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:226: 2.005.012c sabhājito viveśātha tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ 2.005.013a hṛṣṭanārī narayutaṃ rāmaveśma tadā babhau 2.005.013c yathā mattadvijagaṇaṃ praphullanalinaṃ saraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:228: 2.005.014c nirgatya dadṛśe mārgaṃ vasiṣṭho janasaṃvṛtam 2.005.015a vṛndavṛndair ayodhyāyāṃ rājamārgāḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:231: 2.005.017a siktasaṃmṛṣṭarathyā hi tad ahar vanamālinī 2.005.017c āsīd ayodhyā nagarī samucchritagṛhadhvajā
GE09ram_02_u:232: 2.005.018a tadā hy ayodhyā nilayaḥ sastrībālābalo janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:233: 2.005.018c rāmābhiṣekam ākāṅkṣann ākāṅkṣann udayaṃ raveḥ 2.005.019a prajālaṃkārabhūtaṃ ca janasyānandavardhanam
GE09ram_02_u:234: 2.005.019c utsuko 'bhūj jano draṣṭuṃ tam ayodhyā mahotsavam 2.005.020a evaṃ taṃ janasaṃbādhaṃ rājamārgaṃ purohitaḥ 2.005.020c vyūhann iva janaughaṃ taṃ śanai rāja kulaṃ yayau 2.005.021a sitābhraśikharaprakhyaṃ prāsadam adhiruhya saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:236: 2.005.022a tam āgatam abhiprekṣya hitvā rājāsanaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:237: 2.005.022c papraccha sa ca tasmai tat kṛtam ity abhyavedayat 2.005.023a guruṇā tv abhyanujñāto manujaughaṃ visṛjya tam
GE09ram_02_u:238: 2.005.023c viveśāntaḥpuraṃ rājā siṃho giriguhām iva 2.005.024a tad agryaveṣapramadājanākulaṃ; mahendraveśmapratimaṃ niveśanam 2.005.024c vyadīpayaṃś cāru viveśa pārthivaḥ; śaśīva tārāgaṇasaṃkulaṃ nabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:239: 2.006.001a gate purohite rāmaḥ snāto niyatamānasaḥ 2.006.001c saha patnyā viśālākṣyā nārāyaṇam upāgamat 2.006.002a pragṛhya śirasā pātrīṃ haviṣo vidhivat tadā
GE09ram_02_u:241: 2.006.003a śeṣaṃ ca haviṣas tasya prāśyāśāsyātmanaḥ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:242: 2.006.003c dhyāyan nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ svāstīrṇe kuśasaṃstare 2.006.004a vāgyataḥ saha vaidehyā bhūtvā niyatamānasaḥ 2.006.004c śrīmaty āyatane viṣṇoḥ śiśye naravarātmajaḥ 2.006.005a ekayāmāvaśiṣṭāyāṃ rātryāṃ prativibudhya saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:243: 2.006.005c alaṃkāravidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ kārayām āsa veśmanaḥ 2.006.006a tatra śṛṇvan sukhā vācaḥ sūtamāgadhabandinām 2.006.006c pūrvāṃ saṃdhyām upāsīno jajāpa yatamānasaḥ 2.006.007a tuṣṭāva praṇataś caiva śirasā madhusūdanam 2.006.007c vimalakṣaumasaṃvīto vācayām āsa ca dvijān 2.006.008a teṣāṃ puṇyāhaghoṣo 'tha gambhīramadhuras tadā 2.006.008c ayodhyāṃ pūrayām āsa tūryaghoṣānunāditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:244: 2.006.009a kṛtopavāsaṃ tu tadā vaidehyā saha rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:245: 2.006.009c ayodhyā nilayaḥ śrutvā sarvaḥ pramudito janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:246: 2.006.010a tataḥ paurajanaḥ sarvaḥ śrutvā rāmābhiṣecanam 2.006.010c prabhātāṃ rajanīṃ dṛṣṭvā cakre śobhāṃ parāṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:248: 2.006.011c catuṣpatheṣu rathyāsu caityeṣv aṭṭālakeṣu ca 2.006.012a nānāpaṇyasamṛddheṣu vaṇijām āpaṇeṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:249: 2.006.012c kuṭumbināṃ samṛddheṣu śrīmatsu bhavaneṣu ca 2.006.013a sabhāsu caiva sarvāsu vṛkṣeṣv ālakṣiteṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:250: 2.006.013c dhvajāḥ samucchritāś citrāḥ patākāś cābhavaṃs tadā
GE09ram_02_u:252: 2.006.014c manaḥkarṇasukhā vācaḥ śuśruvuś ca tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:253: 2.006.015a rāmābhiṣekayuktāś ca kathāś cakrur mitho janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:254: 2.006.015c rāmābhiṣeke saṃprāpte catvareṣu gṛheṣu ca 2.006.016a bālā api krīḍamānā gṛhadvāreṣu saṃghaśaḥ 2.006.016c rāmābhiṣekasaṃyuktāś cakrur eva mithaḥ kathāḥ 2.006.017a kṛtapuṣpopahāraś ca dhūpagandhādhivāsitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:255: 2.006.017c rājamārgaḥ kṛtaḥ śrīmān paurai rāmābhiṣecane 2.006.018a prakāśīkaraṇārthaṃ ca
GE09ram_02_u:256: 2.006.018c dīpavṛkṣāṃs tathā cakrur anu rathyāsu sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:257: 2.006.019a alaṃkāraṃ purasyaivaṃ kṛtvā tat puravāsinaḥ 2.006.019c ākāṅkṣamāṇā rāmasya yauvarājyābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_02_u:258: 2.006.020a sametya saṃghaśaḥ sarve catvareṣu sabhāsu ca
GE09ram_02_u:259: 2.006.020c kathayanto mithas tatra praśaśaṃsur janādhipam 2.006.021a aho mahātmā rājāyam
GE09ram_02_u:260: 2.006.021c jñātvā yo vṛddham ātmānaṃ rāmaṃ rājye 'hbiṣekṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:261: 2.006.022a sarve hy anugṛhītāḥ sma yan no rāmo mahīpatiḥ 2.006.022c cirāya bhavitā goptā
GE09ram_02_u:263: 2.006.023c yathā ca bhrātṛṣu snigdhas tathāsmāsv api rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:266: 2.006.025a evaṃvidhaṃ kathayatāṃ paurāṇāṃ śuśruvus tadā 2.006.025c digbhyo 'pi śrutavṛttāntāḥ prāptā jānapadā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:267: 2.006.026a te tu digbhyaḥ purīṃ prāptā draṣṭuṃ rāmābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_02_u:268: 2.006.026c rāmasya pūrayām āsuḥ purīṃ jānapadā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:269: 2.006.027a janaughais tair visarpadbhiḥ śuśruve tatra nisvanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:271: 2.006.028a tatas tad indrakṣayasaṃnibhaṃ puraṃ; didṛkṣubhir jānapadair upāgataiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:272: 2.006.028c samantataḥ sasvanam ākulaṃ babhau; samudrayādobhir ivārṇavodakam 2.007.001a jñātidāsī yato jātā kaikeyyās tu sahoṣitā
GE09ram_02_u:275: 2.007.002c ayodhyāṃ mantharā tasmāt prāsādād anvavaikṣata 2.007.003a patākābhir varārhābhir dhvajaiś ca samalaṃkṛtām 2.007.003c siktāṃ candanatoyaiś ca śiraḥsnātajanair vṛtām 2.007.004a avidūre sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhātrīṃ papraccha mantharā
GE09ram_02_u:277: 2.007.005a rāmamātā dhanaṃ kiṃ nu janebhyaḥ saṃprayacchati
GE09ram_02_u:278: 2.007.005c atimātraṃ praharṣo 'yaṃ kiṃ janasya ca śaṃsa me 2.007.005e kārayiṣyati kiṃ vāpi saṃprahṛṣṭo mahīpatiḥ 2.007.006a vidīryamāṇā harṣeṇa dhātrī paramayā mudā 2.007.006c ācacakṣe 'tha kubjāyai bhūyasīṃ rāghave śriyam
GE09ram_02_u:279: 2.007.007a śvaḥ puṣyeṇa jitakrodhaṃ yauvarājyena rāghavam 2.007.007c rājā daśaratho rāmam
GE09ram_02_u:280: 2.007.008a dhātryās tu vacanaṃ śrutvā kubjā kṣipram amarṣitā
GE09ram_02_u:282: 2.007.009a sā dahyamānā kopena mantharā pāpadarśinī 2.007.009c śayānām etya kaikeyīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:283: 2.007.010a uttiṣṭha mūḍhe kiṃ śeṣe bhayaṃ tvām abhivartate
GE09ram_02_u:284: 2.007.010c upaplutamahaughena kim ātmānaṃ na budhyase 2.007.011a aniṣṭe subhagākāre saubhāgyena
GE09ram_02_u:285: 2.007.011c calaṃ hi tava saubhāgyaṃ nadyaḥ srota ivoṣṇage
GE09ram_02_u:286: 2.007.012a evam uktā tu kaikeyī ruṣṭayā paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:287: 2.007.012c kubjayā pāpadarśinyā viṣādam agamat param 2.007.013a kaikeyī tv abravīt kubjāṃ kaccit kṣemaṃ na manthare 2.007.013c viṣaṇṇavadanāṃ hi tvāṃ lakṣaye bhṛśaduḥkhitām 2.007.014a mantharā tu vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyyā madhurākṣaram
GE09ram_02_u:289: 2.007.015a sā viṣaṇṇatarā bhūtvā kubjā tasyā hitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:290: 2.007.015c viṣādayantī provāca bhedayantī ca rāghavam 2.007.016a akṣemaṃ sumahad devi pravṛttaṃ tvadvināśanam 2.007.016c rāmaṃ daśaratho rājā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:291: 2.007.017a sāsmy agādhe bhaye magnā duḥkhaśokasamanvitā 2.007.017c dahyamānānaleneva tvaddhitārtham
GE09ram_02_u:292: 2.007.018a tava duḥkhena kaikeyi mama duḥkhaṃ mahad bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:293: 2.007.018c tvadvṛddhau mama vṛddhiś ca bhaved atra na saṃśayaḥ 2.007.019a narādhipakule jātā mahiṣī tvaṃ mahīpateḥ 2.007.019c ugratvaṃ rājadharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ devi na budhyase
GE09ram_02_u:294: 2.007.020a dharmavādī śaṭho bhartā ślakṣṇavādī ca dāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:295: 2.007.020c śuddhabhāve na jānīṣe tenaivam atisaṃdhitā 2.007.021a upasthitaṃ payuñjānas tvayi sāntvam anarthakam 2.007.021c arthenaivādya te bhartā kausalyāṃ yojayiṣyati 2.007.022a apavāhya sa duṣṭātmā bharataṃ tava bandhuṣu
GE09ram_02_u:296: 2.007.022c kālyaṃ sthāpayitā rāmaṃ rājye nihatakaṇṭake 2.007.023a śatruḥ patipravādena mātreva hitakāmyayā
GE09ram_02_u:297: 2.007.023c āśīviṣa ivāṅkena bāle paridhṛtas tvayā 2.007.024a yathā hi kuryāt sarpo vā śatrur vā pratyupekṣitaḥ 2.007.024c rājñā daśarathenādya saputrā tvaṃ tathā kṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:299: 2.007.025c rāmaṃ sthāpayatā rājye sānubandhā hatā hy asi
GE09ram_02_u:300: 2.007.026a sā prāptakālaṃ kaikeyi kṣipraṃ kuru hitaṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:301: 2.007.026c trāyasva putram ātmānaṃ māṃ ca vismayadarśane
GE09ram_02_u:302: 2.007.027a mantharāyā vacaḥ śrutvā śayanāt sa śubhānanā
GE09ram_02_u:303: 2.007.027c evam ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pradadau śubham
GE09ram_02_u:304: 2.007.028a dattvā tv ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pramadottamā
GE09ram_02_u:305: 2.007.028c kaikeyī mantharāṃ hṛṣṭā punar evābravīd idam
GE09ram_02_u:306: 2.007.029a idaṃ tu manthare mahyam ākhyāsi paramaṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:307: 2.007.029c etan me priyam ākhyātuḥ kiṃ vā bhūyaḥ karomi te
GE09ram_02_u:308: 2.007.030a rāme vā bharate vāhaṃ viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye
GE09ram_02_u:309: 2.007.030c tasmāt tuṣṭāsmi yad rājā rāmaṃ rājye 'bhiṣekṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:310: 2.007.031a na me paraṃ kiṃ cid itas tvayā punaḥ; priyaṃ priyārhe suvacaṃ
GE09ram_02_u:311: vaco varam 2.007.031c tathā hy avocas tvam ataḥ priyottaraṃ; varaṃ paraṃ te pradadāmi taṃ
GE09ram_02_u:312: 2.008.001a mantharā tv abhyasūyyainām utsṛjyābharaṇaṃ ca tat
GE09ram_02_u:314: 2.008.002a harṣaṃ kim idam asthāne kṛtavaty asi bāliśe
GE09ram_02_u:317: 2.008.003c yauvarājyena mahatā śvaḥ puṣyeṇa dvijottamaiḥ 2.008.004a prāptāṃ sumahatīṃ prītiṃ pratītāṃ tāṃ hatadviṣam
GE09ram_02_u:318: 2.008.004c upasthāsyasi kausalyāṃ dāsīva tvaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ 2.008.005a hṛṣṭāḥ khalu bhaviṣyanti rāmasya paramāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:319: 2.008.005c aprahṛṣṭā bhaviṣyanti snuṣās te bharatakṣaye 2.008.006a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītāṃ bruvantīṃ mantharāṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:320: 2.008.006c rāmasyaiva guṇān devī kaikeyī praśaśaṃsa ha
GE09ram_02_u:321: 2.008.007a dharmajño gurubhir dāntaḥ kṛtajñaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:322: 2.008.007c rāmo rājñaḥ suto jyeṣṭho yauvarājyam ato 'rhati
GE09ram_02_u:323: 2.008.008a bhrātṝn bhṛtyāṃś ca dīrghāyuḥ pitṛvat pālayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:324: 2.008.008c saṃtapyase kathaṃ kubje śrutvā rāmābhiṣecanam 2.008.009a bharataś cāpi rāmasya dhruvaṃ varṣaśatāt param
GE09ram_02_u:326: 2.008.010a sā tvam abhyudaye prāpte vartamāne ca manthare
GE09ram_02_u:327: 2.008.010c bhaviṣyati ca kalyāṇe kimarthaṃ paritapyase 2.008.010e kausalyāto 'tiriktaṃ ca sa tu śuśrūṣate hi mām
GE09ram_02_u:328: 2.008.011a kaikeyyā vacanaṃ śrutvā mantharā bhṛśaduḥkhitā 2.008.011c dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya kaikeyīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:331: 2.008.013a bhavitā rāghavo rājā rāghavasya ca yaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:332: 2.008.013c rājavaṃśāt tu bharataḥ kaikeyi parihāsyate 2.008.014a na hi rājñaḥ sutāḥ sarve rājye tiṣṭhanti bhāmini 2.008.014c sthāpyamāneṣu sarveṣu sumahān anayo bhavet 2.008.015a tasmāj jyeṣṭhe hi kaikeyi rājyatantrāṇi pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:333: 2.008.015c sthāpayanty anavadyāṅgi guṇavatsv itareṣv api 2.008.016a asāv atyantanirbhagnas tava putro bhaviṣyati 2.008.016c anāthavat sukhebhyaś ca rājavaṃśāc ca vatsale
GE09ram_02_u:334: 2.008.017a sāhaṃ tvadarthe saṃprāptā tvaṃ tu māṃ nāvabudhyase
GE09ram_02_u:335: 2.008.017c sapatnivṛddhau yā me tvaṃ pradeyaṃ dātum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:336: 2.008.018a dhruvaṃ tu bharataṃ rāmaḥ prāpya rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:337: 2.008.018c deśāntaraṃ nāyayitvā lokāntaram athāpi vā 2.008.019a bāla eva hi mātulyaṃ bharato nāyitas tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:338: 2.008.019c saṃnikarṣāc ca sauhārdaṃ jāyate sthāvareṣv api
GE09ram_02_u:339: 2.008.020a goptā hi rāmaṃ saumitrir lakṣmaṇaṃ cāpi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:340: 2.008.020c aśvinor iva saubhrātraṃ tayor lokeṣu viśrutam
GE09ram_02_u:341: 2.008.021a tasmān na lakṣmaṇe rāmaḥ pāpaṃ kiṃ cit kariṣyati 2.008.021c rāmas tu bharate pāpaṃ kuryād iti na saṃśayaḥ 2.008.022a tasmād rājagṛhād eva vanaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:342: 2.008.022c etad dhi rocate mahyaṃ bhṛśaṃ cāpi hitaṃ tava 2.008.023a evaṃ te jñātipakṣasya śreyaś caiva bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:343: 2.008.023c yadi ced bharato dharmāt pitryaṃ rājyam avāpsyati
GE09ram_02_u:344: 2.008.024a sa te sukhocito bālo rāmasya sahajo ripuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:345: 2.008.024c samṛdhārthasya naṣṭārtho jīviṣyati kathaṃ vaśe 2.008.025a abhidrutam ivāraṇye siṃhena gajayūthapam
GE09ram_02_u:346: 2.008.025c pracchādyamānaṃ rāmeṇa bharataṃ trātum arhasi 2.008.026a darpān nirākṛtā pūrvaṃ tvayā saubhāgyavattayā 2.008.026c rāmamātā sapatnī te kathaṃ vairaṃ na yātayet
GE09ram_02_u:347: 2.008.027a yadā hi rāmaḥ pṛthivīm avāpsyati; dhruvaṃ pranaṣṭo bharato
GE09ram_02_u:349: 2.008.027c ato hi saṃcintaya rājyam ātmaje; parasya cādyaiva vivāsa
GE09ram_02_u:351: 2.009.001a evam uktā tu kaikeyī krodhena jvalitānanā
GE09ram_02_u:352: 2.009.001c dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya mantharām idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:353: 2.009.002a adya rāmam itaḥ kṣipraṃ vanaṃ prasthāpayāmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:355: 2.009.003a idaṃ tv idānīṃ saṃpaśya kenopāyena manthare
GE09ram_02_u:356: 2.009.003c bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃ cana 2.009.004a evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:357: 2.009.004c rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kaikeyīm idam abravīt 2.009.005a hantedānīṃ pravakṣyāmi kaikeyi śrūyatāṃ ca me
GE09ram_02_u:358: 2.009.005c yathā te bharato rājyaṃ putraḥ prāpsyati kevalam
GE09ram_02_u:359: 2.009.006a śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasyā mantharāyās tu kaikayī
GE09ram_02_u:360: 2.009.006c kiṃ cid utthāya śayanāt svāstīrṇād idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:361: 2.009.007a kathaya tvaṃ mamopāyaṃ kenopāyena manthare 2.009.007c bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃ cana 2.009.008a evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:362: 2.009.008c rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kubjā vacanam abravīt 2.009.009a tava devāsure yuddhe saha rājarṣibhiḥ patiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:363: 2.009.009c agacchat tvām upādāya devarājasya sāhyakṛt 2.009.010a diśam āsthāya kaikeyi dakṣiṇāṃ daṇḍakān prati
GE09ram_02_u:364: 2.009.010c vaijayantam iti khyātaṃ puraṃ yatra timidhvajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:365: 2.009.011a sa śambara iti khyātaḥ śatamāyo mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:366: 2.009.011c dadau śakrasya saṃgrāmaṃ devasaṃghair anirjitaḥ 2.009.012a tasmin mahati saṃgrāme rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:367: 2.009.012c apavāhya tvayā devi saṃgrāmān naṣṭacetanaḥ 2.009.013a tatrāpi vikṣataḥ śastraiḥ patis te rakṣitas tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:368: 2.009.013c tuṣṭena tena dattau te dvau varau śubhadarśane
GE09ram_02_u:369: 2.009.014a sa tvayoktaḥ patir devi yadeccheyaṃ tadā varau
GE09ram_02_u:370: 2.009.014c gṛhṇīyām iti tat tena tathety uktaṃ mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:371: 2.009.014e anabhijñā hy ahaṃ devi tvayaiva kathitaṃ purā
GE09ram_02_u:372: 2.009.015a tau varau yāca bhartāraṃ bharatasyābhiṣecanam 2.009.015c pravrājanaṃ ca rāmasya tvaṃ varṣāṇi caturdaśa
GE09ram_02_u:375: 2.009.016e mā smainaṃ pratyudīkṣethā mā cainam abhibhāṣathāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:376: 2.009.017a dayitā tvaṃ sadā bhartur atra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ 2.009.017c tvatkṛte ca mahārājo viśed api hutāśanam
GE09ram_02_u:377: 2.009.018a na tvāṃ krodhayituṃ śakto na kruddhāṃ pratyudīkṣitum
GE09ram_02_u:378: 2.009.018c tava priyārthaṃ rājā hi prāṇān api parityajet
GE09ram_02_u:379: 2.009.019a na hy atikramituṃ śaktas tava vākyaṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:382: 2.009.020c dadyād daśaratho rājā mā sma teṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ 2.009.021a yau tau devāsure yuddhe varau daśaratho 'dadāt
GE09ram_02_u:383: 2.009.021c tau smāraya mahābhāge so 'rtho mā tvām atikramet
GE09ram_02_u:384: 2.009.022a yadā tu te varaṃ dadyāt svayam utthāpya rāghavaḥ 2.009.022c vyavasthāpya mahārājaṃ tvam imaṃ vṛṇuyā varam
GE09ram_02_u:385: 2.009.023a rāmaṃ pravrājayāraṇye nava varṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:386: 2.009.023c bharataḥ kriyatāṃ rājā pṛthivyāṃ pārthivarṣabhaḥ 2.009.024a evaṃ pravrājitaś caiva rāmo 'rāmo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:387: 2.009.024c bharataś ca hatāmitras tava rājā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:388: 2.009.025a yena kālena rāmaś ca vanāt pratyāgamiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:389: 2.009.025c tena kālena putras te kṛtamūlo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:390: 2.009.025e saṃgṛhītamanuṣyaś ca suhṛdbhiḥ sārdham ātmavān 2.009.026a prāptakālaṃ tu te manye rājānaṃ vītasādhvasā
GE09ram_02_u:392: 2.009.027a anartham artharūpeṇa grāhitā sā tatas tayā
GE09ram_02_u:393: 2.009.027c hṛṣṭā pratītā kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:394: 2.009.028a kubje tvāṃ nābhijānāmi śreṣṭhāṃ śreṣṭhābhidhāyinīm 2.009.028c pṛthivyām asi kubjānām uttamā buddhiniścaye 2.009.029a tvam eva tu mamārtheṣu nityayuktā hitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:395: 2.009.029c nāhaṃ samavabudhyeyaṃ kubje rājñaś cikīrṣitam 2.009.030a santi duḥsaṃsthitāḥ kubjā vakrāḥ paramapāpikāḥ 2.009.030c tvaṃ padmam iva vātena saṃnatā priyadarśanā
GE09ram_02_u:396: 2.009.031a uras te 'bhiniviṣṭaṃ vai yāvat skandhāt samunnatam
GE09ram_02_u:397: 2.009.031c adhastāc codaraṃ śāntaṃ sunābham iva lajjitam
GE09ram_02_u:399: 2.009.032c jaṅghe bhṛśam upanyaste pādau cāpy āyatāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:400: 2.009.033a tvam āyatābhyāṃ sakthibhyāṃ manthare kṣaumavāsini 2.009.033c agrato mama gacchantī rājahaṃsīva rājase 2.009.034a tavedaṃ sthagu yad dīrghaṃ rathaghoṇam ivāyatam
GE09ram_02_u:401: 2.009.034c matayaḥ kṣatravidyāś ca māyāś cātra vasanti te
GE09ram_02_u:402: 2.009.035a atra te pratimokṣyāmi mālāṃ kubje hiraṇmayīm
GE09ram_02_u:403: 2.009.035c abhiṣikte ca bharate rāghave ca vanaṃ gate
GE09ram_02_u:404: 2.009.036a jātyena ca suvarṇena suniṣṭaptena sundari 2.009.036c labdhārthā ca pratītā ca lepayiṣyāmi te sthagu
GE09ram_02_u:405: 2.009.037a mukhe ca tilakaṃ citraṃ jātarūpamayaṃ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:406: 2.009.037c kārayiṣyāmi te kubje śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:407: 2.009.038a paridhāya śubhe vastre devadeva cariṣyasi 2.009.038c candram āhvayamānena mukhenāpratimānanā
GE09ram_02_u:408: 2.009.038e gamiṣyasi gatiṃ mukhyāṃ garvayantī dviṣajjanam 2.009.039a tavāpi kubjāḥ kubjāyāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:409: 2.009.039c pādau paricariṣyanti yathaiva tvaṃ sadā mama
GE09ram_02_u:410: 2.009.040a iti praśasyamānā sā kaikeyīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:411: 2.009.040c śayānāṃ śayane śubhre vedyām agniśikhām iva
GE09ram_02_u:412: 2.009.041a gatodake setubandho na kalyāṇi vidhīyate 2.009.041c uttiṣṭha kuru kalyāṇaṃ rājānam anudarśaya 2.009.042a tathā protsāhitā devī gatvā mantharayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:415: 2.009.043c avamucya varārhāṇi śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca 2.009.044a tato hemopamā tatra kubjā vākyaṃ vaśaṃ gatā
GE09ram_02_u:416: 2.009.044c saṃviśya bhūmau kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:417: 2.009.045a iha vā māṃ mṛtāṃ kubje nṛpāyāvedayiṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:418: 2.009.045c vanaṃ tu rāghave prāpte bharataḥ prāpsyati kṣitim
GE09ram_02_u:419: 2.009.046a athaitad uktvā vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ; nidhāya sarvābharaṇāni bhāminī
GE09ram_02_u:420: 2.009.046c asaṃvṛtām āstaraṇena medinīṃ; tadādhiśiśye patiteva kinnarī
GE09ram_02_u:422: 2.009.047c narendrapatnī vimanā babhūva sā; tamovṛtā dyaur iva magnatārakā
GE09ram_02_u:424: 2.010.001c priyārhāṃ priyam ākhyātuṃ viveśāntaḥpuraṃ vaśī 2.010.002a tāṃ tatra patitāṃ bhūmau śayānām atathocitām
GE09ram_02_u:426: 2.010.003a sa vṛddhas taruṇīṃ bhāryāṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm
GE09ram_02_u:428: 2.010.004a kareṇum iva digdhena viddhāṃ mṛgayuṇā vane
GE09ram_02_u:429: 2.010.004c mahāgaja ivāraṇye snehāt parimamarśa tām 2.010.005a parimṛśya ca pāṇibhyām abhisaṃtrastacetanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:430: 2.010.005c kāmī kamalapatrākṣīm uvāca vanitām idam 2.010.006a na te 'ham abhijānāmi krodham ātmani saṃśritam
GE09ram_02_u:431: 2.010.006c devi kenābhiyuktāsi kena vāsi vimānitā 2.010.007a yad idaṃ mama duḥkhāya śeṣe kalyāṇi pāṃsuṣu
GE09ram_02_u:432: 2.010.007c bhūmau śeṣe kimarthaṃ tvaṃ mayi kalyāṇa cetasi
GE09ram_02_u:434: 2.010.008a santi me kuśalā vaidyā abhituṣṭāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:435: 2.010.008c sukhitāṃ tvāṃ kariṣyanti vyādhim ācakṣva bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:436: 2.010.009a kasya vā te priyaṃ kāryaṃ kena vā vipriyaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:437: 2.010.009c kaḥ priyaṃ labhatām adya ko vā sumahad apriyam 2.010.010a avadhyo vadhyatāṃ ko vā vadhyaḥ ko vā vimucyatām 2.010.010c daridraḥ ko bhavatv āḍhyo dravyavān vāpy akiṃcanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:438: 2.010.011a ahaṃ caiva madīyāś ca sarve tava vaśānugāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:439: 2.010.011c na te kaṃ cid abhiprāyaṃ vyāhantum aham utsahe 2.010.012a ātmano jīvitenāpi brūhi yan manasecchasi 2.010.012c yāvad āvartate cakraṃ tāvatī me vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_02_u:440: 2.010.013a tathoktā sā samāśvastā vaktukāmā tad apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:442: 2.010.014a nāsmi viprakṛtā deva kena cin na vimānitā
GE09ram_02_u:443: 2.010.014c abhiprāyas tu me kaś cit tam icchāmi tvayā kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:444: 2.010.015a pratijñāṃ pratijānīṣva yadi tvaṃ kartum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:445: 2.010.015c atha tad vyāhariṣyāmi yad abhiprārthitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:446: 2.010.016a evam uktas tayā rājā priyayā strīvaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:447: 2.010.016c tām uvāca mahātejāḥ kaikeyīm īṣadutsmitaḥ 2.010.017a avalipte na jānāsi tvattaḥ priyataro mama
GE09ram_02_u:448: 2.010.017c manujo manujavyāghrād rāmād anyo na vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:449: 2.010.018a bhadre hṛdayam apy etad anumṛśśyoddharasva me
GE09ram_02_u:450: 2.010.018c etat samīkṣya kaikeyi brūhi yat sādhu manyase
GE09ram_02_u:451: 2.010.019a balam ātmani paśyantī na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:452: 2.010.019c kariṣyāmi tava prītiṃ sukṛtenāpi te śape
GE09ram_02_u:453: 2.010.020a tena vākyena saṃhṛṣṭā tam abhiprāyam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:455: 2.010.021a yathākrameṇa śapasi varaṃ mama dadāsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:456: 2.010.021c tac chṛṇvantu trayastriṃśad devāḥ sendrapurogamāḥ 2.010.022a candrādityau nabhaś caiva grahā rātryahanī diśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:457: 2.010.022c jagac ca pṛthivī caiva sagandharvā sarākṣasā
GE09ram_02_u:459: 2.010.023c yāni cānyāni bhūtāni jānīyur bhāṣitaṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:461: 2.010.024c varaṃ mama dadāty eṣa tan me śṛṇvantu devatāḥ 2.010.025a iti devī maheṣvāsaṃ parigṛhyābhiśasya ca 2.010.025c tataḥ param uvācedaṃ varadaṃ kāmamohitam 2.010.026a varau yau me tvayā deva tadā dattau mahīpate 2.010.026c tau tāvad aham adyaiva vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me vacaḥ 2.010.027a abhiṣeka samārambho rāghavasyopakalpitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:463: 2.010.028a nava pañca ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:465: 2.010.029a bharato bhajatām adya yauvarājyam akaṇṭakam 2.010.029c adya caiva hi paśyeyaṃ prayāntaṃ rāghavaṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:466: 2.010.030a tataḥ śrutvā mahārāja kaikeyyā dāruṇaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:467: 2.010.030c vyathito vilavaś caiva vyāghrīṃ dṛṣṭvā yathā mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:468: 2.010.031a asaṃvṛtāyām āsīno jagatyāṃ dīrgham ucchvasan 2.010.031c aho dhig iti sāmarṣo vācam uktvā narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:470: 2.010.032a cireṇa tu nṛpaḥ saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:471: 2.010.032c kaikeyīm abravīt kruddhaḥ pradahann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_02_u:473: 2.010.033c kiṃ kṛtaṃ tava rāmeṇa pāpe pāpaṃ mayāpi vā 2.010.034a sadā te jananī tulyāṃ vṛttiṃ vahati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:474: 2.010.034c tasyaiva tvam anarthāya kiṃnimittam ihodyatā 2.010.035a tvaṃ mayātmavināśāya bhavanaṃ svaṃ praveśitā 2.010.035c avijñānān nṛpasutā vyālī tīkṣṇaviṣā yathā 2.010.036a jīvaloko yadā sarvo rāmasyeha guṇastavam 2.010.036c aparādhaṃ kam uddiśya tyakṣyāmīṣṭam ahaṃ sutam
GE09ram_02_u:475: 2.010.037a kausalyāṃ vā sumitrāṃ vā tyajeyam api vā śriyam 2.010.037c jīvitaṃ vātmano rāmaṃ na tv eva pitṛvatsalam
GE09ram_02_u:476: 2.010.038a parā bhavati me prītir dṛṣṭvā tanayam agrajam
GE09ram_02_u:477: 2.010.038c apaśyatas tu me rāmaṃ naṣṭā bhavati cetanā
GE09ram_02_u:478: 2.010.039a tiṣṭhel loko vinā sūryaṃ sasyaṃ vā salilaṃ vinā 2.010.039c na tu rāmaṃ vinā dehe tiṣṭhet tu mama jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:479: 2.010.040a tad alaṃ tyajyatām eṣa niścayaḥ pāpaniścaye
GE09ram_02_u:480: 2.010.040c api te caraṇau mūrdhnā spṛśāmy eṣa prasīda me 2.010.041a sa bhūmipālo vilapann anāthavat; striyā gṛhīto dṛhaye
GE09ram_02_u:482: 2.010.041c papāta devyāś caraṇau prasāritāv; ubhāv asaṃspṛśya yathāturas
GE09ram_02_u:485: 2.011.001c yayātim iva puṇyānte devalokāt paricyutam 2.011.002a anartharūpā siddhārthā abhītā bhayadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:486: 2.011.002c punar ākārayām āsa tam eva varam aṅganā
GE09ram_02_u:487: 2.011.003a tvaṃ katthase mahārāja satyavādī dṛḍhavrataḥ 2.011.003c mama cemaṃ varaṃ kasmād vidhārayitum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:488: 2.011.004a evam uktas tu kaikeyyā rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:489: 2.011.004c pratyuvāca tataḥ kruddho muhūrtaṃ vihvalann iva
GE09ram_02_u:490: 2.011.005a mṛte mayi gate rāme vanaṃ manujapuṃgave
GE09ram_02_u:491: 2.011.005c hantānārye mamāmitre rāmaḥ pravrājito vanam 2.011.006a yadi satyaṃ bravīmy etat tad asatyaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:492: 2.011.006c akīrtir atulā loke dhruvaṃ paribhavaś ca me
GE09ram_02_u:494: 2.011.007c astam abhyagamat sūryo rajanī cābhyavartata 2.011.008a sa triyāmā tathārtasya
GE09ram_02_u:495: 2.011.008c rājño vilapamānasya na vyabhāsata śarvarī 2.011.009a tathaivoṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya vṛddho daśaratho nṛpaḥ 2.011.009c vilalāpārtavad duḥkhaṃ gaganāsaktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:497: 2.011.010c atha vā gamyatāṃ śīghraṃ nāham icchāmi nirghṛṇām
GE09ram_02_u:498: 2.011.010e nṛśaṃsāṃ kaikeyīṃ draṣṭuṃ yatkṛte vyasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:499: 2.011.011a evam uktvā tato rājā kaikeyīṃ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:500: 2.011.011c prasādayām āsa punaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:502: 2.011.012c prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ devi bhadre rājño viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:503: 2.011.013a śūnyena khalu suśroṇi mayedaṃ samudāhṛtam 2.011.013c kuru sādhu prasādaṃ me bāle sahṛdayā hy asi 2.011.014a viśuddhabhāvasya hi duṣṭabhāvā; tāmrekṣaṇasyāśrukalasya rājñaḥ 2.011.014c śrutvā vicitraṃ karuṇaṃ vilāpaṃ; bhartur nṛśaṃsā na cakāra vākyam 2.011.015a tataḥ sa rājā punar eva mūrchitaḥ; priyām atuṣṭāṃ pratikūlabhāṣiṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:504: 2.011.015c samīkṣya putrasya vivāsanaṃ prati; kṣitau visaṃjño nipapāta
GE09ram_02_u:506: 2.012.001a putraśokārditaṃ pāpā visaṃjñaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi 2.012.001c viveṣṭamānam udīkṣya saikṣvākam idam abravīt 2.012.002a pāpaṃ kṛtveva kim idaṃ mama saṃśrutya saṃśravam
GE09ram_02_u:507: 2.012.002c śeṣe kṣititale sannaḥ sthityāṃ sthātuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:508: 2.012.003a āhuḥ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ dharmaṃ dharmavido janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:509: 2.012.003c satyam āśritya hi mayā tvaṃ ca dharmaṃ pracoditaḥ 2.012.004a saṃśrutya śaibyaḥ śyenāya svāṃ tanuṃ jagatīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:510: 2.012.004c pradāya pakṣiṇo rājañ jagāma gatim uttamām
GE09ram_02_u:511: 2.012.005a tatha hy alarkas tejasvī brāhmaṇe vedapārage
GE09ram_02_u:512: 2.012.005c yācamāne svake netre uddhṛtyāvimanā dadau 2.012.006a saritāṃ tu patiḥ svalpāṃ maryādāṃ satyam anvitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:513: 2.012.006c satyānurodhāt samaye velāṃ khāṃ nātivartate 2.012.007a samayaṃ ca mamāryemaṃ yadi tvaṃ na kariṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:514: 2.012.007c agratas te parityaktā parityakṣyāmi jīvitam 2.012.008a evaṃ pracodito rājā kaikeyyā nirviśaṅkayā 2.012.008c nāśakat pāśam unmoktuṃ balir indrakṛtaṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:516: 2.012.009c sa dhuryo vai parispandan yugacakrāntaraṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:517: 2.012.010a vihvalābhyāṃ ca netrābhyām apaśyann iva bhūmipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:518: 2.012.010c kṛcchrād dhairyeṇa saṃstabhya kaikeyīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:519: 2.012.011a yas te mantrakṛtaḥ pāṇir agnau pāpe mayā dhṛtaḥ 2.012.011c taṃ tyajāmi svajaṃ caiva tava putraṃ saha tvayā 2.012.012a tataḥ pāpasamācārā kaikeyī pārthivaṃ punaḥ 2.012.012c uvāca paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ vākyajñā roṣamūrchitā 2.012.013a kim idaṃ bhāṣase rājan vākyaṃ gararujopamam
GE09ram_02_u:520: 2.012.013c ānāyayitum akliṣṭaṃ putraṃ rāmam ihārhasi 2.012.014a sthāpya rājye mama sutaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ vanecaram
GE09ram_02_u:521: 2.012.014c niḥsapatnāṃ ca māṃ kṛtvā kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:522: 2.012.015a sa nunna iva tīkṣeṇa pratodena hayottamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:524: 2.012.016a dharmabandhena baddho 'smi naṣṭā ca mama cetanā
GE09ram_02_u:525: 2.012.016c jyeṣṭhaṃ putraṃ priyaṃ rāmaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi dhārmikam
GE09ram_02_u:526: 2.012.017a iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyī tadanantaram
GE09ram_02_u:527: 2.012.017c svayam evābravīt sūtaṃ gaccha tvaṃ rāmam ānaya
GE09ram_02_u:528: 2.012.018a tataḥ sa rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sannaharṣaḥ sutaṃ prati 2.012.018c śokāraktekṣaṇaḥ śrīmān udvīkṣyovāca dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:529: 2.012.019a sumantraḥ karuṇaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā dīnaṃ ca pārthivam
GE09ram_02_u:530: 2.012.019c pragṛhītāñjaliḥ kiṃ cit tasmād deśād apākraman
GE09ram_02_u:531: 2.012.020a yadā vaktuṃ svayaṃ dainyān na śaśāka mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:532: 2.012.020c tadā sumantraṃ mantrajñā kaikeyī pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:533: 2.012.021a sumantra rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi śīghram ānaya sundaram
GE09ram_02_u:534: 2.012.021c sa manyamānaḥ kalyāṇaṃ hṛdayena nananda ca
GE09ram_02_u:535: 2.012.022a sumantraś cintayām āsa tvaritaṃ coditas tayā
GE09ram_02_u:536: 2.012.022c vyaktaṃ rāmo 'bhiṣekārtham ihāyāsyati dharmavit 2.012.023a iti sūto matiṃ kṛtvā harṣeṇa mahatā punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:538: 2.012.024a tataḥ purastāt sahasā vinirgato; mahīpatīn dvāragatān vilokayan
GE09ram_02_u:539: 2.012.024c dadarśa paurān vividhān mahādhanān; upasthitān dvāram upetya
GE09ram_02_u:541: 2.013.001a te tu tāṃ rajanīm uṣya brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:543: 2.013.002a amātyā balamukhyāś ca mukhyā ye nigamasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:547: 2.013.004a kāñcanā jalakumbhāś ca bhadrapīṭhaṃ svalaṃkṛtam 2.013.004c rāmaś ca samyagāstīrṇo bhāsvarā vyāghracarmaṇā 2.013.005a gaṅgāyamunayoḥ puṇyāt saṃgamād āhṛtaṃ jalam 2.013.005c yāś cānyāḥ saritaḥ puṇyā hradāḥ kūpāḥ sarāṃsi ca 2.013.006a prāgvāhāś cordhvavāhāś ca tiryagvāhāḥ samāhitāḥ 2.013.006c tābhyaś caivāhṛtaṃ toyaṃ samudrebhyaś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:548: 2.013.007a kṣaudraṃ dadhighṛtaṃ lājā dharbhāḥ sumanasaḥ payaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:549: 2.013.007c salājāḥ kṣīribhiś channā ghaṭāḥ kāñcanarājatāḥ 2.013.007e padmotpalayutā bhānti pūrṇāḥ paramavāriṇā
GE09ram_02_u:551: 2.013.008c sajjaṃ tiṣṭhati rāmasya vālavyajanam uttamam 2.013.009a candramaṇḍalasaṃkāśam ātapatraṃ ca pāṇḍuram
GE09ram_02_u:553: 2.013.010a pāṇḍuraś ca vṛṣaḥ sajjaḥ pāṇḍurāśvaś ca susthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:554: 2.013.010c prasrutaś ca gajaḥ śrīmān aupavāhyaḥ pratīkṣate
GE09ram_02_u:555: 2.013.011a aṣṭau kanyāś ca maṅgalyāḥ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ 2.013.011c vāditrāṇi ca sarvāṇi bandinaś ca tathāpare
GE09ram_02_u:558: 2.013.013a te rājavacanāt tatra samavetā mahīpatim 2.013.013c apaśyanto 'bruvan ko nu rājño naḥ prativedayet 2.013.014a na paśyāmaś ca rājānam uditaś ca divākaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:559: 2.013.014c yauvarājyābhiṣekaś ca sajjo rāmasya dhīmataḥ 2.013.015a iti teṣu bruvāṇeṣu sārvabhaumān mahīpatīn 2.013.015c abravīt tān idaṃ sarvān sumantro rājasatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:560: 2.013.016a ayaṃ pṛcchāmi vacanāt sukham āyuṣmatām aham
GE09ram_02_u:564: 2.013.018a gatā bhagavatī rātrirahaḥ śivam upasthitam 2.013.018c budhyasva nṛpaśārdūla kuru kāryam anantaram 2.013.019a brāhmaṇā balamukhyāś ca naigamāś cāgatā nṛpa
GE09ram_02_u:566: 2.013.020a stuvantaṃ taṃ tadā sūtaṃ sumantraṃ mantrakovidam
GE09ram_02_u:567: 2.013.020c pratibudhya tato rājā idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:568: 2.013.021a na caiva saṃprasuto 'ham ānayed āśu rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:569: 2.013.021c iti rājā daśarathaḥ sūtaṃ tatrānvaśāt punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:570: 2.013.022a sa rājavacanaṃ śrutvā śirasā pratipūjya tam
GE09ram_02_u:571: 2.013.022c nirjagāma nṛpāvāsān manyamānaḥ priyaṃ mahat 2.013.023a prapanno rājamārgaṃ ca patākā dhvajaśobhitam 2.013.023c sa sūtas tatra śuśrāva rāmādhikaraṇāḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:574: 2.013.025a mahākapāṭapihitaṃ vitardiśataśobhitam 2.013.025c kāñcanapratimaikāgraṃ maṇividrumatoraṇam 2.013.026a śāradābhraghanaprakhyaṃ dīptaṃ meruguhopamam
GE09ram_02_u:576: 2.013.027a sa vājiyuktena rathena sārathir; narākulaṃ rājakulaṃ vilokayan
GE09ram_02_u:577: 2.013.027c tataḥ samāsādya mahādhanaṃ mahat; prahṛṣṭaromā sa babhūva
GE09ram_02_u:580: 2.013.028c avāryamāṇaḥ praviveśa sārathiḥ; prabhūtaratnaṃ makaro yathārṇavam
GE09ram_02_u:581: 2.014.001a sa tad antaḥpuradvāraṃ samatītya janākulam 2.014.001c praviviktāṃ tataḥ kakṣyām āsasāda purāṇavit 2.014.002a prāsakārmukabibhradbhir yuvabhir mṛṣṭakuṇḍalaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:583: 2.014.003a tatra kāṣāyiṇo vṛddhān vetrapāṇīn svalaṃkṛtān 2.014.003c dadarśa viṣṭhitān dvāri stryadhyakṣān susamāhitān 2.014.004a te samīkṣya samāyāntaṃ rāmapriyacikīrṣavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:585: 2.014.005a prativeditam ājñāya sūtam abhyantaraṃ pituḥ 2.014.005c tatraivānāyayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:587: 2.014.006c dādarśa sūtaḥ paryaṅke sauvaṇo sottaracchade 2.014.007a varāharudhirābheṇa śucinā ca sugandhinā
GE09ram_02_u:590: 2.014.008c upetaṃ sītayā bhūyaś citrayā śaśinaṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:591: 2.014.009a taṃ tapantam ivādityam upapannaṃ svatejasā 2.014.009c vavande varadaṃ bandī niyamajño vinītavat 2.014.010a prāñjalis tu sukhaṃ pṛṣṭvā vihāraśayanāsane 2.014.010c rājaputram uvācedaṃ sumantro rājasatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:592: 2.014.011a kausalyā suprabhā deva pitā tvaṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_02_u:593: 2.014.011c mahiṣyā saha kaikeyyā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram
GE09ram_02_u:594: 2.014.012a evam uktas tu saṃhṛṣṭo narasiṃho mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:595: 2.014.012c tataḥ saṃmānayām āsa sītām idam uvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:596: 2.014.013a devi devaś ca devī ca samāgamya madantare
GE09ram_02_u:597: 2.014.013c mantreyete dhruvaṃ kiṃ cid abhiṣecanasaṃhitam 2.014.014a lakṣayitvā hy abhiprāyaṃ priyakāmā sudakṣiṇā 2.014.014c saṃcodayati rājānaṃ madarthaṃ madirekṣaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:598: 2.014.015a yādṛśī pariṣat tatra tādṛśo dūta āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:600: 2.014.016a hanta śīghram ito gatvā drakṣyāmi ca mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:601: 2.014.016c saha tvaṃ parivāreṇa sukham āssva ramasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:604: 2.014.018a sa sarvān arthino dṛṣṭvā sametya pratinandya ca
GE09ram_02_u:606: 2.014.019a muṣṇantam iva cakṣūṃṣi prabhayā hemavarcasaṃ 2.014.019c kareṇuśiśukalpaiś ca yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:607: 2.014.020a hariyuktaṃ sahasrākṣo ratham indra ivāśugam 2.014.020c prayayau tūrṇam āsthāya rāghavo jvalitaḥ śriyā
GE09ram_02_u:608: 2.014.021a sa parjanya ivākāśe svanavān abhinādayan 2.014.021c niketān niryayau śrīmān mahābhrād iva candramāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:610: 2.014.022c jugopa bhrātaraṃ bhrātā ratham āsthāya pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:613: 2.014.024a sa rāghavas tatra kathāpralāpaṃ; śuśrāva lokasya samāgatasya
GE09ram_02_u:614: 2.014.024c ātmādhikārā vividhāś ca vācaḥ; prahṛṣṭarūpasya pure janasya
GE09ram_02_u:615: 2.014.025a eṣa śriyaṃ gacchati rāghavo 'dya; rājaprasādād vipulāṃ gamiṣyan
GE09ram_02_u:616: 2.014.025c ete vayaṃ sarvasamṛddhakāmā; yeṣām ayaṃ no bhavitā praśāstā 2.014.025e lābho janasyāsya yad eṣa sarvaṃ; prapatsyate rāṣṭram idaṃ
GE09ram_02_u:618: 2.014.026a sa ghoṣavadbhiś ca hayaiḥ sanāgaiḥ; puraḥsaraiḥ svastikasūtamāgadhaiḥ 2.014.026c mahīyamānaḥ pravaraiś ca vādakair; abhiṣṭuto vaiśravaṇo yathā
GE09ram_02_u:620: 2.014.027a kareṇumātaṅgarathāśvasaṃkulaṃ; mahājanaughaiḥ paripūrṇacatvaram 2.014.027c prabhūtaratnaṃ bahupaṇyasaṃcayaṃ; dadarśa rāmo ruciraṃ
GE09ram_02_u:622: 2.015.001a sa rāmo ratham āsthāya saṃprahṛṣṭasuhṛjjanaḥ 2.015.001c apaśyan nagaraṃ śrīmān
GE09ram_02_u:623: 2.015.002a sa gṛhair abhrasaṃkāśaiḥ pāṇḍurair upaśobhitam 2.015.002c rājamārgaṃ yayau rāmo
GE09ram_02_u:624: 2.015.003a śobhamānam asaṃbādhaṃ taṃ rājapatham uttamam 2.015.003c saṃvṛtaṃ vividhaiḥ paṇyair bhakṣyair uccāvacair api
GE09ram_02_u:625: 2.015.004a āśīrvādān bahūñ śṛṇvan suhṛdbhiḥ samudīritān 2.015.004c yathārhaṃ cāpi saṃpūjya sarvān eva narān yayau
GE09ram_02_u:628: 2.015.006a yathā sma lālitāḥ pitrā yathā pūrvaiḥ pitāmahaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:629: 2.015.006c tataḥ sukhataraṃ sarve rāme vatsyāma rājani
GE09ram_02_u:630: 2.015.007a alam adya hi bhuktena paramārthair alaṃ ca naḥ 2.015.007c yathā paśyāma niryāntaṃ rāmaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_02_u:631: 2.015.008a ato hi na priyataraṃ nānyat kiṃ cid bhaviṣyati 2.015.008c yathābhiṣeko rāmasya
GE09ram_02_u:632: 2.015.009a etāś cānyāś ca suhṛdām udāsīnaḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:633: 2.015.009c ātmasaṃpūjanīḥ śṛṇvan yayau rāmo mahāpatham 2.015.010a na hi tasmān manaḥ kaś cic cakṣuṣī vā narottamāt
GE09ram_02_u:635: 2.015.011a sarveṣāṃ sa hi dharmātmā varṇānāṃ kurute dayām
GE09ram_02_u:636: 2.015.011c caturṇāṃ hi vayaḥsthānāṃ tena te tam anuvratāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:638: 2.015.012c rājaputraḥ pitur veśma praviveśa śriyā jvalan
GE09ram_02_u:639: 2.015.013a sa sarvāḥ samatikramya kakṣyā daśarathātmajaḥ 2.015.013c saṃnivartya janaṃ sarvaṃ śuddhāntaḥpuram abhyagāt 2.015.014a tataḥ praviṣṭe pitur antikaṃ tadā; janaḥ sa sarvo mudito nṛpātmaje 2.015.014c pratīkṣate tasya punaḥ sma nirgamaṃ; yathodayaṃ candramasaḥ saritpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:640: 2.016.001a sa dadarśāsane rāmo niṣaṇṇaṃ pitaraṃ śubhe
GE09ram_02_u:642: 2.016.002a sa pituś caraṇau pūrvam abhivādya vinītavat
GE09ram_02_u:643: 2.016.002c tato vavande caraṇau kaikeyyāḥ susamāhitaḥ 2.016.003a rāmety uktvā ca vacanaṃ vāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ 2.016.003c śaśāka nṛpatir dīno nekṣituṃ nābhibhāṣitum 2.016.004a tad apūrvaṃ narapater dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ bhayāvaham
GE09ram_02_u:644: 2.016.004c rāmo 'pi bhayam āpannaḥ padā spṛṣṭveva pannagam 2.016.005a indriyair aprahṛṣṭais taṃ śokasaṃtāpakarśitam
GE09ram_02_u:646: 2.016.006a ūrmi mālinam akṣobhyaṃ kṣubhyantam iva sāgaram
GE09ram_02_u:647: 2.016.006c upaplutam ivādityam uktānṛtam ṛṣiṃ yathā 2.016.007a acintyakalpaṃ hi pitus taṃ śokam upadhārayan
GE09ram_02_u:648: 2.016.007c babhūva saṃrabdhataraḥ samudra iva parvaṇi 2.016.008a cintayām āsa ca tadā rāmaḥ pitṛhite rataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:649: 2.016.008c kiṃsvid adyaiva nṛpatir na māṃ pratyabhinandati
GE09ram_02_u:650: 2.016.009a anyadā māṃ pitā dṛṣṭvā kupito 'pi prasīdati
GE09ram_02_u:651: 2.016.009c tasya mām adya saṃprekṣya kimāyāsaḥ pravartate
GE09ram_02_u:652: 2.016.010a sa dīna iva śokārto viṣaṇṇavadanadyutiḥ 2.016.010c kaikeyīm abhivādyaiva rāmo vacanam abravīt 2.016.011a kaccin mayā nāparādham ajñānād yena me pitā
GE09ram_02_u:653: 2.016.011c kupitas tan mamācakṣva tvaṃ caivainaṃ prasādaya
GE09ram_02_u:654: 2.016.012a vivarṇavadano dīno na hi mām abhibhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:655: 2.016.012c śārīro mānaso vāpi kaccid enaṃ na bādhate
GE09ram_02_u:656: 2.016.012e saṃtāpo vābhitāpo vā durlabhaṃ hi sadā sukham
GE09ram_02_u:657: 2.016.013a kaccin na kiṃ cid bharate kumāre priyadarśane
GE09ram_02_u:658: 2.016.013c śatrughne vā mahāsattve mātṝṇāṃ vā mamāśubham
GE09ram_02_u:659: 2.016.014a atoṣayan mahārājam akurvan vā pitur vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:660: 2.016.014c muhūrtam api neccheyaṃ jīvituṃ kupite nṛpe
GE09ram_02_u:661: 2.016.015a yatomūlaṃ naraḥ paśyet prādurbhāvam ihātmanaḥ 2.016.015c kathaṃ tasmin na varteta pratyakṣe sati daivate
GE09ram_02_u:662: 2.016.016a kaccit te paruṣaṃ kiṃ cid abhimānāt pitā mama 2.016.016c ukto bhavatyā kopena yatrāsya lulitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:663: 2.016.017a etad ācakṣva me devi tattvena paripṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:664: 2.016.017c kiṃnimittam apūrvo 'yaṃ vikāro manujādhipe 2.016.018a ahaṃ hi vacanād rājñaḥ pateyam api pāvake
GE09ram_02_u:665: 2.016.018c bhakṣayeyaṃ viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ majjeyam api cārṇave
GE09ram_02_u:666: 2.016.018e niyukto guruṇā pitrā nṛpeṇa ca hitena ca
GE09ram_02_u:667: 2.016.019a tad brūhi vacanaṃ devi rājño yad abhikāṅkṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:668: 2.016.019c kariṣye pratijāne ca rāmo dvir nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:670: 2.016.020c uvāca rāmaṃ kaikeyī vacanaṃ bhṛśadāruṇam 2.016.021a purā devāsure yuddhe pitrā te mama rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:671: 2.016.021c rakṣitena varau dattau saśalyena mahāraṇe 2.016.022a tatra me yācito rājā bharatasyābhiṣecanam 2.016.022c gamanaṃ daṇḍakāraṇye tava cādyaiva rāghava 2.016.023a yadi satyapratijñaṃ tvaṃ pitaraṃ kartum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:672: 2.016.023c ātmānaṃ ca narareṣṭha mama vākyam idaṃ śṛṇu
GE09ram_02_u:673: 2.016.024a sa nideśe pitus tiṣṭha yathā tena pratiśrutam
GE09ram_02_u:674: 2.016.024c tvayāraṇyaṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:675: 2.016.025a sapta sapta ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:676: 2.016.025c abhiṣekam imaṃ tyaktvā jaṭācīradharo vasa 2.016.026a bharataḥ kosalapure praśāstu vasudhām imām 2.016.026c nānāratnasamākīrṇaṃ savājirathakuñjarām 2.016.027a tad apriyam amitraghno vacanaṃ maraṇopamam 2.016.027c śrutvā na vivyathe rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:677: 2.016.028a evam astu gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ vastum ahaṃ tv ataḥ 2.016.028c jaṭācīradharo rājñaḥ pratijñām anupālayan
GE09ram_02_u:678: 2.016.029a idaṃ tu jñātum icchāmi kimarthaṃ māṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:680: 2.016.030a manyur na ca tvayā kāryo devi brūhi tavāgrataḥ 2.016.030c yāsyāmi bhava suprītā vanaṃ cīrajaṭādharaḥ 2.016.031a hitena guruṇā pitrā kṛtajñena nṛpeṇa ca
GE09ram_02_u:681: 2.016.031c niyujyamāno viśrabdhaṃ kiṃ na kuryād ahaṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:682: 2.016.032a alīkaṃ mānasaṃ tv ekaṃ hṛdayaṃ dahatīva me
GE09ram_02_u:683: 2.016.032c svayaṃ yan nāha māṃ rājā bharatasyābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_02_u:684: 2.016.033a ahaṃ hi sītāṃ rājyaṃ ca prāṇān iṣṭān dhanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:685: 2.016.033c hṛṣṭo bhrātre svayaṃ dadyāṃ bharatāyāpracoditaḥ 2.016.034a kiṃ punar manujendreṇa svayaṃ pitrā pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:686: 2.016.034c tava ca priyakāmārthaṃ pratijñām anupālayan 2.016.035a tad āśvāsaya hīmaṃ tvaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ yan mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:688: 2.016.036a gacchantu caivānayituṃ dūtāḥ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ 2.016.036c bharataṃ mātulakulād adyaiva nṛpaśāsanāt
GE09ram_02_u:690: 2.016.037c avicārya pitur vākyaṃ samāvastuṃ caturdaśa 2.016.038a sā hṛṣṭā tasya tadvākyaṃ śrutvā rāmasya kaikayī
GE09ram_02_u:691: 2.016.038c prasthānaṃ śraddadhānā hi tvarayām āsa rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:692: 2.016.039a evaṃ bhavatu yāsyanti dūtāḥ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:694: 2.016.040a tava tv ahaṃ kṣamaṃ manye notsukasya vilambanam
GE09ram_02_u:695: 2.016.040c rāma tasmād itaḥ śīghraṃ vanaṃ tvaṃ gantum arhasi 2.016.041a vrīḍānvitaḥ svayaṃ yac ca nṛpas tvāṃ nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:696: 2.016.041c naitat kiṃ cin naraśreṣṭha manyur eṣo 'panīyatām
GE09ram_02_u:697: 2.016.042a yāvat tvaṃ na vanaṃ yātaḥ purād asmād abhitvaran 2.016.042c pitā tāvan na te rāma snāsyate bhokṣyate 'pi vā
GE09ram_02_u:698: 2.016.043a dhik kaṣṭam iti niḥśvasya rājā śokapariplutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:699: 2.016.043c mūrchito nyapatat tasmin paryaṅke hemabhūṣite 2.016.044a rāmo 'py utthāpya rājānaṃ
GE09ram_02_u:700: 2.016.044c kaśayevāhato vājī vanaṃ gantuṃ kṛtatvaraḥ 2.016.045a tad apriyam anāryāyā vacanaṃ dāruṇodaram 2.016.045c śrutvā gatavyatho rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:701: 2.016.046a nāham arthaparo devi lokam āvastum utsahe
GE09ram_02_u:702: 2.016.046c viddhi mām ṛṣibhis tulyaṃ kevalaṃ dharmam āsthitam
GE09ram_02_u:703: 2.016.047a yad atrabhavataḥ kiṃ cic chakyaṃ kartuṃ priyaṃ mayā 2.016.047c prāṇān api parityajya sarvathā kṛtam eva tat
GE09ram_02_u:704: 2.016.048a na hy ato dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃ cid asti mahattaram 2.016.048c yathā pitari śuśrūṣā tasya vā vacanakriyā
GE09ram_02_u:706: 2.016.049c vane vatsyāmi vijane varṣāṇīha caturdaśa 2.016.050a na nūnaṃ mayi kaikeyi kiṃ cid āśaṃsase guṇam 2.016.050c yad rājānam avocas tvaṃ mameśvaratarā satī
GE09ram_02_u:707: 2.016.051a yāvan mātaram āpṛcche sītāṃ cānunayāmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:709: 2.016.052a bharataḥ pālayed rājyaṃ śuśrūṣec ca pitur yathā
GE09ram_02_u:710: 2.016.052c tahā bhavatyā kartavyaṃ sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:711: 2.016.053a sa rāmasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ duḥkhahataḥ pitā
GE09ram_02_u:712: 2.016.053c śokād aśaknuvan bāṣpaṃ praruroda mahāsvanam 2.016.054a vanditvā caraṇau rāmo visaṃjñasya pitus tadā
GE09ram_02_u:713: 2.016.054c kaikeyyāś cāpy anāryāyā niṣpapāta mahādyutiḥ 2.016.055a sa rāmaḥ pitaraṃ kṛtvā kaikeyīṃ ca pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:714: 2.016.055c niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt svaṃ dadarśa suhṛjjanam 2.016.056a taṃ bāṣpaparipūrṇākṣaḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nujagāma ha
GE09ram_02_u:716: 2.016.057a ābhiṣecanikaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛtvā rāmaḥ pradakṣiṇam 2.016.057c śanair jagāma sāpekṣo dṛṣṭiṃ tatrāvicālayan 2.016.058a na cāsya mahatīṃ lakṣmīṃ rājyanāśo 'pakarṣati
GE09ram_02_u:717: 2.016.058c lokakāntasya kāntatvaṃ śītaraśmer iva kṣapā 2.016.059a na vanaṃ gantukāmasya tyajataś ca vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:719: 2.016.060a dhārayan manasā duḥkham indriyāṇi nigṛhya ca
GE09ram_02_u:721: 2.016.061a praviśya veśmātibhṛśaṃ mudānvitaṃ; samīkṣya tāṃ cārthavipattim
GE09ram_02_u:725: 2.017.001a rāmas tu bhṛśam āyasto niḥśvasann iva kuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:726: 2.017.001c jagāma sahito bhrātrā mātur antaḥpuraṃ vaśī
GE09ram_02_u:728: 2.017.002c upaviṣṭaṃ gṛhadvāri tiṣṭhataś cāparān bahūn 2.017.003a praviśya prathamāṃ kakṣyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:730: 2.017.004a praṇamya rāmas tān vṛddhāṃs tṛtīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:731: 2.017.004c striyo vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca dvārarakṣaṇatatparāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:732: 2.017.005a vardhayitvā prahṛṣṭās tāḥ praviśya ca gṛhaṃ striyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:733: 2.017.005c nyavedayanta tvaritā rāma mātuḥ priyaṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:734: 2.017.006a kausalyāpi tadā devī rātriṃ sthitvā samāhitā
GE09ram_02_u:735: 2.017.006c prabhāte tv akarot pūjāṃ viṣṇoḥ putrahitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:736: 2.017.007a sā kṣaumavasanā hṛṣṭā nityaṃ vrataparāyaṇā 2.017.007c agniṃ juhoti sma tadā mantravat kṛtamaṅgalā
GE09ram_02_u:737: 2.017.008a praviśya ca tadā rāmo mātur antaḥpuraṃ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:738: 2.017.008c dadarśa mātaraṃ tatra hāvayantīṃ hutāśanam 2.017.009a sā cirasyātmajaṃ dṛṣṭvā mātṛnandanam āgatam 2.017.009c abhicakrāma saṃhṛṣṭā kiśoraṃ vaḍavā yathā 2.017.010a tam uvāca durādharṣaṃ rāghavaṃ sutam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:739: 2.017.010c kausalyā putravātsalyād idaṃ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ 2.017.011a vṛddhānāṃ dharmaśīlānāṃ rājarṣīṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_02_u:740: 2.017.011c prāpnuhy āyuś ca kīrtiṃ ca dharmaṃ copahitaṃ kule 2.017.012a satyapratijñaṃ pitaraṃ rājānaṃ paśya rāghava 2.017.012c adyaiva hi tvāṃ dharmātmā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:741: 2.017.013a mātaraṃ rāghavaḥ kiṃ cit prasāryāñjalim abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:742: 2.017.013c sa svabhāvavinītaś ca gauravāc ca tadānataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:743: 2.017.014a devi nūnaṃ na jānīṣe mahad bhayam upasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:744: 2.017.014c idaṃ tava ca duḥkhāya vaidehyā lakṣmaṇasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:745: 2.017.015a caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vatsyāmi vijane vane
GE09ram_02_u:746: 2.017.015c madhumūlaphalair jīvan hitvā munivad āmiṣam 2.017.016a bharatāya mahārājo yauvarājyaṃ
GE09ram_02_u:747: 2.017.016c māṃ punar daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ vivāsayati tāpasaṃ 2.017.017a tām aduḥkhocitāṃ dṛṣṭvā patitāṃ kadalīm iva
GE09ram_02_u:748: 2.017.017c rāmas tūtthāpayām āsa mātaraṃ gatacetasaṃ 2.017.018a upāvṛtyotthitāṃ dīnāṃ vaḍavām iva vāhitām 2.017.018c pāṃśuguṇṭhitasarvāgnīṃ vimamarśa ca pāṇinā
GE09ram_02_u:749: 2.017.019a sā rāghavam upāsīnam asukhārtā sukhocitā 2.017.019c uvāca puruṣavyāghram upaśṛṇvati
GE09ram_02_u:750: 2.017.020a yadi putra na jāyethā mama śokāya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:751: 2.017.020c na sma duḥkham ato bhūyaḥ paśyeyam aham aprajā 2.017.021a eka eva hi vandhyāyāḥ śoko bhavati mānavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:752: 2.017.021c aprajāsmīti saṃtāpo na hy anyaḥ putra vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:753: 2.017.022a na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kalyāṇaṃ sukhaṃ vā patipauruṣe
GE09ram_02_u:754: 2.017.022c api putre vipaśyeyam iti rāmāsthitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:755: 2.017.023a sā bahūny amanojñāni vākyāni hṛdayacchidām 2.017.023c ahaṃ śroṣye sapatnīnām avarāṇāṃ varā satī
GE09ram_02_u:756: 2.017.023e ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu pramadānāṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:757: 2.017.024a tvayi saṃnihite 'py evam aham āsaṃ nirākṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:758: 2.017.024c kiṃ punaḥ proṣite tāta dhruvaṃ maraṇam eva me 2.017.025a yo hi māṃ sevate kaś cid atha vāpy anuvartate
GE09ram_02_u:759: 2.017.025c kaikeyyāḥ putram anvīkṣya sa jano nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:760: 2.017.026a daśa sapta ca varṣāṇi tava jātasya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:762: 2.017.027a upavāsaiś ca yogaiś ca bahubhiś ca pariśramaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:763: 2.017.027c duḥkhaṃ saṃvardhito moghaṃ tvaṃ hi durgatayā mayā
GE09ram_02_u:764: 2.017.028a sthiraṃ tu hṛdayaṃ manye mamedaṃ yan na dīryate 2.017.028c prāvṛṣīva mahānadyāḥ spṛṣṭaṃ kūlaṃ navāmbhasā 2.017.029a mamaiva nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ na vidyate; na cāvakāśo 'sti yamakṣaye mama 2.017.029c yad antako 'dyaiva na māṃ jihīrṣati; prasahya siṃho rudatīṃ
GE09ram_02_u:765: mṛgīm iva 2.017.030a sthiraṃ hi nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ mamāyasaṃ; na bhidyate yad bhuvi nāvadīryate 2.017.030c anena duḥkhena ca deham arpitaṃ; dhruvaṃ hy akāle maraṇaṃ na vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:766: 2.017.031a idaṃ tu duḥkhaṃ yad anarthakāni me; vratāni dānāni ca saṃyamāś ca hi
GE09ram_02_u:767: 2.017.031c tapaś ca taptaṃ yad apatyakāraṇāt; suniṣphalaṃ bījam ivoptam
GE09ram_02_u:769: 2.017.032a yadi hy akāle maraṇaṃ svayecchayā; labheta kaś cid guru duḥkha karśitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:770: 2.017.032c gatāham adyaiva pareta saṃsadaṃ; vinā tvayā dhenur ivātmajena vai 2.017.033a bhṛśam asukham amarṣitā tadā; bahu vilalāpa samīkṣya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:771: 2.017.033c vyasanam upaniśāmya sā mahat; sutam iva baddham avekṣya kiṃnarī 2.018.001a tathā tu vilapantīṃ tāṃ kausalyāṃ rāmamātaram
GE09ram_02_u:772: 2.018.001c uvāca lakṣmaṇo dīnas tat kālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:773: 2.018.002a na rocate mamāpy etad ārye yad rāghavo vanam 2.018.002c tyaktvā rājyaśriyaṃ gacchet striyā vākyavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:774: 2.018.003a viparītaś ca vṛddhaś ca viṣayaiś ca pradharṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:775: 2.018.003c nṛpaḥ kim iva na brūyāc codyamānaḥ samanmathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:776: 2.018.004a nāsyāparādhaṃ paśyāmi nāpi doṣaṃ tathā vidham
GE09ram_02_u:777: 2.018.004c yena nirvāsyate rāṣṭrād vanavāsāya rāghavaḥ 2.018.005a na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ loke parokṣam api yo naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:778: 2.018.005c amitro 'pi nirasto 'pi yo 'sya doṣam udāharet 2.018.006a devakalpam ṛjuṃ dāntaṃ ripūṇām api vatsalam
GE09ram_02_u:779: 2.018.006c avekṣamāṇaḥ ko dharmaṃ tyajet putram akāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:780: 2.018.007a tad idaṃ vacanaṃ rājñaḥ punar bālyam upeyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:781: 2.018.007c putraḥ ko hṛdaye kuryād rājavṛttam anusmaran
GE09ram_02_u:782: 2.018.008a yāvad eva na jānāti kaś cid artham imaṃ naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:783: 2.018.008c tāvad eva mayā sādham ātmasthaṃ kuru śāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:784: 2.018.009a mayā pārśve sadhanuṣā tava guptasya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:786: 2.018.010a nirmanuṣyām imāṃ sarvām ayodhyāṃ manujarṣabha 2.018.010c kariṣyāmi śarais tīkṣṇair yadi sthāsyati vipriye
GE09ram_02_u:787: 2.018.011a bharatasyātha pakṣyo vā yo vāsya hitam icchati
GE09ram_02_u:788: 2.018.011c sarvān etān vadhiṣyāmi mṛdur hi paribhūyate
GE09ram_02_u:789: 2.018.012a tvayā caiva mayā caiva kṛtvā vairam anuttamam
GE09ram_02_u:790: 2.018.012c kasya śaktiḥ śriyaṃ dātuṃ bharatāyāriśāsana 2.018.013a anurakto 'smi bhāvena bhrātaraṃ devi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:791: 2.018.013c satyena dhanuṣā caiva datteneṣṭena te śape
GE09ram_02_u:792: 2.018.014a dīptam agnim araṇyaṃ vā yadi rāmaḥ pravekṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:793: 2.018.014c praviṣṭaṃ tatra māṃ devi tvaṃ pūrvam avadhāraya
GE09ram_02_u:794: 2.018.015a harāmi vīryād duḥkhaṃ te tamaḥ sūrya ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:795: 2.018.015c devī paśyatu me vīryaṃ rāghavaś caiva paśyatu
GE09ram_02_u:796: 2.018.016a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:797: 2.018.016c uvāca rāmaṃ kausalyā rudantī śokalālasā 2.018.017a bhrātus te vadataḥ putra lakṣmaṇasya śrutaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:798: 2.018.017c yad atrānantaraṃ tat tvaṃ kuruṣva yadi rocate
GE09ram_02_u:799: 2.018.018a na cādharmyaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sapatnyā mama bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:800: 2.018.018c vihāya śokasaṃtaptāṃ gantum arhasi mām itaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:801: 2.018.019a dharmajña yadi dharmiṣṭho dharmaṃ caritum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:802: 2.018.019c śuśrūṣa mām ihasthas tvaṃ cara dharmam anuttamam
GE09ram_02_u:803: 2.018.020a śuśrūṣur jananīṃ putra svagṛhe niyato vasan
GE09ram_02_u:804: 2.018.020c pareṇa tapasā yuktaḥ kāśyapas tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:805: 2.018.021a yathaiva rājā pūjyas te gauraveṇa tathā hy aham 2.018.021c tvāṃ nāham anujānāmi na gantavyam ito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:806: 2.018.022a tvadviyogān na me kāryaṃ jīvitena sukhena vā
GE09ram_02_u:807: 2.018.022c tvayā saha mama śreyas tṛṇānām api bhakṣaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:808: 2.018.023a yadi tvaṃ yāsyasi vanaṃ tyaktvā māṃ śokalālasām
GE09ram_02_u:809: 2.018.023c ahaṃ prāyam ihāsiṣye na hi śakṣyāmi jīvitum
GE09ram_02_u:810: 2.018.024a tatas tvaṃ prāpsyase putra nirayaṃ lokaviśrutam
GE09ram_02_u:811: 2.018.024c brahmahatyām ivādharmāt samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ 2.018.025a vilapantīṃ tathā dīnāṃ kausalyāṃ jananīṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:812: 2.018.025c uvāca rāmo dharmātmā vacanaṃ dharmasaṃhitam 2.018.026a nāsti śaktiḥ pitur vākyaṃ samatikramituṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:813: 2.018.026c prasādaye tvāṃ śirasā gantum icchāmy ahaṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:814: 2.018.027a ṛṣiṇā ca pitur vākyaṃ kurvatā vratacāriṇā
GE09ram_02_u:815: 2.018.027c gaur hatā jānatā dharmaṃ kaṇḍunāpi vipaścitā
GE09ram_02_u:816: 2.018.028a asmākaṃ ca kule pūrvaṃ sagarasyājñayā pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:817: 2.018.028c khanadbhiḥ sāgarair bhūtim avāptaḥ sumahān vadhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:818: 2.018.029a jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa reṇukā jananī svayam 2.018.029c kṛttā paraśunāraṇye pitur
GE09ram_02_u:819: 2.018.030a na khalv etan mayaikena kriyate pitṛśāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:821: 2.018.031a tad etat tu mayā kāryaṃ kriyate bhuvi nānyathā 2.018.031c pitur hi vacanaṃ kurvan na kaś cin nāma hīyate
GE09ram_02_u:822: 2.018.032a tām evam uktvā jananīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:823: 2.018.032c tava lakṣmaṇa jānāmi mayi sneham anuttamam
GE09ram_02_u:824: 2.018.032e abhiprāyam avijñāya satyasya ca śamasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:825: 2.018.033a dharmo hi paramo loke dharme satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_02_u:826: 2.018.033c dharmasaṃśritam etac ca pitur vacanam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:827: 2.018.034a saṃśrutya ca pitur vākyaṃ mātur vā brāhmaṇasya vā 2.018.034c na kartavyaṃ vṛthā vīra dharmam āśritya tiṣṭhatā
GE09ram_02_u:828: 2.018.035a so 'haṃ na śakṣyāmi pitur niyogam ativartitum 2.018.035c pitur hi vacanād vīra kaikeyyāhaṃ pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:829: 2.018.036a tad enāṃ visṛjānāryāṃ kṣatradharmāśritāṃ matim 2.018.036c dharmam āśraya mā taikṣṇyaṃ madbuddhir anugamyatām
GE09ram_02_u:830: 2.018.037a tam evam uktvā sauhārdād bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:831: 2.018.037c uvāca bhūyaḥ kausalyāṃ prāñjaliḥ śirasānataḥ 2.018.038a anumanyasva māṃ devi gamiṣyantam ito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:832: 2.018.038c śāpitāsi mama prāṇaiḥ kuru svastyayanāni me
GE09ram_02_u:833: 2.018.038e tīrṇapratijñaś ca vanāt punar eṣyāmy ahaṃ purīm
GE09ram_02_u:834: 2.018.039a yaśo hy ahaṃ kevalarājyakāraṇān; na pṛṣṭhataḥ kartum alaṃ mahodayam 2.018.039c adīrghakāle na tu devi jīvite; vṛṇe 'varām adya mahīm adharmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:835: 2.018.040a prasādayan naravṛṣabhaḥ sa mātaraṃ; parākramāj jigamiṣur eva
GE09ram_02_u:837: 2.018.040c athānujaṃ bhṛśam anuśāsya darśanaṃ; cakāra tāṃ hṛdi jananīṃ pradakṣiṇam 2.019.001a atha taṃ vyathayā dīnaṃ saviśeṣam amarṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:839: 2.019.002a āsādya rāmaḥ saumitriṃ suhṛdaṃ bhrātaraṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:840: 2.019.002c uvācedaṃ sa dhairyeṇa dhārayan sattvam ātmavān
GE09ram_02_u:841: 2.019.003a saumitre yo 'bhiṣekārthe mama saṃbhārasaṃbhramaḥ 2.019.003c abhiṣekanivṛttyarthe so 'stu saṃbhārasaṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:843: 2.019.004c mātā naḥ sā yathā na syāt saviśaṅkā tathā kuru
GE09ram_02_u:844: 2.019.005a tasyāḥ śaṅkāmayaṃ duḥkhaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe
GE09ram_02_u:846: 2.019.006a na buddhipūrvaṃ nābuddhaṃ smarāmīha kadā cana
GE09ram_02_u:847: 2.019.006c mātṝṇāṃ vā pitur vāhaṃ kṛtam alpaṃ ca vipriyam 2.019.007a satyaḥ satyābhisaṃdhaś ca nityaṃ satyaparākramaḥ 2.019.007c paralokabhayād bhīto nirbhayo 'stu pitā mama 2.019.008a tasyāpi hi bhaved asmin karmaṇy apratisaṃhṛte
GE09ram_02_u:848: 2.019.008c satyaṃ neti manas tāpas tasya tāpas tapec ca mām
GE09ram_02_u:849: 2.019.009a abhiṣekavidhānaṃ tu tasmāt saṃhṛtya lakṣmaṇa 2.019.009c anvag evāham icchāmi vanaṃ gantum itaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:850: 2.019.010a mama pravrājanād adya kṛtakṛtyā nṛpātmajā 2.019.010c sutaṃ bharatam avyagram abhiṣecayitā tataḥ 2.019.011a mayi cīrājinadhare jaṭāmaṇḍaladhāriṇi
GE09ram_02_u:852: 2.019.012a buddhiḥ praṇītā yeneyaṃ manaś ca susamāhitam
GE09ram_02_u:853: 2.019.012c tat tu nārhāmi saṃkleṣṭuṃ pravrajiṣyāmi māciram
GE09ram_02_u:854: 2.019.013a kṛtāntas tv eva saumitre draṣṭavyo matpravāsane
GE09ram_02_u:855: 2.019.013c rājyasya ca vitīrṇasya punar eva nivartane
GE09ram_02_u:856: 2.019.014a kaikeyyāḥ pratipattir hi kathaṃ syān mama pīḍane
GE09ram_02_u:857: 2.019.014c yadi bhāvo na daivo 'yaṃ kṛtāntavihito bhavet 2.019.015a jānāsi hi yathā saumya na mātṛṣu mamāntaram
GE09ram_02_u:858: 2.019.015c bhūtapūrvaṃ viśeṣo vā tasyā mayi sute 'pi vā
GE09ram_02_u:860: 2.019.016c ugrair vākyair ahaṃ tasyā nānyad daivāt samarthaye
GE09ram_02_u:862: 2.019.017c brūyāt sā prākṛteva strī matpīḍāṃ bhartṛsaṃnidhau
GE09ram_02_u:863: 2.019.018a yad acintyaṃ tu tad daivaṃ bhūteṣv api na hanyate
GE09ram_02_u:864: 2.019.018c vyaktaṃ mayi ca tasyāṃ ca patito hi viparyayaḥ 2.019.019a kaś cid daivena saumitre yoddhum utsahate pumān
GE09ram_02_u:865: 2.019.019c yasya na grahaṇaṃ kiṃ cit karmaṇo 'nyatra dṛśyate
GE09ram_02_u:867: 2.019.020c yasya kiṃ cit tathā bhūtaṃ nanu daivasya karma tat
GE09ram_02_u:868: 2.019.021a vyāhate 'py abhiṣeke me paritāpo na vidyate 2.019.021c tasmād aparitāpaḥ saṃs tvam apy anuvidhāya mām
GE09ram_02_u:870: 2.019.022a na lakṣmaṇāsmin mama rājyavighne; mātā yavīyasy atiśaṅkanīyā
GE09ram_02_u:871: 2.019.022c daivābhipannā hi vadanty aniṣṭaṃ; jānāsi daivaṃ ca tathā prabhāvam 2.020.001a iti bruvati rāme tu lakṣmaṇo 'dhaḥśirā muhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:872: 2.020.001c śrutvā madhyaṃ jagāmeva manasā duḥkhaharṣayoḥ 2.020.002a tadā tu baddhvā bhrukuṭīṃ bhruvor madhye nararṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:873: 2.020.002c niśaśvāsa mahāsarpo bilastha iva roṣitaḥ 2.020.003a tasya duṣprativīkṣyaṃ tad bhrukuṭīsahitaṃ tadā 2.020.003c babhau kruddhasya siṃhasya mukhasya sadṛśaṃ mukham
GE09ram_02_u:874: 2.020.004a agrahas taṃ vidhunvaṃs tu hastī hastam ivātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:875: 2.020.004c tiryag ūrdhvaṃ śarīre ca pātayitvā śirodharām
GE09ram_02_u:876: 2.020.005a agrākṣṇā vīkṣamāṇas tu tiryag bhrātaram abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:877: 2.020.005c asthāne saṃbhramo yasya jāto vai sumahān ayam
GE09ram_02_u:878: 2.020.006a dharmadoṣaprasaṅgena lokasyānatiśaṅkayā 2.020.006c kathaṃ hy etad asaṃbhrāntas tvadvidho vaktum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:879: 2.020.007a yathā daivam aśauṇḍīraṃ śauṇḍīraḥ kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ 2.020.007c kiṃ nāma kṛpaṇaṃ daivam aśaktam abhiśaṃsasi
GE09ram_02_u:880: 2.020.008a pāpayos tu kathaṃ nāma tayoḥ śaṅkā na vidyate 2.020.008c santi dharmopadhāḥ ślakṣṇā dharmātman kiṃ na budhyase
GE09ram_02_u:882: 2.020.009c yeneyam āgatā dvaidhaṃ tava buddhir mahīpate
GE09ram_02_u:883: 2.020.009e sa hi dharmo mama dveṣyaḥ prasaṅgād yasya muhyasi 2.020.010a yady api pratipattis te daivī cāpi tayor matam 2.020.010c tathāpy upekṣaṇīyaṃ te na me tad api rocate 2.020.011a viklavo vīryahīno yaḥ sa daivam anuvartate
GE09ram_02_u:884: 2.020.011c vīrāḥ saṃbhāvitātmāno na daivaṃ paryupāsate 2.020.012a daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa yaḥ samarthaḥ prabādhitum 2.020.012c na daivena vipannārthaḥ puruṣaḥ so 'vasīdati
GE09ram_02_u:885: 2.020.013a drakṣyanti tv adya daivasya pauruṣaṃ puruṣasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:886: 2.020.013c daivamānuṣayor adya vyaktā vyaktir bhaviṣyati 2.020.014a adya matpauruṣahataṃ daivaṃ drakṣyanti vai janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:887: 2.020.014c yad daivād āhataṃ te 'dya dṛṣṭaṃ rājyābhiṣecanam 2.020.015a atyaṅkuśam ivoddāmaṃ gajaṃ madabaloddhatam
GE09ram_02_u:888: 2.020.015c pradhāvitam ahaṃ daivaṃ pauruṣeṇa nivartaye 2.020.016a lokapālāḥ samastās te nādya rāmābhiṣecanam 2.020.016c na ca kṛtsnās trayo lokā vihanyuḥ kiṃ punaḥ pitā
GE09ram_02_u:889: 2.020.017a yair vivāsas tavāraṇye mitho rājan samarthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:890: 2.020.017c araṇye te vivatsyanti caturdaśa samās tathā
GE09ram_02_u:891: 2.020.018a ahaṃ tadāśāṃ chetsyāmi pitus tasyāś ca yā tava 2.020.018c abhiṣekavighātena putrarājyāya vartate
GE09ram_02_u:892: 2.020.019a madbalena viruddhāya na syād daivabalaṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:893: 2.020.019c prabhaviṣyati duḥkhāya yathograṃ pauruṣaṃ mama 2.020.020a ūrdhvaṃ varṣasahasrānte prajāpālyam anantaram
GE09ram_02_u:894: 2.020.020c āryaputrāḥ kariṣyanti vanavāsaṃ gate tvayi 2.020.021a pūrvarājarṣivṛttyā hi vanavāso vidhīyate
GE09ram_02_u:895: 2.020.021c prajā nikṣipya putreṣu putravat paripālane 2.020.022a sa ced rājany anekāgre rājyavibhramaśaṅkayā 2.020.022c naivam icchasi dharmātman rājyaṃ rāma tvam ātmani
GE09ram_02_u:896: 2.020.023a pratijāne ca te vīra mā bhūvaṃ vīralokabhāk
GE09ram_02_u:897: 2.020.023c rājyaṃ ca tava rakṣeyam ahaṃ veleva sāgaram
GE09ram_02_u:898: 2.020.024a maṅgalair abhiṣiñcasva tatra tvaṃ vyāpṛto bhava
GE09ram_02_u:899: 2.020.024c aham eko mahīpālān alaṃ vārayituṃ balāt
GE09ram_02_u:900: 2.020.025a na śobhārthāv imau bāhū na dhanur bhūṣaṇāya me 2.020.025c nāsirābandhanārthāya na śarāḥ stambhahetavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:901: 2.020.026a amitradamanārthaṃ me sarvam etac catuṣṭayam 2.020.026c na cāhaṃ kāmaye 'tyarthaṃ yaḥ syāc chatrur mato mama 2.020.027a asinā tīkṣṇadhāreṇa vidyuccalitavarcasā
GE09ram_02_u:902: 2.020.027c pragṛhītena vai śatruṃ vajriṇaṃ vā na kalpaye
GE09ram_02_u:903: 2.020.028a khaḍganiṣpeṣaniṣpiṣṭair gahanā duścarā ca me 2.020.028c hastyaśvanarahastoruśirobhir bhavitā mahī
GE09ram_02_u:904: 2.020.029a khaḍgadhārā hatā me 'dya dīpyamānā ivādrayaḥ 2.020.029c patiṣyanti dvipā bhūmau meghā iva savidyutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:905: 2.020.030a baddhagodhāṅgulitrāṇe pragṛhītaśarāsane 2.020.030c kathaṃ puruṣamānī syāt puruṣāṇāṃ mayi sthite
GE09ram_02_u:906: 2.020.031a bahubhiś caikam atyasyann ekena ca bahūñ janān
GE09ram_02_u:908: 2.020.032a adya me 'straprabhāvasya prabhāvaḥ prabhaviṣyati 2.020.032c rājñaś cāprabhutāṃ kartuṃ prabhutvaṃ ca tava prabho
GE09ram_02_u:910: 2.020.033c vasūnāṃ ca vimokṣasya suhṛdāṃ pālanasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:911: 2.020.034a anurūpāv imau bāhū rāma karma kariṣyataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:913: 2.020.035a bravīhi ko 'dyaiva mayā viyujyatāṃ; tavāsuhṛt prāṇayaśaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:914: 2.020.035c yathā taveyaṃ vasudhā vaśe bhavet; tathaiva māṃ śādhi tavāsmi kiṃkaraḥ 2.020.036a vimṛjya bāṣpaṃ parisāntvya cāsakṛt; sa lakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:915: 2.020.036c uvāca pitrye vacane vyavasthitaṃ; nibodha mām eṣa hi saumya satpathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:916: 2.021.001a taṃ samīkṣya tv avahitaṃ pitur nirdeśapālane
GE09ram_02_u:917: 2.021.001c kausalyā bāṣpasaṃruddhā vaco dharmiṣṭham abravīt 2.021.002a adṛṣṭaduḥkho dharmātmā
GE09ram_02_u:918: 2.021.002c mayi jāto daśarathāt katham uñchena vartayet
GE09ram_02_u:919: 2.021.003a yasya bhṛtyāś ca dāsāś ca mṛṣṭāny annāni bhuñjate 2.021.003c kathaṃ sa bhokṣyate nātho vane mūlaphalāny ayam
GE09ram_02_u:920: 2.021.004a ka etac chraddadhec chrutvā kasya vā na bhaved bhayam
GE09ram_02_u:921: 2.021.004c guṇavān dayito rājño rāghavo yad vivāsyate
GE09ram_02_u:922: 2.021.005a tvayā vihīnām iha māṃ śokāgnir atulo mahān
GE09ram_02_u:923: 2.021.005c pradhakṣyati yathā kakṣaṃ citrabhānur himātyaye 2.021.006a kathaṃ hi dhenuḥ svaṃ vatsaṃ gacchantaṃ nānugacchati
GE09ram_02_u:924: 2.021.006c ahaṃ tvānugamiṣyāmi yatra putra gamiṣyasi 2.021.007a tathā nigaditaṃ mātrā tad vākyaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:926: 2.021.008a kaikeyyā vañcito rājā mayi cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_02_u:927: 2.021.008c bhavatyā ca parityakto na nūnaṃ vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:928: 2.021.009a bhartuḥ kila parityāgo nṛśaṃsaḥ kevalaṃ striyāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:929: 2.021.009c sa bhavatyā na kartavyo manasāpi vigarhitaḥ
