GE09ram_02_u:930: 2.021.010a yāvaj jīvati kākutsthaḥ pitā me jagatīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:931: 2.021.010c śuśrūṣā kriyatāṃ tāvat sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:932: 2.021.011a evam uktā tu rāmeṇa kausalyā śubha darśanā
GE09ram_02_u:933: 2.021.011c tathety uvāca suprītā rāmam akliṣṭakāriṇam 2.021.012a evam uktas tu vacanaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:934: 2.021.012c bhūyas tām abravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām
GE09ram_02_u:935: 2.021.013a mayā caiva bhavatyā ca kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:936: 2.021.013c rājā bhartā guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:937: 2.021.014a imāni tu mahāraṇye vihṛtya nava pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:938: 2.021.014c varṣāṇi paramaprītaḥ sthāsyāmi vacane tava 2.021.015a evam uktā priyaṃ putraṃ bāṣpapūrṇānanā tadā
GE09ram_02_u:939: 2.021.015c uvāca paramārtā tu kausalyā putravatsalā 2.021.016a āsāṃ rāma sapatnīnāṃ vastuṃ madhye na me kṣamam 2.021.016c naya mām api kākutstha vanaṃ vanyaṃ mṛgīṃ yathā 2.021.016e yadi te gamane buddhiḥ kṛtā pitur apekṣayā
GE09ram_02_u:940: 2.021.017a tāṃ tathā rudatīṃ rāmo rudan vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:941: 2.021.017c jīvantyā hi striyā bhartā daivataṃ prabhur eva ca 2.021.017e bhavatyā mama caivādya rājā prabhavati prabhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:943: 2.021.018c bhavatīm anuvarteta sa hi dharmarataḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:944: 2.021.019a yathā mayi tu niṣkrānte putraśokena pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:945: 2.021.019c śramaṃ nāvāpnuyāt kiṃ cid apramattā tathā kuru
GE09ram_02_u:947: 2.021.020c bhartāraṃ nānuvarteta sā ca pāpagatir bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:948: 2.021.021a śuśrūṣam eva kurvīta bhartuḥ priyahite ratā
GE09ram_02_u:949: 2.021.021c eṣa dharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭo loke vede śrutaḥ smṛtaḥ 2.021.022a pūjyās te matkṛte devi brāhmaṇāś caiva suvratāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:951: 2.021.023a prāpsyase paramaṃ kāmaṃ mayi pratyāgate sati
GE09ram_02_u:952: 2.021.023c yadi dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho dhārayiṣyati jīvitam 2.021.024a evam uktā tu rāmeṇa bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇā 2.021.024c kausalyā putraśokārtā rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt 2.021.024e gaccha putra tvam ekāgro bhadraṃ te 'stu sadā vibho 2.021.025a tathā hi rāmaṃ vanavāsaniścitaṃ; samīkṣya devī parameṇa cetasā
GE09ram_02_u:953: 2.021.025c uvāca rāmaṃ śubhalakṣaṇaṃ vaco; babhūva ca svastyayanābhikāṅkṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:954: 2.022.001a sāpanīya tam āyāsam upaspṛśya jalaṃ śuci
GE09ram_02_u:955: 2.022.001c cakāra mātā rāmasya maṅgalāni manasvinī 2.022.002a svasti sādhyāś ca viśve ca marutaś ca maharṣayaḥ 2.022.002c svasti dhātā vidhātā ca svasti pūṣā bhago 'ryamā
GE09ram_02_u:956: 2.022.003a ṛtavaś caiva pakṣāś ca māsāḥ saṃvatsarāḥ kṣapāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:957: 2.022.003c dināni ca muhūrtāś ca svasti kurvantu te sadā 2.022.004a smṛtir dhṛtiś ca dharmaś ca pāntu tvāṃ putra sarvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:958: 2.022.004c skandaś ca bhagavān devaḥ somaś ca sabṛhaspatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:959: 2.022.005a saptarṣayo nāradaś ca te tvāṃ rakṣantu sarvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:960: 2.022.005c nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvāṇi grahāś ca sahadevatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:962: 2.022.006a plavagā vṛścikā daṃśā maśakāś caiva kānane
GE09ram_02_u:963: 2.022.006c sarīsṛpāś ca kīṭāś ca mā bhūvan gahane tava 2.022.007a mahādvipāś ca siṃhāś ca vyāghrā ṛkṣāś ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ 2.022.007c mahiṣāḥ śṛṅgiṇo raudrā na te druhyantu putraka
GE09ram_02_u:964: 2.022.008a nṛmāṃsabhojanā raudrā ye cānye sattvajātayaḥ 2.022.008c mā ca tvāṃ hiṃsiṣuḥ putra mayā saṃpūjitās tv iha
GE09ram_02_u:965: 2.022.009a āgamās te śivāḥ santu sidhyantu ca parākramāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:966: 2.022.009c sarvasaṃpattayo rāma svastimān gaccha putraka 2.022.010a svasti te 'stv āntarikṣebhyaḥ pārthivebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:967: 2.022.010c sarvebhyaś caiva devebhyo ye ca te paripanthinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:969: 2.022.011c ye ca śeṣāḥ surās te tvāṃ rakṣantu vanavāsinam 2.022.012a iti mālyaiḥ suragaṇān gandhaiś cāpi yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:972: 2.022.013c vṛtranāśe samabhavat tat te bhavatu maṅgalam
GE09ram_02_u:973: 2.022.014a yan maṅgalaṃ suparṇasya vinatākalpayat purā 2.022.014c amṛtaṃ prārthayānasya tat te bhavatu maṅgalam
GE09ram_02_u:974: 2.022.015a oṣadhīṃ cāpi siddhārthāṃ viśalyakaraṇīṃ śubhām 2.022.015c cakāra rakṣāṃ kausalyā mantrair abhijajāpa ca
GE09ram_02_u:975: 2.022.016a ānamya mūrdhni cāghrāya pariṣvajya yaśasvinī 2.022.016c avadat putra siddhārtho gaccha rāma yathāsukham
GE09ram_02_u:976: 2.022.017a arogaṃ sarvasiddhārtham ayodhyāṃ punar āgatam 2.022.017c paśyāmi tvāṃ sukhaṃ vatsa susthitaṃ rājaveśmani
GE09ram_02_u:977: 2.022.018a mayārcitā devagaṇāḥ śivādayo; maharṣayo bhūtamahāsuroragāḥ 2.022.018c abhiprayātasya vanaṃ cirāya te; hitāni kāṅkṣantu diśaś ca rāghava 2.022.019a itīva cāśrupratipūrṇalocanā; samāpya ca svastyayanaṃ yathāvidhi
GE09ram_02_u:978: 2.022.019c pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ; punaḥ punaś cāpi nipīḍya sasvaje 2.022.020a tathā tu devyā sa kṛtapradakṣiṇo; nipīḍya mātuś caraṇau punaḥ punaḥ 2.022.020c jagāma sītānilayaṃ mahāyaśāḥ; sa rāghavaḥ prajvalitaḥ svayā śriyā 2.023.001a abhivādya tu kausalyāṃ rāmaḥ saṃprasthito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:979: 2.023.001c kṛtasvastyayano mātrā dharmiṣṭhe vartmani sthitaḥ 2.023.002a virājayan rājasuto rājamārgaṃ narair vṛtam 2.023.002c hṛdayāny āmamantheva janasya guṇavattayā
GE09ram_02_u:980: 2.023.003a vaidehī cāpi tat sarvaṃ na śuśrāva tapasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:981: 2.023.003c tad eva hṛdi tasyāś ca yauvarājyābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_02_u:982: 2.023.004a devakāryaṃ sma sā kṛtvā kṛtajñā hṛṣṭacetanā
GE09ram_02_u:984: 2.023.005a praviveśātha rāmas tu svaveśma suvibhūṣitam 2.023.005c prahṛṣṭajanasaṃpūrṇaṃ hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ 2.023.006a atha sītā samutpatya vepamānā ca taṃ patim
GE09ram_02_u:986: 2.023.007a vivarṇavadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ prasvinnam amarṣaṇam 2.023.007c āha duḥkhābhisaṃtaptā kim idānīm idaṃ prabho
GE09ram_02_u:987: 2.023.008a adya bārhaspataḥ śrīmān yuktaḥ puṣyo na rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:988: 2.023.008c procyate brāhmaṇaiḥ prājñaiḥ kena tvam asi durmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:989: 2.023.009a na te śataśalākena jalaphenanibhena ca 2.023.009c āvṛtaṃ vadanaṃ valgu chatreṇābhivirājate
GE09ram_02_u:992: 2.023.011a vāgmino bandinaś cāpi prahṛṣṭās tvaṃ nararṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:993: 2.023.011c stuvanto nādya dṛśyante maṅgalaiḥ sūtamāgadhāḥ 2.023.012a na te kṣaudraṃ ca dadhi ca brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ 2.023.012c mūrdhni mūrdhāvasiktasya dadhati sma vidhānataḥ 2.023.013a na tvāṃ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā śreṇīmukhyāś ca bhūṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:996: 2.023.014c mukhyaḥ puṣyaratho yuktaḥ kiṃ na gacchati te 'grataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:997: 2.023.015a na hastī cāgrataḥ śrīmāṃs tava lakṣaṇapūjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:998: 2.023.015c prayāṇe lakṣyate vīra kṛṣṇameghagiri prabhaḥ 2.023.016a na ca kāñcanacitraṃ te paśyāmi priyadarśana
GE09ram_02_u:1000: 2.023.017a abhiṣeko yadā sajjaḥ kim idānīm idaṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:1001: 2.023.017c apūrvo mukhavarṇaś ca na praharṣaś ca lakṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:1002: 2.023.018a itīva vilapantīṃ tāṃ provāca raghunandanaḥ 2.023.018c sīte tatrabhavāṃs tāta pravrājayati māṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1003: 2.023.019a kule mahati saṃbhūte dharmajñe dharmacāriṇi 2.023.019c śṛṇu jānaki yenedaṃ krameṇābhyāgataṃ mama 2.023.020a rājñā satyapratijñena pitrā daśarathena me 2.023.020c kaikeyyai prītamanasā purā dattau mahāvarau 2.023.021a tayādya mama sajje 'sminn abhiṣeke nṛpodyate 2.023.021c pracoditaḥ sa samayo dharmeṇa pratinirjitaḥ 2.023.022a caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyaṃ daṇḍake mayā
GE09ram_02_u:1004: 2.023.022c pitrā me bharataś cāpi yauvarājye niyojitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1005: 2.023.022e so 'haṃ tvām āgato draṣṭuṃ prasthito vijanaṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1006: 2.023.023a bharatasya samīpe te nāhaṃ kathyaḥ kadā cana
GE09ram_02_u:1007: 2.023.023c ṛddhiyuktā hi puruṣā na sahante parastavam
GE09ram_02_u:1008: 2.023.023e tasmān na te guṇāḥ kathyā bharatasyāgrato mama
GE09ram_02_u:1009: 2.023.024a nāpi tvaṃ tena bhartavyā viśeṣeṇa kadā cana
GE09ram_02_u:1010: 2.023.024c anukūlatayā śakyaṃ samīpe tasya vartitum 2.023.025a ahaṃ cāpi pratijñāṃ tāṃ guroḥ samanupālayan
GE09ram_02_u:1011: 2.023.025c vanam adyaiva yāsyāmi sthirā bhava manasvini
GE09ram_02_u:1012: 2.023.026a yāte ca mayi kalyāṇi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam
GE09ram_02_u:1014: 2.023.027a kālyam utthāya devānāṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ yathāvidhi
GE09ram_02_u:1015: 2.023.027c vanditavyo daśarathaḥ pitā mama nareśvaraḥ 2.023.028a mātā ca mama kausalyā vṛddhā saṃtāpakarśitā
GE09ram_02_u:1016: 2.023.028c dharmam evāgrataḥ kṛtvā tvattaḥ saṃmānam arhati
GE09ram_02_u:1017: 2.023.029a vanditavyāś ca te nityaṃ yāḥ śeṣā mama mātaraḥ 2.023.029c snehapraṇayasaṃbhogaiḥ samā hi mama mātaraḥ 2.023.030a bhrātṛputrasamau cāpi draṣṭavyau ca viśeṣataḥ 2.023.030c tvayā lakṣmaṇaśatrughnau prāṇaiḥ priyatarau mama 2.023.031a vipriyaṃ na ca kartavyaṃ bharatasya kadā cana
GE09ram_02_u:1018: 2.023.031c sa hi rājā prabhuś caiva deśasya ca kulasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:1019: 2.023.032a ārādhitā hi śīlena prayatnaiś copasevitāḥ 2.023.032c rājānaḥ saṃprasīdanti prakupyanti
GE09ram_02_u:1020: 2.023.033a aurasān api putrān hi tyajanty ahitakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1021: 2.023.033c samarthān saṃpragṛhṇanti janān api narādhipāḥ 2.023.034a ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi mahāvanaṃ priye; tvayā hi vastavyam ihaiva bhāmini 2.023.034c yathā vyalīkaṃ kuruṣe na kasya cit; tathā tvayā kāryam idaṃ vaco mama
GE09ram_02_u:1022: 2.024.001a evam uktā tu vaidehī priyārhā priyavādinī
GE09ram_02_u:1023: 2.024.001c praṇayād eva saṃkruddhā bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1024: 2.024.002a āryaputra pitā mātā bhrātā putras tathā snuṣā
GE09ram_02_u:1025: 2.024.002c svāni puṇyāni bhuñjānāḥ svaṃ svaṃ bhāgyam upāsate
GE09ram_02_u:1026: 2.024.003a bhartur bhāgyaṃ tu bhāryaikā prāpnoti puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:1027: 2.024.003c ataś caivāham ādiṣṭā vane vastavyam ity api
GE09ram_02_u:1028: 2.024.004a na pitā nātmajo nātmā na mātā na sakhījanaḥ 2.024.004c iha pretya ca nārīṇāṃ patir eko gatiḥ sadā 2.024.005a yadi tvaṃ prasthito durgaṃ vanam adyaiva rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1029: 2.024.005c agratas te gamiṣyāmi mṛdnantī kuśakaṇṭakān 2.024.006a īrṣyā roṣau bahiṣkṛtya bhuktaśeṣam ivodakam 2.024.006c naya māṃ vīra viśrabdhaḥ pāpaṃ mayi na vidyate 2.024.007a prāsādāgrair vimānair vā vaihāyasagatena vā 2.024.007c sarvāvasthāgatā bhartuḥ pādacchāyā viśiṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:1030: 2.024.008a anuśiṣṭāsmi mātrā ca pitrā ca vividhāśrayam
GE09ram_02_u:1031: 2.024.008c nāsmi saṃprati vaktavyā vartitavyaṃ yathā mayā
GE09ram_02_u:1032: 2.024.009a sukhaṃ vane nivatsyāmi yathaiva bhavane pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1033: 2.024.009c acintayantī trīṃl lokāṃś cintayantī pativratam 2.024.010a śuśrūṣamāṇā te nityaṃ niyatā brahmacāriṇī 2.024.010c saha raṃsye tvayā vīra vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu
GE09ram_02_u:1034: 2.024.011a tvaṃ hi kartuṃ vane śakto rāma saṃparipālanam
GE09ram_02_u:1035: 2.024.011c anyasya pai janasyeha kiṃ punar mama mānada
GE09ram_02_u:1036: 2.024.012a phalamūlāśanā nityaṃ bhaviṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ 2.024.012c na te duḥkhaṃ kariṣyāmi nivasantī saha tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:1037: 2.024.013a icchāmi saritaḥ śailān palvalāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:1038: 2.024.013c draṣṭuṃ sarvatra nirbhītā tvayā nāthena dhīmatā
GE09ram_02_u:1040: 2.024.014c iccheyaṃ sukhinī draṣṭuṃ tvayā vīreṇa saṃgatā
GE09ram_02_u:1041: 2.024.015a saha tvayā viśālākṣa raṃsye paramanandinī 2.024.015c evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ vāhaṃ tvayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:1042: 2.024.016a svarge 'pi ca vinā vāso bhavitā yadi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1043: 2.024.016c tvayā mama naravyāghra nāhaṃ tam api rocaye
GE09ram_02_u:1044: 2.024.017a ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ sudurgamaṃ; mṛgāyutaṃ vānaravāraṇair yutam
GE09ram_02_u:1045: 2.024.017c vane nivatsyāmi yathā pitur gṛhe; tavaiva pādāv upagṛhya
GE09ram_02_u:1047: 2.024.018a ananyabhāvām anuraktacetasaṃ; tvayā viyuktāṃ maraṇāya niścitām
GE09ram_02_u:1048: 2.024.018c nayasva māṃ sādhu kuruṣva yācanāṃ; na te mayāto gurutā bhaviṣyati 2.024.019a tathā bruvāṇām api dharmavatsalo; na ca sma sītāṃ nṛvaro ninīṣati
GE09ram_02_u:1049: 2.024.019c uvāca caināṃ bahu saṃnivartane; vane nivāsasya ca duḥkhitāṃ prati 2.025.001a sa evaṃ bruvatīṃ sītāṃ dharmajño dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1050: 2.025.001c nivartanārthe dharmātmā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:1051: 2.025.002a sīte mahākulīnāsi dharme ca niratā sadā
GE09ram_02_u:1052: 2.025.002c ihācara svadharmaṃ tvaṃ mā yathā manasaḥ sukham
GE09ram_02_u:1053: 2.025.003a sīte yathā tvāṃ vakṣyāmi tathā kāryaṃ tvayābale
GE09ram_02_u:1054: 2.025.003c vane doṣā hi bahavo vadatas tān nibodha me 2.025.004a sīte vimucyatām eṣā vanavāsakṛtā matiḥ 2.025.004c bahudoṣaṃ hi kāntāraṃ vanam ity abhidhīyate
GE09ram_02_u:1055: 2.025.005a hitabuddhyā khalu vaco mayaitad abhidhīyate 2.025.005c sadā sukhaṃ na jānāmi duḥkham eva sadā vanam 2.025.006a girinirjharasaṃbhūtā girikandaravāsinām 2.025.006c siṃhānāṃ ninadā duḥkhāḥ śrotuṃ duḥkham ato vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1056: 2.025.007a supyate parṇaśayyāsu svayaṃ bhagnāsu bhūtale 2.025.007c rātriṣu śramakhinnena tasmād duḥkhataraṃ vanam 2.025.008a upavāsaś ca kartavyā yathāprāṇena maithili 2.025.008c jaṭābhāraś ca kartavyo valkalāmbaradhāriṇā
GE09ram_02_u:1057: 2.025.009a atīva vātas timiraṃ bubhukṣā cātra nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1058: 2.025.009c bhayāni ca mahānty atra tato duḥkhataraṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1059: 2.025.010a sarīsṛpāś ca bahavo bahurūpāś ca bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:1060: 2.025.010c caranti pṛthivīṃ darpād ato dukhataraṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1062: 2.025.011c tiṣṭhanty āvṛtya panthānam ato duḥkhataraṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1063: 2.025.012a pataṃgā vṛścikāḥ kīṭā daṃśāś ca maśakaiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:1064: 2.025.012c bādhante nityam abale sarvaṃ duḥkham ato vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1065: 2.025.013a drumāḥ kaṇṭakinaś caiva kuśakāśāś ca bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:1066: 2.025.013c vane vyākulaśākhāgrās tena duḥkhataraṃ vanam 2.025.014a tad alaṃ te vanaṃ gatvā kṣamaṃ na hi vanaṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:1067: 2.025.014c vimṛśann iha paśyāmi bahudoṣataraṃ vanam 2.025.015a vanaṃ tu netuṃ na kṛtā matis tadā; babhūva rāmeṇa yadā
GE09ram_02_u:1069: 2.025.015c na tasya sītā vacanaṃ cakāra tat; tato 'bravīd rāmam idaṃ suduḥkhitā
GE09ram_02_u:1070: 2.026.001a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sītā rāmasya duḥkhitā
GE09ram_02_u:1071: 2.026.001c prasaktāśrumukhī mandam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 2.026.002a ye tvayā kīrtitā doṣā vane vastavyatāṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:1072: 2.026.002c guṇān ity eva tān viddhi tava snehapuraskṛtān
GE09ram_02_u:1073: 2.026.003a tvayā ca saha gantavyaṃ mayā gurujanājñayā
GE09ram_02_u:1074: 2.026.003c tvadviyogena me rāma tyaktavyam iha jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:1075: 2.026.004a na ca māṃ tvatsamīpastham api śaknoti rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1076: 2.026.004c surāṇām īśvaraḥ śakraḥ pradharṣayitum ojasā 2.026.005a patihīnā tu yā nārī na sā śakṣyati jīvitum 2.026.005c kāmam evaṃvidhaṃ rāma tvayā mama vidarśitam
GE09ram_02_u:1077: 2.026.006a atha cāpi mahāprājña brāhmaṇānāṃ mayā śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:1078: 2.026.006c purā pitṛgṛhe satyaṃ vastavyaṃ kila me vane
GE09ram_02_u:1079: 2.026.007a lakṣaṇibhyo dvijātibhyaḥ śrutvāhaṃ vacanaṃ gṛhe 2.026.007c vanavāsakṛtotsāhā nityam eva mahābala
GE09ram_02_u:1080: 2.026.008a ādeśo vanavāsasya prāptavyaḥ sa mayā kila
GE09ram_02_u:1081: 2.026.008c sā tvayā saha tatrāhaṃ yāsyāmi priya nānyathā
GE09ram_02_u:1082: 2.026.009a kṛtādeśā bhaviṣyāmi gamiṣyāmi saha tvayā 2.026.009c kālaś cāyaṃ samutpannaḥ satyavāg bhavatu dvijaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1083: 2.026.010a vanavāse hi jānāmi duḥkhāni bahudhā kila
GE09ram_02_u:1084: 2.026.010c prāpyante niyataṃ vīra puruṣair akṛtātmabhiḥ 2.026.011a kanyayā ca pitur gehe vanavāsaḥ śruto mayā
GE09ram_02_u:1085: 2.026.011c bhikṣiṇyāḥ sādhuvṛttāyā mama mātur ihāgrataḥ 2.026.012a prasāditaś ca vai pūrvaṃ tvaṃ vai bahuvidhaṃ prabho 2.026.012c gamanaṃ vanavāsasya kāṅkṣitaṃ hi saha tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:1086: 2.026.013a kṛtakṣaṇāhaṃ bhadraṃ te gamanaṃ prati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1087: 2.026.013c vanavāsasya śūrasya caryā hi mama rocate
GE09ram_02_u:1088: 2.026.014a śuddhātman premabhāvād dhi bhaviṣyāmi vikalmaṣā 2.026.014c bhartāram anugacchantī bhartā hi mama daivatam
GE09ram_02_u:1089: 2.026.015a pretyabhāve 'pi kalyāṇaḥ saṃgamo me saha tvayā 2.026.015c śrutir hi śrūyate puṇyā brāhmaṇānāṃ yaśasvinām
GE09ram_02_u:1090: 2.026.016a iha loke ca pitṛbhir yā strī yasya mahāmate 2.026.016c adbhir dattā svadharmeṇa pretyabhāve 'pi tasya sā 2.026.017a evam asmāt svakāṃ nārīṃ suvṛttāṃ hi pativratām
GE09ram_02_u:1091: 2.026.017c nābhirocayase netuṃ tvaṃ māṃ keneha hetunā
GE09ram_02_u:1092: 2.026.018a bhaktāṃ pativratāṃ dīnāṃ māṃ samāṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1094: 2.026.019a yadi māṃ duḥkhitām evaṃ vanaṃ netuṃ na cecchasi 2.026.019c viṣam agniṃ jalaṃ vāham āsthāsye mṛtyukāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:1095: 2.026.020a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ taṃ sā yācate gamanaṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:1096: 2.026.020c nānumene mahābāhus tāṃ netuṃ vijanaṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1097: 2.026.021a evam uktā tu sā cintāṃ maithilī samupāgatā
GE09ram_02_u:1098: 2.026.021c snāpayantīva gām uṣṇair aśrubhir nayanacyutaiḥ 2.026.022a cintayantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu nivartayitum ātmavān
GE09ram_02_u:1099: 2.026.022c krodhāviṣṭāṃ tu vaidehīṃ kākutstho bahv asāntvayat
GE09ram_02_u:1100: 2.027.001a sāntvyamānā tu rāmeṇa maithilī janakātmajā 2.027.001c vanavāsanimittāya bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1101: 2.027.002a sā tam uttamasaṃvignā sītā vipulavakṣasaṃ 2.027.002c praṇayāc cābhimānāc ca paricikṣepa rāghavam 2.027.003a kiṃ tvāmanyata vaidehaḥ pitā me mithilādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1102: 2.027.003c rāma jāmātaraṃ prāpya striyaṃ puruṣavigraham 2.027.004a anṛtaṃ balaloko 'yam ajñānād yad dhi vakṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:1103: 2.027.004c tejo nāsti paraṃ rāme tapatīva divākare
GE09ram_02_u:1104: 2.027.005a kiṃ hi kṛtvā viṣaṇṇas tvaṃ kuto vā bhayam asti te
GE09ram_02_u:1105: 2.027.005c yat parityaktukāmas tvaṃ mām ananyaparāyaṇām 2.027.006a dyumatsenasutaṃ vīra satyavantam anuvratām
GE09ram_02_u:1106: 2.027.006c sāvitrīm iva māṃ viddhi tvam ātmavaśavartinīm
GE09ram_02_u:1107: 2.027.007a na tv ahaṃ manasāpy anyaṃ draṣṭāsmi tvadṛte 'nagha
GE09ram_02_u:1108: 2.027.007c tvayā rāghava gaccheyaṃ yathānyā kulapāṃsanī 2.027.008a svayaṃ tu bhāryāṃ kaumārīṃ ciram adhyuṣitāṃ satīm
GE09ram_02_u:1109: 2.027.008c śailūṣa iva māṃ rāma parebhyo dātum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:1110: 2.027.009a sa mām anādāya vanaṃ na tvaṃ prasthātum arhasi 2.027.009c tapo vā yadi vāraṇyaṃ svargo vā syāt saha tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:1111: 2.027.010a na ca me bhavitā tatra kaś cit pathi pariśramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1112: 2.027.010c pṛṣṭhatas tava gacchantyā vihāraśayaneṣv api 2.027.011a kuśakāśaśareṣīkā ye ca kaṇṭakino drumāḥ 2.027.011c tūlājinasamasparśā mārge mama saha tvayā 2.027.012a mahāvāta samuddhūtaṃ yan mām avakariṣyati 2.027.012c rajo ramaṇa tan manye parārdhyam iva candanam
GE09ram_02_u:1113: 2.027.013a śādvaleṣu yad āsiṣye vanānte vanagoracā 2.027.013c kuthāstaraṇatalpeṣu kiṃ syāt sukhataraṃ tataḥ 2.027.014a patraṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ yat tvam alpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu
GE09ram_02_u:1115: 2.027.015a na mātur na pitus tatra smariṣyāmi na veśmanaḥ 2.027.015c ārtavāny upabhuñjānā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:1116: 2.027.016a na ca tatra gataḥ kiṃ cid draṣṭum arhasi vipriyam
GE09ram_02_u:1117: 2.027.016c matkṛte na ca te śoko na bhaviṣyāmi durbharā 2.027.017a yas tvayā saha sa svargo nirayo yas tvayā vinā
GE09ram_02_u:1118: 2.027.017c iti jānan parāṃ prītiṃ gaccha rāma mayā saha 2.027.018a atha mām evam avyagrāṃ vanaṃ naiva nayiṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:1119: 2.027.018c viṣam adyaiva pāsyāmi mā viśaṃ dviṣatāṃ vaśam
GE09ram_02_u:1120: 2.027.019a paścād api hi duḥkhena mama naivāsti jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:1121: 2.027.019c ujjhitāyās tvayā nātha tadaiva maraṇaṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:1122: 2.027.020a idaṃ hi sahituṃ śokaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe
GE09ram_02_u:1123: 2.027.020c kiṃ punar daśavarṣāṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca duḥkhitā
GE09ram_02_u:1124: 2.027.021a iti sā śokasaṃtaptā vilapya karuṇaṃ bahu
GE09ram_02_u:1125: 2.027.021c cukrośa patim āyastā bhṛśam āliṅgya sasvaram
GE09ram_02_u:1126: 2.027.022a sā viddhā bahubhir vākyair digdhair iva gajāṅganā
GE09ram_02_u:1127: 2.027.022c cira saṃniyataṃ bāṣpaṃ mumocāgnim ivāraṇiḥ 2.027.023a tasyāḥ sphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ vāri saṃtāpasaṃbhavam
GE09ram_02_u:1129: 2.027.024a tāṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ visaṃjñām iva duḥkhitām
GE09ram_02_u:1130: 2.027.024c uvāca vacanaṃ rāmaḥ pariviśvāsayaṃs tadā 2.027.025a na devi tava duḥkhena svargam apy abhirocaye
GE09ram_02_u:1131: 2.027.025c na hi me 'sti bhayaṃ kiṃ cit svayambhor iva sarvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1132: 2.027.026a tava sarvam abhiprāyam avijñāya śubhānane 2.027.026c vāsaṃ na rocaye 'raṇye śaktimān api rakṣaṇe
GE09ram_02_u:1133: 2.027.027a yat sṛṣṭāsi mayā sārdhaṃ vanavāsāya maithili
GE09ram_02_u:1134: 2.027.027c na vihātuṃ mayā śakyā kīrtir ātmavatā yathā
GE09ram_02_u:1135: 2.027.028a dharmas tu gajanāsoru sadbhir ācaritaḥ purā
GE09ram_02_u:1136: 2.027.028c taṃ cāham anuvarte 'dya yathā sūryaṃ suvarcalā
GE09ram_02_u:1137: 2.027.029a eṣa dharmas tu suśroṇi pitur mātuś ca vaśyatā 2.027.029c ataś cājñāṃ vyatikramya nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE09ram_02_u:1138: 2.027.030a sa māṃ pitā yathā śāsti satyadharmapathe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1139: 2.027.030c tathā vartitum icchāmi sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1140: 2.027.030e anugacchasva māṃ bhīru sahadharmacarī bhava 2.027.031a brāhmaṇebhyaś ca ratnāni bhikṣukebhyaś ca bhojanam
GE09ram_02_u:1141: 2.027.031c dehi cāśaṃsamānebhyaḥ saṃtvarasva ca māciram 2.027.032a anukūlaṃ tu sā bhartur jñātvā gamanam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1142: 2.027.032c kṣipraṃ pramuditā devī dātum evopacakrame 2.027.033a tataḥ prahṛṣṭā paripūrṇamānasā; yaśasvinī bhartur avekṣya
GE09ram_02_u:1144: 2.027.033c dhanāni ratnāni ca dātum aṅganā; pracakrame dharmabhṛtāṃ manasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:1146: 2.028.001c sthitaṃ prāggāminaṃ vīraṃ yācamānaṃ kṛtāñjalim 2.028.002a mayādya saha saumitre tvayi gacchati tad vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1147: 2.028.002c ko bhariṣyati kausalyāṃ sumitrāṃ vā yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_02_u:1148: 2.028.003a abhivarṣati kāmair yaḥ parjanyaḥ pṛthivīm iva
GE09ram_02_u:1150: 2.028.004a sā hi rājyam idaṃ prāpya nṛpasyāśvapateḥ sutā
GE09ram_02_u:1151: 2.028.004c duḥkhitānāṃ sapatnīnāṃ na kariṣyati śobhanam 2.028.005a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā
GE09ram_02_u:1152: 2.028.005c pratyuvāca tadā rāmaṃ vākyajño vākyakovidam 2.028.006a tavaiva tejasā vīra bharataḥ pūjayiṣyati 2.028.006c kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca prayato nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1153: 2.028.007a kausalyā bibhṛyād āryā sahasram api madvidhān
GE09ram_02_u:1154: 2.028.007c yasyāḥ sahasraṃ grāmāṇāṃ saṃprāptam upajīvanam 2.028.008a dhanur ādāya saśaraṃ
GE09ram_02_u:1155: 2.028.008c agratas te gamiṣyāmi panthānam anudarśayan 2.028.009a āhariṣyāmi te nityaṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:1156: 2.028.009c vanyāni yāni cānyāni svāhārāṇi tapasvinām 2.028.010a bhavāṃs tu saha vaidehyā girisānuṣu raṃsyate
GE09ram_02_u:1157: 2.028.010c ahaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyāmi jāgrataḥ svapataś ca te
GE09ram_02_u:1158: 2.028.011a rāmas tv anena vākyena suprītaḥ pratyuvāca tam
GE09ram_02_u:1159: 2.028.011c vrajāpṛcchasva saumitre sarvam eva suhṛjjanam 2.028.012a ye ca rājño dadau divye mahātmā varuṇaḥ svayam 2.028.012c janakasya mahāyajñe dhanuṣī raudradarśane
GE09ram_02_u:1162: 2.028.014a satkṛtya nihitaṃ sarvam etad ācāryasadmani 2.028.014c sa tvam āyudham ādāya kṣipram āvraja lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:1163: 2.028.015a sa suhṛjjanam āmantrya vanavāsāya niścitaḥ 2.028.015c ikṣvākugurum āmantrya jagrāhāyudham uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:1164: 2.028.016a tad divyaṃ rājaśārdūlaḥ satkṛtaṃ mālyabhūṣitam 2.028.016c rāmāya darśayām āsa saumitriḥ sarvam āyudham
GE09ram_02_u:1165: 2.028.017a tam uvācātmavān rāmaḥ prītyā lakṣmaṇam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:1166: 2.028.017c kāle tvam āgataḥ saumya kāṅkṣite mama lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:1167: 2.028.018a ahaṃ pradātum icchāmi yad idaṃ māmakaṃ dhanam
GE09ram_02_u:1168: 2.028.018c brāhmaṇebhyas tapasvibhyas tvayā saha paraṃtapa 2.028.019a vasantīha dṛḍhaṃ bhaktyā guruṣu dvijasattamāḥ 2.028.019c teṣām api ca me bhūyaḥ sarveṣāṃ copajīvinām
GE09ram_02_u:1169: 2.028.020a vasiṣṭhaputraṃ tu suyajñam āryaṃ; tvam ānayāśu pravaraṃ
GE09ram_02_u:1171: 2.028.020c abhiprayāsyāmi vanaṃ samastān; abhyarcya śiṣṭān aparān dvijātīn
GE09ram_02_u:1172: 2.029.001a tataḥ śāsanam ājñāya bhrātuḥ śubhataraṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:1173: 2.029.001c gatvā sa praviveśāśu suyajñasya niveśanam 2.029.002a taṃ vipram agnyagārasthaṃ vanditvā lakṣmaṇo 'bravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1175: 2.029.003a tataḥ saṃdhyām upāsyāśu gatvā saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:1176: 2.029.003c juṣṭaṃ tat prāviśal lakṣmyā ramyaṃ rāmaniveśanam
GE09ram_02_u:1177: 2.029.004a tam āgataṃ vedavidaṃ prāñjaliḥ sītayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:1179: 2.029.005a jātarūpamayair mukhyair aṅgadaiḥ kuṇḍalaiḥ śubhaiḥ 2.029.005c sahema sūtrair maṇibhiḥ keyūrair valayair api
GE09ram_02_u:1180: 2.029.006a anyaiś ca ratnair bahubhiḥ kākutsthaḥ pratyapūjayat
GE09ram_02_u:1181: 2.029.006c suyajñaṃ sa tadovāca rāmaḥ sītāpracoditaḥ 2.029.007a hāraṃ ca hemasūtraṃ ca bhāryāyai saumya hāraya
GE09ram_02_u:1182: 2.029.007c raśanāṃ cādhunā sītā dātum icchati te sakhe
GE09ram_02_u:1184: 2.029.008c tam apīcchati vaidehī pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ tvayi 2.029.009a nāgaḥ śatruṃ jayo nāma mātulo yaṃ dadau mama 2.029.009c taṃ te gajasahasreṇa dadāmi dvijapuṃgava 2.029.010a ity uktaḥ sa hi rāmeṇa suyajñaḥ pratigṛhya tat 2.029.010c rāmalakṣmaṇasītānāṃ prayuyojāśiṣaḥ śivāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1185: 2.029.011a atha bhrātaram avyagraṃ priyaṃ rāmaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1186: 2.029.011c saumitriṃ tam uvācedaṃ brahmeva tridaśeśvaram 2.029.012a agastyaṃ kauśikaṃ caiva tāv ubhau brāhmaṇottamau
GE09ram_02_u:1187: 2.029.012c arcayāhūya saumitre ratnaiḥ sasyam ivāmbubhiḥ 2.029.013a kausalyāṃ ca ya āśīrbhir bhaktaḥ paryupatiṣṭhati
GE09ram_02_u:1188: 2.029.013c ācāryas taittirīyāṇām abhirūpaś ca vedavit 2.029.014a tasya yānaṃ ca dāsīś ca saumitre saṃpradāpaya
GE09ram_02_u:1189: 2.029.014c kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi yāvat tuṣyati sa dvijaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1190: 2.029.015a sūtaś citrarathaś cāryaḥ sacivaḥ suciroṣitaḥ 2.029.015c toṣayainaṃ mahārhaiś ca ratnair vastrair dhanais tathā
GE09ram_02_u:1191: 2.029.016a śālivāhasahasraṃ ca dve śate bhadrakāṃs tathā
GE09ram_02_u:1192: 2.029.016c vyañjanārthaṃ ca saumitre gosahasram upākuru 2.029.017a tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:1193: 2.029.017c yathoktaṃ brāhmaṇendrāṇām adadād dhanado yathā 2.029.018a athābravīd bāṣpakalāṃs tiṣṭhataś copajīvinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1195: 2.029.019a lakṣmaṇasya ca yad veśma gṛhaṃ ca yad idaṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:1196: 2.029.019c aśūnyaṃ kāryam ekaikaṃ yāvadāgamanaṃ mama 2.029.020a ity uktvā duḥkhitaṃ sarvaṃ janaṃ tam upajīvinam
GE09ram_02_u:1197: 2.029.020c uvācedaṃ dhanadhyakṣaṃ dhanam ānīyatām iti 2.029.020e tato 'sya dhanam ājahruḥ sarvam evopajīvinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1198: 2.029.021a tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1200: 2.029.022a tatrāsīt piṅgalo gārgyas trijaṭo nāma vai dvijaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1201: 2.029.022c ā pañcamāyāḥ kakṣyāyā nainaṃ kaś cid avārayat
GE09ram_02_u:1202: 2.029.023a sa rājaputram āsādya trijaṭo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1203: 2.029.023c nirdhano bahuputro 'smi rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ 2.029.023e uñchavṛttir vane nityaṃ pratyavekṣasva mām iti
GE09ram_02_u:1204: 2.029.024a tam uvāca tato rāmaḥ parihāsasamanvitam 2.029.024c gavāṃ sahasram apy ekaṃ na tu viśrāṇitaṃ mayā 2.029.024e parikṣipasi daṇḍena yāvat tāvad avāpsyasi 2.029.025a sa śāṭīṃ tvaritaḥ kaṭyāṃ saṃbhrāntaḥ pariveṣṭya tām
GE09ram_02_u:1205: 2.029.025c āvidhya daṇḍaṃ cikṣepa sarvaprāṇena vegitaḥ 2.029.026a uvāca ca tato rāmas taṃ gārgyam abhisāntvayan
GE09ram_02_u:1206: 2.029.026c manyur na khalu kartavyaḥ parihāso hy ayaṃ mama 2.029.027a tataḥ sabhāryas trijaṭo mahāmunir; gavām anīkaṃ pratigṛhya
GE09ram_02_u:1209: 2.030.001a dattvā tu saha vaidehyā brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ bahu
GE09ram_02_u:1210: 2.030.001c jagmatuḥ pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ sītayā saha rāghavau
GE09ram_02_u:1211: 2.030.002a tato gṛhīte duṣprekṣye aśobhetāṃ tadāyudhe 2.030.002c mālādāmabhir āsakte sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:1213: 2.030.003c adhiruhya janaḥ śrīmān udāsīno vyalokayat 2.030.004a na hi rathyāḥ sma śakyante gantuṃ bahujanākulāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1214: 2.030.004c āruhya tasmāt prāsādān dīnāḥ paśyanti rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:1215: 2.030.005a padātiṃ varjitacchatraṃ rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1217: 2.030.006a yaṃ yāntam anuyāti sma caturaṅgabalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:1218: 2.030.006c tam ekaṃ sītayā sārdham anuyāti sma lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1219: 2.030.007a aiśvaryasya rasajñaḥ san kāmināṃ caiva kāmadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1220: 2.030.007c necchaty evānṛtaṃ kartuṃ pitaraṃ dharmagauravāt 2.030.008a yā na śakyā purā draṣṭuṃ bhūtair ākāśagair api 2.030.008c tām adya sītāṃ paśyanti rājamārgagatā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1222: 2.030.009c varṣam uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca neṣyaty āśu vivarṇatām 2.030.010a adya nūnaṃ daśarathaḥ sattvam āviśya bhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:1223: 2.030.010c na hi rājā priyaṃ putraṃ vivāsayitum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:1224: 2.030.011a nirguṇasyāpi putrasyā kāthaṃ syād vipravāsanam 2.030.011c kiṃ punar yasya loko 'yaṃ jito vṛttena kevalam
GE09ram_02_u:1225: 2.030.012a ānṛśaṃsyam anukrośaḥ śrutaṃ śīlaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1226: 2.030.012c rāghavaṃ śobhayanty ete ṣaḍguṇāḥ puruṣottamam 2.030.013a tasmāt tasyopaghātena prajāḥ paramapīḍitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1228: 2.030.014a pīḍayā pīḍitaṃ sarvaṃ jagad asya jagatpateḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1230: 2.030.015a te lakṣmaṇa iva kṣipraṃ sapatnyaḥ sahabāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1231: 2.030.015c gacchantam anugacchāmo yena gacchati rāghavaḥ 2.030.016a udyānāni parityajya kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:1237: 2.030.019a vanaṃ nagaram evāstu yena gacchati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1238: 2.030.019c asmābhiś ca parityaktaṃ puraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1239: 2.030.020a bilāni daṃṣṭriṇaḥ sarve sānūni mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ 2.030.020c asmattyaktaṃ prapadyantāṃ sevyamānaṃ tyajantu ca 2.030.021a ity evaṃ vividhā vāco nānājanasamīritāḥ 2.030.021c śuśrāva rāmaḥ śrutvā ca na vicakre 'sya mānasaṃ
GE09ram_02_u:1241: 2.030.022c jagāma rāmaḥ pitaraṃ didṛkṣuḥ; pitur nideśaṃ vidhivac cikīrṣuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1242: 2.030.023a tat pūrvam aikṣvākasuto mahātmā; rāmo gamiṣyan vanam ārtarūpam
GE09ram_02_u:1243: 2.030.023c vyatiṣṭhata prekṣya tadā sumantraṃ; pitur mahātmā pratihāraṇārtham
GE09ram_02_u:1244: 2.030.024a pitur nideśena tu dharmavatsalo; vanapraveśe kṛtabuddhiniścayaḥ 2.030.024c sa rāghavaḥ prekṣya sumantram abravīn; nivedayasvāgamanaṃ nṛpāya me
GE09ram_02_u:1246: 2.031.001c praviśya nṛpatiṃ sūto niḥśvasantaṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_02_u:1247: 2.031.002a ālokya tu mahāprājñaḥ paramākula cetasaṃ 2.031.002c rāmam evānuśocantaṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir āsadat 2.031.003a ayaṃ sa puruṣavyāghra dvāri tiṣṭhati te sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1248: 2.031.003c brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā sarvaṃ caivopajīvinām 2.031.004a sa tvā paśyatu bhadraṃ te rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1249: 2.031.004c sarvān suhṛda āpṛcchya tvām idānīṃ didṛkṣate
GE09ram_02_u:1250: 2.031.005a gamiṣyati mahāraṇyaṃ taṃ paśya jagatīpate 2.031.005c vṛtaṃ rājaguṇaiḥ sarvair ādityam iva raśmibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1251: 2.031.006a sa satyavādī dharmātmā gāmbhīryāt sāgaropamaḥ 2.031.006c ākāśa iva niṣpaṅko narendraḥ pratyuvāca tam
GE09ram_02_u:1252: 2.031.007a sumantrānaya me dārān ye ke cid iha māmakāḥ 2.031.007c dāraiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvair draṣṭum icchāmi rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:1253: 2.031.008a so 'ntaḥpuram atītyaiva striyas tā vākyam abravīt 2.031.008c āryo hvayati vo rājā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram
GE09ram_02_u:1254: 2.031.009a evam uktāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ sumantreṇa nṛpājñayā
GE09ram_02_u:1255: 2.031.009c pracakramus tad bhavanaṃ bhartur ājñāya śāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:1256: 2.031.010a ardhasaptaśatās tās tu pramadās tāmralocanāḥ 2.031.010c kausalyāṃ parivāryātha śanair jagmur dhṛtavratāḥ 2.031.011a āgateṣu ca dāreṣu samavekṣya mahīpatiḥ 2.031.011c uvāca rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sumantrānaya me sutam
GE09ram_02_u:1257: 2.031.012a sa sūto rāmam ādāya lakṣmaṇaṃ maithilīṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:1259: 2.031.013a sa rājā putram āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrāt kṛtāñjalim
GE09ram_02_u:1261: 2.031.014a so 'bhidudrāva vegena rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśāṃ patiḥ 2.031.014c tam asaṃprāpya duḥkhārtaḥ papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1262: 2.031.015a taṃ rāmo 'bhyapātat kṣipraṃ lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1263: 2.031.015c visaṃjñam iva duḥkhena saśokaṃ nṛpatiṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:1266: 2.031.017a taṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_02_u:1267: 2.031.017c paryaṅke sītayā sārdhaṃ rudantaḥ samaveśayan 2.031.018a atha rāmo muhūrtena labdhasaṃjñaṃ mahīpatim 2.031.018c uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā śokārṇavapariplutam
GE09ram_02_u:1268: 2.031.019a āpṛcche tvāṃ mahārāja sarveṣām īśvaro 'si naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1269: 2.031.019c prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ paśya tvaṃ kuśalena mām
GE09ram_02_u:1270: 2.031.020a lakṣmaṇaṃ cānujānīhi sītā cānveti māṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1271: 2.031.020c kāraṇair bahubhis tathyair vāryamāṇau na cecchataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1272: 2.031.021a anujānīhi sarvān naḥ śokam utsṛjya mānada
GE09ram_02_u:1273: 2.031.021c lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca prajāpatir iva prajāḥ 2.031.022a pratīkṣamāṇam avyagram anujñāṃ jagatīpateḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1274: 2.031.022c uvāca rarjā saṃprekṣya vanavāsāya rāghavam 2.031.023a ahaṃ rāghava kaikeyyā varadānena mohitaḥ 2.031.023c ayodhyāyās tvam evādya bhava rājā nigṛhya mām
GE09ram_02_u:1275: 2.031.024a evam ukto nṛpatinā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1277: 2.031.025a bhavān varṣasahasrāya pṛthivyā nṛpate patiḥ 2.031.025c ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi na me kāryaṃ tvayānṛtam 2.031.026a śreyase vṛddhaye tāta punarāgamanāya ca 2.031.026c gacchasvāriṣṭam avyagraḥ panthānam akutobhayam
GE09ram_02_u:1278: 2.031.027a adya tv idānīṃ rajanīṃ putra mā gaccha sarvathā 2.031.027c mātaraṃ māṃ ca saṃpaśyan vasemām adya śarvarīm
GE09ram_02_u:1279: 2.031.027e tarpitaḥ sarvakāmais tvaṃ śvaḥkāle sādhayiṣyasi 2.031.028a atha rāmas tathā śrutvā pitur ārtasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:1280: 2.031.028c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā dīno vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1281: 2.031.029a prāpsyāmi yān adya guṇān ko me śvastān pradāsyati 2.031.029c apakramaṇam evātaḥ sarvakāmair ahaṃ vṛṇe 2.031.030a iyaṃ sarāṣṭrā sajanā dhanadhānyasamākulā
GE09ram_02_u:1282: 2.031.030c mayā visṛṣṭā vasudhā bharatāya pradīyatām 2.031.031a apagacchatu te duḥkhaṃ mā bhūr bāṣpapariplutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1283: 2.031.031c na hi kṣubhyati durdharṣaḥ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1284: 2.031.032a naivāhaṃ rājyam icchāmi na sukhaṃ na ca maithilīm 2.031.032c tvām ahaṃ satyam icchāmi nānṛtaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:1285: 2.031.033a puraṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca mahī ca kevalā; mayā nisṛṣṭā bharatāya
GE09ram_02_u:1287: 2.031.033c ahaṃ nideśaṃ bhavato 'nupālayan; vanaṃ gamiṣyāmi cirāya sevitum
GE09ram_02_u:1288: 2.031.034a mayā nisṛṣṭāṃ bharato mahīm imāṃ; saśailakhaṇḍāṃ sapurāṃ sakānanām
GE09ram_02_u:1289: 2.031.034c śivāṃ susīmām anuśāstu kevalaṃ; tvayā yad uktaṃ nṛpate yathāstu tat
GE09ram_02_u:1290: 2.031.035a na me tathā pārthiva dhīyate mano; mahatsu kāmeṣu na cātmanaḥ priye 2.031.035c yathā nideśe tava śiṣṭasaṃmate; vyapaitu duḥkhaṃ tava matkṛte
GE09ram_02_u:1292: 2.031.036a tad adya naivānagha rājyam avyayaṃ; na sarvakāmān na sukhaṃ na maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:1293: 2.031.036c na jīvitaṃ tvām anṛtena yojayan; vṛṇīya satyaṃ vratam astu te tathā
GE09ram_02_u:1294: 2.031.037a phalāni mūlāni ca bhakṣayan vane; girīṃś ca paśyan saritaḥ sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:1295: 2.031.037c vanaṃ praviśyaiva vicitrapādapaṃ; sukhī bhaviṣyāmi tavāstu
GE09ram_02_u:1298: 2.032.001c sabāṣpam atiniḥśvasya jagādedaṃ punaḥ punaḥ 2.032.002a sūta ratnasusaṃpūrṇā caturvidhabalā camūḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1300: 2.032.003a rūpājīvā ca śālinyo vaṇijaś ca mahādhanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1302: 2.032.004a ye cainam upajīvanti ramate yaiś ca vīryataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1303: 2.032.004c teṣāṃ bahuvidhaṃ dattvā tān apy atra niyojaya
GE09ram_02_u:1304: 2.032.005a nighnan mṛgān kuñjarāṃś ca pibaṃś cāraṇyakaṃ madhu
GE09ram_02_u:1305: 2.032.005c nadīś ca vividhāḥ paśyan na rājyaṃ saṃsmariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:1306: 2.032.006a dhānyakośaś ca yaḥ kaś cid dhanakośaś ca māmakaḥ 2.032.006c tau rāmam anugacchetāṃ vasantaṃ nirjane vane
GE09ram_02_u:1307: 2.032.007a yajan puṇyeṣu deśeṣu visṛjaṃś cāptadakṣiṇāḥ 2.032.007c ṛṣibhiś ca samāgamya pravatsyati sukhaṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:1308: 2.032.008a bharataś ca mahābāhur ayodhyāṃ pālayiṣyati 2.032.008c sarvakāmaiḥ punaḥ śrīmān rāmaḥ saṃsādhyatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:1309: 2.032.009a evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe kaikeyyā bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:1310: 2.032.009c mukhaṃ cāpy agamāc cheṣaṃ svaraś cāpi nyarudhyata
GE09ram_02_u:1311: 2.032.010a sā viṣaṇṇā ca saṃtrastā kaikeyī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1312: 2.032.010c rājyaṃ gatajanaṃ sādho pītamaṇḍāṃ surām iva
GE09ram_02_u:1316: 2.032.011e vahantaṃ kiṃ tudasi māṃ niyujya dhuri māhite
GE09ram_02_u:1317: 2.032.012a kaikeyī dviguṇaṃ kruddhā rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1318: 2.032.012c tavaiva vaṃśe sagaro jyeṣṭhaṃ putram upārudhat
GE09ram_02_u:1319: 2.032.012e asamañja iti khyātaṃ tathāyaṃ gantum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:1320: 2.032.013a evam ukto dhig ity eva rājā daśaratho 'bravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1321: 2.032.013c vrīḍitaś ca janaḥ sarvaḥ sā ca tan nāvabudhyata 2.032.014a tatra vṛddho mahāmātraḥ siddhārtho nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1322: 2.032.014c śucir bahumato rājñaḥ kaikeyīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1323: 2.032.015a asamañjo gṛhītvā tu krīḍitaḥ pathi dārakān
GE09ram_02_u:1324: 2.032.015c sarayvāḥ prakṣipann apsu ramate tena durmatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1325: 2.032.016a taṃ dṛṣṭvā nāgaraḥ sarve kruddhā rājānam abruvan
GE09ram_02_u:1326: 2.032.016c asamañjaṃ vṛṣīṇvaikam asmān vā rāṣṭravardhana 2.032.017a tān uvāca tato rājā kiṃnimittam idaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_02_u:1327: 2.032.017c tāś cāpi rājñā saṃpṛṣṭā vākyaṃ prakṛtayo 'bruvan
GE09ram_02_u:1328: 2.032.018a krīḍitas tv eṣa naḥ putrān bālān udbhrāntacetanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1329: 2.032.018c sarayvāṃ prakṣipan maurkhyād atulāṃ prītim aśnute
GE09ram_02_u:1330: 2.032.019a sa tāsāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā prakṛtīnāṃ narādhipa
GE09ram_02_u:1331: 2.032.019c taṃ tatyājāhitaṃ putraṃ tāsāṃ priyacikīrṣayā 2.032.020a ity evam atyajad rājā sagaro vai sudhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1332: 2.032.020c rāmaḥ kim akarot pāpaṃ yenaivam uparudhyate
GE09ram_02_u:1333: 2.032.021a śrutvā tu siddhārthavaco rājā śrāntatarasvanaḥ 2.032.021c śokopahatayā vācā kaikeyīm idam abravīt 2.032.022a anuvrajiṣyāmy aham adya rāmaṃ; rājyaṃ parityajya sukhaṃ dhanaṃ ca 2.032.022c sahaiva rājñā bharatena ca tvaṃ; yathā sukhaṃ bhuṅkṣva cirāya rājyam 2.033.001a mahāmātravacaḥ śrutvā rāmo daśarathaṃ tadā 2.033.001c anvabhāṣata vākyaṃ tu vinayajño vinītavat 2.033.002a tyaktabhogasya me rājan vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1334: 2.033.002c kiṃ kāryam anuyātreṇa tyaktasaṅgasya sarvataḥ 2.033.003a yo hi dattvā dvipaśreṣṭhaṃ kakṣyāyāṃ kurute manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1335: 2.033.003c rajjusnehena kiṃ tasya tyajataḥ kuñjarottamam 2.033.004a tathā mama satāṃ śreṣṭha kiṃ dhvajinyā jagatpate
GE09ram_02_u:1336: 2.033.004c sarvāṇy evānujānāmi cīrāṇy evānayantu me 2.033.005a khanitrapiṭake cobhe mamānayata
GE09ram_02_u:1337: 2.033.005c caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi vasato mama
GE09ram_02_u:1338: 2.033.006a atha cīrāṇi kaikeyī svayam āhṛtya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:1340: 2.033.007a sa cīre puruṣavyāghraḥ kaikeyyāḥ pratigṛhya te
GE09ram_02_u:1341: 2.033.007c sūkṣmavastram avakṣipya munivastrāṇy avasta ha 2.033.008a lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tatraiva vihāya vasane śubhe
GE09ram_02_u:1342: 2.033.008c tāpasāc chādane caiva jagrāha pitur agrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1344: 2.033.009c samīkṣya cīraṃ saṃtrastā pṛṣatī vāgurām iva
GE09ram_02_u:1345: 2.033.010a sā vyapatrapamāṇeva pratigṛhya ca durmanāḥ 2.033.010c gandharvarājapratimaṃ bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1346: 2.033.010e kathaṃ nu cīraṃ badhnanti munayo vanavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1347: 2.033.011a kṛtvā kaṇṭhe ca sā cīram ekam ādāya pāṇinā 2.033.011c tasthau hy akuṣalā tatra vrīḍitā janakātmaja
GE09ram_02_u:1348: 2.033.012a tasyās tat kṣipram āgamya rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1349: 2.033.012c cīraṃ babandha sītāyāḥ kauśeyasyopari svayam 2.033.013a tasyāṃ cīraṃ vasānāyāṃ nāthavatyām anāthavat 2.033.013c pracukrośa janaḥ sarvo dhik tvāṃ daśarathaṃ tv iti 2.033.014a sa niḥśvasyoṣṇam aikṣvākas tāṃ bhāryām idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1350: 2.033.014c kaikeyi kuśacīreṇa na sītā gantum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:1351: 2.033.015a nanu paryāptam etat te pāpe rāmavivāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:1352: 2.033.015c kim ebhiḥ kṛpaṇair bhūyaḥ pātakair api te kṛtaiḥ 2.033.016a evaṃ bruvantaṃ pitaraṃ rāmaḥ saṃprasthito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1353: 2.033.016c avākśirasam āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 2.033.017a iyaṃ dhārmika kausalyā mama mātā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:1354: 2.033.017c vṛddhā cākṣudraśīlā ca na ca tvāṃ devagarhite
GE09ram_02_u:1355: 2.033.018a mayā vihīnāṃ varada prapannāṃ śokasāgaram 2.033.018c adṛṣṭapūrvavyasanāṃ bhūyaḥ saṃmantum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:1358: 2.033.019c yathā vanasthe mayi śokakarśitā; na jīvitaṃ nyasya yamakṣayaṃ vrajet 2.034.001a rāmasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā muniveṣadharaṃ ca tam
GE09ram_02_u:1359: 2.034.001c samīkṣya saha bhāryābhī rājā vigatacetanaḥ 2.034.002a nainaṃ duḥkhena saṃtaptaḥ pratyavaikṣata rāghavam 2.034.002c na cainam abhisaṃprekṣya pratyabhāṣata durmanāḥ 2.034.003a sa muhūrtam ivāsaṃjño duḥkhitaś ca mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1361: 2.034.004a manye khalu mayā pūrvaṃ vivatsā bahavaḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1362: 2.034.004c prāṇino hiṃsitā vāpi tasmād idam upasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:1363: 2.034.005a na tv evānāgate kāle dehāc cyavati jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:1364: 2.034.005c kaikeyyā kliśyamānasya mṛtyur mama na vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:1366: 2.034.006c vihāya vasane sūkṣme tāpasācchādam ātmajam 2.034.007a ekasyāḥ khalu kaikeyyāḥ kṛte 'yaṃ kliśyate janaḥ 2.034.007c svārthe prayatamānāyāḥ saṃśritya nikṛtiṃ tv imām
GE09ram_02_u:1367: 2.034.008a evam uktvā tu vacanaṃ bāṣpeṇa pihitekṣṇaha
GE09ram_02_u:1368: 2.034.008c rāmeti sakṛd evoktvā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE09ram_02_u:1369: 2.034.009a saṃjñāṃ tu pratilabhyaiva muhūrtāt sa mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1370: 2.034.009c netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ sumantram idam abravīt 2.034.010a aupavāhyaṃ rathaṃ yuktvā tvam āyāhi hayottamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1371: 2.034.010c prāpayainaṃ mahābhāgam ito janapadāt param 2.034.011a evaṃ manye guṇavatāṃ guṇānāṃ phalam ucyate
GE09ram_02_u:1372: 2.034.011c pitrā mātrā ca yat sādhur vīro nirvāsyate vanam 2.034.012a rājño vacanam ājñāya sumantraḥ śīghravikramaḥ 2.034.012c yojayitvāyayau tatra ratham aśvair alaṃkṛtam 2.034.013a taṃ rathaṃ rājaputrāya sūtaḥ kanakabhūṣitam 2.034.013c ācacakṣe 'ñjaliṃ kṛtvā yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1373: 2.034.014a rājā satvaram āhūya vyāpṛtaṃ vittasaṃcaye 2.034.014c uvāca deśakālajño niścitaṃ sarvataḥ śuci 2.034.015a vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:1374: 2.034.015c varṣāṇy etāni saṃkhyāya vaidehyāḥ kṣipram ānaya
GE09ram_02_u:1375: 2.034.016a narendreṇaivam uktas tu gatvā kośagṛhaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1376: 2.034.016c prāyacchat sarvam āhṛtya sītāyai kṣipram eva tat
GE09ram_02_u:1377: 2.034.017a sā sujātā sujātāni vaidehī prasthitā vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1378: 2.034.017c bhūṣayām āsa gātrāṇi tair vicitrair vibhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1379: 2.034.018a vyarājayata vaidehī veśma tat suvibhūṣitā 2.034.018c udyato 'ṃśumataḥ kāle khaṃ prabheva vivasvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1380: 2.034.019a tāṃ bhujābhyāṃ pariṣvajya śvaśrūr vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1381: 2.034.019c anācarantīṃ kṛpaṇaṃ mūdhny upāghrāya maithilīm 2.034.020a asatyaḥ sarvaloke 'smin satataṃ satkṛtāḥ priyaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1383: 2.034.021a sa tvayā nāvamantavyaḥ putraḥ pravrājito mama
GE09ram_02_u:1384: 2.034.021c tava daivatam astv eṣa nirdhanaḥ sadhano 'pi vā
GE09ram_02_u:1385: 2.034.022a vijñāya vacanaṃ sītā tasyā dharmārthasaṃhitam 2.034.022c kṛtāñjalir uvācedaṃ śvaśrūm abhimukhe sthitā 2.034.023a kariṣye sarvam evāham āryā yad anuśāsti mām
GE09ram_02_u:1386: 2.034.023c abhijñāsmi yathā bhartur vartitavyaṃ śrutaṃ ca me
GE09ram_02_u:1387: 2.034.024a na mām asajjanenāryā samānayitum arhati 2.034.024c dharmād vicalituṃ nāham alaṃ candrād iva prabhā
GE09ram_02_u:1388: 2.034.025a nātantrī vādyate vīṇā nācakro vartate rathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1389: 2.034.025c nāpatiḥ sukham edhate yā syād api śatātmajā
GE09ram_02_u:1390: 2.034.026a mitaṃ dadāti hi pitā mitaṃ mātā mitaṃ sutaḥ 2.034.026c amitasya hi dātāraṃ bhartāraṃ kā na pūjayet
GE09ram_02_u:1392: 2.034.027c ārye kim avamanyeyaṃ strīṇāṃ bhartā hi daivatam
GE09ram_02_u:1393: 2.034.028a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā kausalyā hṛdayaṃgamam 2.034.028c śuddhasattvā mumocāśru sahasā duḥkhaharṣajam
GE09ram_02_u:1395: 2.034.029c rāmaḥ paramadharmajño mātaraṃ vākyam abravīt 2.034.030a amba mā duḥkhitā bhūs tvaṃ paśya tvaṃ pitaraṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:1396: 2.034.030c kṣayo hi vanavāsasya kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:1397: 2.034.031a suptāyās te gamiṣyanti navavarṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:1398: 2.034.031c sā samagram iha prāptaṃ māṃ drakṣyasi suhṛdvṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:1399: 2.034.032a etāvad abhinītārtham uktvā sa jananīṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1400: 2.034.032c trayaḥ śataśatārdhā hi dadarśāvekṣya mātaraḥ 2.034.033a tāś cāpi sa tathaivārtā mātṝr daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1401: 2.034.033c dharmayuktam idaṃ vākyaṃ nijagāda kṛtāñjaliḥ 2.034.034a saṃvāsāt paruṣaṃ kiṃ cid ajñānād vāpi yat kṛtam 2.034.034c tan me samanujānīta sarvāś cāmantrayāmi vaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1402: 2.034.035a jajñe 'tha tāsāṃ saṃnādaḥ krauñcīnām iva niḥsvanaḥ 2.034.035c mānavendrasya bhāryāṇām evaṃ vadati rāghave 2.034.036a murajapaṇavameghaghoṣavad; daśarathaveśma babhūva yat purā
GE09ram_02_u:1403: 2.034.036c vilapita paridevanākulaṃ; vyasanagataṃ tad abhūt suduḥkhitam
GE09ram_02_u:1404: 2.035.001a atha rāmaś ca sītā ca lakṣmaṇaś ca kṛtāñjaliḥ 2.035.001c upasaṃgṛhya rājānaṃ cakrur dīnāḥ pradakṣiṇam 2.035.002a taṃ cāpi samanujñāpya dharmajñaḥ sītayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:1406: 2.035.003a anvakṣaṃ lakṣmaṇo bhrātuḥ kausalyām abhyavādayat 2.035.003c atha mātuḥ sumitrāyā jagrāha caraṇau punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1407: 2.035.004a taṃ vandamānaṃ rudatī mātā saumitrim abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1408: 2.035.004c hitakāmā mahābāhuṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya lakṣmaṇam 2.035.005a sṛṣṭas tvaṃ vanavāsāya svanuraktaḥ suhṛjjane 2.035.005c rāme pramādaṃ mā kārṣīḥ putra bhrātari gacchati
GE09ram_02_u:1409: 2.035.006a vyasanī vā samṛddho vā gatir eṣa tavānagha
GE09ram_02_u:1410: 2.035.006c eṣa loke satāṃ dharmo yaj jyeṣṭhavaśago bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:1411: 2.035.007a idaṃ hi vṛttam ucitaṃ kulasyāsya sanātanam
GE09ram_02_u:1412: 2.035.007c dānaṃ dīkṣā ca yajñeṣu tanutyāgo mṛdheṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:1413: 2.035.008a rāmaṃ daśarathaṃ viddhi māṃ viddhi janakātmajām
GE09ram_02_u:1414: 2.035.008c ayodhyām aṭavīṃ viddhi gaccha tāta yathāsukham
GE09ram_02_u:1415: 2.035.009a tataḥ sumantraḥ kākutsthaṃ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1416: 2.035.009c vinīto vinayajñaś ca mātalir vāsavaṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:1417: 2.035.010a ratham āroha bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1418: 2.035.010c kṣipraṃ tvāṃ prāpayiṣyāmi yatra māṃ rāma vakṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:1419: 2.035.011a caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyāni vane tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:1420: 2.035.011c tāny upakramitavyāni yāni devyāsi coditaḥ 2.035.012a taṃ rathaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaṃ sītā hṛṣṭena cetasā
GE09ram_02_u:1423: 2.035.013c rathopasthe pratinyasya sacarmakaṭhinaṃ ca tat 2.035.014a sītātṛtīyān ārūḍhān dṛṣṭvā dhṛṣṭam acodayat 2.035.014c sumantraḥ saṃmatān aśvān vāyuvegasamāñ jave 2.035.015a prayāte tu mahāraṇyaṃ cirarātrāya rāghave 2.035.015c babhūva nagare mūrcchā balamūrcchā janasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:1426: 2.035.017a tataḥ sabālavṛddhā sā purī paramapīḍitā 2.035.017c rāmam evābhidudrāva gharmārtaḥ salilaṃ yathā 2.035.018a pārśvataḥ pṛṣṭhataś cāpi lambamānās tadunmukhāḥ 2.035.018c bāṣpapūrṇamukhāḥ sarve tam ūcur bhṛśaduḥkhitāḥ 2.035.019a saṃyaccha vājināṃ raśmīn sūta yāhi śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1427: 2.035.019c mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi rāmasya durdarśaṃ no bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:1428: 2.035.020a āyasaṃ hṛdayaṃ nūnaṃ rāmamātur asaṃśayam 2.035.020c yad devagarbhapratime vanaṃ yāti na bhidyate
GE09ram_02_u:1429: 2.035.021a kṛtakṛtyā hi vaidehī chāyevānugatā patim 2.035.021c na jahāti ratā dharme merum arkaprabhā yathā
GE09ram_02_u:1430: 2.035.022a aho lakṣmaṇa siddhārthaḥ satatāṃ priyavādinam 2.035.022c bhrātaraṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ yas tvaṃ paricariṣyasi 2.035.023a mahaty eṣā hi te siddhir eṣa cābhyudayo mahān 2.035.023c eṣa svargasya mārgaś ca yad enam anugacchasi
GE09ram_02_u:1431: 2.035.023e evaṃ vadantas te soḍhuṃ na śekur bāṣpam āgatam 2.035.024a atha rājā vṛtaḥ strībhir dīnābhir dīnacetanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1432: 2.035.024c nirjagāma priyaṃ putraṃ drakṣyāmīti bruvan gṛhāt
GE09ram_02_u:1433: 2.035.025a śuśruve cāgrataḥ strīṇāṃ rudantīnāṃ mahāsvanaḥ 2.035.025c yathā nādaḥ kareṇūnāṃ baddhe mahati kuñjare
GE09ram_02_u:1434: 2.035.026a pitā ca rājā kākutsthaḥ śrīmān sannas tadā babhau 2.035.026c paripūrṇaḥ śaśī kāle graheṇopapluto yathā 2.035.027a tato halahalāśabdo jajñe rāmasya pṛṣṭhataḥ 2.035.027c narāṇāṃ prekṣya rājānaṃ sīdantaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitam 2.035.028a hā rāmeti janāḥ ke cid rāmamāteti cāpare
GE09ram_02_u:1435: 2.035.028c antaḥpuraṃ samṛddhaṃ ca krośantaṃ paryadevayan 2.035.029a anvīkṣamāṇo rāmas tu viṣaṇṇaṃ bhrāntacetasaṃ 2.035.029c rājānaṃ mātaraṃ caiva dadarśānugatau pathi 2.035.029e dharmapāśena saṃkṣiptaḥ prakāśaṃ nābhyudaikṣata
GE09ram_02_u:1436: 2.035.030a padātinau ca yānārhāv aduḥkhārhau sukhocitau 2.035.030c dṛṣṭvā saṃcodayām āsa śīghraṃ yāhīti sārathim
GE09ram_02_u:1437: 2.035.031a na hi tat puruṣavyāghro duḥkhadaṃ darśanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1438: 2.035.031c mātuś ca sahituṃ śaktas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1439: 2.035.032a tathā rudantīṃ kausalyāṃ rathaṃ tam anudhāvatīm
GE09ram_02_u:1440: 2.035.032c krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_02_u:1441: 2.035.032e asakṛt praikṣata tadā nṛtyantīm iva mātaram
GE09ram_02_u:1442: 2.035.033a tiṣṭheti rājā cukroṣa yāhi yāhīti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1443: 2.035.033c sumantrasya babhūvātmā cakrayor iva cāntarā 2.035.034a nāśrauṣam iti rājānam upālabdho 'pi vakṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:1444: 2.035.034c ciraṃ duḥkhasya pāpiṣṭham iti rāmas tam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1445: 2.035.035a rāmasya sa vacaḥ kurvann anujñāpya ca taṃ janam 2.035.035c vrajato 'pi hayāñ śīghraṃ codayām āsa sārathiḥ 2.035.036a nyavartata jano rājño rāmaṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:1446: 2.035.036c manasāpy aśruvegaiś ca na nyavartata mānuṣam
GE09ram_02_u:1447: 2.035.037a yam icchet punar āyāntaṃ nainaṃ dūram anuvrajet
GE09ram_02_u:1448: 2.035.037c ity amātyā mahārājam ūcur daśarathaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1449: 2.035.038a teṣāṃ vacaḥ sarvaguṇopapannaṃ; prasvinnagātraḥ praviṣaṇṇarūpaḥ 2.035.038c niśamya rājā kṛpaṇaḥ sabhāryo; vyavasthitas taṃ sutam īkṣamāṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1450: 2.036.001a tasmiṃs tu puruṣavyāghre niṣkrāmati kṛtāñjalau 2.036.001c ārtaśabdo hi saṃjajñe strīṇām antaḥpure mahān
GE09ram_02_u:1452: 2.036.002c yo gatiṃ śaraṇaṃ cāsīt sa nāthaḥ kva nu gacchati
GE09ram_02_u:1453: 2.036.003a na krudhyaty abhiśasto 'pi krodhanīyāni varjayan 2.036.003c kruddhān prasādayan sarvān samaduḥkhaḥ kva gacchati
GE09ram_02_u:1454: 2.036.004a kausalyāyāṃ mahātejā yathā mātari vartate 2.036.004c tathā yo vartate 'smāsu mahātmā kva nu gacchati
GE09ram_02_u:1455: 2.036.005a kaikeyyā kliśyamānena rājñā saṃcodito vanam 2.036.005c paritrātā janasyāsya jagataḥ kva nu gacchati
GE09ram_02_u:1456: 2.036.006a aho niścetano rājā jīvalokasya saṃpriyam 2.036.006c dharmyaṃ satyavrataṃ rāmaṃ vanavāso pravatsyati 2.036.007a iti sarvā mahiṣyas tā vivatsā iva dhenavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1457: 2.036.007c ruruduś caiva duḥkhārtāḥ sasvaraṃ ca vicukruśuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1458: 2.036.008a sa tam antaḥpure ghoram ārtaśabdaṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1461: 2.036.009c vyasṛjan kavalān nāgā gāvo vatsān na pāyayan
GE09ram_02_u:1462: 2.036.010a triśaṅkur lohitāṅgaś ca bṛhaspatibudhāv api 2.036.010c dāruṇāḥ somam abhyetya grahāḥ sarve vyavasthitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1463: 2.036.011a nakṣatrāṇi gatārcīṃṣi grahāś ca gatatejasaḥ 2.036.011c viśākhāś ca sadhūmāś ca nabhasi pracakāśire
GE09ram_02_u:1464: 2.036.012a akasmān nāgaraḥ sarvo jano dainyam upāgamat
GE09ram_02_u:1465: 2.036.012c āhāre vā vihāre vā na kaś cid akaron manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1467: 2.036.013c na hṛṣṭo lakṣyate kaś cit sarvaḥ śokaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1468: 2.036.014a na vāti pavanaḥ śīto na śaśī saumyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1469: 2.036.014c na sūryas tapate lokaṃ sarvaṃ paryākulaṃ jagat
GE09ram_02_u:1470: 2.036.015a anarthinaḥ sutāḥ strīṇāṃ bhartāro bhrātaras tathā
GE09ram_02_u:1471: 2.036.015c sarve sarvaṃ parityajya rāmam evānvacintayan 2.036.016a ye tu rāmasya suhṛdaḥ sarve te mūḍhacetasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1472: 2.036.016c śokabhāreṇa cākrāntāḥ śayanaṃ na juhus tadā
GE09ram_02_u:1473: 2.036.017a tatas tv ayodhyā rahitā mahātmanā; puraṃdareṇeva mahī saparvatā
GE09ram_02_u:1474: 2.036.017c cacāla ghoraṃ bhayabhārapīḍitā; sanāgayodhāśvagaṇā nanāda ca
GE09ram_02_u:1475: 2.037.001a yāvat tu niryatas tasya rajorūpam adṛśyata
GE09ram_02_u:1477: 2.037.002a yāvad rājā priyaṃ putraṃ paśyaty atyantadhārmikam
GE09ram_02_u:1479: 2.037.003a na paśyati rajo 'py asya yadā rāmasya bhūmipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1480: 2.037.003c tadārtaś ca viṣaṇṇaś ca papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_02_u:1481: 2.037.004a tasya dakṣiṇam anvagāt kausalyā bāhum aṅganā
GE09ram_02_u:1482: 2.037.004c vāmaṃ cāsyānvagāt pārśvaṃ kaikeyī bharatapriyā 2.037.005a tāṃ nayena ca saṃpanno dharmeṇa nivayena ca
GE09ram_02_u:1483: 2.037.005c uvāca rājā kaikeyīṃ samīkṣya vyathitendriyaḥ 2.037.006a kaikeyi mā mamāṅgāni sprākṣīs tvaṃ duṣṭacāriṇī
GE09ram_02_u:1484: 2.037.006c na hi tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi na bhāryā na ca bāndhavī
GE09ram_02_u:1485: 2.037.007a ye ca tvām upajīvanti nāhaṃ teṣāṃ na te mama
GE09ram_02_u:1486: 2.037.007c kevalārthaparāṃ hi tvāṃ tyaktadharmāṃ tyajāmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:1487: 2.037.008a agṛhṇāṃ yac ca te pāṇim agniṃ paryaṇayaṃ ca yat
GE09ram_02_u:1488: 2.037.008c anujānāmi tat sarvam asmiṃl loke paratra ca
GE09ram_02_u:1489: 2.037.009a bharataś cet pratītaḥ syād rājyaṃ prāpyedam avyayam
GE09ram_02_u:1490: 2.037.009c yan me sa dadyāt pitrarthaṃ mā mā tad dattam āgamat
GE09ram_02_u:1491: 2.037.010a atha reṇusamudhvastaṃ tam utthāpya narādhipam 2.037.010c nyavartata tadā devī kausalyā śokakarśitā 2.037.011a hatveva brāhmaṇaṃ kāmāt spṛṣṭvāgnim iva pāṇinā
GE09ram_02_u:1492: 2.037.011c anvatapyata dharmātmā putraṃ saṃcintya tāpasaṃ 2.037.012a nivṛtyaiva nivṛtyaiva sīdato rathavartmasu
GE09ram_02_u:1493: 2.037.012c rājño nātibabhau rūpaṃ grastasyāṃśumato yathā 2.037.013a vilalāpa ca duḥkhārtaḥ priyaṃ putram anusmaran
GE09ram_02_u:1494: 2.037.013c nagarāntam anuprāptaṃ buddhvā putram athābravīt 2.037.014a vāhanānāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vahatāṃ taṃ mamātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:1495: 2.037.014c padāni pathi dṛśyante sa mahātmā na dṛśyate
GE09ram_02_u:1496: 2.037.015a sa nūnaṃ kva cid evādya vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1497: 2.037.015c kāṣṭhaṃ vā yadi vāśmānam upadhāya śayiṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:1498: 2.037.016a utthāsyati ca medinyāḥ kṛpaṇaḥ pāṃśuguṇṭhitaḥ 2.037.016c viniḥśvasan prasravaṇāt kareṇūnām ivarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1499: 2.037.017a drakṣyanti nūnaṃ puruṣā dīrghabāhuṃ vanecarāḥ 2.037.017c rāmam utthāya gacchantaṃ lokanātham anāthavat 2.037.018a sakāmā bhava kaikeyi vidhavā rājyam āvasa
GE09ram_02_u:1500: 2.037.018c na hi taṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ vinā jīvitum utsahe
GE09ram_02_u:1501: 2.037.019a ity evaṃ vilapan rājā janaughenābhisaṃvṛtaḥ 2.037.019c apasnāta ivāriṣṭaṃ praviveśa
GE09ram_02_u:1502: 2.037.020a śūnyacatvaraveśmāntāṃ saṃvṛtāpaṇadevatām 2.037.020c klāntadurbaladuḥkhārtāṃ nātyākīrṇamahāpathām 2.037.021a tām avekṣya purīṃ sarvāṃ rāmam evānucintayan
GE09ram_02_u:1503: 2.037.021c vilapan prāviśad rājā gṛhaṃ sūrya ivāmbudam
GE09ram_02_u:1505: 2.037.022c rāmeṇa rahitaṃ veśma vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_02_u:1506: 2.037.023a kausalyāyā gṛhaṃ śīghraṃ rāma mātur nayantu mām
GE09ram_02_u:1507: 2.037.023c iti bruvantaṃ rājānam anayan dvāradarśitaḥ 2.037.024a tatas tatra praviṣṭasya kausalyāyā niveśanam 2.037.024c adhiruhyāpi śayanaṃ babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ 2.037.025a tac ca dṛṣṭvā mahārājo bhujam udyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:1508: 2.037.025c uccaiḥ svareṇa cukrośa hā rāghava jahāsi mām
GE09ram_02_u:1509: 2.037.026a sukhitā bata taṃ kālaṃ jīviṣyanti narottamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1510: 2.037.026c pariṣvajanto ye rāmaṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:1511: 2.037.027a na tvāṃ paśyāmi kausalye sādhu māṃ pāṇinā spṛśa 2.037.027c rāmaṃ me 'nugatā dṛṣṭir adyāpi na nivartate
GE09ram_02_u:1512: 2.037.028a taṃ rāmam evānuvicintayantaṃ; samīkṣya devī śayane narendram
GE09ram_02_u:1514: 2.038.001a tataḥ samīkṣya śayane sannaṃ śokena pārthivam
GE09ram_02_u:1515: 2.038.001c kausalyā putraśokārtā tam uvāca mahīpatim 2.038.002a rāghavo naraśārdūla viṣam uptvā dvijihvavat 2.038.002c vicariṣyati kaikeyī nirmukteva hi pannagī 2.038.003a vivāsya rāmaṃ subhagā labdhakāmā samāhitā 2.038.003c trāsayiṣyati māṃ bhūyo duṣṭāhir iva veśmani
GE09ram_02_u:1516: 2.038.004a atha sma nagare rāmaś caran bhaikṣaṃ gṛhe vaset 2.038.004c kāmakāro varaṃ dātum api dāsaṃ mamātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:1517: 2.038.005a pātayitvā tu kaikeyyā rāmaṃ sthānād yatheṣṭataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1520: 2.038.006c vanam āviśate nūnaṃ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 2.038.007a vane tv adṛṣṭaduḥkhānāṃ kaikeyyānumate tvayā 2.038.007c tyaktānāṃ vanavāsāya kā nv avasthā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:1521: 2.038.008a te ratnahīnās taruṇāḥ phalakāle vivāsitāḥ 2.038.008c kathaṃ vatsyanti kṛpaṇāḥ phalamūlaiḥ kṛtāśanāḥ 2.038.009a apīdānīṃ sa kālaḥ syān mama śokakṣayaḥ śivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1522: 2.038.009c sabhāryaṃ yat saha bhrātrā paśyeyam iha rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:1525: 2.038.011a kadā prekṣya naravyāghrāv araṇyāt punarāgatau 2.038.011c nandiṣyati purī hṛṣṭā samudra iva parvaṇi
GE09ram_02_u:1526: 2.038.012a kadāyodhyāṃ mahābāhuḥ purīṃ vīraḥ pravekṣyati 2.038.012c puraskṛtya rathe sītāṃ vṛṣabho govadhūm iva
GE09ram_02_u:1529: 2.038.014a kadā sumanasaḥ kanyā dvijātīnāṃ phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:1530: 2.038.014c pradiśantyaḥ purīṃ hṛṣṭāḥ kariṣyanti pradakṣiṇam 2.038.015a kadā pariṇato buddhyā vayasā cāmaraprabhaḥ 2.038.015c abhyupaiṣyati dharmajñas trivarṣa iva māṃ lalan
GE09ram_02_u:1531: 2.038.016a niḥsaṃśayaṃ mayā manye purā vīra kadaryayā
GE09ram_02_u:1532: 2.038.016c pātu kāmeṣu vatseṣu mātṝṇāṃ śātitāḥ stanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1533: 2.038.017a sāhaṃ gaur iva siṃhena vivatsā vatsalā kṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:1534: 2.038.017c kaikeyyā puruṣavyāghra bālavatseva gaur balāt 2.038.018a na hi tāvad guṇair juṣṭaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam
GE09ram_02_u:1535: 2.038.018c ekaputrā vinā putram ahaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE09ram_02_u:1536: 2.038.019a na hi me jīvite kiṃ cit sāmartham iha kalpyate
GE09ram_02_u:1537: 2.038.019c apaśyantyāḥ priyaṃ putraṃ mahābāhuṃ mahābalam 2.038.020a ayaṃ hi māṃ dīpayate samutthitas; tanūjaśokaprabhavo hutāśanaḥ 2.038.020c mahīm imāṃ raśmibhir uttamaprabho; yathā nidāghe bhagavān
GE09ram_02_u:1539: 2.039.001a vilapantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu kausalyāṃ pramadottamām
GE09ram_02_u:1540: 2.039.001c idaṃ dharme sthitā dharmyaṃ sumitrā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1541: 2.039.002a tavārye sadguṇair yuktaḥ putraḥ sa puruṣottamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1542: 2.039.002c kiṃ te vilapitenaivaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ ruditena vā
GE09ram_02_u:1543: 2.039.003a yas tavārye gataḥ putras tyaktvā rājyaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1544: 2.039.003c sādhu kurvan mahātmānaṃ pitaraṃ satyavādinām 2.039.004a śiṣṭair ācarite samyak śaśvat pretya phalodaye
GE09ram_02_u:1545: 2.039.004c rāmo dharme sthitaḥ śreṣṭho na sa śocyaḥ kadā cana
GE09ram_02_u:1547: 2.039.005c dayāvān sarvabhūteṣu lābhas tasya mahātmanaḥ 2.039.006a araṇyavāse yad duḥkhaṃ jānatī vai sukhocitā
GE09ram_02_u:1549: 2.039.007a kīrtibhūtāṃ patākāṃ yo loke bhrāmayati prabhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1550: 2.039.007c damasatyavrataparaḥ kiṃ na prāptas tavātmajaḥ 2.039.008a vyaktaṃ rāmasya vijñāya śaucaṃ māhātmyam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:1551: 2.039.008c na gātram aṃśubhiḥ sūryaḥ saṃtāpayitum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:1552: 2.039.009a śivaḥ sarveṣu kāleṣu kānanebhyo viniḥsṛtaḥ 2.039.009c rāghavaṃ yuktaśītoṣṇaḥ seviṣyati sukho 'nilaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1554: 2.039.010c raśmibhiḥ saṃspṛśañ śītaiś candramā hlādayiṣyati 2.039.011a dadau cāstrāṇi divyāni yasmai brahmā mahaujase
GE09ram_02_u:1555: 2.039.011c dānavendraṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā timidhvajasutaṃ raṇe 2.039.012a pṛthivyā saha vaidehyā śriyā ca puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1557: 2.039.013a duḥkhajaṃ visṛjanty asraṃ niṣkrāmantam udīkṣya yam
GE09ram_02_u:1558: 2.039.013c samutsrakṣyasi netrābhyāṃ kṣipram ānandajaṃ payaḥ 2.039.014a abhivādayamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sasuhṛdaṃ sutam 2.039.014c mudāśru mokṣyase kṣipraṃ meghalekeva vārṣikī 2.039.015a putras te varadaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1560: 2.039.016a niśamya tal lakṣmaṇamātṛvākyaṃ; rāmasya mātur naradevapatnyāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1561: 2.039.016c sadyaḥ śarīre vinanāśa śokaḥ; śaradgato megha ivālpatoyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1563: 2.040.001c anujagmuḥ prayāntaṃ taṃ vanavāsāya mānavāḥ 2.040.002a nivartite 'pi ca balāt suhṛdvarge ca rājini 2.040.002c naiva te saṃnyavartanta rāmasyānugatā ratham 2.040.003a ayodhyānilayānāṃ hi puruṣāṇāṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1564: 2.040.003c babhūva guṇasaṃpannaḥ pūrṇacandra iva priyaḥ 2.040.004a sa yācyamānaḥ kākutsthaḥ svābhiḥ prakṛtibhis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:1565: 2.040.004c kurvāṇaḥ pitaraṃ satyaṃ vanam evānvapadyata 2.040.005a avekṣamāṇaḥ sasnehaṃ cakṣuṣā prapibann iva 2.040.005c uvāca rāmaḥ snehena tāḥ prajāḥ svāḥ prajā iva 2.040.006a yā prītir bahumānaś ca mayy ayodhyānivāsinām
GE09ram_02_u:1566: 2.040.006c matpriyārthaṃ viśeṣeṇa bharate sā niveśyatām 2.040.007a sa hi kalyāṇa cāritraḥ kaikeyyānandavardhanaḥ 2.040.007c kariṣyati yathāvad vaḥ priyāṇi ca hitāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:1568: 2.040.008c anurūpaḥ sa vo bhartā bhaviṣyati bhayāpahaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1569: 2.040.009a sa hi rājaguṇair yukto yuvarājaḥ samīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1570: 2.040.009c api cāpi mayā śiṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ vo bhartṛśāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:1571: 2.040.010a na ca tapyed yathā cāsau vanavāsaṃ gate mayi 2.040.010c mahārājas tathā kāryo mama priyacikīrṣayā 2.040.011a yathā yathā dāśarathir dharmam evāsthito 'bhavat
GE09ram_02_u:1572: 2.040.011c tathā tathā prakṛtayo rāmaṃ patim akāmayan
GE09ram_02_u:1573: 2.040.012a bāṣpeṇa pihitaṃ dīnaṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:1574: 2.040.012c cakarṣeva guṇair baddhvā janaṃ punar ivāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:1575: 2.040.013a te dvijās trividhaṃ vṛddhā jñānena vayasaujasā
GE09ram_02_u:1576: 2.040.013c vayaḥprakampaśiraso dūrād ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ 2.040.014a vahanto javanā rāmaṃ bho bho jātyās turaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1577: 2.040.014c nivartadhvaṃ na gantavyaṃ hitā bhavata bhartari
GE09ram_02_u:1578: 2.040.014e upavāhyas tu vo bhartā nāpavāhyaḥ purād vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1579: 2.040.015a evam ārtapralāpāṃs tān vṛddhān pralapato dvijān
GE09ram_02_u:1580: 2.040.015c avekṣya sahasā rāmo rathād avatatāra ha
GE09ram_02_u:1581: 2.040.016a padbhyām eva jagāmātha sasītaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 2.040.016c saṃnikṛṣṭapadanyāso rāmo vanaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1582: 2.040.017a dvijātīṃs tu padātīṃs tān rāmaś cāritravatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1583: 2.040.017c na śaśāka ghṛṇācakṣuḥ parimoktuṃ rathena saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1584: 2.040.018a gacchantam eva taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ saṃbhrāntamānasāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1585: 2.040.018c ūcuḥ paramasaṃtaptā rāmaṃ vākyam idaṃ dvijāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1586: 2.040.019a brāhmaṇyaṃ kṛtsnam etat tvāṃ brahmaṇyam anugacchati
GE09ram_02_u:1587: 2.040.019c dvijaskandhādhirūḍhās tvām agnayo 'py anuyānty amī 2.040.020a vājapeyasamutthāni chatrāṇy etāni paśya naḥ 2.040.020c pṛṣṭhato 'nuprayātāni haṃsān iva jalātyaye
GE09ram_02_u:1589: 2.040.021c ebhiś chāyāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ svaiś chatrair vājapeyikaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1590: 2.040.022a yā hi naḥ satataṃ buddhir vedamantrānusāriṇī
GE09ram_02_u:1591: 2.040.022c tvatkṛte sā kṛtā vatsa vanavāsānusāriṇī 2.040.023a hṛdayeṣv avatiṣṭhante vedā ye naḥ paraṃ dhanam
GE09ram_02_u:1592: 2.040.023c vatsyanty api gṛheṣv eva dārāś cāritrarakṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1593: 2.040.024a na punar niścayaḥ kāryas tvadgatau sukṛtā matiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1594: 2.040.024c tvayi dharmavyapekṣe tu kiṃ syād dharmam avekṣitum
GE09ram_02_u:1597: 2.040.026a bahūnāṃ vitatā yajñā dvijānāṃ ya ihāgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1598: 2.040.026c teṣāṃ samāptir āyattā tava vatsa nivartane
GE09ram_02_u:1599: 2.040.027a bhaktimanti hi bhūtāni jaṃgamājaṃgamāni ca 2.040.027c yācamāneṣu teṣu tvaṃ bhaktiṃ bhakteṣu darśaya
GE09ram_02_u:1600: 2.040.028a anugaṃtum aśaktās tvāṃ mūlair uddhṛtavegibhiḥ 2.040.028c unnatā vāyuvegena vikrośantīva
GE09ram_02_u:1601: 2.040.029a niśceṣṭāhārasaṃcārā vṛkṣaikasthānaviṣṭhitāḥ 2.040.029c pakṣiṇo 'pi prayācante sarvabhūtānukampinam 2.040.030a evaṃ vikrośatāṃ teṣāṃ dvijātīnāṃ nivartane 2.040.030c dadṛśe tamasā tatra vārayantīva rāghavam 2.041.001a tatas tu tamasā tīraṃ ramyam āśritya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1602: 2.041.001c sītām udvīkṣya saumitrim idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1603: 2.041.002a iyam adya niśā pūrvā saumitre prasthitā vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1604: 2.041.002c vanavāsasya bhadraṃ te sa notkaṇṭhitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:1605: 2.041.003a paśya śūnyāny araṇyāni rudantīva samantataḥ 2.041.003c yathānilayam āyadbhir nilīnāni mṛgadvijaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1606: 2.041.004a adyāyodhyā tu nagarī rājadhānī pitur mama
GE09ram_02_u:1607: 2.041.004c sastrīpuṃsā gatān asmāñ śociṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1608: 2.041.005a bharataḥ khalu dharmātmā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca me
GE09ram_02_u:1611: 2.041.006c nānuśocāmi pitaraṃ mātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇa 2.041.007a tvayā kāryaṃ naravyāghra mām anuvrajatā kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:1612: 2.041.007c anveṣṭavyā hi vaidehyā rakṣaṇārthe sahāyatā 2.041.008a adbhir eva tu saumitre vatsyāmy adya niśām imām 2.041.008c etad dhi rocate mahyaṃ vanye 'pi vividhe sati 2.041.009a evam uktvā tu saumitraṃ sumantram api rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1613: 2.041.009c apramattas tvam aśveṣu bhava saumyety uvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:1616: 2.041.011a upāsyatu śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā rātrim upasthitām
GE09ram_02_u:1617: 2.041.011c rāmasya śayanaṃ cakre sūtaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:1618: 2.041.012a tāṃ śayyāṃ tamasātīre vīkṣya vṛkṣadalaiḥ kṛtām
GE09ram_02_u:1619: 2.041.012c rāmaḥ saumitriṇāṃ sārdhaṃ sabhāryaḥ saṃviveśa ha
GE09ram_02_u:1620: 2.041.013a sabhāryaṃ saṃprasuptaṃ taṃ bhrātaraṃ vīkṣya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1621: 2.041.013c kathayām āsa sūtāya rāmasya vividhān guṇān
GE09ram_02_u:1622: 2.041.014a jāgrato hy eva tāṃ rātriṃ saumitrer udito raviḥ 2.041.014c sūtasya tamasātīre rāmasya bruvato guṇān 2.041.015a gokulākulatīrāyās tamasāyā vidūrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1623: 2.041.015c avasat tatra tāṃ rātriṃ rāmaḥ prakṛtibhiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:1624: 2.041.016a utthāya tu mahātejāḥ prakṛtīs tā niśāmya ca
GE09ram_02_u:1625: 2.041.016c abravīd bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ puṇyalakṣaṇam 2.041.017a asmadvyapekṣān saumitre nirapekṣān gṛheṣv api 2.041.017c vṛkṣamūleṣu saṃsuptān paśya lakṣmaṇa sāmpratam 2.041.018a yathaite niyamaṃ paurāḥ kurvanty asmannivartane 2.041.018c api prāṇān asiṣyanti na tu tyakṣyanti niścayam
GE09ram_02_u:1626: 2.041.019a yāvad eva tu saṃsuptās tāvad eva vayaṃ laghu 2.041.019c ratham āruhya gacchāmaḥ panthānam akutobhayam 2.041.020a ato bhūyo 'pi nedānīm ikṣvākupuravāsinaḥ 2.041.020c svapeyur anuraktā māṃ vṛkṣamūlāni saṃśritāḥ 2.041.021a paurā hy ātmakṛtād duḥkhād vipramocyā nṛpātmajaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1627: 2.041.021c na tu khalv ātmanā yojyā duḥkhena puravāsinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1628: 2.041.022a abravīl lakṣmaṇo rāmaṃ sākṣād dharmam iva sthitam
GE09ram_02_u:1629: 2.041.022c rocate me mahāprājña kṣipram āruhyatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:1630: 2.041.023a sūtas tataḥ saṃtvaritaḥ syandanaṃ tair hayottamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1632: 2.041.024a mohanārthaṃ tu paurāṇāṃ sūtaṃ rāmo 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1633: 2.041.024c udaṅmukhaḥ prayāhi tvaṃ ratham āsthāya sārathe
GE09ram_02_u:1634: 2.041.025a muhūrtaṃ tvaritaṃ gatvā nirgataya rathaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1635: 2.041.025c yathā na vidyuḥ paurā māṃ tathā kuru samāhitaḥ 2.041.026a rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tathā cakre sa sārathiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1636: 2.041.026c pratyāgamya ca rāmasya syandanaṃ pratyavedayat 2.041.027a taṃ syandanam adhiṣṭhāya rāghavaḥ saparicchadaḥ 2.041.027c śīghragām ākulāvartāṃ tamasām ataran nadīm 2.041.028a sa saṃtīrya mahābāhuḥ śrīmāñ śivam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:1638: 2.041.029a prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ paurās te rāghavo vinā
GE09ram_02_u:1641: 2.041.030c ālokam api rāmasya na paśyanti sma duḥkhitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1642: 2.041.031a tato mārgānusāreṇa gatvā kiṃ cit kṣaṇaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1645: 2.041.032c kim idaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmo daivenopahatā iti
GE09ram_02_u:1647: 2.041.033c ayodhyām agaman sarve purīṃ vyathitasajjanām 2.042.001a anugamya nivṛttānāṃ rāmaṃ nagaravāsinām
GE09ram_02_u:1649: 2.042.002a svaṃ svaṃ nilayam āgamya putradāraiḥ samāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1650: 2.042.002c aśrūṇi mumucuḥ sarve bāṣpeṇa pihitānanāḥ 2.042.003a na cāhṛṣyan na cāmodan vaṇijo na prasārayan
GE09ram_02_u:1651: 2.042.003c na cāśobhanta paṇyāni nāpacan gṛhamedhinaḥ 2.042.004a naṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā nābhyanandan vipulaṃ vā dhanāgamam
GE09ram_02_u:1652: 2.042.004c putraṃ prathamajaṃ labdhvā jananī nābhyanandata 2.042.005a gṛhe gṛhe rudantyaś ca bhartāraṃ gṛham āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:1653: 2.042.005c vyagarhayanto duḥkhārtā vāgbhis totrair iva dvipān
GE09ram_02_u:1654: 2.042.006a kiṃ nu teṣāṃ gṛhaiḥ kāryaṃ kiṃ dāraiḥ kiṃ dhanena vā
GE09ram_02_u:1655: 2.042.006c putrair vā kiṃ sukhair vāpi ye na paśyanti rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:1656: 2.042.007a ekaḥ satpuruṣo loke lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:1658: 2.042.008a āpagāḥ kṛtapuṇyās tāḥ padminyaś ca sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:1659: 2.042.008c yeṣu snāsyati kākutstho vigāhya salilaṃ śuci
GE09ram_02_u:1661: 2.042.009c āpagāś ca mahānūpāḥ sānumantaś ca parvatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1662: 2.042.010a kānanaṃ vāpi śailaṃ vā yaṃ rāmo 'bhigamiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:1663: 2.042.010c priyātithim iva prāptaṃ nainaṃ śakṣyanty anarcitum
GE09ram_02_u:1664: 2.042.011a vicitrakusumāpīḍā bahumañjaridhāriṇaḥ 2.042.011c akāle cāpi mukhyāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:1665: 2.042.011e darśayiṣyanty anukrośād girayo rāmam āgatam 2.042.012a vidarśayanto vividhān bhūyaś citrāṃś ca nirjharān
GE09ram_02_u:1667: 2.042.013a yatra rāmo bhayaṃ nātra nāsti tatra parābhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1668: 2.042.013c sa hi śūro mahābāhuḥ putro daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:1669: 2.042.014a purā bhavati no dūrād anugacchāma rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:1670: 2.042.014c pādacchāyā sukhā bhartus tādṛśasya mahātmanaḥ 2.042.014e sa hi nātho janasyāsya sa gatiḥ sa parāyaṇam 2.042.015a vayaṃ paricariṣyāmaḥ sītāṃ yūyaṃ tu rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:1671: 2.042.015c iti paurastriyo bhartṝn duḥkhārtās tat tad abruvan
GE09ram_02_u:1672: 2.042.016a yuṣmākaṃ rāghavo 'raṇye yogakṣemaṃ vidhāsyati 2.042.016c sītā nārījanasyāsya yogakṣemaṃ kariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:1673: 2.042.017a ko nv anenāpratītena sotkaṇṭhitajanena ca 2.042.017c saṃprīyetāmanojñena vāsena
GE09ram_02_u:1674: 2.042.018a kaikeyyā yadi ced rājyaṃ syād adharmyam anāthavat
GE09ram_02_u:1675: 2.042.018c na hi no jīvitenārthaḥ kutaḥ putraiḥ kuto dhanaiḥ 2.042.019a yayā putraś ca bhartā ca tyaktāv aiśvaryakāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:1676: 2.042.019c kaṃ sā parihared anyaṃ kaikeyī kulapāṃsanī
GE09ram_02_u:1677: 2.042.020a kaikeyyā na vayaṃ rājye bhṛtakā nivasemahi
GE09ram_02_u:1678: 2.042.020c jīvantyā jātu jīvantyaḥ putrair api śapāmahe
GE09ram_02_u:1679: 2.042.021a yā putraṃ pārthivendrasya pravāsayati nirghṛṇā 2.042.021c kas tāṃ prāpya sukhaṃ jīved adharmyāṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:1680: 2.042.022a na hi pravrajite rāme jīviṣyati mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1681: 2.042.022c mṛte daśarathe vyaktaṃ vilopas tadanantaram 2.042.023a te viṣaṃ pibatāloḍya kṣīṇapuṇyāḥ sudurgatāḥ 2.042.023c rāghavaṃ vānugacchadhvam aśrutiṃ vāpi gacchata 2.042.024a mithyā pravrājito rāmaḥ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 2.042.024c bharate saṃniṣṛṣṭāḥ smaḥ saunike paśavo yathā
GE09ram_02_u:1682: 2.042.025a tās tathā vilapantyas tu nagare nāgarastriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1683: 2.042.025c cukruśur bhṛśasaṃtaptā mṛtyor iva bhayāgame 2.042.026a tathā striyo rāmanimittam āturā; yathā sute bhrātari vā vivāsite 2.042.026c vilapya dīnā rurudur vicetasaḥ; sutair hi tāsām adhiko hi so
GE09ram_02_u:1686: 2.043.001c jagāma puruṣavyāghraḥ pitur ājñām anusmaran 2.043.002a tathaiva gacchatas tasya vyapāyād rajanī śivā
GE09ram_02_u:1687: 2.043.002c upāsya sa śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ viṣayāntaṃ vyagāhata
GE09ram_02_u:1688: 2.043.003a grāmān vikṛṣṭasīmāṃs tān puṣpitāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:1689: 2.043.003c paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ śarair iva hayottamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1691: 2.043.004c rājānaṃ dhig daśarathaṃ kāmasya vaśam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:1692: 2.043.005a hā nṛśaṃsādya kaikeyī pāpā pāpānubandhinī 2.043.005c tīkṣṇā saṃbhinnamaryādā tīkṣṇe karmaṇi vartate 2.043.006a yā putram īdṛśaṃ rājñaḥ pravāsayati dhārmikam
GE09ram_02_u:1693: 2.043.006c vana vāse mahāprājñaṃ sānukrośam atandritam 2.043.007a etā vāco manuṣyāṇāṃ grāmasaṃvāsavāsinām
GE09ram_02_u:1694: 2.043.007c śṛṇvann atiyayau vīraḥ kosalān kosaleśvaraḥ 2.043.008a tato vedaśrutiṃ nāma śivavārivahāṃ nadīm 2.043.008c uttīryābhimukhaḥ prāyād agastyādhyuṣitāṃ diśam
GE09ram_02_u:1695: 2.043.009a gatvā tu suciraṃ kālaṃ tataḥ śītajalāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:1697: 2.043.010a gomatīṃ cāpy atikramya rāghavaḥ śīghragair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1699: 2.043.011a sa mahīṃ manunā rājñā dattām ikṣvākave purā
GE09ram_02_u:1700: 2.043.011c sphītāṃ rāṣṭrāvṛtāṃ rāmo vaidehīm anvadarśayat 2.043.012a sūta ity eva cābhāṣya sārathiṃ tam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1702: 2.043.013a kadāhaṃ punar āgamya sarayvāḥ puṣpite vane
GE09ram_02_u:1703: 2.043.013c mṛgayāṃ paryāṭaṣyāmi mātrā pitrā ca saṃgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1705: 2.043.014c ratir hy eṣātulā loke rājarṣigaṇasaṃmatā 2.043.015a sa tam adhvānam aikṣvākaḥ sūtaṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_02_u:1706: 2.043.015c taṃ tam artham abhipretya yayauvākyam udīrayan
GE09ram_02_u:1707: 2.044.001a viśālān kosalān ramyān yātvā lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ 2.044.001c āsasāda mahābāhuḥ śṛṅgaverapuraṃ
GE09ram_02_u:1708: 2.044.002a tatra tripathagāṃ divyāṃ śivatoyām aśaivalām 2.044.002c dadarśa rāghavo gaṅgāṃ puṇyām ṛṣinisevitām 2.044.003a haṃsasārasasaṃghuṣṭāṃ cakravākopakūjitām 2.044.003c śiṃśumaraiś ca nakraiś ca bhujaṃgaiś ca niṣevitām
GE09ram_02_u:1710: 2.044.004c sumantram abravīt sūtam ihaivādya vasāmahe 2.044.005a avidūrād ayaṃ nadyā bahupuṣpapravālavān
GE09ram_02_u:1712: 2.044.006a lakṣaṇaś ca sumantraś ca bāḍham ity eva rāghavam 2.044.006c uktvā tam iṅgudīvṛkṣaṃ tadopayayatur hayaiḥ 2.044.007a rāmo 'bhiyāya taṃ ramyaṃ vṛkṣam ikṣvākunandanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1713: 2.044.007c rathād avātarat tasmāt sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 2.044.008a sumantro 'py avatīryaiva mocayitvā hayottamān
GE09ram_02_u:1715: 2.044.009a tatra rājā guho nāma rāmasyātmasamaḥ sakhā
GE09ram_02_u:1716: 2.044.009c niṣādajātyo balavān sthapatiś ceti viśrutaḥ 2.044.010a sa śrutvā puruṣavyāghraṃ rāmaṃ viṣayam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:1718: 2.044.011a tato niṣādādhipatiṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrād avasthitam 2.044.011c saha saumitriṇā rāmaḥ samāgacchad guhena saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1719: 2.044.012a tam ārtaḥ saṃpariṣvajya guho rāghavam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1720: 2.044.012c yathāyodhyā tathedaṃ te rāma kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE09ram_02_u:1722: 2.044.013c arghyaṃ copānayat kṣipraṃ vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:1723: 2.044.014a svāgataṃ te mahābāho taveyam akhilā mahī
GE09ram_02_u:1724: 2.044.014c vayaṃ preṣyā bhavān bhartā sādhu rājyaṃ praśādhi naḥ 2.044.015a bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca lehyaṃ cedam upasthitam 2.044.015c śayanāni ca mukhyāni vājināṃ khādanaṃ ca te
GE09ram_02_u:1725: 2.044.016a guham eva bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:1726: 2.044.016c arcitāś caiva hṛṣṭāś ca bhavatā sarvathā vayam
GE09ram_02_u:1727: 2.044.017a padbhyām abhigamāc caiva snehasaṃdarśanena ca 2.044.017c bhujābhyāṃ sādhuvṛttābhyāṃ pīḍayan vākyam abravīt 2.044.018a diṣṭyā tvāṃ guha paśyāmi arogaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1728: 2.044.018c api te kūśalaṃ rāṣṭre mitreṣu ca dhaneṣu ca 2.044.019a yat tv idaṃ bhavatā kiṃ cit prītyā samupakalpitam 2.044.019c sarvaṃ tad anujānāmi na hi varte pratigrahe
GE09ram_02_u:1730: 2.044.020c viddhi praṇihitaṃ dharme tāpasaṃ vanagocaram 2.044.021a aśvānāṃ khādanenāham arthī nānyena kena cit
GE09ram_02_u:1732: 2.044.022a ete hi dayitā rājñaḥ pitur daśarathasya me
GE09ram_02_u:1733: 2.044.022c etaiḥ suvihitair aśvair bhaviṣyāmy aham arcitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1734: 2.044.023a aśvānāṃ pratipānaṃ ca khādanaṃ caiva so 'nvaśāt
GE09ram_02_u:1735: 2.044.023c guhas tatraiva puruṣāṃs tvaritaṃ dīyatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:1736: 2.044.024a tataś cīrottarāsaṅgaḥ saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām 2.044.024c jalam evādade bhojyaṃ lakṣmaṇenāhṛtaṃ svayam 2.044.025a tasya bhūmau śayānasya pādau prakṣālya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1739: 2.044.026c anvajāgrat tato rāmam apramatto dhanurdharaḥ 2.044.027a tathā śayānasya tato 'sya dhīmato; yaśasvino dāśarather mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1740: 2.044.027c adṛṣṭaduḥkhasya sukhocitasya sā; tadā vyatīyāya cireṇa śarvarī
GE09ram_02_u:1741: 2.045.001a taṃ jāgratam adambhena bhrātur arthāya lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:1742: 2.045.001c guhaḥ saṃtāpasaṃtapto rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt 2.045.002a iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā
GE09ram_02_u:1743: 2.045.002c pratyāśvasihi sādhv asyāṃ rājaputra yathāsukham 2.045.003a ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarvaḥ kleśānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ 2.045.003c guptyarthaṃ jāgariṣyāmaḥ kākutsthasya vayaṃ niśām 2.045.004a na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaś cana 2.045.004c bravīmy etad ahaṃ satyaṃ satyenaiva ca te śape 2.045.005a asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ 2.045.005c dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām
GE09ram_02_u:1744: 2.045.006a so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā 2.045.006c rakṣiṣyāmi dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sarvato jñātibhiḥ saha 2.045.007a na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃ cid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā 2.045.007c caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ sumahat prasahemahi
GE09ram_02_u:1745: 2.045.008a lakṣmaṇas taṃ tadovāca rakṣyamāṇās tvayānagha 2.045.008c nātra bhītā vayaṃ sarve dharmam evānupaśyatā
GE09ram_02_u:1746: 2.045.009a kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:1747: 2.045.009c śakyā nidrā mayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā 2.045.010a yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi
GE09ram_02_u:1748: 2.045.010c taṃ paśya sukhasaṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:1749: 2.045.011a yo mantra tapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1751: 2.045.012a asmin pravrajito rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:1752: 2.045.012c vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:1755: 2.045.014a kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama
GE09ram_02_u:1756: 2.045.014c nāśaṃse yadi jīvanti sarve te śarvarīm imām
GE09ram_02_u:1757: 2.045.015a jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā
GE09ram_02_u:1758: 2.045.015c tad duḥkhaṃ yat tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:1761: 2.045.017c rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:1762: 2.045.018a siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite
GE09ram_02_u:1764: 2.045.019a ramyacatvarasaṃsthānāṃ suvibhaktamahāpathām 2.045.019c harmyaprāsādasaṃpannāṃ gaṇikāvaraśobhitām 2.045.020a rathāśvagajasaṃbādhāṃ tūryanādavināditām 2.045.020c sarvakalyāṇasaṃpūrṇāṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākulām 2.045.021a ārāmodyānasaṃpannāṃ samājotsavaśālinīm 2.045.021c sukhitā vicariṣyanti rājadhānīṃ pitur mama 2.045.022a api satyapratijñena sārdhaṃ kuśalinā vayam 2.045.022c nivṛtte vanavāse 'sminn ayodhyāṃ praviśemahi 2.045.023a paridevayamānasya duḥkhārtasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1766: 2.045.024a tathā hi satyaṃ bruvati prajāhite; narendraputre gurusauhṛdād guhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1767: 2.045.024c mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyasanābhipīḍito; jvarāturo nāga iva vyathāturaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1768: 2.046.001a prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ pṛthu vṛkṣā mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1769: 2.046.001c uvāca rāmaḥ saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam 2.046.002a bhāskarodayakālo 'yaṃ gatā bhagavatī niśā
GE09ram_02_u:1770: 2.046.002c asau sukṛṣṇo vihagaḥ kokilas tāta kūjati
GE09ram_02_u:1771: 2.046.003a barhiṇānāṃ ca nirghoṣaḥ śrūyate nadatāṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:1772: 2.046.003c tarāma jāhnavīṃ saumya śīghragāṃ sāgaraṃgamām 2.046.004a vijñāya rāmasya vacaḥ saumitrir mitranandanaḥ 2.046.004c guham āmantrya sūtaṃ ca so 'tiṣṭhad bhrātur agrataḥ 2.046.005a tataḥ kalāpān saṃnahya khaḍgau baddhvā ca dhanvinau
GE09ram_02_u:1773: 2.046.005c jagmatur yena tau gaṅgāṃ sītayā saha rāghavau
GE09ram_02_u:1774: 2.046.006a rāmam eva tu dharmajñam upagamya vinītavat
GE09ram_02_u:1775: 2.046.006c kim ahaṃ karavāṇīti sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1776: 2.046.007a nivartasvety uvācainam etāvad dhi kṛtaṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:1777: 2.046.007c yānaṃ vihāya padbhyāṃ tu gamiṣyāmo mahāvanam
GE09ram_02_u:1778: 2.046.008a ātmānaṃ tv abhyanujñātam avekṣyārtaḥ sa sārathiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1779: 2.046.008c sumantraḥ puruṣavyāghram aikṣvākam idam abravīt 2.046.009a nātikrāntam idaṃ loke puruṣeṇeha kena cit
GE09ram_02_u:1780: 2.046.009c tava sabhrātṛbhāryasya vāsaḥ prākṛtavad vane 2.046.010a na manye brahmacarye 'sti svadhīte vā phalodayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1781: 2.046.010c mārdavārjavayor vāpi tvāṃ ced vyasanam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:1782: 2.046.011a saha rāghava vaidehyā bhrātrā caiva vane vasan
GE09ram_02_u:1783: 2.046.011c tvaṃ gatiṃ prāpsyase vīra trīṃl lokāṃs tu jayann iva
GE09ram_02_u:1784: 2.046.012a vayaṃ khalu hatā rāma ye tayāpy upavañcitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1785: 2.046.012c kaikeyyā vaśam eṣyāmaḥ pāpāyā duḥkhabhāginaḥ 2.046.013a iti bruvann ātma samaṃ sumantraḥ sārathis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:1786: 2.046.013c dṛṣṭvā dura gataṃ rāmaṃ duḥkhārto rurude ciram
