GE09ram_02_u:2858: 2.073.005a rājyaṃ gṛhāṇa bharata pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mahat 2.073.005c abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ pāhi cāsmān nararṣabha 2.073.006a ābhiṣecanikaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛtvā sarvaṃ pradakṣiṇam 2.073.006c bharatas taṃ janaṃ sarvaṃ pratyuvāca dhṛtavrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2859: 2.073.007a jyeṣṭhasya rājatā nityam ucitā hi kulasya naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2860: 2.073.007c naivaṃ bhavanto māṃ vaktum arhanti kuśalā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2861: 2.073.008a rāmaḥ pūrvo hi no bhrātā bhaviṣyati mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2862: 2.073.008c ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi varṣāṇi nava pañca ca 2.073.009a yujyatāṃ mahatī senā
GE09ram_02_u:2863: 2.073.009c ānayiṣyāmy ahaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaraṃ rāghavaṃ vanāt
GE09ram_02_u:2864: 2.073.010a ābhiṣecanikaṃ caiva sarvam etad upaskṛtam 2.073.010c puraskṛtya gamiṣyāmi rāmahetor vanaṃ prati 2.073.011a tatraiva taṃ naravyāghram abhiṣicya puraskṛtam 2.073.011c āneṣyāmi tu vai rāmaṃ havyavāham ivādhvarāt
GE09ram_02_u:2865: 2.073.012a na sakāmā kariṣyāmi svam imāṃ mātṛgandhinīm
GE09ram_02_u:2866: 2.073.012c vane vatsyāmy ahaṃ durge rāmo rājā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:2867: 2.073.013a kriyatāṃ śilpibhiḥ panthāḥ samāni viṣamāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:2869: 2.073.014a evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇaṃ taṃ rāmahetor nṛpātmajam 2.073.014c pratyuvāca janaḥ sarvaḥ śrīmadvākyam anuttamam 2.073.015a evaṃ te bhāṣamāṇasya padmā śrīr upatiṣṭhatām
GE09ram_02_u:2870: 2.073.015c yas tvaṃ jyeṣṭhe nṛpasute pṛthivīṃ dātum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:2871: 2.073.016a anuttamaṃ tad vacanaṃ nṛpātmaja; prabhāṣitaṃ saṃśravaṇe niśamya
GE09ram_02_u:2873: 2.073.016c praharṣajās taṃ prati bāṣpabindavo; nipetur āryānananetrasaṃbhavāḥ 2.073.017a ūcus te vacanam idaṃ niśamya hṛṣṭāḥ; sāmātyāḥ sapariṣado viyātaśokāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2874: 2.073.017c panthānaṃ naravarabhaktimāñ janaś ca; vyādiṣṭas tava vacanāc ca śilpivargaḥ 2.074.001a atha bhūmipradeśajñāḥ sūtrakarmaviśāradāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2875: 2.074.001c svakarmābhiratāḥ śūrāḥ khanakā yantrakās tathā 2.074.002a karmāntikāḥ sthapatayaḥ puruṣā yantrakovidāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2876: 2.074.002c tathā vardhakayaś caiva mārgiṇo vṛkṣatakṣakāḥ 2.074.003a kūpakārāḥ sudhākārā vaṃśakarmakṛtas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:2877: 2.074.003c samarthā ye ca draṣṭāraḥ puratas te pratasthire
GE09ram_02_u:2878: 2.074.004a sa tu harṣāt tam uddeśaṃ janaugho vipulaḥ prayān 2.074.004c aśobhata mahāvegaḥ sāgarasyeva parvaṇi
GE09ram_02_u:2879: 2.074.005a te svavāraṃ samāsthāya vartmakarmāṇi kovidāḥ 2.074.005c karaṇair vividhopetaiḥ purastāt saṃpratasthire
GE09ram_02_u:2880: 2.074.006a latāvallīś ca gulmāṃś ca sthāṇūn aśmana eva ca 2.074.006c janās te cakrire mārgaṃ chindanto vividhān drumān
GE09ram_02_u:2881: 2.074.007a avṛkṣeṣu ca deśeṣu ke cid vṛkṣān aropayan
GE09ram_02_u:2882: 2.074.007c ke cit kuṭhāraiṣ ṭaṅkaiś ca dātraiś chindan kva cit kva cit 2.074.008a apare vīraṇastambān balino balavattarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2883: 2.074.008c vidhamanti sma durgāṇi sthalāni ca tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2885: 2.074.009c nimnabhāgāṃs tathā ke cit samāṃś cakruḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2886: 2.074.010a babandhur bandhanīyāṃś ca kṣodyān saṃcukṣudus tadā
GE09ram_02_u:2887: 2.074.010c bibhidur bhedanīyāṃś ca tāṃs tān deśān narās tadā 2.074.011a acireṇaiva kālena parivāhān bahūdakān
GE09ram_02_u:2891: 2.074.013a candanodakasaṃsikto nānākusumabhūṣitaḥ 2.074.013c bahv aśobhata senāyāḥ panthāḥ svargapathopamaḥ 2.074.014a ājñāpyātha yathājñapti yuktās te 'dhikṛtā narāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2893: 2.074.015a yo niveśas tv abhipreto bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2894: 2.074.015c bhūyas taṃ śobhayām āsur bhūṣābhir bhūṣaṇopamam
GE09ram_02_u:2895: 2.074.016a nakṣatreṣu praśasteṣu muhūrteṣu ca tadvidaḥ 2.074.016c niveśaṃ sthāpayām āsur bharatasya mahātmanaḥ 2.074.017a bahupāṃsucayāś cāpi parikhāparivāritāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2896: 2.074.017c tatrendrakīlapratimāḥ pratolīvaraśobhitāḥ 2.074.018a prāsādamālāsaṃyuktāḥ saudhaprākārasaṃvṛtāḥ 2.074.018c patākā śobhitāḥ sarve sunirmitamahāpathāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2898: 2.074.019c samucchritair niveśās te babhuḥ śakrapuropamāḥ 2.074.020a jāhnavīṃ tu samāsādya vividhadruma kānanām 2.074.020c śītalāmalapānīyāṃ mahāmīnasamākulām 2.074.021a sacandratārāgaṇamaṇḍitaṃ yathā; nabhaḥkṣapāyām amalaṃ virājate
GE09ram_02_u:2899: 2.074.021c narendramārgaḥ sa tathā vyarājata; krameṇa ramyaḥ śubhaśilpinirmitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2900: 2.075.001a tato nāndīmukhīṃ rātriṃ bharataṃ sūtamāgadhāḥ 2.075.001c tuṣṭuvur vāgviśeṣajñāḥ stavair maṅgalasaṃhitaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2902: 2.075.002c dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca śataśo vādyāṃś coccāvacasvarān
GE09ram_02_u:2903: 2.075.003a sa tūrya ghoṣaḥ sumahān divam āpūrayann iva
GE09ram_02_u:2904: 2.075.003c bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ bhūyaḥ śokair arandhrayat 2.075.004a tato prabuddho bharatas taṃ ghoṣaṃ saṃnivartya ca
GE09ram_02_u:2905: 2.075.004c nāhaṃ rājeti cāpy uktvā śatrughnam idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:2906: 2.075.005a paśya śatrughna kaikeyyā lokasyāpakṛtaṃ mahat 2.075.005c visṛjya mayi duḥkhāni rājā daśaratho gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2908: 2.075.006c paribhramati rājaśrīr naur ivākarṇikā jale 2.075.007a ity evaṃ bharataṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ vicetanam
GE09ram_02_u:2909: 2.075.007c kṛpaṇaṃ ruruduḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ yoṣitas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:2910: 2.075.008a tathā tasmin vilapati vasiṣṭho rājadharmavit 2.075.008c sabhām ikṣvākunāthasya praviveśa mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2912: 2.075.009c sudharmām iva dharmātmā sagaṇaḥ pratyapadyata 2.075.010a sa kāñcanamayaṃ pīṭhaṃ
GE09ram_02_u:2913: 2.075.010c adhyāsta sarvavedajño dūtān anuśaśāsa ca 2.075.011a brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān yodhān amātyān gaṇaballabhān 2.075.011c kṣipram ānayatāvyagrāḥ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ hi naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2915: 2.075.012c rathair aśvair gajaiś cāpi janānām upagacchatām
GE09ram_02_u:2916: 2.075.013a tato bharatam āyāntaṃ śatakratum ivāmarāḥ 2.075.013c pratyanandan prakṛtayo yathā daśarathaṃ tathā 2.075.014a hrada iva timināgasaṃvṛtaḥ; stimitajalo maṇiśaṅkhaśarkaraḥ 2.075.014c daśarathasutaśobhitā sabhā; sadaśaratheva babhau yathā purā
GE09ram_02_u:2917: 2.076.001a tām āryagaṇasaṃpūrṇāṃ bharataḥ pragrahāṃ sabhām 2.076.001c dadarśa buddhisaṃpannaḥ pūrṇacandrāṃ niśām iva 2.076.002a āsanāni yathānyāyam āryāṇāṃ viśatāṃ tadā 2.076.002c adṛśyata ghanāpāye pūrṇacandreva śarvarī
GE09ram_02_u:2918: 2.076.003a rājñas tu prakṛtīḥ sarvāḥ samagrāḥ prekṣya dharmavit
GE09ram_02_u:2919: 2.076.003c idaṃ purohito vākyaṃ bharataṃ mṛdu cābravīt
GE09ram_02_u:2920: 2.076.004a tāta rājā daśarathaḥ svargato dharmam ācaran
GE09ram_02_u:2921: 2.076.004c dhana dhānyavatīṃ sphītāṃ pradāya pṛthivīṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:2922: 2.076.005a rāmas tathā satyadhṛtiḥ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran
GE09ram_02_u:2923: 2.076.005c nājahāt pitur ādeśaṃ śaśī jyotsnām ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2924: 2.076.006a pitrā bhrātrā ca te dattaṃ rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:2925: 2.076.006c tad bhuṅkṣva muditāmātyaḥ kṣipram evābhiṣecaya 2.076.007a udīcyāś ca pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca kevalāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2926: 2.076.007c koṭyāparāntāḥ sāmudrā ratnāny abhiharantu te 2.076.008a tac chrutvā bharato vākyaṃ śokenābhipariplutaḥ 2.076.008c jagāma manasā rāmaṃ dharmajño dharmakāṅkṣayā 2.076.009a sa bāṣpakalayā vācā kalahaṃsasvaro yuvā 2.076.009c vilalāpa sabhāmadhye jagarhe ca purohitam 2.076.010a caritabrahmacaryasya vidyā snātasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2927: 2.076.010c dharme prayatamānasya ko rājyaṃ madvidho haret
GE09ram_02_u:2928: 2.076.011a kathaṃ daśarathāj jāto bhaved rājyāpahārakaḥ 2.076.011c rājyaṃ cāhaṃ ca rāmasya dharmaṃ vaktum ihārhasi
GE09ram_02_u:2929: 2.076.012a jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaś ca dharmātmā dilīpanahuṣopamaḥ 2.076.012c labdhum arhati kākutstho rājyaṃ daśaratho yathā
GE09ram_02_u:2930: 2.076.013a anāryajuṣṭam asvargyaṃ kuryāṃ pāpam ahaṃ yadi
GE09ram_02_u:2931: 2.076.013c ikṣvākūṇām ahaṃ loke bhaveyaṃ kulapāṃsanaḥ 2.076.014a yad dhi mātrā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ nāhaṃ tad abhirocaye 2.076.014c ihastho vanadurgasthaṃ namasyāmi kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2932: 2.076.015a rāmam evānugacchāmi sa rājā dvipadāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2933: 2.076.015c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ rāghavo rājyam arhati
GE09ram_02_u:2934: 2.076.016a tad vākyaṃ dharmasaṃyuktaṃ śrutvā sarve sabhāsadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2935: 2.076.016c harṣān mumucur aśrūṇi rāme nihitacetasaḥ 2.076.017a yadi tv āryaṃ na śakṣyāmi vinivartayituṃ vanāt
GE09ram_02_u:2936: 2.076.017c vane tatraiva vatsyāmi yathāryo lakṣmaṇas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:2937: 2.076.018a sarvopāyaṃ tu vartiṣye vinivartayituṃ balāt 2.076.018c samakṣam ārya miśrāṇāṃ sādhūnāṃ guṇavartinām 2.076.019a evam uktvā tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2939: 2.076.020a tūrṇam utthāya gaccha tvaṃ sumantra mama śāsanāt
GE09ram_02_u:2940: 2.076.020c yātrām ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ balaṃ caiva samānaya
GE09ram_02_u:2941: 2.076.021a evam uktaḥ sumantras tu bharatena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:2942: 2.076.021c prahṛṣṭaḥ so 'diśat sarvaṃ yathā saṃdiṣṭam iṣṭavat
GE09ram_02_u:2943: 2.076.022a tāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ prakṛtayo balādhyakṣā balasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:2944: 2.076.022c śrutvā yātrāṃ samājñaptāṃ rāghavasya nivartane 2.076.023a tato yodhāṅganāḥ sarvā bhartṝn sarvān gṛhegṛhe
GE09ram_02_u:2945: 2.076.023c yātrā gamanam ājñāya tvarayanti sma harṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2946: 2.076.024a te hayair gorathaiḥ śīghraiḥ syandanaiś ca manojavaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2947: 2.076.024c saha yodhair balādhyakṣā balaṃ sarvam acodayan
GE09ram_02_u:2948: 2.076.025a sajjaṃ tu tad balaṃ dṛṣṭvā bharato gurusaṃnidhau
GE09ram_02_u:2950: 2.076.026a bharatasya tu tasyājñāṃ pratigṛhya praharṣitaḥ 2.076.026c rathaṃ gṛhītvā prayayau yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ 2.076.027a sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiḥ pratāpavān; bruvan suyuktaṃ dṛḍhasatyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2953: 2.076.028a tūṇa samutthāya sumantra gaccha; balasya yogāya balapradhānān
GE09ram_02_u:2954: 2.076.028c ānetum icchāmi hi taṃ vanasthaṃ; prasādya rāmaṃ jagato hitāya
GE09ram_02_u:2955: 2.076.029a sa sūtaputro bharatena samyag; ājñāpitaḥ saṃparipūrṇakāmaḥ 2.076.029c śaśāsa sarvān prakṛtipradhānān; balasya mukhyāṃś ca suhṛjjanaṃ ca 2.076.030a tataḥ samutthāya kule kule te; rājanyavaiśyā vṛṣalāś ca viprāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2956: 2.076.030c ayūyujann uṣṭrarathān kharāṃś ca; nāgān hayāṃś caiva
GE09ram_02_u:2958: 2.077.001a tataḥ samutthitaḥ kālyam āsthāya syandanottamam 2.077.001c prayayau bharataḥ śīghraṃ rāmadarśanakāṅkṣayā
GE09ram_02_u:2959: 2.077.002a agrataḥ prayayus tasya sarve mantripurodhasaḥ 2.077.002c adhiruhya hayair yuktān rathān sūryarathopamān 2.077.003a navanāgasahasrāṇi kalpitāni yathāvidhi
GE09ram_02_u:2960: 2.077.003c anvayur bharataṃ yāntam ikṣvāku kulanandanam 2.077.004a ṣaṣṭhī rathasahasrāṇi dhanvino vividhāyudhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2961: 2.077.004c anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam 2.077.005a śataṃ sahasrāṇy aśvānāṃ samārūḍhāni rāghavam 2.077.005c anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam 2.077.006a kaikeyī ca sumitrā ca kausalyā ca yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:2963: 2.077.007a prayātāś cāryasaṃghātā rāmaṃ draṣṭuṃ salakṣmaṇam 2.077.007c tasyaiva ca kathāś citrāḥ kurvāṇā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2965: 2.077.008c kadā drakṣyāmahe rāmaṃ jagataḥ śokanāśanam 2.077.009a dṛṣṭa eva hi naḥ śokam apaneṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2966: 2.077.009c tamaḥ sarvasya lokasya samudyann iva bhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2967: 2.077.010a ity evaṃ kathayantas te saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2968: 2.077.010c pariṣvajānāś cānyonyaṃ yayur nāgarikās tadā 2.077.011a ye ca tatrāpare sarve saṃmatā ye ca naigamāḥ 2.077.011c rāmaṃ prati yayur hṛṣṭāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:2969: 2.077.012a maṇi kārāś ca ye ke cit kumbhakārāś ca śobhanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2970: 2.077.012c sūtrakarmakṛtaś caiva ye ca śastropajīvinaḥ 2.077.013a māyūrakāḥ krākacikā rocakā vedhakās tathā 2.077.013c dantakārāḥ sudhākārās tathā gandhopajīvinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2972: 2.077.014c snāpakācchādakā vaidyā dhūpakāḥ śauṇḍikās tathā 2.077.015a rajakās tunnavāyāś ca grāmaghoṣamahattarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2973: 2.077.015c śailūṣāś ca saha strībhir yānti kaivartakās tathā
GE09ram_02_u:2975: 2.077.016c gorathair bharataṃ yāntam anujagmuḥ sahasraśaḥ 2.077.017a suveṣāḥ śuddhavasanās
GE09ram_02_u:2976: 2.077.017c sarve te vividhair yānaiḥ śanair bharatam anvayuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2979: 2.077.019a nirīkṣyānugatāṃ senāṃ tāṃ ca gaṅgāṃ śivodakām
GE09ram_02_u:2980: 2.077.019c bharataḥ sacivān sarvān abravīd vākyakovidaḥ 2.077.020a niveśayata me sainyam abhiprāyeṇa sarvaśaḥ 2.077.020c viśrāntaḥ pratariṣyāmaḥ śva idānīṃ mahānadīm 2.077.021a dātuṃ ca tāvad icchāmi svar gatasya mahīpateḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2983: 2.077.022c nyaveśayaṃs tāṃś chandena svena svena pṛthakpṛthak
GE09ram_02_u:2984: 2.077.023a niveśya gaṅgām anu tāṃ mahānadīṃ; camūṃ vidhānaiḥ paribarha
GE09ram_02_u:2986: 2.077.023c uvāsa rāmasya tadā mahātmano; vicintayāno bharato nivartanam
GE09ram_02_u:2987: 2.078.001a tato niviṣṭāṃ dhvajinīṃ gaṅgām anvāśritāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:2989: 2.078.002a mahatīyam ataḥ senā sāgarābhā pradṛśyate 2.078.002c nāsyāntam avagacchāmi manasāpi
GE09ram_02_u:2990: 2.078.003a sa eṣa hi mahākāyaḥ kovidāradhvajo rathe
GE09ram_02_u:2991: 2.078.003c bandhayiṣyati vā dāśān atha vāsmān vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:2992: 2.078.004a atha dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ pitrā rājyād vivāsitam
GE09ram_02_u:2994: 2.078.005a bhartā caiva sakhā caiva rāmo dāśarathir mama
GE09ram_02_u:2996: 2.078.006a tiṣṭhantu sarvadāśāś ca gaṅgām anvāśritā nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:2998: 2.078.007a nāvāṃ śatānāṃ pañcānāṃ kaivartānāṃ śataṃ śatam
GE09ram_02_u:2999: 2.078.007c saṃnaddhānāṃ tathā yūnāṃ tiṣṭhantv atyabhyacodayat 2.078.008a yadā tuṣṭas tu bharato rāmasyeha bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3000: 2.078.008c seyaṃ svastimayī senā gaṅgām adya tariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3001: 2.078.009a ity uktvopāyanaṃ gṛhya matsyamāṃsamadhūni ca 2.078.009c abhicakrāma bharataṃ niṣādādhipatir guhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3002: 2.078.010a tam āyāntaṃ tu saṃprekṣya sūtaputraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:3003: 2.078.010c bharatāyācacakṣe 'tha vinayajño vinītavat 2.078.011a eṣa jñātisahasreṇa sthapatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3004: 2.078.011c kuśalo daṇḍakāraṇye vṛddho bhrātuś ca te sakhā
GE09ram_02_u:3005: 2.078.012a tasmāt paśyatu kākutstha tvāṃ niṣādādhipo guhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3006: 2.078.012c asaṃśayaṃ vijānīte yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau 2.078.013a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sumantrād bharataḥ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:3007: 2.078.013c uvāca vacanaṃ śīghraṃ guhaḥ paśyatu mām iti
GE09ram_02_u:3009: 2.078.014c āgamya bharataṃ prahvo guho vacanam abravīit
GE09ram_02_u:3010: 2.078.015a niṣkuṭaś caiva deśo 'yaṃ vañcitāś cāpi te vayam
GE09ram_02_u:3011: 2.078.015c nivedayāmas te sarve svake dāśakule vasa
GE09ram_02_u:3012: 2.078.016a asti mūlaṃ phalaṃ caiva niṣādaiḥ samupāhṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:3013: 2.078.016c ārdraṃ ca māṃsaṃ śuṣkaṃ ca vanyaṃ coccāvacaṃ mahat 2.078.017a āśaṃse svāśitā senā vatsyatīmāṃ vibhāvarīm 2.078.017c arcito vividhaiḥ kāmaiḥ śvaḥ sasainyo gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:3014: 2.079.001a evam uktas tu bharato niṣādādhipatiṃ guham
GE09ram_02_u:3016: 2.079.002a ūrjitaḥ khalu te kāmaḥ kṛto mama guroḥ sakhe 2.079.002c yo me tvam īdṛśīṃ senām eko 'bhyarcitum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:3017: 2.079.003a ity uktvā tu mahātejā guhaṃ vacanam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:3018: 2.079.003c abravīd bharataḥ śrīmān niṣādādhipatiṃ punaḥ 2.079.004a katareṇa gamiṣyāmi bharadvājāśramaṃ
GE09ram_02_u:3020: 2.079.005a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājaputrasya dhīmataḥ 2.079.005c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ guho gahanagocaraḥ 2.079.006a dāśās tv anugamiṣyanti dhanvinaḥ susamāhitāḥ 2.079.006c ahaṃ cānugamiṣyāmi rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3021: 2.079.007a kaccin na duṣṭo vrajasi rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ 2.079.007c iyaṃ te mahatī senā śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me
GE09ram_02_u:3022: 2.079.008a tam evam abhibhāṣantam ākāśa iva nirmalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3023: 2.079.008c bharataḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā guhaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3024: 2.079.009a mā bhūt sa kālo yat kaṣṭaṃ na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:3025: 2.079.009c rāghavaḥ sa hi me bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛsamo mama 2.079.010a taṃ nivartayituṃ yāmi kākutsthaṃ vanavāsinam 2.079.010c buddhir anyā na te kāryā guha satyaṃ bravīmi te
GE09ram_02_u:3026: 2.079.011a sa tu saṃhṛṣṭavadanaḥ śrutvā bharatabhāṣitam 2.079.011c punar evābravīd vākyaṃ bharataṃ prati harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3027: 2.079.012a dhanyas tvaṃ na tvayā tulyaṃ paśyāmi jagatītale
GE09ram_02_u:3028: 2.079.012c ayatnād āgataṃ rājyaṃ yas tvaṃ tyaktum ihecchasi
GE09ram_02_u:3029: 2.079.013a śāśvatī khalu te kīrtir lokān anucariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3030: 2.079.013c yas tvaṃ kṛcchragataṃ rāmaṃ pratyānayitum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:3031: 2.079.014a evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇasya guhasya bharataṃ tadā 2.079.014c babhau naṣṭaprabhaḥ sūryo rajanī cābhyavartata 2.079.015a saṃniveśya sa tāṃ senāṃ guhena paritoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3032: 2.079.015c śatrughnena saha śrīmāñ śayanaṃ punar āgamat
GE09ram_02_u:3034: 2.079.016c upasthito hy anarhasya dharmaprekṣasya tādṛśaḥ 2.079.017a antardāhena dahanaḥ saṃtāpayati rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:3035: 2.079.017c vanadāhābhisaṃtaptaṃ gūḍho 'gnir iva pādapam 2.079.018a prasrutaḥ sarvagātrebhyaḥ svedaḥ śokāgnisaṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3036: 2.079.018c yathā sūryāṃśusaṃtapto himavān prasruto himam 2.079.019a dhyānanirdaraśailena viniḥśvasitadhātunā 2.079.019c dainyapādapasaṃghena śokāyāsādhiśṛṅgiṇā 2.079.020a pramohānantasattvena saṃtāpauṣadhiveṇunā 2.079.020c ākrānto duḥkhaśailena mahatā kaikayīsutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3037: 2.079.021a guhena sārdhaṃ bharataḥ samāgato; mahānubhāvaḥ sajanaḥ samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3038: 2.079.021c sudurmanās taṃ bharataṃ tadā punar; guhaḥ samāśvāsayad agrajaṃ
GE09ram_02_u:3042: 2.080.002a taṃ jāgrataṃ guṇair yuktaṃ varacāpeṣudhāriṇam 2.080.002c bhrātṛ guptyartham atyantam ahaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravam
GE09ram_02_u:3043: 2.080.003a iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā
GE09ram_02_u:3045: 2.080.004a ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarve duḥkhānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ 2.080.004c dharmātmaṃs tasya guptyarthaṃ jāgariṣyāmahe vayam 2.080.005a na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaś cana 2.080.005c motsuko bhūr bravīmy etad apy asatyaṃ tavāgrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3046: 2.080.006a asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ 2.080.006c dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām
GE09ram_02_u:3047: 2.080.007a so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā 2.080.007c rakṣiṣyāmi dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sarvaiḥ svair jñātibhiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:3048: 2.080.008a na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃ cid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā 2.080.008c caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ prasahema vayaṃ yudhi
GE09ram_02_u:3049: 2.080.009a evam asmābhir uktena lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā 2.080.009c anunītā vayaṃ sarve dharmam evānupaśyatā 2.080.010a kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:3050: 2.080.010c śakyā nidrāmayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā
GE09ram_02_u:3051: 2.080.011a yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi
GE09ram_02_u:3052: 2.080.011c taṃ paśya guha saṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:3053: 2.080.012a mahatā tapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3055: 2.080.013a asmin pravrājite rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3056: 2.080.013c vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3059: 2.080.015a kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama
GE09ram_02_u:3060: 2.080.015c nāśaṃse yadi te sarve jīveyuḥ śarvarīm imām
GE09ram_02_u:3061: 2.080.016a jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā
GE09ram_02_u:3062: 2.080.016c duḥkhitā yā tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3064: 2.080.017c rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3065: 2.080.018a siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite
GE09ram_02_u:3067: 2.080.019a ramyacatvarasaṃsthānāṃ suvibhaktamahāpathām 2.080.019c harmyaprāsādasaṃpannāṃ sarvaratnavibhūṣitām 2.080.020a gajāśvarathasaṃbādhāṃ tūryanādavināditām 2.080.020c sarvakalyāṇasaṃpūrṇāṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākulām 2.080.021a ārāmodyānasaṃpūrṇāṃ samājotsavaśālinīm 2.080.021c sukhitā vicariṣyanti rājadhānīṃ pitur mama 2.080.022a api satyapratijñena sārdhaṃ kuśalinā vayam 2.080.022c nivṛtte samaye hy asmin sukhitāḥ praviśemahi
GE09ram_02_u:3070: 2.080.024a prabhāte vimale sūrye kārayitvā jaṭā ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:3071: 2.080.024c asmin bhāgīrathī tīre sukhaṃ saṃtāritau mayā
GE09ram_02_u:3072: 2.080.025a jaṭādharau tau drumacīravāsasau; mahābalau kuñjarayūthapopamau 2.080.025c vareṣucāpāsidharau paraṃtapau; vyavekṣamāṇau saha sītayā gatau
GE09ram_02_u:3073: 2.081.001a guhasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharato bhṛśam apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:3074: 2.081.001c dhyānaṃ jagāma tatraiva yatra tac chrutam apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:3077: 2.081.003a pratyāśvasya muhūrtaṃ tu kālaṃ paramadurmanāḥ 2.081.003c papāta sahasā totrair hṛdi viddha iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3080: 2.081.005a tataḥ sarvāḥ samāpetur mātaro bharatasya tāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3082: 2.081.006a tāś ca taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau rudantyaḥ paryavārayan
GE09ram_02_u:3083: 2.081.006c kausalyā tv anusṛtyainaṃ durmanāḥ pariṣasvaje 2.081.007a vatsalā svaṃ yathā vatsam upagūhya tapasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:3085: 2.081.008a putravyādhir na te kaccic charīraṃ paribādhate
GE09ram_02_u:3086: 2.081.008c adya rājakulasyāsya tvadadhīnaṃ hi jīvitam 2.081.009a tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā putra jīvāmi rāme sabhrātṛke gate
GE09ram_02_u:3087: 2.081.009c vṛtte daśarathe rājñi nātha ekas tvam adya naḥ 2.081.010a kaccin na lakṣmaṇe putra śrutaṃ te kiṃ cid apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:3088: 2.081.010c putra vā hy ekaputrāyāḥ sahabhārye vanaṃ gate
GE09ram_02_u:3089: 2.081.011a sa muhūrtaṃ samāśvasya rudann eva mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3090: 2.081.011c kausalyāṃ parisāntvyedaṃ guhaṃ vacanam abravīt 2.081.012a bhrātā me kvāvasad rātriṃ kva sītā kva ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3091: 2.081.012c asvapac chayane kasmin kiṃ bhuktvā guha śaṃsa me 2.081.013a so 'bravīd bharataṃ pṛṣṭo niṣādādhipatir guhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3092: 2.081.013c yad vidhaṃ pratipede ca rāme priyahite 'tithau
GE09ram_02_u:3093: 2.081.014a annam uccāvacaṃ bhakṣyāḥ phalāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:3095: 2.081.015a tat sarvaṃ pratyanujñāsīd rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 2.081.015c na hi tat pratyagṛhṇāt sa kṣatradharmam anusmaran
GE09ram_02_u:3096: 2.081.016a na hy asmābhiḥ pratigrāhyaṃ sakhe deyaṃ tu sarvadā 2.081.016c iti tena vayaṃ rājann anunītā mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:3097: 2.081.017a lakṣmaṇena samānītaṃ pītvā vāri mahāyaśāḥ 2.081.017c aupavāsyaṃ tadākārṣīd rāghavaḥ saha sītayā 2.081.018a tatas tu jalaśeṣeṇa lakṣmaṇo 'py akarot tadā 2.081.018c vāg yatās te trayaḥ saṃdhyām upāsata samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3098: 2.081.019a saumitris tu tataḥ paścād akarot svāstaraṃ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:3099: 2.081.019c svayam ānīya barhīṃṣi kṣipraṃ rāghava kāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:3100: 2.081.020a tasmin samāviśad rāmaḥ svāstare saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:3101: 2.081.020c prakṣālya ca tayoḥ pādāv apacakrāma lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3102: 2.081.021a etat tad iṅgudīmūlam idam eva ca tat tṛṇam 2.081.021c yasmin rāmaś ca sītā ca rātriṃ tāṃ śayitāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:3103: 2.081.022a niyamya pṛṣṭhe tu talāṅgulitravāñ; śaraiḥ supūrṇāv iṣudhī
GE09ram_02_u:3105: 2.081.022c mahad dhanuḥ sajyam upohya lakṣmaṇo; niśām atiṣṭhat parito 'sya
GE09ram_02_u:3107: 2.081.023a tatas tv ahaṃ cottamabāṇacāpadhṛk; sthito 'bhavaṃ tatra sa yatra lakṣmaṇaḥ 2.081.023c atandribhir jñātibhir āttakārmukair; mahendrakalpaṃ paripālayaṃs tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3108: 2.082.001a tac chrutvā nipuṇaṃ sarvaṃ bharataḥ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3109: 2.082.001c iṅgudīmūlam āgamya rāmaśayyām avekṣya tām 2.082.002a abravīj jananīḥ sarvā iha tena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:3110: 2.082.002c śarvarī śayitā bhūmāv idam asya vimarditam
GE09ram_02_u:3112: 2.082.003c jāto daśarathenorvyāṃ na rāmaḥ svaptum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:3113: 2.082.004a ajinottarasaṃstīrṇe varāstaraṇasaṃcaye 2.082.004c śayitvā puruṣavyāghraḥ kathaṃ śete mahītale 2.082.005a prāsādāgra vimāneṣu valabhīṣu ca sarvadā 2.082.005c haimarājatabhaumeṣu varāstaraṇaśāliṣu 2.082.006a puṣpasaṃcayacitreṣu candanāgarugandhiṣu 2.082.006c pāṇḍurābhraprakāśeṣu śukasaṃgharuteṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:3114: 2.082.007a gītavāditranirghoṣair varābharaṇaniḥsvanaiḥ 2.082.007c mṛdaṅgavaraśabdaiś ca satataṃ pratibodhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3115: 2.082.008a bandibhir vanditaḥ kāle bahubhiḥ sūtamāgadhaiḥ 2.082.008c gāthābhir anurūpābhiḥ stutibhiś ca paraṃtapaḥ 2.082.009a aśraddheyam idaṃ loke na satyaṃ pratibhāti mā
GE09ram_02_u:3116: 2.082.009c muhyate khalu me bhāvaḥ svapno 'yam iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3117: 2.082.010a na nūnaṃ daivataṃ kiṃ cit kālena balavattaram
GE09ram_02_u:3118: 2.082.010c yatra dāśarathī rāmo bhūmāv evaṃ śayīta saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3119: 2.082.011a videharājasya sutā sītā ca priyadarśanā 2.082.011c dayitā śayitā bhūmau snuṣā daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:3120: 2.082.012a iyaṃ śayyā mama bhrātur idaṃ hi parivartitam
GE09ram_02_u:3121: 2.082.012c sthaṇḍile kaṭhine sarvaṃ gātrair vimṛditaṃ tṛṇam
GE09ram_02_u:3122: 2.082.013a manye sābharaṇā suptā sītāsmiñ śayane tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3123: 2.082.013c tatra tatra hi dṛśyante saktāḥ kanakabindavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3124: 2.082.014a uttarīyam ihāsaktaṃ suvyaktaṃ sītayā tadā 2.082.014c tathā hy ete prakāśante saktāḥ kauśeyatantavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3125: 2.082.015a manye bhartuḥ sukhā śayyā yena bālā tapasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:3126: 2.082.015c sukumārī satī duḥkhaṃ na vijānāti maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:3128: 2.082.016c sarvalokapriyas tyaktvā rājyaṃ priyam anuttamam 2.082.017a katham indīvaraśyāmo raktākṣaḥ priyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3129: 2.082.017c sukhabhāgī ca duḥkhārhaḥ śayito bhuvi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3130: 2.082.018a siddhārthā khalu vaidehī patiṃ yānugatā vanam
GE09ram_02_u:3131: 2.082.018c vayaṃ saṃśayitāḥ sarve hīnās tena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:3132: 2.082.019a akarṇadhārā pṛthivī śūnyeva pratibhāti mā 2.082.019c gate daśarathe svarge rāme cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_02_u:3133: 2.082.020a na ca prārthayate kaś cin manasāpi vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:3137: 2.082.022c śatravo nābhimanyante bhakṣyān viṣakṛtān iva 2.082.023a adya prabhṛti bhūmau tu śayiṣye 'haṃ tṛṇeṣu vā 2.082.023c phalamūlāśano nityaṃ jaṭācīrāṇi dhārayan
GE09ram_02_u:3138: 2.082.024a tasyārtham uttaraṃ kālaṃ nivatsyāmi sukhaṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:3139: 2.082.024c taṃ pratiśravam āmucya nāsya mithyā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3140: 2.082.025a vasantaṃ bhrātur arthāya śatrughno mānuvatsyati 2.082.025c lakṣmaṇena saha tv āryo ayodhyāṃ pālayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3142: 2.082.026c api me devatāḥ kuryur imaṃ satyaṃ manoratham
GE09ram_02_u:3143: 2.082.027a prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mayā svayaṃ; bahuprakāraṃ yadi na
GE09ram_02_u:3145: 2.082.027c tato 'nuvatsyāmi cirāya rāghavaṃ; vane vasan nārhati mām upekṣitum 2.083.001a vyuṣya rātriṃ tu tatraiva gaṅgākūle sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3146: 2.083.001c bharataḥ kālyam utthāya śatrughnam idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3147: 2.083.002a śatrughottiṣṭha kiṃ śeṣe niṣādādhipatiṃ guham 2.083.002c śīghram ānaya bhadraṃ te tārayiṣyati vāhinīm
GE09ram_02_u:3148: 2.083.003a jāgarmi nāhaṃ svapimi tathaivāryaṃ vicintayan 2.083.003c ity evam abravīd bhrātrā śatrughno 'pi pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3149: 2.083.004a iti saṃvadator evam anyonyaṃ narasiṃhayoḥ 2.083.004c āgamya prāñjaliḥ kāle guho bharatam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3150: 2.083.005a kaccit sukhaṃ nadītīre 'vātsīḥ kākutstha śarvarīm 2.083.005c kaccic ca saha sainyasya tava sarvam anāmayam
GE09ram_02_u:3151: 2.083.006a guhasya tat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā snehād udīritam
GE09ram_02_u:3153: 2.083.007a sukhā naḥ śarvarī rājan pūjitāś cāpi te vayam 2.083.007c gaṅgāṃ tu naubhir bahvībhir dāśāḥ saṃtārayantu naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3154: 2.083.008a tato guhaḥ saṃtvaritaḥ śrutvā bharataśāsanam 2.083.008c pratipraviśya nagaraṃ taṃ jñātijanam abravīt 2.083.009a uttiṣṭhata prabudhyadhvaṃ bhadram astu hi vaḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:3156: 2.083.010a te tathoktāḥ samutthāya tvaritā rājaśāsanāt 2.083.010c pañca nāvāṃ śatāny eva samāninyuḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3157: 2.083.011a anyāḥ svastikavijñeyā mahāghaṇḍā dharā varāḥ 2.083.011c śobhamānāḥ patākinyo yuktavātāḥ susaṃhatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3159: 2.083.012c sanandighoṣāṃ kalyāṇīṃ guho nāvam upāharat 2.083.013a tām āruroha bharataḥ śatrughnaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3160: 2.083.013c kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3161: 2.083.014a purohitaś ca tat pūrvaṃ gurave brāhmaṇāś ca ye 2.083.014c anantaraṃ rājadārās tathaiva śakaṭāpaṇāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3162: 2.083.015a āvāsam ādīpayatāṃ tīrthaṃ cāpy avagāhatām 2.083.015c bhāṇḍāni cādadānānāṃ ghoṣas tridivam aspṛśat 2.083.016a patākinyas tu tā nāvaḥ svayaṃ dāśair adhiṣṭhitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3163: 2.083.016c vahantyo janam ārūḍhaṃ tadā saṃpetur āśugāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3164: 2.083.017a nārīṇām abhipūrṇās tu kāś cit kāś cit tu vājinām
GE09ram_02_u:3165: 2.083.017c kaś cit tatra vahanti sma yānayugyaṃ mahādhanam
GE09ram_02_u:3166: 2.083.018a tāḥ sma gatvā paraṃ tīram avaropya ca taṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:3168: 2.083.019a savaijayantās tu gajā gajārohaiḥ pracoditāḥ 2.083.019c tarantaḥ sma prakāśante sadhvajā iva parvatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3169: 2.083.020a nāvaś cāruruhus tv anye plavais terus tathāpare
GE09ram_02_u:3170: 2.083.020c anye kumbhaghaṭais terur anye teruś ca bāhubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3171: 2.083.021a sā puṇyā dhvajinī gaṅgāṃ dāśaiḥ saṃtāritā svayam
GE09ram_02_u:3172: 2.083.021c maitre muhūrte prayayau prayāgavanam uttamam 2.083.022a āśvāsayitvā ca camūṃ mahātmā; niveśayitvā ca yathopajoṣam
GE09ram_02_u:3173: 2.083.022c draṣṭuṃ bharadvājam ṛṣipravaryam; ṛtvig vṛtaḥ san bharataḥ pratasthe 2.084.001a bharadvājāśramaṃ dṛṣṭvā krośād eva nararṣabhaḥ 2.084.001c balaṃ sarvam avasthāpya jagāma saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3174: 2.084.002a padbhyām eva hi dharmajño nyastaśastraparicchadaḥ 2.084.002c vasāno vāsasī kṣaume purodhāya purohitam 2.084.003a tataḥ saṃdarśane tasya bharadvājasya rāghavaḥ 2.084.003c mantriṇas tān avasthāpya jagāmānu purohitam 2.084.004a vasiṣṭham atha dṛṣṭvaiva bharadvājo mahātapāḥ 2.084.004c saṃcacālāsanāt tūrṇaṃ śiṣyān arghyam iti bruvan
GE09ram_02_u:3176: 2.084.005c abudhyata mahātejāḥ sutaṃ daśarathasya tam 2.084.006a tābhyām arghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca dattvā paścāt phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:3177: 2.084.006c ānupūrvyāc ca dharmajñaḥ papraccha kuśalaṃ kule
GE09ram_02_u:3178: 2.084.007a ayodhyāyāṃ bale kośe mitreṣv api ca mantriṣu
GE09ram_02_u:3179: 2.084.007c jānan daśarathaṃ vṛttaṃ na rājānam udāharat
GE09ram_02_u:3180: 2.084.008a vasiṣṭho bharataś cainaṃ papracchatur anāmayam 2.084.008c śarīre 'gniṣu vṛkṣeṣu śiṣyeṣu mṛgapakṣiṣu
GE09ram_02_u:3181: 2.084.009a tatheti ca pratijñāya bharadvājo mahātapāḥ 2.084.009c bharataṃ pratyuvācedaṃ
GE09ram_02_u:3182: 2.084.010a kim ihāgamane kāryaṃ tava rājyaṃ praśāsataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3183: 2.084.010c etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ na hi me śudhyate manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3185: 2.084.011c bhrātrā saha sabhāryo yaś ciraṃ pravrājito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:3187: 2.084.012c vanavāsī bhavetīha samāḥ kila caturdaśa 2.084.013a kaccin na tasyāpāpasya pāpaṃ kartum ihecchasi
GE09ram_02_u:3188: 2.084.013c akaṇṭakaṃ bhoktumanā rājyaṃ tasyānujasya ca 2.084.014a evam ukto bharadvājaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:3189: 2.084.014c paryaśru nayano duḥkhād vācā saṃsajjamānayā 2.084.015a hato 'smi yadi mām evaṃ bhagavān api manyate
GE09ram_02_u:3190: 2.084.015c matto na doṣam āśaṅker naivaṃ mām anuśādhi hi 2.084.016a aṃś caitad iṣṭaṃ mātā me yad avocan madantare 2.084.016c nāham etena tuṣṭaś ca na tad vacanam ādade 2.084.017a ahaṃ tu taṃ naravyāghram upayātaḥ prasādakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3191: 2.084.017c pratinetum ayodhyāṃ ca pādau tasyābhivanditum 2.084.018a tvaṃ mām evaṃ gataṃ matvā prasādaṃ kartum arhasi 2.084.018c śaṃsa me bhagavan rāmaḥ kva saṃprati mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3192: 2.084.019a uvāca taṃ bharadvājaḥ prasādād bharataṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3193: 2.084.019c tvayy etat puruṣavyāghraṃ yuktaṃ rāghavavaṃśaje 2.084.019e guruvṛttir damaś caiva sādhūnāṃ cānuyāyitā 2.084.020a jāne caitan manaḥsthaṃ te dṛḍhīkaraṇam astv iti
GE09ram_02_u:3194: 2.084.020c apṛcchaṃ tvāṃ tavātyarthaṃ kīrtiṃ samabhivardhayan 2.084.021a asau vasati te bhrātā citrakūṭe mahāgirau
GE09ram_02_u:3195: 2.084.021c śvas tu gantāsi taṃ deśaṃ vasādya saha mantribhiḥ 2.084.021e etaṃ me kuru suprājña kāmaṃ kāmārthakovida
GE09ram_02_u:3196: 2.084.022a tatas tathety evam udāradarśanaḥ; pratītarūpo bharato 'bravīd
GE09ram_02_u:3198: 2.084.022c cakāra buddhiṃ ca tadā mahāśrame; niśānivāsāya narādhipātmajaḥ 2.085.001a kṛtabuddhiṃ nivāsāya tathaiva sa munis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3199: 2.085.001c bharataṃ kaikayī putram ātithyena nyamantrayat 2.085.002a abravīd bharatas tv enaṃ nanv idaṃ bhavatā kṛtam 2.085.002c pādyam arghyaṃ tathātithyaṃ vane yad ūpapadyate
GE09ram_02_u:3200: 2.085.003a athovāca bharadvājo bharataṃ prahasann iva 2.085.003c jāne tvāṃ prīti saṃyuktaṃ tuṣyes tvaṃ yena kena cit
GE09ram_02_u:3201: 2.085.004a senāyās tu tavaitasyāḥ kartum icchāmi bhojanam
GE09ram_02_u:3202: 2.085.004c mama pritir yathā rūpā tvam arho manujarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:3203: 2.085.005a kimarthaṃ cāpi nikṣipya dūre balam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3204: 2.085.005c kasmān nehopayāto 'si sabalaḥ puruṣarṣabha 2.085.006a bharataḥ pratyuvācedaṃ prāñjalis taṃ tapodhanam 2.085.006c sasainyo nopayāto 'smi bhagavan bhagavad bhayāt
GE09ram_02_u:3205: 2.085.007a vāji mukhyā manuṣyāś ca mattāś ca vara vāraṇāḥ 2.085.007c pracchādya mahatīṃ bhūmiṃ bhagavann anuyānti mām
GE09ram_02_u:3206: 2.085.008a te vṛkṣān udakaṃ bhūmim āśrameṣūṭajāṃs tathā
GE09ram_02_u:3207: 2.085.008c na hiṃsyur iti tenāham eka evāgatas tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3208: 2.085.009a ānīyatām itaḥ senety ājñaptaḥ paramarṣiṇā 2.085.009c tathā tu cakre bharataḥ senāyāḥ samupāgamam
GE09ram_02_u:3209: 2.085.010a agniśālāṃ praviśyātha pītvāpaḥ parimṛjya ca 2.085.010c ātithyasya kriyāhetor viśvakarmāṇam āhvayat
GE09ram_02_u:3210: 2.085.011a āhvaye viśvakarmāṇam ahaṃ tvaṣṭāram eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:3211: 2.085.011c ātithyaṃ kartum icchāmi tatra me saṃvidhīyatām
GE09ram_02_u:3212: 2.085.012a prāk srotasaś ca yā nadyaḥ pratyak srotasa eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:3213: 2.085.012c pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca samāyāntv adya sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3214: 2.085.013a anyāḥ sravantu maireyaṃ surām anyāḥ suniṣṭhitām
GE09ram_02_u:3217: 2.085.014c tathaivāpsaraso devīr gandharvīś cāpi sarvaśaḥ 2.085.015a ghṛtācīm atha viśvācīṃ miśrakeśīm alambusām 2.085.015c śakraṃ yāś copatiṣṭhanti brahmāṇaṃ yāś ca bhāminīḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3218: 2.085.015e sarvās tumburuṇā sārdham āhvaye saparicchadāḥ 2.085.016a vanaṃ kuruṣu yad divyaṃ vāso bhūṣaṇapatravat
GE09ram_02_u:3219: 2.085.016c divyanārīphalaṃ śaśvat tat kauberam ihaiva tu
GE09ram_02_u:3220: 2.085.017a iha me bhagavān somo vidhattām annam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:3221: 2.085.017c bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca coṣyaṃ ca lehyaṃ ca vividhaṃ bahu
GE09ram_02_u:3222: 2.085.018a vicitrāṇi ca mālyāni pādapapracyutāni ca 2.085.018c surādīni ca peyāni māṃsāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:3223: 2.085.019a evaṃ samādhinā yuktas tejasāpratimena ca 2.085.019c śikṣāsvarasamāyuktaṃ tapasā cābravīn muniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3224: 2.085.020a manasā dhyāyatas tasya prāṅmukhasya kṛtāñjaleḥ 2.085.020c ājagmus tāni sarvāṇi daivatāni pṛthakpṛthak 2.085.021a malayaṃ durduraṃ caiva tataḥ svedanudo 'nilaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3225: 2.085.021c upaspṛśya vavau yuktyā supriyātmā sukhaḥ śivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3227: 2.085.022c devadundubhighoṣaś ca dikṣu sarvāsu śuśruve 2.085.023a pravavuś cottamā vātā nanṛtuś cāpsarogaṇāḥ 2.085.023c prajagur devagandharvā vīṇā pramumucuḥ svarān 2.085.024a sa śabdo dyāṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca prāṇināṃ śravaṇāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:3229: 2.085.025a tasminn uparate śabde divye śrotrasukhe nṛṇām
GE09ram_02_u:3230: 2.085.025c dadarśa bhārataṃ sainyaṃ vidhānaṃ viśvakarmaṇaḥ 2.085.026a babhūva hi samā bhūmiḥ samantāt pañcayojanam
GE09ram_02_u:3232: 2.085.027a tasmin bilvāḥ kapitthāś ca panasā bījapūrakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3233: 2.085.027c āmalakyo babhūvuś ca cūtāś ca phalabhūṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3234: 2.085.028a uttarebhyaḥ kurubhyaś ca vanaṃ divyopabhogavat 2.085.028c ājagāma nadī divyā tīrajair bahubhir vṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:3235: 2.085.029a catuḥśālāni śubhrāṇi śālāś ca gajavājinām 2.085.029c harmyaprāsādasaṃghātās toraṇāni śubhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:3242: 2.085.033c veśma tad ratnasaṃpūrṇaṃ bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ 2.085.034a anujagmuś ca taṃ sarve mantriṇaḥ sapurohitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3243: 2.085.034c babhūvuś ca mudā yuktā taṃ dṛṣṭvā veśma saṃvidhim 2.085.035a tatra rājāsanaṃ divyaṃ vyajanaṃ chatram eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:3244: 2.085.035c bharato mantribhiḥ sārdham abhyavartata rājavat 2.085.036a āsanaṃ pūjayām āsa rāmāyābhipraṇamya ca 2.085.036c vālavyajanam ādāya nyaṣīdat sacivāsane
GE09ram_02_u:3245: 2.085.037a ānupūrvyān niṣeduś ca sarve mantrapurohitāḥ 2.085.037c tataḥ senāpatiḥ paścāt praśāstā ca niṣedatuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3246: 2.085.038a tatas tatra muhūrtena nadyaḥ pāyasakardamāḥ 2.085.038c upātiṣṭhanta bharataṃ bharadvājasya śāsanat
GE09ram_02_u:3248: 2.085.039c ramyāś cāvasathā divyā brahmaṇas tu prasādajāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3250: 2.085.040c āgur viṃśatisāhasrā brāhmaṇā prahitāḥ striyaḥ 2.085.041a suvarṇamaṇimuktena pravālena ca śobhitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3252: 2.085.042a yābhir gṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ sonmāda iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:3254: 2.085.043a nāradas tumburur gopaḥ parvataḥ sūryavarcasaḥ 2.085.043c ete gandharvarājāno bharatasyāgrato jaguḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3256: 2.085.044c upānṛtyaṃs tu bharataṃ bharadvājasya śāsanāt 2.085.045a yāni mālyāni deveṣu yāni caitrarathe vane
GE09ram_02_u:3257: 2.085.045c prayāge tāny adṛśyanta bharadvājasya śāsanāt 2.085.046a bilvā mārdaṅgikā āsañ śamyā grāhā bibhītakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3258: 2.085.046c aśvatthā nartakāś cāsan bharadvājasya tejasā 2.085.047a tataḥ saralatālāś ca tilakā naktamālakāḥ 2.085.047c prahṛṣṭās tatra saṃpetuḥ kubjābhūtātha vāmanāḥ 2.085.048a śiṃśapāmalakī jambūr yāś cānyāḥ kānane latāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3260: 2.085.049a surāṃ surāpāḥ pibata pāyasaṃ ca bubhukśitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3261: 2.085.049c māṃsani ca sumedhyāni bhakṣyantāṃ yāvad icchatha
GE09ram_02_u:3262: 2.085.050a utsādya snāpayanti sma nadītīreṣu valguṣu 2.085.050c apy ekam ekaṃ puruṣaṃ pramadāḥ satpa cāṣṭa ca 2.085.051a saṃvahantyaḥ samāpetur nāryo ruciralocanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3263: 2.085.051c parimṛjya tathā nyāyaṃ pāyayanti varāṅganāḥ 2.085.052a hayān gajān kharān uṣṭrāṃs tathaiva surabheḥ sutān
GE09ram_02_u:3264: 2.085.052c ikṣūṃś ca madhujālāṃś ca bhojayanti sma vāhanān
GE09ram_02_u:3267: 2.085.053c mattapramattamuditā camūḥ sā tatra saṃbabhau 2.085.054a tarpitā sarvakāmais te raktacandanarūṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3269: 2.085.055a naivāyodhyāṃ gamiṣyāmo na gamiṣyāma daṇḍakān 2.085.055c kuśalaṃ bharatasyāstu rāmasyāstu tathā sukham 2.085.056a iti pādātayodhāś ca hastyaśvārohabandhakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3270: 2.085.056c anāthās taṃ vidhiṃ labdhvā vācam etām udairayan
GE09ram_02_u:3271: 2.085.057a saṃprahṛṣṭā vinedus te narās tatra sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3272: 2.085.057c bharatasyānuyātāraḥ svarge 'yam iti cābruvan 2.085.058a tato bhuktavatāṃ teṣāṃ tad annam amṛtopamam
GE09ram_02_u:3273: 2.085.058c divyān udvīkṣya bhakṣyāṃs tān abhavad bhakṣaṇe matiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3274: 2.085.059a preṣyāś ceṭyaś ca vadhvaś ca balasthāś cāpi sarvaśaḥ 2.085.059c babhūvus te bhṛśaṃ tṛptāḥ sarve cāhatavāsasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3275: 2.085.060a kuñjarāś ca kharoṣṭraś ca go'śvāś ca mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ 2.085.060c babhūvuḥ subhṛtās tatra nānyo hy anyam akalpayat
GE09ram_02_u:3277: 2.085.061c rajasā dhvastakeśo vā naraḥ kaś cid adṛśyata
GE09ram_02_u:3278: 2.085.062a ājaiś cāpi ca vārāhair niṣṭhānavarasaṃcayaiḥ 2.085.062c phalaniryūhasaṃsiddhaiḥ sūpair gandharasānvitaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3280: 2.085.063c dadṛśur vismitās tatra narā lauhīḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3282: 2.085.064c tāś ca kāmadughā gāvo drumāś cāsan madhuścyutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3283: 2.085.065a vāpyo maireya pūrṇāś ca mṛṣṭamāṃsacayair vṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3285: 2.085.066a pātrīṇāṃ ca sahasrāṇi śātakumbhamayāni ca 2.085.066c sthālyaḥ kumbhyaḥ karambhyaś ca dadhipūrṇāḥ susaṃskṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3287: 2.085.067a hradāḥ pūrṇā rasālasya dadhnaḥ śvetasya cāpare
GE09ram_02_u:3288: 2.085.067c babhūvuḥ pāyasasyānte śarkarāyāś ca saṃcayāḥ 2.085.068a kalkāṃś cūrṇakaṣāyāṃś ca snānāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:3289: 2.085.068c dadṛśur bhājanasthāni tīrtheṣu saritāṃ narāḥ 2.085.069a śuklān aṃśumataś cāpi
GE09ram_02_u:3290: 2.085.069c śuklāṃś candanakalkāṃś ca samudgeṣv avatiṣṭhataḥ 2.085.070a darpaṇān parimṛṣṭāṃś ca vāsasāṃ cāpi saṃcayān
GE09ram_02_u:3291: 2.085.070c pādukopānahāṃ caiva yugmān yatra sahasraśaḥ 2.085.071a āñjanīḥ kaṅkatān kūrcāṃś chatrāṇi ca dhanūṃṣi ca
GE09ram_02_u:3292: 2.085.071c marmatrāṇāni citrāṇi śayanāny āsanāni ca 2.085.072a pratipānahradān pūrṇān kharoṣṭragajavājinām
GE09ram_02_u:3293: 2.085.072c avagāhya sutīrthāṃś ca hradān sotpala puṣkarān
GE09ram_02_u:3295: 2.085.073c nirvāpārthaṃ paśūnāṃ te dadṛśus tatra sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3296: 2.085.074a vyasmayanta manuṣyās te svapnakalpaṃ tad adbhutam
GE09ram_02_u:3297: 2.085.074c dṛṣṭvātithyaṃ kṛtaṃ tādṛg bharatasya maharṣiṇā 2.085.075a ity evaṃ ramamāṇānāṃ devānām iva nandane
GE09ram_02_u:3298: 2.085.075c bharadvājāśrame ramye sā rātrir vyatyavartata 2.085.076a pratijagmuś ca tā nadyo gandharvāś ca yathāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:3299: 2.085.076c bharadvājam anujñāpya tāś ca sarvā varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3300: 2.085.077a tathaiva mattā madirotkaṭā narās; tathaiva divyāgurucandanokṣitāḥ 2.085.077c tathaiva divyā vividhāḥ sraguttamāḥ; pṛthakprakīrṇā manujaiḥ pramarditāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3301: 2.086.001a tatas tāṃ rajanīm uṣya bharataḥ saparicchadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3302: 2.086.001c kṛtātithyo bharadvājaṃ kāmād abhijagāma ha 2.086.002a tam ṛṣiḥ puruṣavyāghraṃ prekṣya prāñjalim āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:3304: 2.086.003a kaccid atra sukhā rātris tavāsmadviṣaye gatā
GE09ram_02_u:3305: 2.086.003c samagras te janaḥ kaccid ātithye śaṃsa me 'nagha
GE09ram_02_u:3307: 2.086.004c āśramād abhiniṣkrantam ṛṣim uttama tejasaṃ 2.086.005a sukhoṣito 'smi bhagavan samagrabalavāhanaḥ 2.086.005c tarpitaḥ sarvakāmaiś ca sāmātyo balavat tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:3309: 2.086.006c api preṣyān upādāya sarve sma susukhoṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3311: 2.086.007c samīpaṃ prasthitaṃ bhrātur maireṇekṣasva cakṣuṣā 2.086.008a āśramaṃ tasya dharmajña dhārmikasya mahātmanaḥ 2.086.008c ācakṣva katamo mārgaḥ kiyān iti ca śaṃsa me 2.086.009a iti pṛṣṭas tu bharataṃ bhrātṛdarśanalālasaṃ 2.086.009c pratyuvāca mahātejā bharadvājo mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3314: 2.086.011a uttaraṃ pārśvam āsādya tasya mandākinī nadī
GE09ram_02_u:3315: 2.086.011c puṣpitadrumasaṃchannā ramyapuṣpitakānanā 2.086.012a anantaraṃ tat saritaś citrakūṭaś ca parvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3316: 2.086.012c tato parṇakuṭī tāta tatra tau vasato dhruvam
GE09ram_02_u:3317: 2.086.013a dakṣiṇenaiva mārgeṇa savyadakṣiṇam eva ca 2.086.013c gajavājirathākīrṇāṃ vāhinīṃ
GE09ram_02_u:3318: 2.086.013e vāhayasva mahābhāga tato drakṣyasi rāghavam 2.086.014a prayāṇam iti ca śrutvā rājarājasya yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3319: 2.086.014c hitvā yānāni yānārhā brāhmaṇaṃ paryavārayan 2.086.015a vepamānā kṛśā dīnā saha devyā sumantriyā
GE09ram_02_u:3320: 2.086.015c kausalyā tatra jagrāha karābhyāṃ caraṇau muneḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3322: 2.086.016c kaikeyī tasya jagrāha caraṇau savyapatrapā 2.086.017a taṃ pradakṣiṇam āgamya bhagavantaṃ mahāmunim 2.086.017c adūrād bharatasyaiva tasthau dīnamanās tadā 2.086.018a tataḥ papraccha bharataṃ bharadvājo dṛḍhavrataḥ 2.086.018c viśeṣaṃ jñātum icchāmi mātṝṇāṃ tava rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:3323: 2.086.019a evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3324: 2.086.019c uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyaṃ vacanakovidaḥ 2.086.020a yām imāṃ bhagavan dīnāṃ śokān aśanakarśitām
GE09ram_02_u:3325: 2.086.020c pitur hi mahiṣīṃ devīṃ devatām iva paśyasi
GE09ram_02_u:3327: 2.086.021c kausalyā suṣuve rāmaṃ dhātāram aditir yathā
GE09ram_02_u:3328: 2.086.022a asyā vāmabhujaṃ śliṣṭā yaiṣā tiṣṭhati durmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3330: 2.086.023a etasyās tau sutau devyāḥ kumārau devavarṇinau
GE09ram_02_u:3332: 2.086.024a yasyāḥ kṛte narayāghrau jīvanāśam ito gatau
GE09ram_02_u:3333: 2.086.024c rājā putravihīnaś ca svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3335: 2.086.025c mamaitāṃ mātaraṃ viddhi nṛśaṃsāṃ pāpaniścayām 2.086.025e yatomūlaṃ hi paśyāmi vyasanaṃ mahad ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3336: 2.086.026a ity uktvā naraśārdūlo bāṣpagadgadayā girā 2.086.026c sa niśaśvāsa tāmrākṣo kruddho nāga ivāsakṛt
GE09ram_02_u:3337: 2.086.027a bharadvājo maharṣis taṃ bruvantaṃ bharataṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3338: 2.086.027c pratyuvāca mahābuddhir idaṃ vacanam arthavat 2.086.028a na doṣeṇāvagantavyā kaikeyī bharata tvayā 2.086.028c rāmapravrājanaṃ hy etat sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati 2.086.029a abhivādya tu saṃsiddhaḥ kṛtvā cainaṃ pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:3339: 2.086.029c āmantrya bharataḥ sainyaṃ yujyatām ity acodayat
GE09ram_02_u:3340: 2.086.030a tato vājirathān yuktvā divyān hemapariṣkritān 2.086.030c adhyārohat prayāṇārthī bahūn bahuvidho janaḥ 2.086.031a gajakanyāgajāś caiva hemakakṣyāḥ patākinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3341: 2.086.031c jīmūtā iva gharmānte saghoṣāḥ saṃpratasthire 2.086.032a vividhāny api yānāni mahāni ca laghūni ca
GE09ram_02_u:3342: 2.086.032c prayayuḥ sumahārhāṇi pādair eva padātayaḥ 2.086.033a atha yānapravekais tu kausalyāpramukhāḥ striyaḥ 2.086.033c rāmadarśanakāṅkṣiṇyaḥ prayayur muditās tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3343: 2.086.034a sa cārkataruṇābhāsāṃ niyuktāṃ śibikāṃ śubhām 2.086.034c āsthāya prayayau śrīmān bharataḥ saparicchadaḥ 2.086.035a sā prayātā mahāsenā gajavājirathākulā
GE09ram_02_u:3344: 2.086.035c dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āvṛtya mahāmegha ivotthitaḥ 2.086.035e vanāni tu vyatikramya juṣṭāni mṛgapakṣibhiḥ 2.086.036a sā saṃprahṛṣṭadvipavājiyodhā; vitrāsayantī mṛgapakṣisaṃghān 2.086.036c mahad vanaṃ tat pravigāhamānā; rarāja senā bharatasya tatra
GE09ram_02_u:3345: 2.087.001a tayā mahatyā yāyinyā dhvajinyā vanavāsinaḥ 2.087.001c arditā yūthapā mattāḥ sayūthāḥ saṃpradudruvuḥ 2.087.002a ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca ruravaś ca samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3346: 2.087.002c dṛśyante vanarājīṣu giriṣv api nadīṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:3347: 2.087.003a sa saṃpratasthe dharmātmā prīto daśarathātmajaḥ 2.087.003c vṛto mahatyā nādinyā senayā caturaṅgayā 2.087.004a sāgaraughanibhā senā bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3348: 2.087.004c mahīṃ saṃchādayām āsa prāvṛṣi dyām ivāmbudaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3349: 2.087.005a turaṃgaughair avatatā vāraṇaiś ca mahājavaiḥ 2.087.005c anālakṣyā ciraṃ kālaṃ tasmin kāle babhūva bhūḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3350: 2.087.006a sa yātvā dūram adhvānaṃ supariśrānta vāhanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3351: 2.087.006c uvāca bharataḥ śrīmān vasiṣṭhaṃ mantriṇāṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:3352: 2.087.007a yādṛśaṃ lakṣyate rūpaṃ yathā caiva śrutaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:3353: 2.087.007c vyaktaṃ prāptāḥ sma taṃ deśaṃ bharadvājo yam abravīt 2.087.008a ayaṃ giriś citrakūṭas tathā mandākinī nadī
GE09ram_02_u:3354: 2.087.008c etat prakāśate dūrān nīlameghanibhaṃ vanam 2.087.009a gireḥ sānūni ramyāṇi citrakūṭasya saṃprati 2.087.009c vāraṇair avamṛdyante māmakaiḥ parvatopamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3355: 2.087.010a muñcanti kusumāny ete nagāḥ parvatasānuṣu 2.087.010c nīlā ivātapāpāye toyaṃ toyadharā ghanāḥ 2.087.011a kinnarācaritoddeśaṃ paśya śatrughna parvatam
GE09ram_02_u:3356: 2.087.011c hayaiḥ samantād ākīrṇaṃ makarair iva sāgaram
GE09ram_02_u:3357: 2.087.012a ete mṛgagaṇā bhānti śīghravegāḥ pracoditāḥ 2.087.012c vāyupraviddhāḥ śaradi megharājya ivāmbare
GE09ram_02_u:3358: 2.087.013a kurvanti kusumāpīḍāñ śiraḥsu surabhīn amī 2.087.013c meghaprakāśaiḥ phalakair dākṣiṇātyā yathā narāḥ 2.087.014a niṣkūjam iva bhūtvedaṃ vanaṃ ghorapradarśanam 2.087.014c ayodhyeva janākīrṇā saṃprati pratibhāti mā 2.087.015a khurair udīrito reṇur divaṃ pracchādya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_02_u:3359: 2.087.015c taṃ vahaty anilaḥ śīghraṃ kurvann iva mama priyam 2.087.016a syandanāṃs turagopetān sūtamukhyair adhiṣṭhitān
GE09ram_02_u:3360: 2.087.016c etān saṃpatataḥ śīghraṃ paśya śatrughna kānane
GE09ram_02_u:3361: 2.087.017a etān vitrāsitān paśya barhiṇaḥ priyadarśanān 2.087.017c etam āviśataḥ śailam adhivāsaṃ patatriṇām 2.087.018a atimātram ayaṃ deśo manojñaḥ pratibhāti mā
GE09ram_02_u:3363: 2.087.019a mṛgā mṛgībhiḥ sahitā bahavaḥ pṛṣatā vane
GE09ram_02_u:3364: 2.087.019c manojña rūpā lakṣyante kusumair iva citritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3365: 2.087.020a sādhu sainyāḥ pratiṣṭhantāṃ vicinvantu ca kānanam
GE09ram_02_u:3366: 2.087.020c yathā tau puruṣavyāghrau dṛśyete rāmalakṣmaṇau 2.087.021a bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā puruṣāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ 2.087.021c viviśus tad vanaṃ śūrā dhūmaṃ ca dadṛśus tataḥ 2.087.022a te samālokya dhūmāgram ūcur bharatam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3367: 2.087.022c nāmanuṣye bhavaty agnir vyaktam atraiva rāghavau
GE09ram_02_u:3368: 2.087.023a atha nātra naravyāghrau rājaputrau paraṃtapau 2.087.023c anye rāmopamāḥ santi vyaktam atra tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3369: 2.087.024a tac chrutvā bharatas teṣāṃ vacanaṃ sādhu saṃmatam
GE09ram_02_u:3370: 2.087.024c sainyān uvāca sarvāṃs tān amitrabalamardanaḥ 2.087.025a yat tā bhavantas tiṣṭhantu neto gantavyam agrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3371: 2.087.025c aham eva gamiṣyāmi sumantro gurur eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:3372: 2.087.026a evam uktās tataḥ sarve tatra tasthuḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3373: 2.087.026c bharato yatra dhūmāgraṃ tatra dṛṣṭiṃ samādadhat
GE09ram_02_u:3374: 2.087.027a vyavasthitā yā bharatena sā camūr; nirīkṣamāṇāpi ca dhūmam
GE09ram_02_u:3376: 2.087.027c babhūva hṛṣṭā nacireṇa jānatī; priyasya rāmasya samāgamaṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3378: 2.088.001c videhyāḥ priyamākāṅkṣan svaṃ ca cittaṃ vilobhayan
GE09ram_02_u:3379: 2.088.002a atha dāśarathiś citraṃ citrakūṭam adarśayat 2.088.002c bhāryām amarasaṃkāśaḥ śacīm iva puraṃdaraḥ 2.088.003a na rājyād bhraṃśanaṃ bhadre na suhṛdbhir vinābhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3380: 2.088.003c mano me bādhate dṛṣṭvā ramaṇīyam imaṃ girim
GE09ram_02_u:3382: 2.088.004c śikharaiḥ kham ivodviddhair dhātumadbhir vibhūṣitam 2.088.005a ke cid rajatasaṃkāśāḥ ke cit kṣatajasaṃnibhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3383: 2.088.005c pītamāñjiṣṭhavarṇāś ca ke cin maṇivaraprabhāḥ 2.088.006a puṣyārkaketukābhāś ca ke cij jyotī rasaprabhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3384: 2.088.006c virājante 'calendrasya deśā dhātuvibhūṣitāḥ 2.088.007a nānāmṛgagaṇadvīpitarakṣvṛkṣagaṇair vṛtaḥ 2.088.007c aduṣṭair bhāty ayaṃ śailo bahupakṣisamākulaḥ 2.088.008a āmrajambvasanair lodhraiḥ priyālaiḥ panasair dhavaiḥ 2.088.008c aṅkolair bhavyatiniśair bilvatindukaveṇubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3388: 2.088.010c evamādibhir ākīrṇaḥ śriyaṃ puṣyaty ayaṃ giriḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3390: 2.088.011c kinnarān dvaṃdvaśo bhadre ramamāṇān manasvinaḥ 2.088.012a śākhāvasaktān khaḍgāṃś ca pravarāṇy ambarāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:3391: 2.088.012c paśya vidyādharastrīṇāṃ krīḍed deśān manoramān 2.088.013a jalaprapātair udbhedair niṣyandaiś ca kva cit kva cit 2.088.013c sravadbhir bhāty ayaṃ śailaḥ sravan mada iva dvipaḥ 2.088.014a guhāsamīraṇo gandhān nānāpuṣpabhavān vahan
GE09ram_02_u:3392: 2.088.014c ghrāṇatarpaṇam abhyetya kaṃ naraṃ na praharṣayet
GE09ram_02_u:3394: 2.088.015c lakṣmaṇena ca vatsyāmi na māṃ śokaḥ pradhakṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3396: 2.088.016c vicitraśikhare hy asmin ratavān asmi bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:3397: 2.088.017a anena vanavāsena mayā prāptaṃ phaladvayam 2.088.017c pituś cānṛṇatā dharme bharatasya priyaṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:3398: 2.088.018a vaidehi ramase kaccic citrakūṭe mayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:3400: 2.088.019a idam evāmṛtaṃ prāhū rājñāṃ rājarṣayaḥ pare
GE09ram_02_u:3401: 2.088.019c vanavāsaṃ bhavārthāya pretya me prapitāmahāḥ 2.088.020a śilāḥ śailasya śobhante viśālāḥ śataśo 'bhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3403: 2.088.021a niśi bhānty acalendrasya hutāśanaśikhā iva 2.088.021c oṣadhyaḥ svaprabhā lakṣmyā bhrājamānāḥ sahasraśaḥ 2.088.022a ke cit kṣayanibhā deśāḥ ke cid udyānasaṃnibhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3404: 2.088.022c ke cid ekaśilā bhānti parvatasyāsya bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:3405: 2.088.023a bhittveva vasudhāṃ bhāti citrakūṭaḥ samutthitaḥ 2.088.023c citrakūṭasya kūṭo 'sau dṛśyate sarvataḥ śivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3408: 2.088.025a mṛditāś cāpaviddhāś ca dṛśyante kamalasrajaḥ 2.088.025c kāmibhir vanite paśya phalāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:3411: 2.088.027a imaṃ tu kālaṃ vanite vijahrivāṃs; tvayā ca sīte saha lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_02_u:3412: 2.088.027c ratiṃ prapatsye kuladharmavardhinīṃ; satāṃ pathi svair niyamaiḥ paraiḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3413: 2.089.001a atha śailād viniṣkramya maithilīṃ kosaleśvaraḥ 2.089.001c adarśayac chubhajalāṃ ramyāṃ mandākinīṃ nadīm 2.089.002a abravīc ca varārohāṃ cārucandranibhānanām
GE09ram_02_u:3416: 2.089.003c kusumair upasaṃpannāṃ paśya mandākinīṃ nadīm 2.089.004a nānāvidhais tīraruhair vṛtāṃ puṣpaphaladrumaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3417: 2.089.004c rājantīṃ rājarājasya nalinīm iva sarvataḥ 2.089.005a mṛgayūthanipītāni kaluṣāmbhāṃsi
GE09ram_02_u:3418: 2.089.005c tīrthāni ramaṇīyāni ratiṃ saṃjanayanti me 2.089.006a jaṭājinadharāḥ kāle valkalottaravāsasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3419: 2.089.006c ṛṣayas tv avagāhante nadīṃ mandākinīṃ priye
GE09ram_02_u:3422: 2.089.008a mārutoddhūta śikharaiḥ pranṛtta iva parvataḥ 2.089.008c pādapaiḥ patrapuṣpāṇi sṛjadbhir abhito nadīm 2.089.009a kaccin maṇinikāśodāṃ kaccit pulinaśālinīm
GE09ram_02_u:3423: 2.089.009c kaccit siddhajanākīrṇāṃ paśya mandākinīṃ nadīm 2.089.010a nirdhūtān vāyunā paśya vitatān puṣpasaṃcayān 2.089.010c poplūyamānān aparān paśya tvaṃ jalamadhyagān 2.089.011a tāṃś cātivalgu vacaso rathāṅgāhvayanā dvijāḥ 2.089.011c adhirohanti kalyāṇi niṣkūjantaḥ śubhā giraḥ 2.089.012a darśanaṃ citrakūṭasya mandākinyāś ca śobhane 2.089.012c adhikaṃ puravāsāc ca manye ca tava darśanāt
GE09ram_02_u:3425: 2.089.013c nityavikṣobhita jalāṃ vihāhasva mayā saha 2.089.014a sakhīvac ca vigāhasva sīte mandakinīm imām
GE09ram_02_u:3426: 2.089.014c kamalāny avamajjantī puṣkarāṇi ca bhāmini 2.089.015a tvaṃ paurajanavad vyālān ayodhyām iva parvatam
GE09ram_02_u:3427: 2.089.015c manyasva vanite nityaṃ sarayūvad imāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:3428: 2.089.016a lakṣmaṇaś caiva dharmātmā mannideśe vyavasthitaḥ 2.089.016c tvaṃ cānukūlā vaidehi prītiṃ janayatho mama
GE09ram_02_u:3430: 2.089.017c nāyodhyāyai na rājyāya spṛhaye 'dya tvayā saha 2.089.018a imāṃ hi ramyāṃ gajayūthalolitāṃ; nipītatoyāṃ gajasiṃhavānaraiḥ 2.089.018c supuṣpitaiḥ puṣpadharair alaṃkṛtāṃ; na so 'sti yaḥ syān na
GE09ram_02_u:3431: gatakramaḥ sukhī 2.089.019a itīva rāmo bahusaṃgataṃ vacaḥ; priyā sahāyaḥ saritaṃ prati bruvan 2.089.019c cacāra ramyaṃ nayanāñjanaprabhaṃ; sa citrakūṭaṃ raghuvaṃśavardhanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3433: 2.090.001c sainya reṇuś ca śabdaś ca prādurāstāṃ nabhaḥ spṛśau 2.090.002a etasminn antare trastāḥ śabdena mahatā tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3434: 2.090.002c arditā yūthapā mattāḥ sayūthā dudruvur diśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3435: 2.090.003a sa taṃ sainyasamudbhūtaṃ śabdaṃ śuśrava rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3436: 2.090.003c tāṃś ca vipradrutān sarvān yūthapān anvavaikṣata
GE09ram_02_u:3437: 2.090.004a tāṃś ca vidravato dṛṣṭvā taṃ ca śrutvā sa niḥsvanam
GE09ram_02_u:3438: 2.090.004c uvāca rāmaḥ saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasaṃ 2.090.005a hanta lakṣmaṇa paśyeha sumitrā suprajās tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:3440: 2.090.006a rājā vā rājamātro vā mṛgayām aṭate vane
GE09ram_02_u:3441: 2.090.006c anyad vā śvāpadaṃ kiṃ cit saumitre jñātum arhasi 2.090.006e sarvam etad yathātattvam acirāj jñātum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:3442: 2.090.007a sa lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃtvaritaḥ sālam āruhya puṣpitam
GE09ram_02_u:3443: 2.090.007c prekṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvāḥ pūrvāṃ diśam avaikṣata
GE09ram_02_u:3444: 2.090.008a udaṅmukhaḥ prekṣamāṇo dadarśa mahatīṃ camūm 2.090.008c rathāśvagajasaṃbādhāṃ yattair yuktāṃ padātibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3446: 2.090.009c śaśaṃsa senāṃ rāmāya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3447: 2.090.010a agniṃ saṃśamayatv āryaḥ sītā ca bhajatāṃ guhām
GE09ram_02_u:3448: 2.090.010c sajyaṃ kuruṣva cāpaṃ ca śarāṃś ca kavacaṃ tathā 2.090.011a taṃ rāmaḥ puruṣavyāghro lakṣmaṇaṃ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:3449: 2.090.011c aṅgāvekṣasva saumitre kasyaitāṃ manyase camūm 2.090.012a evam ukktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmāṇo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3450: 2.090.012c didhakṣann iva tāṃ senāṃ ruṣitaḥ pāvako yathā
GE09ram_02_u:3451: 2.090.013a saṃpannaṃ rājyam icchaṃs tu vyaktaṃ prāpyābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_02_u:3452: 2.090.013c āvāṃ hantuṃ samabhyeti kaikeyyā bharataḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3453: 2.090.014a eṣa vai sumahāñ śrīmān viṭapī saṃprakāśate
GE09ram_02_u:3454: 2.090.014c virājaty udgataskandhaḥ kovidāra dhvajo rathe 2.090.015a bhajanty ete yathākāmam aśvān āruhya śīghragān
GE09ram_02_u:3455: 2.090.015c ete bhrājanti saṃhṛṣṭā jagān āruhya sādinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3456: 2.090.016a gṛhītadhanuṣau cāvāṃ giriṃ vīra śrayāvahe 2.090.016c api nau vaśam āgacchet kovidāradhvajo raṇe
GE09ram_02_u:3457: 2.090.017a api drakṣyāmi bharataṃ yatkṛte vyasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:3458: 2.090.017c tvayā rāghava saṃprāptaṃ sītayā ca mayā tathā
GE09ram_02_u:3459: 2.090.018a yannimittaṃ bhavān rājyāc cyuto rāghava śāśvatīm
GE09ram_02_u:3460: 2.090.018c saṃprāpto 'yam arir vīra bharato vadhya eva me
GE09ram_02_u:3461: 2.090.019a bharatasya vadhe doṣaṃ nāhaṃ paśyāmi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:3462: 2.090.019c pūrvāpakariṇāṃ tyāge na hy adharmo vidhīyate
GE09ram_02_u:3463: 2.090.019e etasminn nihate kṛtsnām anuśādhi vasuṃdharām 2.090.020a adya putraṃ hataṃ saṃkhye kaikeyī rājyakāmukā
GE09ram_02_u:3464: 2.090.020c mayā paśyet suduḥkhārtā hastibhagnam iva drumam
GE09ram_02_u:3465: 2.090.021a kaikeyīṃ ca vadhiṣyāmi sānubandhāṃ sabāndhavām 2.090.021c kaluṣeṇādya mahatā medinī parimucyatām
GE09ram_02_u:3466: 2.090.022a adyemaṃ saṃyataṃ krodham asatkāraṃ ca mānada
GE09ram_02_u:3467: 2.090.022c mokṣyāmi śatrusainyeṣu kakṣeṣv iva hutāśanam 2.090.023a adyaitac citrakūṭasya kānanaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ 2.090.023c bhindañ śatruśarīrāṇi kariṣye śoṇitokṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:3468: 2.090.024a śarair nirbhinnahṛdayān kuñjarāṃs turagāṃs tathā 2.090.024c śvāpadāḥ parikarṣantu narāś ca nihatān mayā
GE09ram_02_u:3470: 2.090.025c sasainyaṃ bharataṃ hatvā bhaviṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3471: 2.091.001a susaṃrabdhaṃ tu saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ krodhamūrchitam 2.091.001c rāmas tu parisāntvyātha vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3472: 2.091.002a kim atra dhanuṣā kāryam asinā vā sacarmaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:3473: 2.091.002c maheṣvāse mahāprājñe bharate svayam āgate 2.091.003a prāptakālaṃ yad eṣo 'smān bharato draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_02_u:3474: 2.091.003c asmāsu manasāpy eṣa nāhitaṃ kiṃ cid ācaret
GE09ram_02_u:3475: 2.091.004a vipriyaṃ kṛtapūrvaṃ te bharatena kadā na kim
GE09ram_02_u:3476: 2.091.004c īdṛśaṃ vā bhayaṃ te 'dya bharataṃ yo 'tra śaṅkase
GE09ram_02_u:3477: 2.091.005a na hi te niṣṭhuraṃ vācyo bharato nāpriyaṃ vacaḥ 2.091.005c ahaṃ hy apriyam uktaḥ syāṃ bharatasyāpriye kṛte
GE09ram_02_u:3478: 2.091.006a kathaṃ nu putrāḥ pitaraṃ hanyuḥ kasyāṃ cid āpadi 2.091.006c bhrātā vā bhrātaraṃ hanyāt saumitre prāṇam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3479: 2.091.007a yadi rājyasya hetos tvam imāṃ vācaṃ prabhāṣase
GE09ram_02_u:3480: 2.091.007c vakṣyāmi bharataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājyam asmai pradīyatām
GE09ram_02_u:3481: 2.091.008a ucyamāno hi bharato mayā lakṣmaṇa tattvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3482: 2.091.008c rājyam asmai prayaccheti bāḍham ity eva vakṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3483: 2.091.009a tathokto dharmaśīlena bhrātrā tasya hite rataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3484: 2.091.009c lakṣmaṇaḥ praviveśeva svāni gātrāṇi lajjayā 2.091.010a vrīḍitaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:3485: 2.091.010c eṣa manye mahābāhur ihāsmān draṣṭum āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3487: 2.091.011c imāṃ vāpy eśa vaidehīm atyantasukhasevinīm 2.091.012a etau tau saṃprakāśete gotravantau manoramau 2.091.012c vāyuvegasamau vīra javanau turagottamau
GE09ram_02_u:3488: 2.091.013a sa eṣa sumahākāyaḥ kampate vāhinīmukhe 2.091.013c nāgaḥ śatruṃjayo nāma vṛddhas tātasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3489: 2.091.014a avatīrya tu sālāgrāt tasmāt sa samitiṃjayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3490: 2.091.014c lakṣmaṇaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā tasthau rāmasya pārśvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3491: 2.091.015a bharatenātha saṃdiṣṭā saṃmardo na bhaved iti
GE09ram_02_u:3492: 2.091.015c samantāt tasya śailasya senāvāsam akalpayat 2.091.016a adhyardham ikṣvākucamūr yojanaṃ parvatasya sā 2.091.016c pārśve nyaviśad āvṛtya gajavājirathākulā
GE09ram_02_u:3493: 2.091.017a sā citrakūṭe bharatena senā; dharmaṃ puraskṛtya vidhūya darpam
GE09ram_02_u:3495: 2.092.001a niveśya senāṃ tu vibhuḥ padbhyāṃ pādavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3496: 2.092.001c abhigantuṃ sa kākutstham iyeṣa guruvartakam 2.092.002a niviṣṭa mātre sainye tu yathoddeśaṃ vinītavat
GE09ram_02_u:3497: 2.092.002c bharato bhrātaraṃ vākyaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3498: 2.092.003a kṣipraṃ vanam idaṃ saumya narasaṃghaiḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3499: 2.092.003c lubdhaiś ca sahitair ebhis tvam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:3500: 2.092.004a yāvan na rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇaṃ vā mahābalam
GE09ram_02_u:3501: 2.092.004c vaidehīṃ vā mahābhāgāṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3502: 2.092.005a yāvan na candrasaṃkāśaṃ drakṣyāmi śubham ānanam
GE09ram_02_u:3503: 2.092.005c bhrātuḥ padmapalāśākṣaṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3504: 2.092.006a yāvan na caraṇau bhrātuḥ pārthiva vyañjanānvitau
GE09ram_02_u:3505: 2.092.006c śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi na me śāntir bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3506: 2.092.007a yāvan na rājye rājyārhaḥ pitṛpaitāmahe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3507: 2.092.007c abhiṣekajalaklinno na me śāntir bhaviṣyati 2.092.008a kṛtakṛtyā mahābhāgā vaidehī
GE09ram_02_u:3509: 2.092.009a subhagaś citrakūṭo 'sau girirājopamo giriḥ 2.092.009c yasmin vasati kākutsthaḥ kubera ivanandane 2.092.010a kṛtakāryam idaṃ durgaṃ vanaṃ vyālaniṣevitam 2.092.010c yad adhyāste mahātejā rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3510: 2.092.011a evam uktvā mahātejā bharataḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ 2.092.011c padbhyām eva mahātejāḥ praviveśa mahad vanam
GE09ram_02_u:3511: 2.092.012a sa tāni drumajālāni jātāni girisānuṣu 2.092.012c puṣpitāgrāṇi madhyena jagāma vadatāṃ varaḥ 2.092.013a sa gireś citrakūṭasya sālam āsādya puṣpitam
GE09ram_02_u:3513: 2.092.014a taṃ dṛṣṭvā bharataḥ śrīmān mumoda sahabāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3514: 2.092.014c atra rāma iti jñātvā gataḥ pāram ivāmbhasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3515: 2.092.015a sa citrakūṭe tu girau niśāmya; rāmāśramaṃ puṇyajanopapannam 2.092.015c guhena sārdhaṃ tvarito jagāma; punar niveśyaiva camūṃ mahātmā
GE09ram_02_u:3516: 2.093.001a niviṣṭāyāṃ tu senāyām utsuko bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3517: 2.093.001c jagāma bhrātaraṃ draṣṭuṃ śatrughnam anudarśayan 2.093.002a ṛṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ saṃdiśya mātṝr me śīghram ānaya
GE09ram_02_u:3518: 2.093.002c iti taritam agre sa jāgama guruvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3519: 2.093.003a sumantras tv api śatughnam adūrād anvapadyata
GE09ram_02_u:3520: 2.093.003c rāmadārśanajas tarṣo bharatasyeva tasya ca 2.093.004a gacchann evātha bharatas
GE09ram_02_u:3521: 2.093.004c bhrātuḥ parṇakuṭīṃ śrīmān uṭajaṃ ca dadarśa ha
GE09ram_02_u:3522: 2.093.005a śālāyās tv agratas tasyā dadarśa bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3523: 2.093.005c kāṣṭāni cāvabhagnāni puṣpāṇy avacitāni ca 2.093.006a dadarśa ca vane tasmin mahataḥ saṃcayān kṛtān
GE09ram_02_u:3524: 2.093.006c mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca karīṣaiḥ śītakāraṇāt 2.093.007a gacchan eva mahābāhur dyutimān bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3525: 2.093.007c śatrughnaṃ cābravīd dhṛṣṭas tān amātyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3526: 2.093.008a manye prāptāḥ sma taṃ deśaṃ bharadvājo yam abravīt 2.093.008c nātidūre hi manye 'haṃ nadīṃ mandākinīm itaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3527: 2.093.009a uccair baddhāni cīrāṇi lakṣmaṇena bhaved ayam
GE09ram_02_u:3528: 2.093.009c abhijñānakṛtaḥ panthā vikāle gantum icchatā 2.093.010a idaṃ codāttadantānāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ tarasvinām
GE09ram_02_u:3530: 2.093.011a yam evādhātum icchanti tāpasāḥ satataṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:3531: 2.093.011c tasyāsau dṛśyate dhūmaḥ saṃkulaḥ kṛṣṭavartmanaḥ 2.093.012a atrāhaṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ
GE09ram_02_u:3532: 2.093.012c āryaṃ drakṣyāmi saṃhṛṣṭo maharṣim iva rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:3533: 2.093.013a atha gatvā muhūrtaṃ tu citrakūṭaṃ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3534: 2.093.013c mandākinīm anuprāptas taṃ janaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3535: 2.093.014a jagatyāṃ puruṣavyāghra āste vīrāsane rataḥ 2.093.014c janendro nirjanaṃ prāpya dhin me janma sajīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:3536: 2.093.015a matkṛte vyasanaṃ prāpto lokanātho mahādyutiḥ 2.093.015c sarān kāmān parityajya vane vasati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3537: 2.093.016a iti lokasamākruṣṭaḥ pādeṣv adya prasādayan 2.093.016c rāmasya nipatiṣyāmi sītāyāś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3538: 2.093.017a evaṃ sa vilapaṃs tasmin vane daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3539: 2.093.017c dadarśa mahatīṃ puṇyāṃ parṇaśālāṃ manoramām 2.093.018a sālatālāśvakarṇānāṃ parṇair bahubhir āvṛtām
GE09ram_02_u:3540: 2.093.018c viśālāṃ mṛdubhis tīrṇāṃ kuśair vedim ivādhvare
GE09ram_02_u:3541: 2.093.019a śakrāyudha nikāśaiś ca kārmukair bhārasādhanaiḥ 2.093.019c rukmapṛṣṭhair mahāsāraiḥ śobhitāṃ śatrubādhakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3543: 2.093.020c śobhitāṃ dīptavadanaiḥ sarpair bhogavatīm iva 2.093.021a mahārajatavāsobhyām asibhyāṃ ca virājitām
GE09ram_02_u:3546: 2.093.022c arisaṃghair anādhṛṣyāṃ mṛgaiḥ siṃhaguhām iva 2.093.023a prāgudaksravaṇāṃ vediṃ viśālāṃ dīptapāvakām
GE09ram_02_u:3547: 2.093.023c dadarśa bharatas tatra puṇyāṃ rāmaniveśane 2.093.024a nirīkṣya sa muhūrtaṃ tu dadarśa bharato gurum
GE09ram_02_u:3550: 2.093.025c dadarśa rāmam āsīnam abhitaḥ pāvakopamam 2.093.026a siṃhaskandhaṃ mahābāhuṃ
GE09ram_02_u:3552: 2.093.027a upaviṣṭaṃ mahābāhuṃ brahmāṇam iva śāśvatam 2.093.027c sthaṇḍile darbhasasmtīrṇe sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca 2.093.028a taṃ dṛṣṭvā bharataḥ śrīmān duḥkhamohapariplutaḥ 2.093.028c abhyadhāvata dharmātmā bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3553: 2.093.029a dṛṣṭvā ca vilalāpārto bāṣpasaṃdigdhayā girā 2.093.029c aśaknuvan dhārayituṃ dhairyād vacanam abravīt 2.093.030a yaḥ saṃsadi prakṛtibhir bhaved yukta upāsitum
GE09ram_02_u:3554: 2.093.030c vanyair mṛgair upāsīnaḥ so 'yam āste mamāgrajaḥ 2.093.031a vāsobhir bahusāhasrair yo mahātmā purocitaḥ 2.093.031c mṛgājine so 'yam iha pravaste dharmam ācaran
GE09ram_02_u:3555: 2.093.032a adhārayad yo vividhāś citrāḥ sumanasas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3556: 2.093.032c so 'yaṃ jaṭābhāram imaṃ sahate rāghavaḥ katham 2.093.033a yasya yajñair yathādiṣṭair yukto dharmasya saṃcayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3557: 2.093.033c śarīra kleśasaṃbhūtaṃ sa dharmaṃ parimārgate 2.093.034a candanena mahārheṇa yasyāṅgam upasevitam
GE09ram_02_u:3558: 2.093.034c malena tasyāṅgam idaṃ katham āryasya sevyate
GE09ram_02_u:3559: 2.093.035a mannimittam idaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpto rāmaḥ sukhocitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3560: 2.093.035c dhig jīvitaṃ nṛśaṃsasya mama lokavigarhitam 2.093.036a ity evaṃ vilapan dīnaḥ prasvinnamukhapaṅkajaḥ 2.093.036c pādāv aprāpya rāmasya papāta bharato rudan
GE09ram_02_u:3562: 2.093.037c uktvāryeti sakṛd dīnaṃ punar novāca kiṃ cana
GE09ram_02_u:3563: 2.093.038a bāṣpāpihita kaṇṭhaś ca prekṣya rāmaṃ yaśasvinam
GE09ram_02_u:3564: 2.093.038c āryety evābhisaṃkruśya vyāhartuṃ nāśakat tataḥ 2.093.039a śatrughnaś cāpi rāmasya vavande caraṇau rudan
GE09ram_02_u:3565: 2.093.039c tāv ubhau sa samāliṅgya rāmo 'py aśrūṇy avartayat 2.093.040a tataḥ sumantreṇa guhena caiva; samīyatū rājasutāv araṇye
GE09ram_02_u:3566: 2.093.040c divākaraś caiva niśākaraś ca; yathāmbare śukrabṛhaspatibhyām 2.093.041a tān pārthivān vāraṇayūthapābhān; samāgatāṃs tatra mahaty araṇye
GE09ram_02_u:3567: 2.093.041c vanaukasas te 'pi samīkṣya sarve 'py; aśrūṇy amuñcan pravihāya
GE09ram_02_u:3569: 2.094.001a āghrāya rāmas taṃ mūrdhni pariṣvajya ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3570: 2.094.001c aṅke bharatam āropya paryapṛcchat samāhitaḥ 2.094.002a kva nu te 'bhūt pitā tāta yad araṇyaṃ tvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3571: 2.094.002c na hi tvaṃ jīvatas tasya vanam āgantum arhasi 2.094.003a cirasya bata paśyāmi dūrād bharatam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:3572: 2.094.003c duṣpratīkam araṇye 'smin kiṃ tāta vanam āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3573: 2.094.004a kaccid daśaratho rājā kuśalī satyasaṃgaraḥ 2.094.004c rājasūyāśvamedhānām āhartā
GE09ram_02_u:3574: 2.094.005a sa kaccid brāhmaṇo vidvān dharmanityo mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3575: 2.094.005c ikṣvākūṇām upādhyāyo yathāvat tāta pūjyate 2.094.006a tāta kaccic ca kausalyā sumitrā ca prajāvatī
GE09ram_02_u:3576: 2.094.006c sukhinī kaccid āryā ca devī nandati kaikayī
GE09ram_02_u:3577: 2.094.007a kaccid vinaya saṃpannaḥ kulaputro bahuśrutaḥ 2.094.007c anasūyur anudraṣṭā satkṛtas te purohitaḥ 2.094.008a kaccid agniṣu te yukto vidhijño matimān ṛjuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3578: 2.094.008c hutaṃ ca hoṣyamāṇaṃ ca kāle vedayate sadā
GE09ram_02_u:3579: 2.094.009a iṣvastravarasaṃpannam arthaśāstraviśāradam 2.094.009c sudhanvānam upādhyāyaṃ kaccit tvaṃ tāta manyase
GE09ram_02_u:3580: 2.094.010a kaccid ātma samāḥ śūrāḥ śrutavanto jitendriyāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3581: 2.094.010c kulīnāś ceṅgitajñāś ca kṛtās te tāta mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3582: 2.094.011a mantro vijayamūlaṃ hi rājñāṃ bhavati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:3584: 2.094.012a kaccin nidrāvaśaṃ naiṣi kaccit kāle vibudhyase
GE09ram_02_u:3585: 2.094.012c kac ciṃś cāpararātriṣu cintayasy arthanaipuṇam 2.094.013a kaccin mantrayase naikaḥ kaccin na bahubhiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:3586: 2.094.013c kaccit te mantrito mantro rāṣṭraṃ na paridhāvati
GE09ram_02_u:3587: 2.094.014a kaccid arthaṃ viniścitya laghumūlaṃ mahodayam 2.094.014c kṣipram ārabhase kartuṃ na dīrghayasi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:3588: 2.094.015a kaccit tu sukṛtāny eva kṛtarūpāṇi vā punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3589: 2.094.015c vidus te sarvakāryāṇi na kartavyāni pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3590: 2.094.016a kaccin na tarkair yuktvā vā ye cāpy aparikīrtitāḥ 2.094.016c tvayā vā tava vāmātyair budhyate tāta mantritam
GE09ram_02_u:3591: 2.094.017a kaccit sahasrān mūrkhāṇām ekam icchasi paṇḍitam
GE09ram_02_u:3592: 2.094.017c paṇḍito hy arthakṛcchreṣu kuryān niḥśreyasaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:3593: 2.094.018a sahasrāṇy api mūrkhāṇāṃ yady upāste mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3594: 2.094.018c atha vāpy ayutāny eva nāsti teṣu sahāyatā
GE09ram_02_u:3595: 2.094.019a eko 'py amātyo medhāvī śūro dakṣo vicakṣaṇaḥ 2.094.019c rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā prāpayen mahatīṃ śriyam
GE09ram_02_u:3596: 2.094.020a kaccin mukhyā mahatsv eva madhyameṣu ca madhyamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3597: 2.094.020c jaghanyāś ca jaghanyeṣu bhṛtyāḥ karmasu yojitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3599: 2.094.021c śreṣṭhāñ śreṣṭheṣu kaccit tvaṃ niyojayasi karmasu
GE09ram_02_u:3600: 2.094.022a kaccit tvāṃ nāvajānanti yājakāḥ patitaṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:3603: 2.094.023c śūram aiśvaryakāmaṃ ca yo na hanti sa vadhyate 2.094.024a kaccid dhṛṣṭaś ca śūraś ca dhṛtimān matimāñ śuciḥ 2.094.024c kulīnaś cānuraktaś ca dakṣaḥ senāpatiḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3604: 2.094.025a balavantaś ca kaccit te mukhyā yuddhaviśāradāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3605: 2.094.025c dṛṣṭāpadānā vikrāntās tvayā satkṛtya mānitāḥ 2.094.026a ka cid balasya bhaktaṃ ca vetanaṃ ca yathocitam 2.094.026c saṃprāptakālaṃ dātavyaṃ dadāsi na vilambase 2.094.027a kālātikramaṇe hy eva bhakta vetanayor bhṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3606: 2.094.027c bhartuḥ kupyanti duṣyanti so 'narthaḥ sumahān smṛtaḥ 2.094.028a kaccit sarve 'nuraktās tvāṃ kulaputrāḥ pradhānataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3607: 2.094.028c kaccit prāṇāṃs tavārtheṣu saṃtyajanti samāhitāḥ 2.094.029a kaccij jānapado vidvān dakṣiṇaḥ pratibhānavān 2.094.029c yathoktavādī dūtas te kṛto bharata paṇḍitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3608: 2.094.030a kaccid aṣṭādaśāny eṣu svapakṣe daśa pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:3609: 2.094.030c tribhis tribhir avijñātair vetsi tīrthāni cārakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3610: 2.094.031a kaccid vyapāstān ahitān pratiyātāṃś ca sarvadā
GE09ram_02_u:3612: 2.094.032a kaccin na lokāyatikān brāhmaṇāṃs tāta sevase
GE09ram_02_u:3613: 2.094.032c anartha kuśalā hy ete bālāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3615: 2.094.033c buddhimān vīkṣikīṃ prāpya nirarthaṃ pravadanti te
GE09ram_02_u:3616: 2.094.034a vīrair adhyuṣitāṃ pūrvam asmākaṃ tāta pūrvakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3618: 2.094.035a brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyair vaiśyaiḥ svakarmanirataiḥ sadā 2.094.035c jitendriyair mahotsāhair vṛtāmātyaiḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3620: 2.094.036c kaccit samuditāṃ sphītām ayodhyāṃ parirakṣasi 2.094.037a kaccic caityaśatair juṣṭaḥ suniviṣṭajanākulaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3621: 2.094.037c devasthānaiḥ prapābhiś ca taḍāgaiś copaśobhitaḥ 2.094.038a prahṛṣṭanaranārīkaḥ samājotsavaśobhitaḥ 2.094.038c sukṛṣṭasīmā paśumān hiṃsābhir abhivarjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3623: 2.094.039c kaccij janapadaḥ sphītaḥ sukhaṃ vasati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:3624: 2.094.040a kaccit te dayitāḥ sarve kṛṣigorakṣajīvinaḥ 2.094.040c vārtāyāṃ saṃśritas tāta loko hi sukham edhate
GE09ram_02_u:3625: 2.094.041a teṣāṃ guptiparīhāraiḥ kaccit te bharaṇaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:3626: 2.094.041c rakṣyā hi rājñā dharmeṇa sarve viṣayavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3627: 2.094.042a kaccit striyaḥ sāntvayasi kaccit tāś ca surakṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3628: 2.094.042c kaccin na śraddadhāsyāsāṃ kaccid guhyaṃ na bhāṣase
GE09ram_02_u:3629: 2.094.043a kaccin nāga vanaṃ guptaṃ kuñjarāṇaṃ ca tṛpyasi
GE09ram_02_u:3630: 2.094.043c kaccid darśayase nityaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ vibhūṣitam 2.094.043e utthāyotthāya pūrvāhṇe rājaputro mahāpathe
GE09ram_02_u:3632: 2.094.044c yantraiś ca paripūrṇāni tathā śilpidhanurdharaiḥ 2.094.045a āyas te vipulaḥ kaccit kaccid alpataro vyayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3633: 2.094.045c apātreṣu na te kaccit kośo gacchati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:3634: 2.094.046a devatārthe ca pitrarthe brāhmaṇābhyāgateṣu ca 2.094.046c yodheṣu mitravargeṣu kaccid gacchati te vyayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3635: 2.094.047a kaccid āryo viśuddhātmā kṣāritaś corakarmaṇā 2.094.047c apṛṣṭaḥ śāstrakuśalair na lobhād badhyate śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3636: 2.094.048a gṛhītaś caiva pṛṣṭaś ca kāle dṛṣṭaḥ sakāraṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3637: 2.094.048c kaccin na mucyate coro dhanalobhān nararṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:3638: 2.094.049a vyasane kaccid āḍhyasya dugatasya ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:3639: 2.094.049c arthaṃ virāgāḥ paśyanti tavāmātyā bahuśrutāḥ 2.094.050a yāni mithyābhiśastānāṃ patanty asrāṇi rāghava 2.094.050c tāni putrapaśūn ghnanti prītyartham anuśāsataḥ 2.094.051a kaccid vṛdhāṃś ca bālāṃś ca vaidyamukhyāṃś ca rāghava 2.094.051c dānena manasā vācā tribhir etair bubhūṣase
GE09ram_02_u:3640: 2.094.052a kaccid gurūṃś ca vṛddhāṃś ca tāpasān devatātithīn
GE09ram_02_u:3641: 2.094.052c caityāṃś ca sarvān siddhārthān brāhmaṇāṃś ca namasyasi
GE09ram_02_u:3642: 2.094.053a kaccid arthena vā dharmaṃ dharmaṃ dharmeṇa vā punaḥ 2.094.053c ubhau vā prītilobhena kāmena na vibādhase
GE09ram_02_u:3643: 2.094.054a kaccid arthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:3644: 2.094.054c vibhajya kāle kālajña sarvān bharata sevase
GE09ram_02_u:3645: 2.094.055a kaccit te brāhmaṇāḥ śarma sarvaśāstrārthakovidaḥ 2.094.055c āśaṃsante mahāprājña paurajānapadaiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:3646: 2.094.056a nāstikyam anṛtaṃ krodhaṃ pramādaṃ dīrghasūtratām 2.094.056c adarśanaṃ jñānavatām ālasyaṃ pañcavṛttitām
GE09ram_02_u:3647: 2.094.057a ekacintanam arthānām anarthajñaiś ca mantraṇam 2.094.057c niścitānām anārambhaṃ
GE09ram_02_u:3648: 2.094.058a maṅgalasyāprayogaṃ ca pratyutthānaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ 2.094.058c kaccit tvaṃ varjayasy etān rājadoṣāṃś caturdaśa
GE09ram_02_u:3649: 2.094.059a kaccit svādukṛtaṃ bhojyam eko nāśnāsi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:3651: 2.095.001a rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:3652: 2.095.001c kiṃ me dharmād vihīnasya rājadharmaḥ kariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3654: 2.095.002c jyeṣṭha putre sthite rājan na kanīyān bhaven nṛpaḥ 2.095.003a sa samṛddhāṃ mayā sārdham ayodhyāṃ gaccha rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:3655: 2.095.003c abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ kulasyāsya bhavāya naḥ 2.095.004a rājānaṃ mānuṣaṃ prāhur devatve saṃmato mama
GE09ram_02_u:3656: 2.095.004c yasya dharmārthasahitaṃ vṛttam āhur amānuṣam 2.095.005a kekayasthe ca mayi tu tvayi cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_02_u:3657: 2.095.005c divam ārya gato rājā yāyajūkaḥ satāṃ mataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3658: 2.095.006a uttiṣṭha puruṣavyāghra kriyatām udakaṃ pituḥ 2.095.006c ahaṃ cāyaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ pūrvam eva kṛtodakau
GE09ram_02_u:3659: 2.095.007a priyeṇa kila dattaṃ hi pitṛlokeṣu rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:3660: 2.095.007c akṣayyaṃ bhavatīty āhur bhavāṃś caiva pituḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3661: 2.095.008a tāṃ śrutvā karuṇāṃ vācaṃ pitur maraṇasaṃhitām
GE09ram_02_u:3664: 2.095.009c pragṛhya bāhū rāmo vai puṣpitāgro yathā drumaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3665: 2.095.009e vane paraśunā kṛttas tathā bhuvi papāta ha
GE09ram_02_u:3666: 2.095.010a tathā hi patitaṃ rāmaṃ jagatyāṃ jagatīpatim
GE09ram_02_u:3668: 2.095.011a bhrātaras te maheṣvāsaṃ sarvataḥ śokakarśitam 2.095.011c rudantaḥ saha vaidehyā siṣicuḥ salilena vai
GE09ram_02_u:3669: 2.095.012a sa tu saṃjñāṃ punar labdhvā netrābhyām āsram utsṛjan 2.095.012c upākrāmata kākutsthaḥ kṛpaṇaṃ bahubhāṣitum
GE09ram_02_u:3670: 2.095.013a kiṃ nu tasya mayā kāryaṃ durjātena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:3671: 2.095.013c yo mṛto mama śokena na mayā cāpi saṃskṛtaḥ 2.095.014a aho bharata siddhārtho yena rājā tvayānagha
GE09ram_02_u:3672: 2.095.014c śatrugheṇa ca sarveṣu pretakṛtyeṣu satkṛtaḥ 2.095.015a niṣpradhānām anekāgraṃ narendreṇa vinākṛtām
GE09ram_02_u:3675: 2.095.016c ko nu śāsiṣyati punas tāte lokāntaraṃ gate
GE09ram_02_u:3676: 2.095.017a purā prekṣya suvṛttaṃ māṃ pitā yāny āha sāntvayan 2.095.017c vākyāni tāni śroṣyāmi kutaḥ karṇasukhāny aham
GE09ram_02_u:3677: 2.095.018a evam uktvā sa bharataṃ bhāryām abhyetya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3679: 2.095.019a sīte mṛtas te śvaśuraḥ pitrā hīno 'si lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:3680: 2.095.019c bharato duḥkham ācaṣṭe svargataṃ pṛthivīpatim 2.095.020a sāntvayitvā tu tāṃ rāmo rudantīṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_02_u:3681: 2.095.020c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ tatra duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3684: 2.095.022a sītā purastād vrajatu tvam enām abhito vraja
GE09ram_02_u:3685: 2.095.022c ahaṃ paścād gamiṣyāmi gatir hy eṣā sudāruṇā
GE09ram_02_u:3686: 2.095.023a tato nityānugas teṣāṃ viditātmā mahāmatiḥ 2.095.023c mṛdur dāntaś ca śāntaś ca rāme ca dṛḍha bhaktimān
GE09ram_02_u:3687: 2.095.024a sumantras tair nṛpasutaiḥ sārdham āśvāsya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:3688: 2.095.024c avātārayad ālambya nadīṃ mandākinīṃ śivām 2.095.025a te sutīrthāṃ tataḥ kṛcchrād upāgamya yaśasvinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3689: 2.095.025c nadīṃ mandākinīṃ ramyāṃ sadā puṣpitakānanām 2.095.026a śīghrasrotasam āsādya tīrthaṃ śivam akardamam 2.095.026c siṣicus tūdakaṃ rājñe tata etad bhavatv iti
GE09ram_02_u:3690: 2.095.027a pragṛhya ca mahīpālo jalapūritam añjalim 2.095.027c diśaṃ yāmyām abhimukho rudan vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3691: 2.095.028a etat te rājaśārdūla vimalaṃ toyam akṣayam
GE09ram_02_u:3693: 2.095.029a tato mandākinī tīrāt pratyuttīrya sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3694: 2.095.029c pituś cakāra tejasvī nivāpaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:3696: 2.095.030c nyasya rāmaḥ suduḥkhārto rudan vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3697: 2.095.031a idaṃ bhuṅkṣva mahārājaprīto yad aśanā vayam
GE09ram_02_u:3698: 2.095.031c yadannaḥ puruṣo bhavati tadannās tasya devatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3699: 2.095.032a tatas tenaiva mārgeṇa pratyuttīrya nadītaṭāt 2.095.032c āruroha naravyāghro ramyasānuṃ mahīdharam
GE09ram_02_u:3702: 2.095.034a teṣāṃ tu rudatāṃ śabdāt pratiśrutkābhavad girau
GE09ram_02_u:3703: 2.095.034c bhrātṝṇāṃ saha vaidehyā siṃhānāṃ nardatām iva
GE09ram_02_u:3704: 2.095.035a vijñāya tumulaṃ śabdaṃ trastā bharatasainikāḥ 2.095.035c abruvaṃś cāpi rāmeṇa bharataḥ saṃgato dhruvam
GE09ram_02_u:3705: 2.095.035e teṣām eva mahāñ śabdaḥ śocatāṃ pitaraṃ mṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:3706: 2.095.036a atha vāsān parityajya taṃ sarve 'bhimukhāḥ svanam
GE09ram_02_u:3707: 2.095.036c apy eka manaso jagmur yathāsthānaṃ pradhāvitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3708: 2.095.037a hayair anye gajair anye rathair anye svalaṃkṛtaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3709: 2.095.037c sukumārās tathaivānye padbhir eva narā yayuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3711: 2.095.038c draṣṭukāmo janaḥ sarvo jagāma sahasāśramam 2.095.039a bhrātṝṇāṃ tvaritās te tu draṣṭukāmāḥ samāgamam
GE09ram_02_u:3713: 2.095.040a sā bhūmir bahubhir yānaiḥ khuranemisamāhatā 2.095.040c mumoca tumulaṃ śabdaṃ dyaur ivābhrasamāgame 2.095.041a tena vitrāsitā nāgāḥ kareṇuparivāritāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3714: 2.095.041c āvāsayanto gandhena jagmur anyad vanaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3716: 2.095.042c vyāghra gokarṇagavayā vitreṣuḥ pṛṣataiḥ saha 2.095.043a rathāṅgasāhvā natyūhā haṃsāḥ kāraṇḍavāḥ plavāḥ 2.095.043c tathā puṃskokilāḥ krauñcā visaṃjñā bhejire diśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3717: 2.095.044a tena śabdena vitrastair ākāśaṃ pakṣibhir vṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:3718: 2.095.044c manuṣyair āvṛtā bhūmir ubhayaṃ prababhau tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3719: 2.095.045a tān narān bāṣpapūrṇākṣān samīkṣyātha suduḥkhitān 2.095.045c paryaṣvajata dharmajñaḥ pitṛvan mātṛvac ca saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3720: 2.095.046a sa tatra kāṃś cit pariṣasvaje narān; narāś ca ke cit tu tam
GE09ram_02_u:3722: 2.095.046c cakāra sarvān savayasyabāndhavān; yathārham āsādya tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3724: 2.095.047a tataḥ sa teṣāṃ rudatāṃ mahātmanāṃ; bhuvaṃ ca khaṃ cānuvinādayan svanaḥ 2.095.047c guhā girīṇāṃ ca diśaś ca saṃtataṃ; mṛdaṅgaghoṣapratimo viśuśruve 2.096.001a vasiṣṭhaḥ purataḥ kṛtvā dārān daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:3726: 2.096.002a rājapatnyaś ca gacchantyo mandaṃ mandākinīṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:3727: 2.096.002c dadṛśus tatra tat tīrthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇasevitam 2.096.003a kausalyā bāṣpapūrṇena mukhena pariśuṣyatā
GE09ram_02_u:3728: 2.096.003c sumitrām abravīd dīnā yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3729: 2.096.004a idaṃ teṣām anāthānāṃ kliṣṭam akliṣṭa karmaṇām
GE09ram_02_u:3730: 2.096.004c vane prāk kevalaṃ tīrthaṃ ye te nirviṣayī kṛtāḥ 2.096.005a itaḥ sumitre putras te sadā jalam atandritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3731: 2.096.005c svayaṃ harati saumitrir mama putrasya kāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:3732: 2.096.006a dakṣiṇāgreṣu darbheṣu sā dadarśa mahītale 2.096.006c pitur iṅgudipiṇyākaṃ nyastam
GE09ram_02_u:3733: 2.096.007a taṃ bhūmau pitur ārtena nyastaṃ rāmeṇa vīkṣya sā 2.096.007c uvāca devī kausalyā sarvā daśarathastriyaḥ 2.096.008a idam ikṣvākunāthasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3734: 2.096.008c rāghaveṇa pitur dattaṃ paśyataitad yathāvidhi 2.096.009a tasya devasamānasya pārthivasya mahātmanaḥ
