GE09ram_02_u:3735: 2.096.009c naitad aupayikaṃ manye bhuktabhogasya bhojanam 2.096.010a caturantāṃ mahīṃ bhuktvā mahendra sadṛśo bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:3736: 2.096.010c katham iṅgudipiṇyākaṃ sa bhuṅkte vasudhādhipaḥ 2.096.011a ato duḥkhataraṃ loke na kiṃ cit pratibhāti mā 2.096.011c yatra rāmaḥ pitur dadyād iṅgudīkṣodam ṛddhimān
GE09ram_02_u:3737: 2.096.012a rāmeṇeṅgudipiṇyākaṃ pitur dattaṃ samīkṣya me 2.096.012c kathaṃ duḥkhena hṛdayaṃ na sphoṭati sahasradhā
GE09ram_02_u:3738: 2.096.013a evam ārtāṃ sapatnyas tā jagmur āśvāsya tāṃ tadā 2.096.013c dadṛśuś cāśrame rāmaṃ svargāc cyutam ivāmaram
GE09ram_02_u:3739: 2.096.014a sarvabhogaiḥ parityaktaṃ rāma saṃprekṣya mātaraḥ 2.096.014c ārtā mumucur aśrūṇi sasvaraṃ śokakarśitāḥ 2.096.015a tāsāṃ rāmaḥ samutthāya jagrāha caraṇāñ śubhān
GE09ram_02_u:3741: 2.096.016a tāḥ pāṇibhiḥ sukhasparśair mṛdvaṅgulitalaiḥ śubhaiḥ 2.096.016c pramamārjū rajaḥ pṛṣṭhād rāmasyāyatalocanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3742: 2.096.017a saumitrir api tāḥ sarvā mātṝh saṃprekṣya duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3744: 2.096.018a yathā rāme tathā tasmin sarvā vavṛtire striyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3745: 2.096.018c vṛttiṃ daśarathāj jāte lakṣmaṇe śubhalakṣaṇe 2.096.019a sītāpi caraṇāṃs tāsām upasaṃgṛhya duḥkhitā 2.096.019c śvaśrūṇām aśrupūrṇākṣī sā babhūvāgrataḥ sthitā 2.096.020a tāṃ pariṣvajya duḥkhārtāṃ mātā duhitaraṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:3746: 2.096.020c vanavāsakṛśāṃ dīnāṃ kausalyā vākyam abravīt 2.096.021a videharājasya sutā snuṣā daśarathasya ca 2.096.021c rāmapatnī kathaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃprāptā nirjane vane
GE09ram_02_u:3748: 2.096.022c kāñcanaṃ rajasā dhvastaṃ kliṣṭaṃ candram ivāmbudaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3749: 2.096.023a mukhaṃ te prekṣya māṃ śoko dahaty agnir ivāśrayam 2.096.023c bhṛśaṃ manasi vaidehi
GE09ram_02_u:3750: 2.096.024a bruvantyām evam ārtāyāṃ jananyāṃ bharatāgrajaḥ 2.096.024c pādāv āsādya jagrāha vasiṣṭhasya sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3751: 2.096.025a purohitasyāgnisamasya tasya vai; bṛhaspater indra ivāmarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3752: 2.096.025c pragṛhya pādau susamṛddhatejasaḥ; sahaiva tenopaviveśa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3753: 2.096.026a tato jaghanyaṃ sahitaiḥ sa mantribhiḥ; purapradhānaiś ca sahaiva sainikaiḥ 2.096.026c janena dharmajñatamena dharmavān; upopaviṣṭo bharatas tadāgrajam
GE09ram_02_u:3754: 2.096.027a upopaviṣṭas tu tadā sa vīryavāṃs; tapasviveṣeṇa samīkṣya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:3755: 2.096.027c śriyā jvalantaṃ bharataḥ kṛtāñjalir; yathā mahendraḥ prayataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3757: 2.096.028a kim eṣa vākyaṃ bharato 'dya rāghavaṃ; praṇamya satkṛtya ca
GE09ram_02_u:3758: sādhu vakṣyati 2.096.028c itīva tasyāryajanasya tattvato; babhūva kautūhalam uttamaṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3759: 2.096.029a sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiś ca lakṣmaṇo; mahānubhāvo bharataś ca
GE09ram_02_u:3761: 2.096.029c vṛtāḥ suhṛdbhiś ca virejur adhvare; yathā sadasyaiḥ sahitās
GE09ram_02_u:3763: 2.097.001a taṃ tu rāmaḥ samāśvāsya bhrātaraṃ guruvatsalam
GE09ram_02_u:3764: 2.097.001c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame 2.097.002a kim etad iccheyam ahaṃ śrotuṃ pravyāhṛtaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:3765: 2.097.002c yasmāt tvam āgato deśam imaṃ cīrajaṭājinī
GE09ram_02_u:3767: 2.097.003c hitvā rājyaṃ praviṣṭas tvaṃ tat sarvaṃ vaktum arhasi 2.097.004a ity uktaḥ kekayīputraḥ kākutsthena mahātmanā 2.097.004c pragṛhya balavad bhūyaḥ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3768: 2.097.005a āryaṃ tātaḥ parityajya kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_02_u:3770: 2.097.006a striyā niyuktaḥ kaikeyyā mama mātrā paraṃtapa
GE09ram_02_u:3771: 2.097.006c cakāra sumahat pāpam idam ātmayaśoharam 2.097.007a sā rājyaphalam aprāpya vidhavā śokakarśitā 2.097.007c patiṣyati mahāghore niraye jananī mama 2.097.008a tasya me dāsabhūtasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:3772: 2.097.008c abhiṣiñcasva cādyaiva rājyena maghavān iva 2.097.009a imāḥ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā vidhavā māturaś ca yāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3773: 2.097.009c tvat sakāśam anuprāptāḥ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:3774: 2.097.010a tadānupūrvyā yuktaṃ ca yuktaṃ cātmani mānada
GE09ram_02_u:3775: 2.097.010c rājyaṃ prāpnuhi dharmeṇa sakāmān suhṛdaḥ kuru
GE09ram_02_u:3776: 2.097.011a bhavatv avidhavā bhūmiḥ samagrā patinā tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:3777: 2.097.011c śaśinā vimaleneva śāradī rajanī yathā 2.097.012a ebhiś ca sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ śirasā yācito mayā
GE09ram_02_u:3778: 2.097.012c bhrātuḥ śiṣyasya dāsasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:3779: 2.097.013a tad idaṃ śāśvataṃ pitryaṃ sarvaṃ sacivamaṇḍalam
GE09ram_02_u:3781: 2.097.014a evam uktvā mahābāhuḥ sabāṣpaḥ kekayīsutaḥ 2.097.014c rāmasya śirasā pādau jagrāha bharataḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3782: 2.097.015a taṃ mattam iva mātaṅgaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3783: 2.097.015c bhrātaraṃ bharataṃ rāmaḥ pariṣvajyedam abravīt 2.097.016a kulīnaḥ sattvasaṃpannas tejasvī caritavrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3784: 2.097.016c rājyahetoḥ kathaṃ pāpam ācaret tvadvidho janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3785: 2.097.017a na doṣaṃ tvayi paśyāmi sūkṣmam apy ari sūdana 2.097.017c na cāpi jananīṃ bālyāt tvaṃ vigarhitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:3786: 2.097.018a yāvat pitari dharmajña gauravaṃ lokasatkṛte 2.097.018c tāvad dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha jananyām api gauravam
GE09ram_02_u:3787: 2.097.019a etābhyāṃ dharmaśīlābhyāṃ vanaṃ gaccheti rāghava 2.097.019c mātā pitṛbhyām ukto 'haṃ katham anyat samācare
GE09ram_02_u:3788: 2.097.020a tvayā rājyam ayodhyāyāṃ prāptavyaṃ lokasatkṛtam 2.097.020c vastavyaṃ daṇḍakāraṇye mayā valkalavāsasā
GE09ram_02_u:3789: 2.097.021a evaṃ kṛtvā mahārājo vibhāgaṃ lokasaṃnidhau 2.097.021c vyādiśya ca mahātejā divaṃ daśaratho gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3790: 2.097.022a sa ca pramāṇaṃ dharmātmā rājā lokagurus tava
GE09ram_02_u:3791: 2.097.022c pitrā dattaṃ yathābhāgam upabhoktuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:3792: 2.097.023a caturdaśa samāḥ saumya daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ 2.097.023c upabhokṣye tv ahaṃ dattaṃ bhāgaṃ pitrā mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:3793: 2.097.024a yad abravīn māṃ naralokasatkṛtaḥ; pitā mahātmā vibudhādhipopamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3794: 2.097.024c tad eva manye paramātmano hitaṃ; na sarvalokeśvarabhāvam avyayam
GE09ram_02_u:3795: 2.098.001a tataḥ puruṣasiṃhānāṃ vṛtānāṃ taiḥ suhṛdgaṇaiḥ 2.098.001c śocatām eva rajanī duḥkhena vyatyavartata 2.098.002a rajanyāṃ suprabhātāyāṃ bhrātaras te suhṛdvṛtāḥ 2.098.002c mandākinyāṃ hutaṃ japyaṃ kṛtvā rāmam upāgaman
GE09ram_02_u:3796: 2.098.003a tūṣṇīṃ te samupāsīnā na kaś cit kiṃ cid abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3797: 2.098.003c bharatas tu suhṛnmadhye rāmavacanam abravīt 2.098.004a sāntvitā māmikā mātā dattaṃ rājyam idaṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:3798: 2.098.004c tad dadāmi tavaivāhaṃ bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:3800: 2.098.005c durāvāraṃ tvadanyena rājyakhaṇḍam idaṃ mahat 2.098.006a gatiṃ khara ivāśvasya tārkṣyasyeva patatriṇaḥ 2.098.006c anugantuṃ na śaktir me gatiṃ tava mahīpate
GE09ram_02_u:3801: 2.098.007a sujīvaṃ nityaśas tasya yaḥ parair upajīvyate
GE09ram_02_u:3802: 2.098.007c rāma tena tu durjīvaṃ yaḥ parān upajīvati
GE09ram_02_u:3803: 2.098.008a yathā tu ropito vṛkṣaḥ puruṣeṇa vivardhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3805: 2.098.009a sa yadā puṣpito bhūtvā phalāni na vidarśayet
GE09ram_02_u:3806: 2.098.009c sa tāṃ nānubhavet prītiṃ yasya hetoḥ prabhāvitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3807: 2.098.010a eṣopamā mahābāho tvam arthaṃ vettum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:3808: 2.098.010c yadi tvam asmān ṛṣabho bhartā bhṛtyān na śādhi hi
GE09ram_02_u:3809: 2.098.011a śreṇayas tvāṃ mahārāja paśyantv agryāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3810: 2.098.011c pratapantam ivādityaṃ rājye sthitam ariṃdamam 2.098.012a tavānuyāne kākutṣṭha mattā nardantu kuñjarāḥ 2.098.012c antaḥpura gatā nāryo nandantu susamāhitāḥ 2.098.013a tasya sādhv ity amanyanta nāgarā vividhā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3811: 2.098.013c bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaṃ pratyanuyācataḥ 2.098.014a tam evaṃ duḥkhitaṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ yaśasvinam
GE09ram_02_u:3812: 2.098.014c rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bharataṃ samāśvāsayad ātmavān 2.098.015a nātmanaḥ kāmakāro 'sti puruṣo 'yam anīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3813: 2.098.015c itaś cetarataś cainaṃ kṛtāntaḥ parikarṣati 2.098.016a sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ 2.098.016c saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ ca jīvitam 2.098.017a yathā phalānaṃ pakvānāṃ nānyatra patanād bhayam
GE09ram_02_u:3814: 2.098.017c evaṃ narasya jātasya nānyatra maraṇād bhayam
GE09ram_02_u:3817: 2.098.019a ahorātrāṇi gacchanti sarveṣāṃ prāṇinām iha 2.098.019c āyūṃṣi kṣapayanty āśu grīṣme jalam ivāṃśavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3818: 2.098.020a ātmānam anuśoca tvaṃ kim anyam anuśocasi
GE09ram_02_u:3819: 2.098.020c āyus te hīyate yasya sthitasya ca gatasya ca 2.098.021a sahaiva mṛtyur vrajati saha mṛtyur niṣīdati
GE09ram_02_u:3820: 2.098.021c gatvā sudīrgham adhvānaṃ saha mṛtyur nivartate
GE09ram_02_u:3821: 2.098.022a gātreṣu valayaḥ prāptāḥ śvetāś caiva śiroruhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3822: 2.098.022c jarayā puruṣo jīrṇaḥ kiṃ hi kṛtvā prabhāvayet
GE09ram_02_u:3823: 2.098.023a nandanty udita āditye nandanty astam ite ravau
GE09ram_02_u:3825: 2.098.024a hṛṣyanty ṛtumukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā navaṃ navam ihāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:3827: 2.098.025a yathā kāṣṭhaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca sameyātāṃ mahārṇave
GE09ram_02_u:3828: 2.098.025c sametya ca vyapeyātāṃ kālam āsādya kaṃ cana
GE09ram_02_u:3829: 2.098.026a evaṃ bhāryāś ca putrāś ca jñātayaś ca vasūni ca
GE09ram_02_u:3830: 2.098.026c sametya vyavadhāvanti dhruvo hy eṣāṃ vinābhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3831: 2.098.027a nātra kaś cid yathā bhāvaṃ prāṇī samabhivartate
GE09ram_02_u:3832: 2.098.027c tena tasmin na sāmarthyaṃ pretasyāsty anuśocataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3833: 2.098.028a yathā hi sārthaṃ gacchantaṃ brūyāt kaś cit pathi sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3834: 2.098.028c aham apy āgamiṣyāmi pṛṣṭhato bhavatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:3835: 2.098.029a evaṃ pūrvair gato mārgaḥ pitṛpaitāmaho dhruvaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3836: 2.098.029c tam āpannaḥ kathaṃ śoced yasya nāsti vyatikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3838: 2.098.030c ātmā sukhe niyoktavyaḥ sukhabhājaḥ prajāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3839: 2.098.031a dharmātmā sa śubhaiḥ kṛtsnaiḥ kratubhiś cāptadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3840: 2.098.031c dhūtapāpo gataḥ svargaṃ pitā naḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3841: 2.098.032a bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇāt samyak prajānāṃ paripālanāt 2.098.032c arthādānāc ca dhārmeṇa pitā nas tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3842: 2.098.033a iṣṭvā bahuvidhair yajñair bhogāṃś cāvāpya puṣkalān
GE09ram_02_u:3843: 2.098.033c uttamaṃ cāyur āsādya svar gataḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3844: 2.098.034a sa jīrṇaṃ mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ parityajya pitā hi naḥ 2.098.034c daivīm ṛddhim anuprāpto
GE09ram_02_u:3845: 2.098.035a taṃ tu naivaṃ vidhaḥ kaś cit prājñaḥ śocitum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:3846: 2.098.035c tvadvidho yadvidhaś cāpi śrutavān buddhimattaraḥ 2.098.036a ete bahuvidhāḥ śokā vilāpa rudite tathā
GE09ram_02_u:3847: 2.098.036c varjanīyā hi dhīreṇa sarvāvasthāsu dhīmatā 2.098.037a sa svastho bhava mā śoco yātvā cāvasa tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_02_u:3848: 2.098.037c tathā pitrā niyukto 'si vaśinā vadatāmv vara
GE09ram_02_u:3849: 2.098.038a yatrāham api tenaiva niyuktaḥ puṇyakarmaṇā 2.098.038c tatraivāhaṃ kariṣyāmi pitur āryasya śāsanam 2.098.039a na mayā śāsanaṃ tasya tyaktuṃ nyāyyam ariṃdama
GE09ram_02_u:3850: 2.098.039c tat tvayāpi sadā mānyaṃ sa vai bandhuḥ sa naḥ pitā
GE09ram_02_u:3851: 2.098.040a evam uktvā tu virate rāme vacanam arthavat
GE09ram_02_u:3852: 2.098.040c uvāca bharataś citraṃ dhārmiko dhārmikaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3853: 2.098.041a ko hi syād īdṛśo loke yādṛśas tvam ariṃdama 2.098.041c na tvāṃ pravyathayed duḥkhaṃ prītir vā na praharṣayet 2.098.042a saṃmataś cāsi vṛddhānāṃ tāṃś ca pṛcchasi saṃśayān
GE09ram_02_u:3854: 2.098.042c yathā mṛtas tathā jīvan yathāsati tathā sati
GE09ram_02_u:3855: 2.098.043a yasyaiṣa buddhilābhaḥ syāt paritapyeta kena saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3856: 2.098.043c sa evaṃ vyasanaṃ prāpya na viṣīditum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:3858: 2.098.044c sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca buddhimāṃś cāsi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:3859: 2.098.045a na tvām evaṃ guṇair yuktaṃ prabhavābhavakovidam
GE09ram_02_u:3861: 2.098.046a proṣite mayi yat pāpaṃ mātrā matkāraṇāt kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:3862: 2.098.046c kṣudrayā tad aniṣṭaṃ me prasīdatu bhavān mama
GE09ram_02_u:3864: 2.098.047c hanmi tīvreṇa daṇḍena daṇḍārhāṃ pāpakāriṇīm 2.098.048a kathaṃ daśarathāj jātaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3865: 2.098.048c jānan dharmam adharmiṣṭhaṃ kuryāṃ karma jugupsitam
GE09ram_02_u:3866: 2.098.049a guruḥ kriyāvān vṛddhaś ca rājā pretaḥ piteti ca 2.098.049c tātaṃ na parigarheyaṃ daivataṃ ceti saṃsadi
GE09ram_02_u:3867: 2.098.050a ko hi dharmārthayor hīnam īdṛśaṃ karma kilbiṣam
GE09ram_02_u:3868: 2.098.050c striyāḥ priyacikīrṣuḥ san kuryād dharmajña dharmavit
GE09ram_02_u:3869: 2.098.051a antakāle hi bhūtāni muhyantīti purāśrutiḥ 2.098.051c rājñaivaṃ kurvatā loke pratyakṣā sā śrutiḥ kṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:3870: 2.098.052a sādhv artham abhisaṃdhāya krodhān mohāc ca sāhasāt
GE09ram_02_u:3871: 2.098.052c tātasya yad atikrāntaṃ pratyāharatu tad bhavān
GE09ram_02_u:3872: 2.098.053a pitur hi samatikrāntaṃ putro yaḥ sādhu manyate
GE09ram_02_u:3873: 2.098.053c tad apatyaṃ mataṃ loke viparītam ato 'nyathā
GE09ram_02_u:3874: 2.098.054a tad apatyaṃ bhavān astu mā bhavān duṣkṛtaṃ pituḥ 2.098.054c abhipat tat kṛtaṃ karma loke dhīravigarhitam
GE09ram_02_u:3875: 2.098.055a kaikeyīṃ māṃ ca tātaṃ ca suhṛdo bāndhavāṃś ca naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3876: 2.098.055c paurajānapadān sarvāṃs trātu sarvam idaṃ bhavān
GE09ram_02_u:3877: 2.098.056a kva cāraṇyaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ kva jaṭāḥ kva ca pālanam
GE09ram_02_u:3878: 2.098.056c īdṛśaṃ vyāhataṃ karma na bhavān kartum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:3879: 2.098.057a atha kleśajam eva tvaṃ dharmaṃ caritum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:3880: 2.098.057c dharmeṇa caturo varṇān pālayan kleśam āpnuhi
GE09ram_02_u:3881: 2.098.058a caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ hi gārhasthyaṃ śreṣṭham āśramam
GE09ram_02_u:3882: 2.098.058c āhur dharmajña dharmajñās taṃ kathaṃ tyaktum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:3883: 2.098.059a śrutena bālaḥ sthānena janmanā bhavato hy aham
GE09ram_02_u:3884: 2.098.059c sa kathaṃ pālayiṣyāmi bhūmiṃ bhavati tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_02_u:3885: 2.098.060a hīnabuddhiguṇo bālo hīnaḥ sthānena cāpy aham
GE09ram_02_u:3886: 2.098.060c bhavatā ca vinā bhūto na vartayitum utsahe
GE09ram_02_u:3887: 2.098.061a idaṃ nikhilam avyagraṃ pitryaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:3888: 2.098.061c anuśādhi svadharmeṇa dharmajña saha bāndhavaiḥ 2.098.062a ihaiva tvābhiṣiñcantu dharmajña saha bāndhavaiḥ 2.098.062c ṛtvijaḥ savasiṣṭhāś ca mantravan mantrakovidāḥ 2.098.063a abhiṣiktas tvam asmābhir ayodhyāṃ pālane vraja
GE09ram_02_u:3889: 2.098.063c vijitya tarasā lokān marudbhir iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3890: 2.098.064a ṛṇāni trīṇy apākurvan durhṛdaḥ sādhu nirdahan
GE09ram_02_u:3891: 2.098.064c suhṛdas tarpayan kāmais tvam evātrānuśādhi mām
GE09ram_02_u:3893: 2.098.065c adya bhītāḥ pālayantāṃ durhṛdas te diśo daśa
GE09ram_02_u:3894: 2.098.066a ākrośaṃ mama mātuś ca pramṛjya puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:3895: 2.098.066c adya tatra bhavantaṃ ca pitaraṃ rakṣa kilbiṣāt
GE09ram_02_u:3897: 2.098.067c bāndhaveṣu ca sarveṣu bhūteṣv iva maheśvaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3898: 2.098.068a atha vā pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā vanam eva bhavān itaḥ 2.098.068c gamiṣyati gamiṣyāmi bhavatā sārdham apy aham
GE09ram_02_u:3899: 2.098.069a tathāpi rāmo bharatena tāmyata; prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3900: 2.098.069c na caiva cakre gamanāya sattvavān; matiṃ pitus tadvacane
GE09ram_02_u:3902: 2.098.070a tad adbhutaṃ sthairyam avekṣya rāghave; samaṃ jano harṣam avāpa duḥkhitaḥ 2.098.070c na yāty ayodhyām iti duḥkhito 'bhavat; sthirapratijñatvam avekṣya harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3903: 2.098.071a tam ṛtvijo naigamayūthavallabhās; tathā visaṃjñāśrukalāś ca
GE09ram_02_u:3905: 2.098.071c tathā bruvāṇaṃ bharataṃ pratuṣṭuvuḥ; praṇamya rāmaṃ ca yayācire saha 2.099.001a punar evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu bharataṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3907: 2.099.002a upapannam idaṃ vākyaṃ yat tvam evam abhāṣathāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3908: 2.099.002c jātaḥ putro daśarathāt kaikeyyāṃ rājasattamāt 2.099.003a purā bhrātaḥ pitā naḥ sa mātaraṃ te samudvahan 2.099.003c mātāmahe samāśrauṣīd rājyaśulkam anuttamam
GE09ram_02_u:3909: 2.099.004a devāsure ca saṃgrāme jananyai tava pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3910: 2.099.004c saṃprahṛṣṭo dadau rājā varam ārādhitaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3911: 2.099.005a tataḥ sā saṃpratiśrāvya tava mātā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:3912: 2.099.005c ayācata naraśreṣṭhaṃ dvau varau varavarṇinī 2.099.006a tava rājyaṃ naravyāghra mama pravrājanaṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:3913: 2.099.006c tac ca rājā tathā tasyai niyuktaḥ pradadau varam 2.099.007a tena pitrāham apy atra niyuktaḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:3914: 2.099.007c caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi varadānikam 2.099.008a so 'haṃ vanam idaṃ prāpto nirjanaṃ lakṣmaṇānvitaḥ 2.099.008c śītayā cāpratidvandvaḥ satyavāde sthitaḥ pituḥ 2.099.009a bhavān api tathety eva pitaraṃ satyavādinam
GE09ram_02_u:3915: 2.099.009c kartum arhati rājendraṃ kṣipram evābhiṣecanāt 2.099.010a ṛṇān mocaya rājānaṃ matkṛte bharata prabhum
GE09ram_02_u:3916: 2.099.010c pitaraṃ trāhi dharmajña mātaraṃ cābhinandaya 2.099.011a śrūyate hi purā tāta śrutir gītā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:3917: 2.099.011c gayena yajamānena gayeṣv eva pitṝn prati
GE09ram_02_u:3918: 2.099.012a puṃ nāmnā narakād yasmāt pitaraṃ trāyate sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3919: 2.099.012c tasmāt putra iti proktaḥ pitṝn yat pāti vā sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3920: 2.099.013a eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā guṇavanto bahuśrutāḥ 2.099.013c teṣāṃ vai samavetānām api kaś cid gayāṃ vrajet 2.099.014a evaṃ rājarṣayaḥ sarve pratītā rājanandana 2.099.014c tasmāt trāhi naraśreṣṭha pitaraṃ narakāt prabho
GE09ram_02_u:3921: 2.099.015a ayodhyāṃ gaccha bharata prakṛtīr anurañjaya 2.099.015c śatrughna sahito vīra saha sarvair dvijātibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3922: 2.099.016a pravekṣye daṇḍakāraṇyam aham apy avilambayan 2.099.016c ābhyāṃ tu sahito rājan vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_02_u:3923: 2.099.017a tvaṃ rājā bhava bharata svayaṃ narāṇāṃ; vanyānām aham api
GE09ram_02_u:3924: rājarāṇ mṛgāṇām 2.099.017c gaccha tvaṃ puravaram adya saṃprahṛṣṭaḥ; saṃhṛṣṭas tv aham api daṇḍakān pravekṣye
GE09ram_02_u:3925: 2.099.018a chāyāṃ te dinakarabhāḥ prabādhamānaṃ; varṣatraṃ bharata karotu
GE09ram_02_u:3926: mūrdhni śītām 2.099.018c eteṣām aham api kānanadrumāṇāṃ; chāyāṃ tām atiśayinīṃ sukhaṃ śrayiṣye 2.099.019a śatrughnaḥ kuśalamatis tu te sahāyaḥ; saumitrir mama viditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3928: 2.099.019c catvāras tanayavarā vayaṃ narendraṃ; satyasthaṃ bharata carāma
GE09ram_02_u:3929: mā viṣādam 2.100.001a āśvāsayantaṃ bharataṃ jābālir brāhmaṇottamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3930: 2.100.001c uvāca rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ dharmāpetam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3931: 2.100.002a sādhu rāghava mā bhūt te buddhir evaṃ nirarthakā 2.100.002c prākṛtasya narasyeva ārya buddhes tapasvinaḥ 2.100.003a kaḥ kasya puruṣo bandhuḥ kim āpyaṃ kasya kena cit
GE09ram_02_u:3932: 2.100.003c yad eko jāyate jantur eka eva vinaśyati
GE09ram_02_u:3933: 2.100.004a tasmān mātā pitā ceti rāma sajjeta yo naraḥ 2.100.004c unmatta iva sa jñeyo nāsti kācid dhi kasya cit
GE09ram_02_u:3934: 2.100.005a yathā grāmāntaraṃ gacchan naraḥ kaś cit kva cid vaset
GE09ram_02_u:3936: 2.100.006a evam eva manuṣyāṇāṃ pitā mātā gṛhaṃ vasu
GE09ram_02_u:3937: 2.100.006c āvāsamātraṃ kākutstha sajjante nātra sajjanāḥ 2.100.007a pitryaṃ rājyaṃ samutsṛjya sa nārhati narottama
GE09ram_02_u:3938: 2.100.007c āsthātuṃ kāpathaṃ duḥkhaṃ viṣamaṃ bahukaṇṭakam 2.100.008a samṛddhāyām ayodhyāyām ātmānam abhiṣecaya
GE09ram_02_u:3939: 2.100.008c ekaveṇīdharā hi tvāṃ nagarī saṃpratīkṣate 2.100.009a rājabhogān anubhavan mahārhān
GE09ram_02_u:3940: 2.100.009c vihara tvam ayodhyāyāṃ yathā śakras triviṣṭape
GE09ram_02_u:3941: 2.100.010a na te kaś cid daśarataḥs tvaṃ ca tasya na kaś cana 2.100.010c anyo rājā tvam anyaś ca tasmāt kuru yad ucyate
GE09ram_02_u:3942: 2.100.011a gataḥ sa nṛpatis tatra gantavyaṃ yatra tena vai 2.100.011c pravṛttir eṣā martyānāṃ tvaṃ tu mithyā vihanyase
GE09ram_02_u:3943: 2.100.012a arthadharmaparā ye ye tāṃs tāñ śocāmi netarān
GE09ram_02_u:3944: 2.100.012c te hi duḥkham iha prāpya vināśaṃ pretya bhejire 2.100.013a aṣṭakā pitṛdaivatyam ity ayaṃ prasṛto janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3945: 2.100.013c annasyopadravaṃ paśya mṛto hi kim aśiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3946: 2.100.014a yadi bhuktam ihānyena deham anyasya gacchati
GE09ram_02_u:3947: 2.100.014c dadyāt pravasataḥ śrāddhaṃ na tat pathy aśanaṃ bhavet 2.100.015a dānasaṃvananā hy ete granthā medhāvibhiḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3948: 2.100.015c yajasva dehi dīkṣasva tapas tapyasva saṃtyaja
GE09ram_02_u:3949: 2.100.016a sa nāsti param ity eva kuru buddhiṃ mahāmate 2.100.016c pratyakṣaṃ yat tad ātiṣṭha parokṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kuru
GE09ram_02_u:3951: 2.100.017c rājyaṃ tvaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva bharatena prasāditaḥ 2.101.001a jābāles tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ satyātmanāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3952: 2.101.001c uvāca parayā yuktyā svabuddhyā cāvipannayā 2.101.002a bhavān me priyakāmārthaṃ vacanaṃ yad ihoktavān
GE09ram_02_u:3955: 2.101.003c mānaṃ na labhate satsu bhinnacāritradarśanaḥ 2.101.004a kulīnam akulīnaṃ vā vīraṃ puruṣamāninam 2.101.004c cāritram eva vyākhyāti śuciṃ vā yadi vāśucim
GE09ram_02_u:3956: 2.101.005a anārays tv ārya saṃkāśaḥ śaucād dhīnas tathā śuciḥ 2.101.005c lakṣaṇyavad alakṣaṇyo duḥśīlaḥ śīlavān iva 2.101.006a adharmaṃ dharmaveṣeṇa yadīmaṃ lokasaṃkaram
GE09ram_02_u:3959: 2.101.007c bahu maṃsyati māṃ loke durvṛttaṃ lokadūṣaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:3960: 2.101.008a kasya yāsyāmy ahaṃ vṛttaṃ kena vā svargam āpnuyām 2.101.008c anayā vartamāno 'haṃ vṛttyā hīnapratijñayā 2.101.009a kāmavṛttas tv ayaṃ lokaḥ kṛtsnaḥ samupavartate
GE09ram_02_u:3961: 2.101.009c yadvṛttāḥ santi rājānas tadvṛttāḥ santi hi prajāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3962: 2.101.010a satyam evānṛśaṃsyaṃ ca rājavṛttaṃ sanātanam 2.101.010c tasmāt satyātmakaṃ rājyaṃ satye lokaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3963: 2.101.011a ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca satyam eva hi menire 2.101.011c satyavādī hi loke 'smin paramaṃ gacchati kṣayam
GE09ram_02_u:3964: 2.101.012a udvijante yathā sarpān narād anṛtavādinaḥ 2.101.012c dharmaḥ satyaṃ paro loke mūlaṃ svargasya cocyate
GE09ram_02_u:3965: 2.101.013a satyam eveśvaro loke satyaṃ padmā samāśritā
GE09ram_02_u:3966: 2.101.013c satyamūlāni sarvāṇi satyān nāsti paraṃ padam
GE09ram_02_u:3967: 2.101.014a dattam iṣṭaṃ hutaṃ caiva taptāni ca tapāṃsi ca 2.101.014c vedāḥ satyapratiṣṭhānās tasmāt satyaparo bhavet 2.101.015a ekaḥ pālayate lokam ekaḥ pālayate kulam
GE09ram_02_u:3968: 2.101.015c majjaty eko hi niraya ekaḥ svarge mahīyate
GE09ram_02_u:3969: 2.101.016a so 'haṃ pitur nideśaṃ tu kimarthaṃ nānupālaye 2.101.016c satyapratiśravaḥ satyaṃ satyena samayīkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3970: 2.101.017a naiva lobhān na mohād vā na cājñānāt tamo'nvitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3971: 2.101.017c setuṃ satyasya bhetsyāmi guroḥ satyapratiśravaḥ 2.101.018a asatyasaṃdhasya sataś
GE09ram_02_u:3972: 2.101.018c naiva devā na pitaraḥ pratīcchantīti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:3973: 2.101.019a pratyagātmam imaṃ dharmaṃ satyaṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:3974: 2.101.019c bhāraḥ satpuruṣācīrṇas tad artham abhinandyate 2.101.020a kṣātraṃ dharmam ahaṃ tyakṣye hy adharmaṃ dharmasaṃhitam
GE09ram_02_u:3975: 2.101.020c kṣudraur nṛśaṃsair lubdhaiś ca sevitaṃ pāpakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3976: 2.101.021a kāyena kurute pāpaṃ manasā saṃpradhārya ca
GE09ram_02_u:3977: 2.101.021c anṛtaṃ jihvayā cāha trividhaṃ karma pātakam
GE09ram_02_u:3978: 2.101.022a bhūmiḥ kīrtir yaśo lakṣmīḥ puruṣaṃ prārthayanti hi
GE09ram_02_u:3979: 2.101.022c svargasthaṃ cānubadhnanti satyam eva bhajeta tat
GE09ram_02_u:3980: 2.101.023a śreṣṭhaṃ hy anāryam eva syād yad bhavān avadhārya mām
GE09ram_02_u:3981: 2.101.023c āha yuktikarair vākyair idaṃ bhadraṃ kuruṣva ha
GE09ram_02_u:3982: 2.101.024a kathaṃ hy ahaṃ pratijñāya vanavāsam imaṃ guroḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3983: 2.101.024c bharatasya kariṣyāmi vaco hitvā guror vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3984: 2.101.025a sthirā mayā pratijñātā pratijñā gurusaṃnidhau 2.101.025c prahṛṣṭamānasā devī kaikeyī cābhavat tadā 2.101.026a vanavāsaṃ vasann evaṃ śucir niyatabhojanaḥ 2.101.026c mūlaiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pitṝn devāṃś ca tarpayan 2.101.027a saṃtuṣṭapañcavargo 'haṃ lokayātrāṃ pravartaye 2.101.027c akuhaḥ śraddadhānaḥ san kāryākāryavicakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3985: 2.101.028a karmabhūmim imāṃ prāpya kartavyaṃ karma yac chubham
GE09ram_02_u:3986: 2.101.028c agnir vāyuś ca somaś ca karmaṇāṃ phalabhāginaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3987: 2.101.029a śataṃ kratūnām āhṛtya devarāṭ tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3988: 2.101.029c tapāṃsy ugrāṇi cāsthāya divaṃ yātā maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3989: 2.101.030a satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca; bhūtānukampāṃ priyavāditāṃ ca
GE09ram_02_u:3990: 2.101.030c dvijātidevātithipūjanaṃ ca; panthānam āhus tridivasya santaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3991: 2.101.031a dharme ratāḥ satpuruṣaiḥ sametās; tejasvino dānaguṇapradhānāḥ 2.101.031c ahiṃsakā vītamalāś ca loke; bhavanti pūjyā munayaḥ pradhānāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3992: 2.102.001a kruddham ājñāya rāma tu vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:3993: 2.102.001c jābālir api jānīte lokasyāsya gatāgatim 2.102.001e nivartayitu kāmas tu tvām etad vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3994: 2.102.002a imāṃ lokasamutpattiṃ lokanātha nibodha me 2.102.002c sarvaṃ salilam evāsīt pṛthivī yatra nirmitā
GE09ram_02_u:3995: 2.102.002e tataḥ samabhavad brahmā svayambhūr daivataiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:3996: 2.102.003a sa varāhas tato bhūtvā projjahāra vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:3997: 2.102.003c asṛjac ca jagat sarvaṃ saha putraiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3998: 2.102.004a ākāśaprabhavo brahmā śāśvato nitya avyayaḥ 2.102.004c tasmān marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3999: 2.102.005a vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe manur vaivastavaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4000: 2.102.005c sa tu prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākus tu manoḥ sutaḥ 2.102.006a yasyeyaṃ prathamaṃ dattā samṛddhā manunā mahī
GE09ram_02_u:4001: 2.102.006c tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyāṃ rājānaṃ viddhi pūrvakam
GE09ram_02_u:4002: 2.102.007a ikṣvākos tu sutaḥ śrīmān kukṣir eveti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4003: 2.102.007c kukṣer athātmajo vīro vikukṣir udapadyata 2.102.008a vikukṣes tu mahātejā bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:4004: 2.102.008c bāṇasya tu mahābāhur anaraṇyo mahāyaśāḥ 2.102.009a nānā vṛṣṭir babhūvāsmin na durbhikṣaṃ satāṃ vare
GE09ram_02_u:4005: 2.102.009c anaraṇye mahārāje taskaro vāpi kaś cana
GE09ram_02_u:4006: 2.102.010a anaraṇyān mahābāhuḥ pṛthū rājā babhūva ha
GE09ram_02_u:4007: 2.102.010c tasmāt pṛthor mahārājas triśaṅkur udapadyata 2.102.010e sa satyavacanād vīraḥ saśarīro divaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4008: 2.102.011a triśaṅkor abhavat sūnur dhundhumāro mahāyaśāḥ 2.102.011c dhundhumārān mahātejā yuvanāśvo vyajāyata
GE09ram_02_u:4009: 2.102.012a yuvanāśva sutaḥ śrīmān māndhātā samapadyata 2.102.012c māndhātus tu mahātejāḥ susaṃdhir udapadyata 2.102.013a susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit
GE09ram_02_u:4010: 2.102.013c yaśasvī dhruvasaṃdhes tu bharato ripusūdanaḥ 2.102.014a bharatāt tu mahābāhor asito nāma jāyata
GE09ram_02_u:4012: 2.102.014e haihayās tālajaṅghāś ca śūrāś ca śaśabindavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4013: 2.102.015a tāṃs tu sarvān prativyūhya yuddhe rājā pravāsitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4014: 2.102.015c sa ca śailavare ramye babhūvābhirato muniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4015: 2.102.015e dve cāsya bhārye garbhiṇyau babhūvatur iti śrutiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4016: 2.102.016a bhārgavaś cyavano nāma himavantam upāśritaḥ 2.102.016c tam ṛṣiṃ samupāgamya kālindī tv abhyavādayat
GE09ram_02_u:4017: 2.102.017a sa tām abhyavadad vipro varepsuṃ putrajanmani
GE09ram_02_u:4018: 2.102.017c tataḥ sā gṛham āgamya devī putraṃ vyajāyata
GE09ram_02_u:4019: 2.102.018a sapatnyā tu garas tasyai datto garbhajighāṃsayā
GE09ram_02_u:4020: 2.102.018c gareṇa saha tenaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat
GE09ram_02_u:4021: 2.102.019a sa rājā sagaro nāma yaḥ samudram akhānayat
GE09ram_02_u:4022: 2.102.019c iṣṭvā parvaṇi vegena trāsayantam imāḥ prajāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4023: 2.102.020a asamañjas tu putro 'bhūt sagarasyeti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:4024: 2.102.020c jīvann eva sa pitrā tu nirastaḥ pāpakarmakṛt
GE09ram_02_u:4025: 2.102.021a aṃśumān iti putro 'bhūd asamañjasya vīryavān 2.102.021c dilīpo 'ṃśumataḥ putro dilīpasya bhagīrathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4026: 2.102.022a bhagīrathāt kakutsthas tu kākutsthā yena tu smṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4027: 2.102.022c kakutsthasya tu putro 'bhūd raghur yena tu rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4028: 2.102.023a raghos tu putras tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4029: 2.102.023c kalmāṣapādaḥ saudāsa ity evaṃ prathito bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:4031: 2.102.024c yas tu tad vīryam āsādya sahaseno vyanīnaśat
GE09ram_02_u:4032: 2.102.025a śaṅkhaṇasya tu putro 'bhūc chūraḥ śrīmān sudarśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4034: 2.102.026a śīghragasya maruḥ putro maroḥ putraḥ praśuśrukaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4035: 2.102.026c praśuśrukasya putro 'bhūd ambarīṣo mahādyutiḥ 2.102.027a ambarīṣasya putro 'bhūn nahuṣaḥ satyavikramaḥ 2.102.027c nahuṣasya ca nābhāgaḥ putraḥ paramadhārmikaḥ 2.102.028a ajaś ca suvrataś caiva nābhāgasya sutāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:4036: 2.102.028c ajasya caiva dharmātmā rājā daśarathaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4037: 2.102.029a tasya jyeṣṭho 'si dāyādo rāma ity abhiviśrutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4038: 2.102.029c tad gṛhāṇa svakaṃ rājyam avekṣasva jagan nṛpa
GE09ram_02_u:4039: 2.102.030a ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ rājā bhavati pūrvajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4041: 2.102.031a sa rāghavāṇāṃ kuladharmam ātmanaḥ; sanātanaṃ nādya vihātum
GE09ram_02_u:4043: 2.102.031c prabhūtaratnām anuśādhi medinīṃ; prabhūtarāṣṭrāṃ pitṛvan mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4044: 2.103.001a vasiṣṭhas tu tadā rāmam uktvā rājapurohitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4045: 2.103.001c abravīd dharmasaṃyuktaṃ punar evāparaṃ vacaḥ 2.103.002a puruṣasyeha jātasya bhavanti guravas trayaḥ 2.103.002c ācāryaś caiva kākutstha pitā mātā ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:4046: 2.103.003a pitā hy enaṃ janayati puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:4047: 2.103.003c prajñāṃ dadāti cācāryas tasmāt sa gurur ucyate
GE09ram_02_u:4048: 2.103.004a sa te 'haṃ pitur ācāryas tava caiva paraṃtapa 2.103.004c mama tvaṃ vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim
GE09ram_02_u:4049: 2.103.005a imā hi te pariṣadaḥ śreṇayaś ca samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4050: 2.103.005c eṣu tāta caran dharmaṃ nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim
GE09ram_02_u:4051: 2.103.006a vṛddhāyā dharmaśīlāyā mātur nārhasy avartitum 2.103.006c asyās tu vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim
GE09ram_02_u:4052: 2.103.007a bharatasya vacaḥ kurvan yācamānasya rāghava 2.103.007c ātmānaṃ nātivartes tvaṃ
GE09ram_02_u:4053: 2.103.008a evaṃ madhuram uktas tu guruṇā rāghavaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:4055: 2.103.009a yan mātāpitarau vṛttaṃ tanaye kurutaḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:4056: 2.103.009c na supratikaraṃ tat tu mātrā pitrā ca yat kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:4057: 2.103.010a yathāśakti pradānena snāpanāc chādanena ca 2.103.010c nityaṃ ca priyavādena tathā saṃvardhanena ca
GE09ram_02_u:4058: 2.103.011a sa hi rājā janayitā pitā daśaratho mama
GE09ram_02_u:4059: 2.103.011c ājñātaṃ yan mayā tasya na tan mithyā bhaviṣyati 2.103.012a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa bharataḥ pratyanantaram
GE09ram_02_u:4061: 2.103.013a iha me sthaṇḍile śīghraṃ kuśān āstara sārathe
GE09ram_02_u:4062: 2.103.013c āryaṃ pratyupavekṣyāmi yāvan me na prasīdati
GE09ram_02_u:4063: 2.103.014a anāhāro nirāloko dhanahīno yathā dvijaḥ 2.103.014c śeṣye purastāc chālāyā yāvan na pratiyāsyati
GE09ram_02_u:4064: 2.103.015a sa tu rāmam avekṣantaṃ sumantraṃ prekṣya durmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4065: 2.103.015c kuśottaram upasthāpya bhūmāv evāstarat svayam 2.103.016a tam uvāca mahātejā rāmo rājarṣisattamāḥ 2.103.016c kiṃ māṃ bharata kurvāṇaṃ tāta pratyupavekṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:4066: 2.103.017a brāhmaṇo hy ekapārśvena narān roddhum ihārhati
GE09ram_02_u:4067: 2.103.017c na tu mūrdhāvasiktānāṃ vidhiḥ pratyupaveśane 2.103.018a uttiṣṭha naraśārdūla hitvaitad dāruṇaṃ vratam 2.103.018c puravaryām itaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ yāhi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:4068: 2.103.019a āsīnas tv eva bharataḥ paurajānapadaṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:4069: 2.103.019c uvāca sarvataḥ prekṣya kim āryaṃ nānuśāsatha
GE09ram_02_u:4070: 2.103.020a te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4071: 2.103.020c kākutstham abhijānīmaḥ samyag vadati rāghavaḥ 2.103.021a eṣo 'pi hi mahābhāgaḥ pitur vacasi tiṣṭhati 2.103.021c ata eva na śaktāḥ smo vyāvartayitum añjasā
GE09ram_02_u:4072: 2.103.022a teṣām ājñāya vacanaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:4073: 2.103.022c evaṃ nibodha vacanaṃ suhṛdāṃ dharmacakṣuṣām 2.103.023a etac caivobhayaṃ śrutvā samyak saṃpaśya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:4074: 2.103.023c uttiṣṭha tvaṃ mahābāho māṃ ca spṛśa tathodakam
GE09ram_02_u:4075: 2.103.024a athotthāya jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā bharato vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:4076: 2.103.024c śṛṇvantu me pariṣado mantriṇaḥ śreṇayas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:4077: 2.103.025a na yāce pitaraṃ rājyaṃ nānuśāsāmi mātaram
GE09ram_02_u:4079: 2.103.026a yadi tv avaśyaṃ vastavyaṃ kartavyaṃ ca pitur vacaḥ 2.103.026c aham eva nivatsyāmi caturdaśa vane samāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4080: 2.103.027a dharmātmā tasya tathyena bhrātur vākyena vismitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4081: 2.103.027c uvāca rāmaḥ saṃprekṣya paurajānapadaṃ janam 2.103.028a vikrītam āhitaṃ krītaṃ yat pitrā jīvatā mama
GE09ram_02_u:4082: 2.103.028c na tal lopayituṃ śakyaṃ mayā vā bharatena vā 2.103.029a upadhir na mayā kāryo vanavāse jugupsitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4083: 2.103.029c yuktam uktaṃ ca kaikeyyā pitrā me sukṛtaṃ kṛtam 2.103.030a jānāmi bharataṃ kṣāntaṃ
GE09ram_02_u:4084: 2.103.030c sarvam evātra kalyāṇaṃ satyasaṃdhe mahātmani 2.103.031a anena dharmaśīlena vanāt pratyāgataḥ punaḥ 2.103.031c bhrātrā saha bhaviṣyāmi pṛthivyāḥ patir uttamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4085: 2.103.032a vṛto rājā hi kaikeyyā mayā tad vacanaṃ kṛtam 2.103.032c anṛtān mocayānena pitaraṃ taṃ mahīpatim 2.104.001a tam apratimatejobhyāṃ bhrātṛbhyāṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:4086: 2.104.001c vismitāḥ saṃgamaṃ prekṣya samavetā maharṣayaḥ 2.104.002a antarhitās tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4087: 2.104.002c tau bhrātarau mahātmānau kākutsthau praśaśaṃsire 2.104.003a sa dhanyo yasya putrau dvau dharmajñau dharmavikramau
GE09ram_02_u:4088: 2.104.003c śrutvā vayaṃ hi saṃbhāṣām ubhayoḥ spṛhayāmahe
GE09ram_02_u:4089: 2.104.004a tatas tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ kṣipraṃ daśagrīvavadhaiṣiṇaḥ 2.104.004c bharataṃ rājaśārdūlam ity ūcuḥ saṃgatā vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4090: 2.104.005a kule jāta mahāprājña mahāvṛtta mahāyaśaḥ 2.104.005c grāhyaṃ rāmasya vākyaṃ te pitaraṃ yady avekṣase
GE09ram_02_u:4091: 2.104.006a sadānṛṇam imaṃ rāmaṃ vayam icchāmahe pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4092: 2.104.006c anṛṇatvāc ca kaikeyyāḥ svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4093: 2.104.007a etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ gandharvāḥ samaharṣayaḥ 2.104.007c rājarṣayaś caiva tathā sarve svāṃ svāṃ gatiṃ gatāḥ 2.104.008a hlāditas tena vākyena śubhena śubhadarśanaḥ 2.104.008c rāmaḥ saṃhṛṣṭavadanas tān ṛṣīn abhyapūjayat 2.104.009a srastagātras tu bharataḥ sa vācā sajjamānayā
GE09ram_02_u:4094: 2.104.009c kṛtāñjalir idaṃ vākyaṃ rāghavaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:4096: 2.104.010c kartum arhasi kākutstha mama mātuś ca yācanām
GE09ram_02_u:4097: 2.104.011a rakṣituṃ sumahad rājyam aham ekas tu notsahe
GE09ram_02_u:4098: 2.104.011c paurajānapadāṃś cāpi raktān rañjayituṃ tathā 2.104.012a jñātayaś ca hi yodhāś ca mitrāṇi suhṛdaś ca naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4099: 2.104.012c tvām eva pratikāṅkṣante parjanyam iva karṣakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4100: 2.104.013a idaṃ rājyaṃ mahāprājña sthāpaya pratipadya hi
GE09ram_02_u:4101: 2.104.013c śaktimān asi kākutstha lokasya paripālane 2.104.014a ity uktvā nyapatad bhrātuḥ pādayor bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:4102: 2.104.014c bhṛśaṃ saṃprārthayām āsa rāmam evaṃ priyaṃ vadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4103: 2.104.015a tam aṅke bhrātaraṃ kṛtvā rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:4105: 2.104.016a āgatā tvām iyaṃ buddhiḥ svajā vainayikī ca yā 2.104.016c bhṛśam utsahase tāta rakṣituṃ pṛthivīm api
GE09ram_02_u:4106: 2.104.017a amātyaiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca buddhimadbhiś ca mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4107: 2.104.017c sarvakāryāṇi saṃmantrya sumahānty api kāraya 2.104.018a lakṣmīś candrād apeyād vā himavān vā himaṃ tyajet 2.104.018c atīyāt sāgaro velāṃ na pratijñām ahaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4108: 2.104.019a kāmād vā tāta lobhād vā mātrā tubhyam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:4109: 2.104.019c na tan manasi kartavyaṃ vartitavyaṃ ca mātṛvat
GE09ram_02_u:4110: 2.104.020a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ bharataḥ kausalyāsutam abravīt 2.104.020c tejasādityasaṃkāśaṃ pratipaccandradarśanam 2.104.021a adhirohārya pādābhyāṃ pāduke hemabhūṣite
GE09ram_02_u:4111: 2.104.021c ete hi sarvalokasya yogakṣemaṃ vidhāsyataḥ 2.104.022a so 'dhiruhya naravyāghraḥ pāduke hy avaruhya ca 2.104.022c prāyacchat sumahātejā bharatāya mahātmane
GE09ram_02_u:4112: 2.104.023a sa pāduke te bharataḥ pratāpavān; svalaṃkṛte saṃparigṛhya dharmavit
GE09ram_02_u:4113: 2.104.023c pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ; cakāra caivottamanāgamūrdhani 2.104.024a athānupūrvyāt pratipūjya taṃ janaṃ; gurūṃś ca mantriprakṛtīs
GE09ram_02_u:4117: 2.104.025a taṃ mātaro bāṣpagṛhītakaṇṭho; duḥkhena nāmantrayituṃ hi śekuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4118: 2.104.025c sa tv eva mātṝr abhivādya sarvā; rudan kuṭīṃ svāṃ praviveśa rāmaḥ 2.105.001a tataḥ śirasi kṛtvā tu pāduke bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:4119: 2.105.001c āruroha rathaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ śatrughnena samanvitaḥ 2.105.002a vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābāliś ca dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4120: 2.105.002c agrataḥ prayayuḥ sarve mantriṇo mantrapūjitāḥ 2.105.003a mandākinīṃ nadīṃ ramyāṃ prāṅmukhās te yayus tadā
GE09ram_02_u:4121: 2.105.003c pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kurvāṇāś citrakūṭaṃ mahāgirim 2.105.004a paśyan dhātusahasrāṇi ramyāṇi vividhāni ca 2.105.004c prayayau tasya pārśvena sasainyo bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:4122: 2.105.005a adūrāc citrakūṭasya dadarśa bharatas tadā 2.105.005c āśramaṃ yatra sa munir bharadvājaḥ kṛtālayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4123: 2.105.006a sa tam āśramam āgamya bharadvājasya buddhimān
GE09ram_02_u:4124: 2.105.006c avatīrya rathāt pādau vavande kulanandanaḥ 2.105.007a tato hṛṣṭo bharadvājo bharataṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:4125: 2.105.007c api kṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ tāta rāmeṇa ca samāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:4126: 2.105.008a evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhīmatā
GE09ram_02_u:4128: 2.105.009a sa yācyamāno guruṇā mayā ca dṛḍhavikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4129: 2.105.009c rāghavaḥ paramaprīto vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abravīt 2.105.010a pituḥ pratijñāṃ tām eva pālayiṣyāmi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4130: 2.105.010c caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi ya pratijñā pitur mama
GE09ram_02_u:4131: 2.105.011a evam ukto mahāprājño vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:4132: 2.105.011c vākyajño vākyakuśalaṃ rāghavaṃ vacanaṃ mahat 2.105.012a ete prayaccha saṃhṛṣṭaḥ pāduke hemabhūṣite 2.105.012c ayodhyāyāṃ mahāprājña yogakṣemakare tava
GE09ram_02_u:4133: 2.105.013a evam ukto vasiṣṭhena rāghavaḥ prāṅmukhaḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4134: 2.105.013c pāduke hemavikṛte mama rājyāya te dadau
GE09ram_02_u:4136: 2.105.014c ayodhyām eva gacchāmi gṛhītvā pāduke śubhe
GE09ram_02_u:4137: 2.105.015a etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4138: 2.105.015c bharadvājaḥ śubhataraṃ munir vākyam udāharat 2.105.016a naitac citraṃ naravyāghra śīlavṛttavatāṃ vara 2.105.016c yad āryaṃ tvayi tiṣṭhet tu nimne vṛṣṭim ivodakam 2.105.017a amṛtaḥ sa mahābāhuḥ pitā daśarathas tava
GE09ram_02_u:4139: 2.105.017c yasya tvam īdṛśaḥ putro dharmātmā dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4140: 2.105.018a tam ṛṣiṃ tu mahātmānam uktavākyaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4141: 2.105.018c āmantrayitum ārebhe caraṇāv upagṛhya ca 2.105.019a tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā bharadvājaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4142: 2.105.019c bharatas tu yayau śrīmān ayodhyāṃ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4143: 2.105.020a yānaiś ca śakaṭaiś caiva hayaiś nāgaiś ca sā camūḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4145: 2.105.021a tatas te yamunāṃ divyāṃ nadīṃ tīrtvormimālinīm
GE09ram_02_u:4146: 2.105.021c dadṛśus tāṃ punaḥ sarve gaṅgāṃ śivajalāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:4147: 2.105.022a tāṃ ramyajalasaṃpūrṇāṃ saṃtīrya saha bāndhavaḥ 2.105.022c śṛṅgaverapuraṃ ramyaṃ praviveśa sasainikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4148: 2.105.023a śṛṅgaverapurād bhūya ayodhyāṃ saṃdadarśa ha 2.105.023c bharato duḥkhasaṃtaptaḥ sārathiṃ cedam abravīt 2.105.024a sārathe paśya vidhvastā ayodhyā na prakāśate
GE09ram_02_u:4151: 2.106.001c ayodhyāṃ bharataḥ kṣipraṃ praviveśa mahāyaśāḥ 2.106.002a biḍālolūkacaritām ālīnanaravāraṇām 2.106.002c timirābhyāhatāṃ kālīm aprakāśāṃ niśām iva 2.106.003a rāhuśatroḥ priyāṃ patnīṃ śriyā prajvalitaprabhām 2.106.003c graheṇābhyutthitenaikāṃ rohiṇīm iva pīḍitām
GE09ram_02_u:4152: 2.106.004a alpoṣṇakṣubdhasalilāṃ gharmottaptavihaṃgamām 2.106.004c līnamīnajhaṣagrāhāṃ kṛśāṃ girinadīm iva
GE09ram_02_u:4154: 2.106.005c havirabhyukṣitāṃ paścāc chikhāṃ vipralayaṃ gatām 2.106.006a vidhvastakavacāṃ rugṇagajavājirathadhvajām 2.106.006c hatapravīrām āpannāṃ camūm iva mahāhave 2.106.007a saphenāṃ sasvanāṃ bhūtvā sāgarasya samutthitām 2.106.007c praśāntamārutoddhūtāṃ jalormim iva niḥsvanām
GE09ram_02_u:4155: 2.106.008a tyaktāṃ yajñāyudhaiḥ sarvair abhirūpaiś ca yājakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4156: 2.106.008c sutyākāle vinirvṛtte vediṃ gataravām iva 2.106.009a goṣṭhamadhye sthitām ārtām acarantīṃ navaṃ tṛṇam
GE09ram_02_u:4157: 2.106.009c govṛṣeṇa parityaktāṃ gavāṃ patnīm ivotsukām 2.106.010a prabhākarālaiḥ susnigdhaiḥ prajvaladbhir ivottamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4158: 2.106.010c viyuktāṃ maṇibhir jātyair navāṃ muktāvalīm iva
GE09ram_02_u:4159: 2.106.011a sahasā calitāṃ sthānān mahīṃ puṇyakṣayād gatām
GE09ram_02_u:4160: 2.106.011c saṃhṛtadyutivistārāṃ tārām iva divaś cyutām 2.106.012a puṣpanaddhāṃ vasantānte
GE09ram_02_u:4167: 2.106.015c upayuktodakāṃ bhagnāṃ prapāṃ nipatitām iva 2.106.016a vipulāṃ vitatāṃ caiva yuktapāśāṃ tarasvinām 2.106.016c bhūmau bāṇair viniṣkṛttāṃ patitāṃ jyām ivāyudhāt
GE09ram_02_u:4169: 2.106.017c nikṣiptabhāṇḍām utsṛṣṭāṃ kiśorīm iva durbalām 2.106.018a prāvṛṣi pravigāḍhāyāṃ praviṣṭasyābhra maṇḍalam
GE09ram_02_u:4170: 2.106.018c pracchannāṃ nīlajīmūtair bhāskarasya prabhām iva 2.106.019a bharatas tu rathasthaḥ sañ śrīmān daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4171: 2.106.019c vāhayantaṃ rathaśreṣṭhaṃ sārathiṃ vākyam abravīt 2.106.020a kiṃ nu khalv adya gambhīro mūrchito na niśamyate 2.106.020c yathāpuram ayodhyāyāṃ gītavāditraniḥsvanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4172: 2.106.021a vāruṇīmadagandhāś ca mālyagandhaś ca mūrchitaḥ 2.106.021c dhūpitāgarugandhaś ca na pravāti samantataḥ 2.106.022a yānapravaraghoṣaś ca snigdhaś ca hayaniḥsvanaḥ 2.106.022c pramattagajanādaś ca mahāṃś ca rathaniḥsvanaḥ 2.106.022e nedānīṃ śrūyate puryām asyāṃ rāme vivāsite
GE09ram_02_u:4173: 2.106.023a taruṇaiś cāru veṣaiś ca narair unnatagāmibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4174: 2.106.023c saṃpatadbhir ayodhyāyāṃ na vibhānti mahāpathāḥ 2.106.024a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ jalpan viveśa vasatiṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4175: 2.106.024c tena hīnāṃ narendreṇa siṃhahīnāṃ guhām iva
GE09ram_02_u:4176: 2.107.001a tato nikṣipya mātṝh sa ayodhyāyāṃ dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4177: 2.107.001c bharataḥ śokasaṃtapto gurūn idam athābravīt 2.107.002a nandigrāmaṃ gamiṣyāmi sarvān āmantraye 'dya vaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4178: 2.107.002c tatra duḥkham idaṃ sarvaṃ sahiṣye rāghavaṃ vinā
GE09ram_02_u:4179: 2.107.003a gataś ca hi divaṃ rājā vanasthaś ca gurur mama
GE09ram_02_u:4180: 2.107.003c rāmaṃ pratīkṣe rājyāya sa hi rājā mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4181: 2.107.004a etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4182: 2.107.004c abruvan mantriṇaḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaś ca purohitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4183: 2.107.005a sadṛśaṃ ślāghanīyaṃ ca yad uktaṃ bharata tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:4184: 2.107.005c vacanaṃ bhrātṛvātsalyād anurūpaṃ tavaiva tat 2.107.006a nityaṃ te bandhulubdhasya tiṣṭhato bhrātṛsauhṛde 2.107.006c āryamārgaṃ prapannasya nānumanyeta kaḥ pumān 2.107.007a mantriṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā yathābhilaṣitaṃ priyam 2.107.007c abravīt sārathiṃ vākyaṃ ratho me yujyatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:4185: 2.107.008a prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ sarvā mātṝh samabhivādya saḥ 2.107.008c āruroha rathaṃ śrīmāñ śatrughnena samanvitaḥ 2.107.009a āruhya tu rathaṃ śīghraṃ śatrughnabharatāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:4187: 2.107.010a agrato puravas tatra vasiṣṭha pramukhā dvijāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4189: 2.107.011a balaṃ ca tad anāhūtaṃ gajāśvarathasaṃkulam 2.107.011c prayayau bharate yāte sarve ca puravāsinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4190: 2.107.012a rathasthaḥ sa tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4191: 2.107.012c nandigrāmaṃ yayau tūrṇaṃ śirasy ādhāya pāduke
GE09ram_02_u:4192: 2.107.013a tatas tu bharataḥ kṣipraṃ nandigrāmaṃ praviśya saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4193: 2.107.013c avatīrya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gurūn idam uvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:4194: 2.107.014a etad rājyaṃ mama bhrātrā dattaṃ saṃnyāsavat svayam
GE09ram_02_u:4196: 2.107.014e tam imaṃ pālayiṣyāmi rāghavāgamanaṃ prati 2.107.015a kṣipraṃ saṃyojayitvā tu rāghavasya punaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:4197: 2.107.015c caraṇau tau tu rāmasya drakṣyāmi sahapādukau
GE09ram_02_u:4198: 2.107.016a tato nikṣiptabhāro 'haṃ rāghaveṇa samāgataḥ 2.107.016c nivedya gurave rājyaṃ bhajiṣye guruvṛttitām 2.107.017a rāghavāya ca saṃnyāsaṃ dattveme varapāduke 2.107.017c rājyaṃ cedam ayodhyāṃ ca dhūtapāpo bhavāmi ca
GE09ram_02_u:4199: 2.107.018a abhiṣikte tu kākutsthe prahṛṣṭamudite jane 2.107.018c prītir mama yaśaś caiva bhaved rājyāc caturguṇam
GE09ram_02_u:4200: 2.107.019a evaṃ tu vilapan dīno bharataḥ sa mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4205: 2.107.021c bhrātur vacanakārī ca pratijñāpāragas tadā 2.107.022a pāduke tv abhiṣicyātha nandigrāme 'vasat tadā
GE09ram_02_u:4206: 2.107.022c bharataḥ śāsanaṃ sarvaṃ pādukābhyāṃ nyavedayat 2.108.001a pratiprayāte bharate vasan rāmas tapovane 2.108.001c lakṣayām āsa sodvegam athautsukyaṃ tapasvinām 2.108.002a ye tatra citrakūṭasya purastāt tāpasāśrame 2.108.002c rāmam āśritya niratās tān alakṣayad utsukān
GE09ram_02_u:4207: 2.108.003a nayanair bhṛkuṭībhiś ca rāmaṃ nirdiśya śaṅkitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4208: 2.108.003c anyonyam upajalpantaḥ śanaiś cakrur mithaḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4209: 2.108.004a teṣām autsukyam ālakṣya rāmas tv ātmani śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4210: 2.108.004c kṛtāñjalir uvācedam ṛṣiṃ kulapatiṃ tataḥ 2.108.005a na kaccid bhagavan kiṃ cit pūrvavṛttam idaṃ mayi 2.108.005c dṛśyate vikṛtaṃ yena vikriyante tapasvinaḥ 2.108.006a pramādāc caritaṃ kaccit kiṃ cin nāvarajasya me
GE09ram_02_u:4212: 2.108.007a kaccic chuśrūṣamāṇā vaḥ śuśrūṣaṇaparā mayi 2.108.007c pramadābhyucitāṃ vṛttiṃ sītā yuktaṃ na vartate
GE09ram_02_u:4213: 2.108.008a atharṣir jarayā vṛddhas tapasā ca jarāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4216: 2.108.009c calanaṃ tāta vaidehyās tapasviṣu viśeṣataḥ 2.108.010a tvannimittam idaṃ tāvat tāpasān prati vartate
GE09ram_02_u:4217: 2.108.010c rakṣobhyas tena saṃvignāḥ kathayanti mithaḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4218: 2.108.011a rāvaṇāvarajaḥ kaś cit kharo nāmeha rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4220: 2.108.012a dhṛṣṭaś ca jitakāśī ca nṛśaṃsaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4221: 2.108.012c avaliptaś ca pāpaś ca tvāṃ ca tāta na mṛṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:4222: 2.108.013a tvaṃ yadā prabhṛti hy asminn āśrame tāta vartase 2.108.013c tadā prabhṛti rakṣāṃsi viprakurvanti tāpasān 2.108.014a darśayanti hi bībhatsaiḥ krūrair bhīṣaṇakair api
GE09ram_02_u:4223: 2.108.014c nānā rūpair virūpaiś ca rūpair asukhadarśanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4224: 2.108.015a apraśastair aśucibhiḥ saṃprayojya ca tāpasān 2.108.015c pratighnanty aparān kṣipram anāryāḥ purataḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4225: 2.108.016a teṣu teṣv āśramasthāneṣv abuddham avalīya ca
GE09ram_02_u:4227: 2.108.017a apakṣipanti srugbhāṇḍān agnīn siñcanti vāriṇā 2.108.017c kalaśāṃś ca pramṛdnanti havane samupasthite 2.108.018a tair durātmabhir āviṣṭān āśramān prajihāsavaḥ 2.108.018c gamanāyānyadeśasya codayanty ṛṣayo 'dya mām
GE09ram_02_u:4228: 2.108.019a tat purā rāma śārīrām upahiṃsāṃ tapasviṣu
GE09ram_02_u:4229: 2.108.019c darśayati hi duṣṭās te tyakṣyāma imam āśramam
GE09ram_02_u:4230: 2.108.020a bahumūlaphalaṃ citram avidūrād ito vanam 2.108.020c purāṇāśramam evāhaṃ śrayiṣye sagaṇaḥ punaḥ 2.108.021a kharas tvayy api cāyuktaṃ purā tāta pravartate
GE09ram_02_u:4231: 2.108.021c sahāsmābhir ito gaccha yadi buddhiḥ pravartate
GE09ram_02_u:4232: 2.108.022a sakalatrasya saṃdeho nityaṃ yat tasya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:4233: 2.108.022c samarthasyāpi hi sato vāso duḥkha ihādya te
GE09ram_02_u:4234: 2.108.023a ity uktavantaṃ rāmas taṃ rājaputras tapasvinam
GE09ram_02_u:4235: 2.108.023c na śaśākottarair vākyair avaroddhuṃ samutsukam 2.108.024a abhinandya samāpṛcchya samādhāya ca rāghavam 2.108.024c sa jagāmāśramaṃ tyaktvā kulaiḥ kulapatiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:4236: 2.108.025a rāmaḥ saṃsādhya tv ṛṣigaṇam anugamanād; deśāt tasmāccit kulapatim abhivādyarṣim 2.108.025c samyakprītais tair anumata upadiṣṭārthaḥ; puṇyaṃ vāsāya svanilayam upasaṃpede 2.108.026a āśramaṃ tv ṛṣivirahitaṃ prabhuḥ; kṣaṇam api na jahau sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4237: 2.108.026c rāghavaṃ hi satatam anugatās; tāpasāś carṣicaritadhṛtaguṇāḥ 2.109.001a rāghavas tv apayāteṣu tapasviṣu vicintayan 2.109.001c na tatrārocayad vāsaṃ kāraṇair bahubhis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:4238: 2.109.002a iha me bharato dṛṣṭo mātaraś ca sanāgarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4239: 2.109.002c sā ca me smṛtir anveti tān nityam anuśocataḥ 2.109.003a skandhāvāraniveśena tena tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4240: 2.109.003c hayahastikarīṣaiś ca upamardaḥ kṛto bhṛśam 2.109.004a tasmād anyatra gacchāma iti saṃcintya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4241: 2.109.004c prātiṣṭhata sa vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca saṃgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4242: 2.109.005a so 'trer āśramam āsādya taṃ vavande mahāyaśāḥ 2.109.005c taṃ cāpi bhagavān atriḥ putravat pratyapadyata
GE09ram_02_u:4243: 2.109.006a svayam ātithyam ādiśya sarvam asya susatkṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:4244: 2.109.006c saumitriṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ sītāṃ ca samasāntvayat
GE09ram_02_u:4245: 2.109.007a patnīṃ ca tam anuprāptāṃ vṛddhām āmantrya satkṛtām
GE09ram_02_u:4246: 2.109.007c sāntvayām āsa dharmajñaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ 2.109.008a anasūyāṃ mahābhāgāṃ tāpasīṃ dharmacāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:4248: 2.109.009a rāmāya cācacakṣe tāṃ tāpasīṃ dharmacāriṇīm 2.109.009c daśa varṣāṇy anāvṛṣṭyā dagdhe loke nirantaram
GE09ram_02_u:4249: 2.109.010a yayā mūlaphale sṛṣṭe jāhnavī ca pravartitā
GE09ram_02_u:4250: 2.109.010c ugreṇa tapasā yuktā niyamaiś cāpy alaṃkṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:4251: 2.109.011a daśavarṣasahasrāṇi yayā taptaṃ mahat tapaḥ 2.109.011c anasūyāvratais tāta pratyūhāś ca nibarhitāḥ 2.109.012a devakāryanimittaṃ ca yayā saṃtvaramāṇayā
GE09ram_02_u:4252: 2.109.012c daśarātraṃ kṛtvā rātriḥ seyaṃ māteva te 'nagha
GE09ram_02_u:4253: 2.109.013a tām imāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ namaskāryāṃ yaśasvinīm 2.109.013c abhigacchatu vaidehī vṛddhām akrodhanāṃ sadā 2.109.014a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ tathety uktvā sa rāghavaḥ 2.109.014c sītām uvāca dharmajñām idaṃ vacanam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:4254: 2.109.015a rājaputri śrutaṃ tv etan muner asya samīritam
GE09ram_02_u:4256: 2.109.016a anasūyeti yā loke karmabhiḥ kyātim āgatā
GE09ram_02_u:4257: 2.109.016c tāṃ śīghram abhigaccha tvam abhigamyāṃ tapasvinīm
GE09ram_02_u:4258: 2.109.017a sītā tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavasya hitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:4259: 2.109.017c tām atripatnīṃ dharmajñām abhicakrāma maithilī 2.109.018a śithilāṃ valitāṃ vṛddhāṃ
GE09ram_02_u:4260: 2.109.018c satataṃ vepamānāṅgīṃ pravāte kadalī yathā 2.109.019a tāṃ tu sītā mahābhāgām anasūyāṃ pativratām
GE09ram_02_u:4261: 2.109.019c abhyavādayad avyagrā svaṃ nāma samudāharat 2.109.020a abhivādya ca vaidehī tāpasīṃ tām aninditām
GE09ram_02_u:4263: 2.109.021a tataḥ sītāṃ mahābhāgāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ dharmacāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:4264: 2.109.021c sāntvayanty abravīd dhṛṣṭā diṣṭyā dharmam avekṣase
GE09ram_02_u:4265: 2.109.022a tyaktvā jñātijanaṃ sīte mānam ṛddhiṃ ca mānini
GE09ram_02_u:4266: 2.109.022c avaruddhaṃ vane rāmaṃ diṣṭyā tvam anugacchasi
GE09ram_02_u:4267: 2.109.023a nagarastho vanastho vā pāpo vā yadi vāśubhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4268: 2.109.023c yāsāṃ strīṇāṃ priyo bhartā tāsāṃ lokā mahodayāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4269: 2.109.024a duḥśīlaḥ kāmavṛtto vā dhanair vā parivarjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4270: 2.109.024c strīṇām ārya svabhāvānāṃ paramaṃ daivataṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4271: 2.109.025a nāto viśiṣṭaṃ paśyāmi bāndhavaṃ vimṛśanty aham
GE09ram_02_u:4272: 2.109.025c sarvatra yogyaṃ vaidehi tapaḥ kṛtam ivāvyayam
GE09ram_02_u:4273: 2.109.026a na tv evam avagacchanti guṇa doṣam asat striyaḥ 2.109.026c kāmavaktavyahṛdayā bhartṛnāthāś caranti yāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4274: 2.109.027a prāpnuvanty ayaśaś caiva dharmabhraṃśaṃ ca maithili
GE09ram_02_u:4275: 2.109.027c akārya vaśam āpannāḥ striyo yāḥ khalu tad vidhāḥ 2.109.028a tvadvidhās tu guṇair yuktā dṛṣṭalokaparāvarāḥ 2.109.028c striyaḥ svarge cariṣyanti yathā puṇyakṛtas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:4276: 2.110.001a sā tv evam uktā vaidehī anasūyān asūyayā
GE09ram_02_u:4277: 2.110.001c pratipūjya vaco mandaṃ pravaktum upacakrame 2.110.002a naitad āścaryam āryāyā yan māṃ tvam anubhāṣase
GE09ram_02_u:4278: 2.110.002c viditaṃ tu mamāpy etad yathā nāryāḥ patir guruḥ 2.110.003a yady apy eṣa bhaved bhartā mamārye vṛttavarjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4279: 2.110.003c advaidham upavartavyas tathāpy eṣa mayā bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:4280: 2.110.004a kiṃ punar yo guṇaślāghyaḥ sānukrośo jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4281: 2.110.004c sthirānurāgo dharmātmā mātṛvartī pitṛ priyaḥ 2.110.005a yāṃ vṛttiṃ vartate rāmaḥ kausalyāyāṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4282: 2.110.005c tām eva nṛpanārīṇām anyāsām api vartate
GE09ram_02_u:4283: 2.110.006a sakṛd dṛṣṭāsv api strīṣu nṛpeṇa nṛpavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4284: 2.110.006c mātṛvad vartate vīro mānam utsṛjya dharmavit
GE09ram_02_u:4285: 2.110.007a āgacchantyāś ca vijanaṃ vanam evaṃ bhayāvaham
GE09ram_02_u:4286: 2.110.007c samāhitaṃ hi me śvaśrvā hṛdaye yat sthitaṃ mama 2.110.008a prāṇipradānakāle ca yat purā tv agnisaṃnidhau
GE09ram_02_u:4287: 2.110.008c anuśiṣṭā jananyāsmi vākyaṃ tad api me dhṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:4288: 2.110.009a navīkṛtaṃ tu tat sarvaṃ vākyais te dharmacāriṇi
GE09ram_02_u:4289: 2.110.009c patiśuśrūṣaṇān nāryās tapo nānyad vidhīyate 2.110.010a sāvitrī patiśuśrūṣāṃ kṛtvā svarge mahīyate 2.110.010c tathā vṛttiś ca yātā tvaṃ patiśuśrūṣayā divam
GE09ram_02_u:4290: 2.110.011a variṣṭhā sarvanārīṇām eṣā ca divi devatā
GE09ram_02_u:4291: 2.110.011c rohiṇī ca vinā candraṃ muhūrtam api dṛśyate
GE09ram_02_u:4292: 2.110.012a evaṃvidhāś ca pravarāḥ striyo bhartṛdṛḍhavratāḥ 2.110.012c devaloke mahīyante puṇyena svena karmaṇā 2.110.013a tato 'nasūyā saṃhṛṣṭā śrutvoktaṃ sītayā vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4293: 2.110.013c śirasy āghrāya covāca maithilīṃ harṣayanty uta
GE09ram_02_u:4294: 2.110.014a niyamair vividhair āptaṃ tapo hi mahad asti me 2.110.014c tat saṃśritya balaṃ sīte chandaye tvāṃ śucivrate
GE09ram_02_u:4295: 2.110.015a upapannaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca vacanaṃ tava maithili
GE09ram_02_u:4296: 2.110.015c prītā cāsmy ucitaṃ kiṃ te karavāṇi bravīhi me 2.110.015e kṛtam ity abravīt sītā tapobalasamanvitām 2.110.016a sā tv evam uktā dharmajñā tayā prītatarābhavat
GE09ram_02_u:4297: 2.110.016c saphalaṃ ca praharṣaṃ te hanta sīte karomy aham 2.110.017a idaṃ divyaṃ varaṃ mālyaṃ vastram ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:4298: 2.110.017c aṅgarāgaṃ ca vaidehi mahārham anulepanam 2.110.018a mayā dattam idaṃ sīte tava gātrāṇi śobhayet
GE09ram_02_u:4299: 2.110.018c anurūpam asaṃkliṣṭaṃ nityam eva bhaviṣyati 2.110.019a aṅgarāgeṇa divyena liptāṅgī
GE09ram_02_u:4300: 2.110.019c śobhayiṣyāmi bhartāraṃ yathā śrīr viṣṇum avyayam
GE09ram_02_u:4301: 2.110.020a sā vastram aṅgarāgaṃ ca bhūṣaṇāni srajas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:4303: 2.110.021a pratigṛhya ca tat sītā prītidānaṃ yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:4305: 2.110.022a tathā sītām upāsīnām anasūyā dṛḍhavratā 2.110.022c vacanaṃ praṣṭum ārebhe kathāṃ kāṃ cid anupriyām
GE09ram_02_u:4306: 2.110.023a svayaṃvare kila prāptā tvam anena yaśasvinā
GE09ram_02_u:4307: 2.110.023c rāghaveṇeti me sīte kathā śrutim upāgatā
GE09ram_02_u:4308: 2.110.024a tāṃ kathāṃ śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa ca maithili
GE09ram_02_u:4309: 2.110.024c yathānubhūtaṃ kārtsnyena tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:4310: 2.110.025a evam uktā tu sā sītā tāṃ tato dharmacāriṇīm 2.110.025c śrūyatām iti coktvā vai kathayām āsa tāṃ kathām 2.110.026a mithilādhipatir vīro janako nāma dharmavit 2.110.026c kṣatradharmaṇy abhirato nyāyataḥ śāsti medinīm 2.110.027a tasya lāṅgalahastasya karṣataḥ kṣetramaṇḍalam
GE09ram_02_u:4311: 2.110.027c ahaṃ kilotthitā bhittvā jagatīṃ nṛpateḥ sutā
GE09ram_02_u:4312: 2.110.028a sa māṃ dṛṣṭvā narapatir muṣṭivikṣepatatparaḥ 2.110.028c pāṃśu guṇṭhita sarvāṅgīṃ vismito janako 'bhavat
GE09ram_02_u:4313: 2.110.029a anapatyena ca snehād aṅkam āropya ca svayam
GE09ram_02_u:4314: 2.110.029c mameyaṃ tanayety uktvā sneho mayi nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4315: 2.110.030a antarikṣe ca vāg uktāpratimā mānuṣī kila
GE09ram_02_u:4316: 2.110.030c evam etan narapate dharmeṇa tanayā tava
GE09ram_02_u:4317: 2.110.031a tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dharmātmā pitā me mithilādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4318: 2.110.031c avāpto vipulām ṛddhiṃ mām avāpya narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4319: 2.110.032a dattvā cāsmīṣṭavad devyai jyeṣṭhāyai puṇyakarmaṇā 2.110.032c tayā saṃbhāvitā cāsmi snigdhayā mātṛsauhṛdāt 2.110.033a patisaṃyogasulabhaṃ vayo dṛṣṭvā tu me pitā
GE09ram_02_u:4320: 2.110.033c cintām abhyagamad dīno vittanāśād ivādhanaḥ 2.110.034a sadṛśāc cāpakṛṣṭāc ca loke kanyāpitā janāt
GE09ram_02_u:4321: 2.110.034c pradharṣaṇām avāpnoti śakreṇāpi samo bhuvi 2.110.035a tāṃ dharṣaṇām adūrasthāṃ saṃdṛśyātmani pārthivaḥ 2.110.035c cinntārṇavagataḥ pāraṃ nāsasādāplavo yatha
GE09ram_02_u:4322: 2.110.036a ayonijāṃ hi māṃ jñātvā nādhyagacchat sa cintayan
GE09ram_02_u:4323: 2.110.036c sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca mahīpālaḥ patiṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:4324: 2.110.037a tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā cintayānasya saṃtatam
GE09ram_02_u:4325: 2.110.037c svayaṃ varaṃ tanūjāyāḥ kariṣyāmīti dhīmataḥ 2.110.038a mahāyajñe tadā tasya varuṇena mahātmanā 2.110.038c dattaṃ dhanurvaraṃ prītyā tūṇī cākṣayya sāyakau
GE09ram_02_u:4326: 2.110.039a asaṃcālyaṃ manuṣyaiś ca yatnenāpi ca gauravāt
GE09ram_02_u:4327: 2.110.039c tan na śaktā namayituṃ svapneṣv api narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4328: 2.110.040a tad dhanuḥ prāpya me pitrā vyāhṛtaṃ satyavādinā
GE09ram_02_u:4329: 2.110.040c samavāye narendrāṇāṃ pūrvam āmantrya pārthivān 2.110.041a idaṃ ca dhanur udyamya sajyaṃ yaḥ kurute naraḥ 2.110.041c tasya me duhitā bhāryā bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4330: 2.110.042a tac ca dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ gauravād girisaṃnibham
GE09ram_02_u:4331: 2.110.042c abhivādya nṛpā jagmur aśaktās tasya tolane
GE09ram_02_u:4333: 2.110.043c viśvāmitreṇa sahito yajñaṃ draṣṭuṃ samāgataḥ 2.110.044a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 2.110.044c viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā mama pitrā supūjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4334: 2.110.045a provāca pitaraṃ tatra rāghavo rāmalakṣmaṇau 2.110.045c sutau daśarathasyemau
GE09ram_02_u:4335: 2.110.045e ity uktas tena vipreṇa tad dhanuḥ samupānayat
GE09ram_02_u:4336: 2.110.046a nimeṣāntaramātreṇa tad ānamya sa vīryavān 2.110.046c jyāṃ samāropya jhaṭiti pūrayām āsa vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:4337: 2.110.047a tena pūrayatā vegān madhye bhagnaṃ dvidhā dhanuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4340: 2.110.048c udyatā dātum udyamya jalabhājanam uttamam 2.110.049a dīyamānāṃ na tu tadā pratijagrāha
GE09ram_02_u:4341: 2.110.049c avijñāya pituś chandam ayodhyādhipateḥ prabhoḥ 2.110.050a tataḥ śvaśuram āmantrya vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:4342: 2.110.050c mama pitrā ahaṃ dattā rāmāya viditātmane
GE09ram_02_u:4343: 2.110.051a mama caivānujā sādhvī ūrmilā priyadarśanā 2.110.051c bhāryārthe lakṣmaṇasyāpi dattā pitrā mama svayam
GE09ram_02_u:4344: 2.110.052a evaṃ dattāsmi rāmāya tadā tasmin svayaṃ vare
GE09ram_02_u:4345: 2.110.052c anuraktā ca dharmeṇa patiṃ vīryavatāṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:4346: 2.111.001a anasūyā tu dharmajñā śrutvā tāṃ mahatīṃ kathām
GE09ram_02_u:4347: 2.111.001c paryaṣvajata bāhubhyāṃ śirasy āghrāya maithilīm 2.111.002a vyaktākṣarapadaṃ citraṃ bhāṣitaṃ madhuraṃ tvayā 2.111.002c yathā svayaṃvaraṃ vṛttaṃ tat sarvaṃ hi śrutaṃ mayā 2.111.003a rame 'haṃ kathayā te tu dṛṣḍhaṃ madhurabhāṣiṇi 2.111.003c ravir astaṃ gataḥ śrīmān upohya rajanīṃ śivām
GE09ram_02_u:4348: 2.111.004a divasaṃ prati kīrṇānām āhārārthaṃ patatriṇām 2.111.004c saṃdhyākāle nilīnānāṃ nidrārthaṃ śrūyate dhvaniḥ 2.111.005a ete cāpy abhiṣekārdrā munayaḥ phalaśodhanāḥ 2.111.005c sahitā upavartante salilāplutavalkalāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4351: 2.111.007a alpaparṇā hi taravo ghanībhūtāḥ samantataḥ 2.111.007c viprakṛṣṭe 'pi ye deśe na prakāśanti vai diśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4353: 2.111.008c tapovanamṛgā hy ete veditīrtheṣu śerate 2.111.009a saṃpravṛttā niśā sīte nakṣatrasamalaṃkṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:4356: 2.111.010c kathayantyā hi madhuraṃ tvayāhaṃ paritoṣitā 2.111.011a alaṃkuru ca tāvat tvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ mama maithili
GE09ram_02_u:4357: 2.111.011c prītiṃ janaya me vatsa divyālaṃkāraśobhinī 2.111.012a sā tadā samalaṃkṛtya sītā surasutopamā 2.111.012c praṇamya śirasā tasyai rāmaṃ tv abhimukhī yayau
GE09ram_02_u:4358: 2.111.013a tathā tu bhūṣitāṃ sītāṃ dadarśa vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4359: 2.111.013c rāghavaḥ prītidānena tapasvinyā jaharṣa ca 2.111.014a nyavedayat tataḥ sarvaṃ sītā rāmāya maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:4361: 2.111.015a prahṛṣṭas tv abhavad rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4362: 2.111.015c maithilyāḥ satkriyāṃ dṛṣṭvā mānuṣeṣu sudurlabhām 2.111.016a tatas tāṃ sarvarīṃ prītaḥ puṇyāṃ śaśinibhānanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4363: 2.111.016c arcitas tāpasaiḥ siddhair uvāsa raghunandanaḥ 2.111.017a tasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyām abhiṣicya hutāgnikān 2.111.017c āpṛcchetāṃ naravyāghrau tāpasān vanagocarān
GE09ram_02_u:4364: 2.111.018a tāv ūcus te vanacarās tāpasā dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4365: 2.111.018c vanasya tasya saṃcāraṃ rākṣasaiḥ samabhiplutam 2.111.019a eṣa panthā maharṣīṇāṃ phalāny āharatāṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:4366: 2.111.019c anena tu vanaṃ durgaṃ gantuṃ rāghava te kṣamam 2.111.020a itīva taiḥ prāñjalibhis tapasvibhir; dvijaiḥ kṛtasvastyayanaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4367: 2.111.020c vanaṃ sabhāryaḥ praviveśa rāghavaḥ; salakṣmaṇaḥ sūrya ivābhramaṇḍalam
